Trying to use on an iPad Pro, updated with the latest software.

title: Better Health because of homemade foods
body: I love this app in that it has a great variety of recipes from several sources, the ability to create shopping list is a nice feature. My family has loved almost every recipe that I have tried and I love being able to provide truly homemade food in hopes of healthier waist lines. We have cut preservatives out of our home and that has helped with Thyroid condition along with cholesterol counts.

title: Great but annoying sometimes
body: I love the app, but using it on my phone, if I‚Äôm scrolling through my ‚ÄúYums,‚Äù if I select one to look at the ingredients, then go back, it takes me back to the very top. I wish I didn‚Äôt have to scroll all the way back down (with intermittent loading of my recipes) to where I was. I think this app is great, but I have tons of recipes saved and it is a hassle scrolling all the way back down after viewing a recipe. If this gets fixed it would definitely be a 5 star rating from me.

title: Really like but
body: I really like this app but gave it 3 stars. The read is they always give me the same recipe pretty much every single day!! Rarely do they offer up something new. If they actually showed a different recipe for every day or every other day, I would give them 5 stars! Plus now they want you to subscribe to their Pro version, which if you do you then are allowed access to the videos of recipes from specific chefs. Why subscribe when I have 2 other cooking apps that allow me to access videos for free?

title: FoodFan
body: Love this app.  It‚Äôs one of my favorite go to‚Äôs for recipes.  There seems to be thousands.  Love that you can opt for food preferences, needs, allergies, etc.  Able to save and categorize recipes.  I must admit though, that a lot of recipes I saved have disappeared.  All in all if you‚Äôre looking for a recipe from seemingly any part of the world this is the spot to look.  Great for beginners and seasoned cooks alike.  Just give it a try and you‚Äôll fall in love.

title: Yummly Review
body: Pretty good app. Imaginative recipes. App is pretty easy to use. Still learning my way around the site.

title: Yummly
body: I finally started cooking again because of Yummly. There are so many choices in different categories that I could cook a different meal for my family every night for a year! The recipes are healthy, not complicated, and the desserts are amazing!!!!! I have digestive stomach issues and finding a meal for me isn‚Äôt difficult any more.

title: Love it! Use almost daily
body: I have been using the app for years and have built up quite a recipe book. I love that I can make notes about the recipes and read what others say. I also search for new recipes frequently using the detailed filters. I turned on a setting that I am vegan, and non-vegan recipes never show up (easy to flip on and off I‚Äôd needed though). Super handy for this busy mom!

title: Like Pinterest for food!
body: If you're like me and like to look up random recipes when you're in the mood to cook dinner or bake dessert, this is the perfect app for you! It's like Pinterest, shows photos of the recipe so you have a visual before you click. You can make shopping lists based upon your recipes and take this to the store! It's very interactive and pulls from several websites of recipes. I've used for 5 years.

title: It‚Äôs okay, generally
body: It‚Äôs generally great.  I hate that they place these super awesome recipes towards the front but you have to pay for them.  I‚Äôm also not much of a fan of having to read a whole story about the recipe before I actually get to the recipe.  But in general, it works.  I have made many things.  Read the comments on the recipe to get some suggestions and feedback...some things are very off on the ingredients and the comments will help direct you.

title: Mostly great.
body: Love the recipes from this app. Love the grocery list function, EXCEPT when you view the items by recipes there is a little minus symbol on the top right next to each recipe title. In most of the User Interfaces I‚Äôve seen for (almost anything) that is the HIDE symbol. I wanted to collapse that menu to see just the titles of the recipes. However, this removed them from my list... that seemed very counter intuitive and undid a lot of time I spent on my first experience with the app.

title: Love it, but can we thrown in the fridge?
body: Should add a ‚ÄòMy Fridge‚Äô feature of listing what you have in stock. Then the option to find recipes based on what you have would be even cooler, because you wouldn‚Äôt have to re-enter what you have on hand each time, and it would populate many more recipes as well as a handy tool when grocery shopping, ‚Äúoh do I have some of that? Let me check my Yummy fridge‚Äù.

title: LOVE this app!!
body: I‚Äôve been using this app to menu plan and organize my grocery list. I‚Äôve tried a bunch of the recipes and have loved them! It‚Äôs also so amazing that the app connects to your online grocery shopping accounts. That makes menu planning/shopping SO easy!!! It‚Äôs also wonderful that you can find a ton of recipes that fit whatever special diets you‚Äôre needing to accommodate. Highly recommend Ymmily!

title: Fantastic
body: Whenever I get in a food rut of eating the same thing I always find new tasty recipes to keep spicing things up with my dinners and lunches! Love this app and step-by-step instructions, nutrition facts, diet options and ingredients it provides. Would recommend app to cooks of all skill levels. Only downside is all the adds on the app when you try to scroll to find the directions. Otherwise no complaints!!

title: Yummy Yummly
body: I love this recipe index because it pulls from many different sources. I can often look at several of the same recipes and combine or subtract what I want. The pictures are great. It‚Äôs easy to use and generally has everything I‚Äôll look for when I‚Äôm wanting to make a certain recipe. I no longer have to have tons of books in my kitchen and sit there and look through them all for the right recipe.

title: This app is my all time favorite!
body: I literally tell everyone about this app and how it works because it saved my life! I didn‚Äôt know how to cook and hated cookbooks because there were usually only a handful of recipes I liked. I found this app and was able to teach myself how to cook, collect hundreds of recipes that I can use for my family and access them whenever I need them without a hassle. I love this app! ‚ù§Ô∏è

title: Everything is wonderful!
body: I use at least 3 times per week or more... always able to find recipes for what I have on hand‚Äîand even special trip to the store makes for wonderful dishes that even my finicky husband LOVES...amazing!

title: thank you‚ò∫Ô∏è
body: I cook for my family and I was getting bored with the same meals every week.  I was losing my passion for preparing meals! This app is amazing! It has a ton of recipes, easy directions, reviews so you can read on how others who‚Äôve tried to make the dish felt about how theirs came out or what they may want to do different. I love the lay out and the search tool. I normally don‚Äôt post reviews but this app is well deserving imo!

title: Love the ideas
body: I love the variety! I like looking up different ways to make one dish and decide which ingredients I think will fit my taste best! I like how it gets the recipes from multiple different sources too! The yum function makes it easy for me to save dishes I‚Äôm intrigued by and sorts them into nice categories too! I‚Äôve only used free so I‚Äôm not sure what else I‚Äôm missing with the premium but I‚Äôm happy with what is offered to me.

title: My go to
body: Yummly is my go to recipe finder. I have not found any that I don‚Äôt like. I love the fact you can just put one word  in search and it will list so many recipes!  So, if you‚Äôre stuck figuring out what to make and you have, for example chicken in the frig, and not sure what to make with it, use Yummly. You will be very pleased. Don‚Äôt forget to check out recipes for desserts, veggies, appetizers, etc. Yummly has it all.

title: In Love with Yummly
body: This is the best app for recipes and to be able to throw something together ASAP. I love all the features, like being able to search recipes by the ingredients you already have, and being able to omit the ingredients that you do not care for from your search options. This is a wonderful app. I have already begun experimenting more with recipes due to how easy this app is to use.

title: Annoyed
body: This app has been my go-to app for almost every recipe I have made for the past several years. One of my favorite features was the ability to mark a recipe as Scheduled and Made. It helped me keep track of my planning for the week as well as my grocery shopping.  But now, the only way to ‚Äúschedule‚Äù is to use the new $4.99/ month (!) Add to Meal Plan feature. I am annoyed and disgusted that you took the Scheduled and Made feature away and replaced with a $5/month feature.  Now I have to try to remember which delectable recipe I decided upon after reviewing dozens.

title: Super helpful
body: Yummly is the only free recipes app that I can find that does what I need it to do. I use it to make a meal plan every week for breakfast, lunches, and dinners for my family. I love how you can customize the number of servings on each recipe and add them straight to your shopping list. The only thing I don‚Äôt like is that you can‚Äôt edit items on your shopping list. If you need to change something you have to completely delete it and start over.

title: You never know what the updates will bring
body: When I first installed the app I loved it and used it quite often. One of the updates took the free meal planner/calendar away and began charging for something similar allowing a grocery list. The most recent update has a free grocery list, but now you can‚Äôt list your favorite ‚ÄúYum‚Äôs‚Äù in categories and now I have to search any new recipes. I wish it would go back to when I first downloaded it.

title: Amazing
body: You have to love the fact that there are other people‚Äôs reviews from when they made a certain dish are 100% real people. The people also recommend substitutes or different little tweaks that they have used which is great. My favorite thing about this app is the recommended dishes based on what diet you‚Äôre on. I‚Äôve used this app for weeks now and my family loves every dish I‚Äôve made thanks to Yummly!

title: Excellent App!
body: This app is the best thing that ever happened to my dinner table! Rather than having the same old dishes from week to week, now we open Yummly & look for something new to try. We also compare recipes to see what we would like given the ingredients in different takes of the same dish like our favorite pastas. It's easy to use & the filters make sticking to a dietary plan simple! Love the app!

title: A lot of recipes - functionality can be frustrating.
body: I enjoy searching by ingredients or specific chef. The functionality can be frustrating. I opened Yummly without logging in on a new device and the featured recipes had diversity that I don‚Äôt see, for instance: if I looked up banana bread last time, I will see mostly banana bread recipes for the next year.  Previously, the directions link took you to the owner‚Äôs site, now the directions are embedded and emailing a link includes a 250 character subject. Other than that, it‚Äôs great.

title: Wonderful
body: It delivers healthy delicious and exciting meals at a tap. Anywhere from simple to complex three course meals. It has a fluid interface and intuitive design that makes accessing what you want very simple. The emails they send you are customized to your preferences meaning they send you emails about what you are interested and a small suggested meal to widen your horizon. What can I say this app delivers what it says it will and more. Excellent!

title: Good collection
body: I enjoy this app and have made many of the recipes.  I like the option to save and organize recipes and shopping list feature.  The only down fall is that in order to access recipes you have to click on a link but 99.9% of the links have been reliable. I imagine we have more access to recipes via the links so I can't complain too much.

title: Awesome
body: Amazing app and has a variety of recipes to choose from. They offer suggestions for me personally and it is amazing. From easy to difficult recipes yummly has pretty much all.  Only snag i ran into was a few recipes that say 24 ingredients but in fact it is 12 because the recipe shows duplicates but if you are a seasoned cook or baker you will quickly recognize it. But that aside i absolutely love this app.

title: Good app, some flaws
body: There‚Äôs some really great functionality and innovation in this app. The login via email token instead of password is very undesirable and a poor authentication choice. The UX for my collections and Yum‚Äôd categories leaves a lot to be desired. A better thought out system for stuff I want to cook, and stuff I have already cooked would be great, but maybe I‚Äôm just not using the app right. Either way, I highly recommend this as the developers are very innovative.

title: I love love Yummly,
body: The Yummly app is so well done. It‚Äôs easy, intuitive and thorough in meeting the needs and desires of its interested user.

title: Love this App
body: I‚Äôve been using Yummly for several years now and have not been disappointed. I‚Äôve tried recipes in all forms and experimented with things I would otherwise not have tried. The reviews and alteration made by users is helpful.

title: Great food app with a lot of recipes
body: Very good app with plenty of recipes.  The Yummly app is user friendly and has great helpful categories and options to help you search, shop, and links for your recipe needs.  There are a variety of choices when you search, it‚Äôs like searching on google for certain recipes.  I definitely recommend this app if you need food ideas like I do.  Happy Cooking!

title: Most used app on my phone!
body: I love using this app to search for recipes based on my preferences. I also appreciate that i can search for recipes from other sources and find them they Yummly. title: Easy app
body: It‚Äôs just been about a week, but I‚Äôm loving this app already. title: Excellent
body: This is my go-to find-anything recipe ‚Äúbook‚Äù. Everything I‚Äôve tried has been delicious, since I have such good taste, and the filters keep out anything I‚Äôd rather not eat. title: Easy to use and makes it fun to cook!
body: It‚Äôs great for finding quick snacks, or large dinners to cook for the family. I love surprising my mom with the food I make, and the recipes are pretty easy to use. title: The great one says
body: I have been using this app for about a month and love how you can look up things from ingredients that you have and also whatever you‚Äôre needs are for diet or healthy eating and the shopping list helps me out when searching for things to cook in the future. title: Hard to figure out at first

It also has a feature that you can say you want to use up a certain item in your kitchen and search for recipes using it. But that‚Äôs hard for me to use. I think it‚Äôs because I expect it to be a find recipes based off of what you already have rather than focusing on just one item.

title: Yummyly is pure Yum!
body: This app is pure genius! I love this app. It has helped me continue on my vegan diet and cook so many great recipes. It‚Äôs also helped me come up with great recipes with food that I have had on hand. When I‚Äôve wanted to make something that I used to love when I was just a vegetarian or that I want to make for like a potluck but make vegan I just look up and bam I am sure to find at least 3 recipes. Thank you Yummly keep it up.

title: I love it
body: I am able to find great recipes & able to save them. I love that they have dietary categories which provide my precise needs. Thank you for helping me provide new choices of foods to my family. I‚Äôm not a great cook but am able to follow Directions & they turn out great. Yummly as changed my same old menu by providing so many new ideas. And it‚Äôs free except for the pro. I love this & no longer use BigOven!

title: Yummly for my tummy
body: Great app! I find all the recipes I need. I love the layout of ingredients then directions. It‚Äôs my go to all the time. I made Asian wings and brought them to work one day. My co worker loved them so much she slapped me. It was hysterically funny. I thought I did something wrong and she said don‚Äôt ever make something that delicious without warning me because I totally overate these wings. Needless to say I had to make them again.

title: Such an inspiration and time saver!
body: I love the fact that I can search through thousands of recipes, find things that we like or have ingredients for, then download the list to my Fred Meyer account and schedule it for pick up! Especially this year - it has been a real lifesaver. Maybe literally! Plus I hate spending time in a grocery store and this helps me avoid that. We‚Äôre hooked!

title: BEST of the BEST
body: I have at least 7 or more apps to either house recipes or find other cooking related items, etc.  But none have all wrapped into one app like Yummly!  The features are numerous and the pictures make you decide to try more than you started out to find!  Definitely my favorite app and I can‚Äôt wait to promote them once I get my new website completed.  Keep up the GREAT work Yummly!

title: Time saver!
body: I absolutely LOVE this app! It‚Äôs beautifully designed and very user friendly. The recipes are easy to follow and I love how the ingredients are listed before redirecting you to the recipe‚Äôs site.

title: Jmgladden
body: Love love love this app but every since update 3 days ago the app won‚Äôt open on my iPhone, when I touch the app to open it the home page comes on with the Yummly logo on the butchers block then in about 20 seconds or less it close itself üôÅ I hope this can be fixed my phone is updated to the most recent software & I have never had this happen before. Thanks

title: Great Recipe Resource!
body: Love this app for recipes, finding new sites with amazing recipes/food bloggers who have new takes on stuff I‚Äôve been looking for and ease of use. Also, as I have recently had to completely change my eating habits due to a major health issue, the ability to fine tune my searches and discover recipes specific to my - now pretty precise - dietary needs is a big plus! Love it!

title: Pretty good,Could be better
body: I like  Yummly and use it a lot. I am not thrilled with the search feature, it often serves up diff results on the same search and you can‚Äôt misspell anything. I guess I am a lazy speller since autocorrect. I also don‚Äôt some of the added features, for example when it asks if you made it ? Or want to add items to shopping list. These things just gunk  me up but I understand some people may find them helpful.

title: The Variety is Unmatched
body: I‚Äôve been using Yummly before I was diagnosed with hypothyroidism - before I got put on a strict gluten free diet. It‚Äôs amazing the amount of recipes I was still able to find going from an unrestricted diet to a gluten-free diet. My boyfriend is also a picky eater so that makes things even more difficult. And there‚Äôs still hundreds of recipes I can try cooking for us both. I would recommend this to anyone!

title: Only recipe catalog you need
body: This is my go to app for recipes. I can find everything I need in this one app. I have even found recipes that are the same as what my mom use to use. If I have a particular vegetable in the refrigerator, like an eggplant and not sure how I am going to use it, I just search ‚Äúeggplant‚Äù and I have a variety of great recipes to use it in. title: Setup is confusing-not vegetarian friendly
body: So, as a vegetarian the first thing I looked to do was ‚Äúfilter‚Äù ingredients. The filters showed a list of various foods with little ‚ÄúX‚Äôs‚Äù next to them. So i hit the X next to Pork thinking I was removing it from the list. But no, I got only pork recipes.  So I found a page finally for ‚ÄúDisliked‚Äù diets, with 2 lists: one side included many ‚Äúveg‚Äù diets but no mention of meat, the other was titled ‚ÄúAllergies‚Äù and had a list including ‚Äúgluten-free‚Äù, ‚Äúpeanut-free‚Äù etc, which made no sense. Perhaps the ‚ÄúDisliked‚Äù heading had no bearing on the sub-headings below it, but by now I‚Äôm unimpressed & unenchanted. Removed it.

title: Great variety of recipes!
body: Yummly has become my go-to for recipes.  I‚Äôve found some fantastic new ideas here!

title: Awesome app!
body: I‚Äôm so impressed with this app.  As background, I‚Äôm very savvy with my iPhone, iPad, desktop/laptop, etc... but I truly appreciate a user-friendly app (just like everyone else!).  And THIS ONE is amazing! So fun to use, easy to navigate... way better than Pinterest even, as far as recipe finding, pinning, etc. I‚Äôm so excited to have come across this app... and I‚Äôm already using it on the daily. ‚ÄîWell done!

title: Excellent way to figure out your meal plan!!
body: I have always had trouble coming up with ideas for dinner. I‚Äôd find myself doing the same old meal time after time. If I don‚Äôt have the ingredients on hand the app will ask you questions on what you fancy, such as what meat do you want to eat to how many ingredients you would like to use.

title: Dreams DO come true...
body: I‚Äôve searched and searched for a long time for an app that not only helps me search recipes and helps with grocery shopping but, finally, to complete my culinary needs it would find recipes I couldn‚Äôt think of by inputting what ingredients are on-hand. üëèüëèüëè BRAVO! The app has made my day. It has improved the pantry and it‚Äôs about to improve my skills in the kitchen and save me a LOT of money.

title: The best cooking app
body: The program is well thought out and designed. The scanning of ingredients is cool and works so well that it is faster than typing them. I appreciate the ability to adjust the recipe for number of servings especially since we recently had to make large batches for a church dinner. Love that Yummly is alway updating their program and how easy it is to customize for my family.

title: So convenient!

title: Amazingly Easy
body: I am days into Keto diet.  I know there's alot of info out there but this app gets me directly to what food I would like to try.

title: Frustrated
body: I have really enjoyed using Yummly for the past year or so. However, I hate the new chef inspired meals that you only get if you pay for the premium version. I don‚Äôt particularly care if they want to include those as part of the premium package, but don‚Äôt casually slip them into my recommendations as if they are available for me to look at only to then tell me that I have to upgrade to get them.

title: Love this app! I use it almost every day.
body: This app is so helpful! I love being able to change diet restrictions based on who is coming for dinner that night. I love being able to check out the ingredients list before the recipe. It‚Äôs so easy to use this app!

title: Always has the recipe I want!
body: I‚Äôve used Yummly for a couple of years. I always find the recipe I need. It redirects to linked recipes quickly , without glitches.  I love that it makes a grocery list for you. Super user-friendly - if I don‚Äôt need everything in a recipe I can just delete and I‚Äôm on my way. I also like the fact that it updates my calendar when I schedule a meal! Love this app!

title: Best recipes
body: Yummly always has the latest and greatest recipes, the best of whatever is trending. Yummly categorizes recipes in many convenient ways and always has multiple suggestions for any request. Yummly is the best and my go-to for any recipe, no matter what.

title: Great Variety
body: My go to recipe app! Love that there is recipes from all over the world-great variety of recipes. The layout of the app makes it so easy to use & it‚Äôs easy to get to my saved recipes. I love that you can set up a schedule for meals too. Easy to share my favorite recipes with my friends thru social media also. So many new recipes, that I stay busy cooking wonderful new dishes for my family weekly!

title: Farmers‚Äô Market Friend
body: This app comes in handy when I shop at my local farmers‚Äô market. If I find a particular item that looks too good to pass up or new to me, I do a quick search and find a meal using it. title: Great App, but
body: What I honestly believe would make this app 10,000x better, is if the instructions were included in the app so we wouldn‚Äôt be redirected to the website it came from. Only because, sometimes the websites don‚Äôt look that great on mobile and they‚Äôre harder to follow when I‚Äôm in the middle of cooking. title: The best recipe app ever
body: This app is a life saver.  I can find recipes of all kinds. Especially vegetarian and vegan recipes.  It‚Äôs my go to app whenever I‚Äôm short on ideas or want to make something a little different.

title: My favorite site
body: This is by far my favorite go to site for delicious recipes. When I don‚Äôt know what to fix for dinner out comes the IPad to search. Always member to make your own little additions or deletions, more one spice,, leave out another, substitute one cheese for another or use both. You will love Yummly!

title: Really Good!
body: I have found a lot of good recipes. I just lost 60 lbs so, I was looking for food that would help me maintain my loss. Very good food but, not fattening and my husband loves it! If I need a recipie I know where to look!

title: Yummy Is great, though the search option could be better
body: I use Yummly all the time, but the new filter isn‚Äôt useful (fast and easy, etc.). title: Love
body: This is such a great app! I‚Äôve gotten so many great recoveries from here! The best I‚Äôve seen! I like that it personalizes things I may like. This has Definitely been my go to app for when I want to be adventurous, which is always. I utilize the recipes and once I tried if I like I add my own take. I would recommend this nit makes me feel like a chef and I‚Äôve made so many great things from this!

title: I Love Yummly
body: I love the ability to create different recipe folders, such as Chicken Meals, Snacks, Vegan Dishes etc, which help me stay organized and makes it easier to plan what I want to cook and when.

title: Great app!
body: Yummly has helped me prepare many meals & dishes for my friends as family.   It has been especially useful to me since the pandemic had changed our routine nights out.   I turn to this page frequently and enjoy reading some of the stories along with the recipes.  My family enjoys my cooking - and I‚Äôm happy to say I love being in the kitchen working on perfecting a skill for them!

title: Meal planning lifesaver!
body: Like many others, I just want the family to eat right. This app has helped tremendously and to me one of the greatest features is adding recipe ingredients to the categorized shopping list!! Genius!! I have used 4 other apps but it was always for a specific feature, either recipe, or shopping list, or weekly meal planner. This helps me keep it all together in one place!

title: A life savor
body: We discovered my son had dairy, egg and beef allergies and I didn‚Äôt know what I could make for him. I found this app and put in what he was allergic to and there was the answer to my prayers. I‚Äôve found the most delicious and simple recipes here. I‚Äôve learned how to substitute items so he can have them and as a result, my whole family eats better now! Thank you for creating such an amayzing free app!

title: Love this App!
body: I absolutely love this app.  It gives such a variety and my whole family uses it!  I totally recommend this to everyone!  I used to be able to limit the recipes to only display ones with 10 or less grams of carbs and since one of the updates I can‚Äôt find that feature anymore.  Any hints would be greatly appreciated! I used that heavily since I do a Keto diet!

title: Joy is happy
body: I like this app a lot, it connects me to a variety of recipes and allows me to find recipes based off what I have in my fridge already. I will say that it would be better if I could narrow the search results when I try to find recipes for what I have already. There‚Äôs a surprising amount of recipes on how to simply make rice and is annoying to sift through.

title: Tunisian meatballs
body: OMG, this sounds so deliciously different that my mouth is watering as I read the directions.  I‚Äôve got most of the ingredients on hand and have prepped them and then off to the market to pick up the missing ones. Can‚Äôt wait to taste the finished product.

title: Wish ratings showed in list of recipes & directions were in the app
body: Wish the recipe ratings showed in list of recipes. It weighs time opening each recipe to see if it‚Äôs been rated one star or five stars by however many people. Then the directions are not listed in the app, like a normal recipe is expected to have... ya know ingredients then instructions directly below ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è I don‚Äôt get it. Really pitiful arrangement to instead re-direct all users, EVERY SINGLE TIME to a recipe blog website. I don‚Äôt have time to read through blogs to figure out where recipes are at when some bloggers hide them. Disappointed with Yummly‚Äôs setup.

title: Always have Yummly ready
body: Can‚Äôt say enough about this app! Had so many saved recipes on search engines and no way to organize. This has all the recipes I need -especially love the filter for certain food sensitivities or health concerns.

title: Finally - a way to sort the collections
body: I‚Äôve been using Yummly for years now. It‚Äôs one of my most often used apps but there are still a few features missing. One was actually just implemented though and I‚Äôm happy to see this!  It‚Äôs the sort collection feature. Yes!  I wanted forever to be able to see my collections alphabetically and now I can.

title: The New Update Freezes
body: I downloaded the new updated version of Yummly and the app doesn‚Äôt work they way it should. After going through the filters on a recipe, everything stops working. The recipe won‚Äôt open and I can‚Äôt get anything to work. At first I thought it was my screen, but after reinstalling the old version, which works, I know it‚Äôs the app itself. I can see that a lot of new features have been added and I really want to use it. Please fix it for me. Thanks.

title: Worked Great until the latest upgrade
body: I can still see the recipes I saved, but I can‚Äôt touch any recipe without the APP freezing up.  It‚Äôs also quite annoying to have the ‚Äúpro‚Äù pictures starting to overwhelm the others.  It would be great if you could either allow me to turn the pro recipes off, since I won‚Äôt be able to see them, or put them in a special place.  I know that probably doesn‚Äôt fit in with your marketing strategy, but it is likely to drive me to stop using what was a useful and interesting app.

title: Many, many recipes
body: It may take awhile to figure out the different ways to look for recipes but I can always find something to make or to give me ideas.  I am not a cook or baker but have found things to make no matter what the audience.  In fact I am making a Chinese meal for my book club, including vegan options for my vegan friend, because the book was centered on China.

title: Handy for finding new recipes
body: I use a couple recipe apps and I really like Yummly for the filters in particular. I am vegan and the app only shows foods I will eat. Other apps I have used don‚Äôt filter as well. I also like searching a certain ingredient I have to find a recipe I can use it in. Only issue is a lot of recipes do not have reviews and I like to hear reviews before trying a new recipe.

title: Good app but..
body: Thank you for making this app. I enjoyed the process of selecting my favorite cuisines, food allergies, and foods that I dislike. I felt the dessert section was lacking and I was disappointed to scroll through over 100 recipes for pumpkin and apple spice. I would rate this app five stars if a feature is built to incorporate all my recipes from my bookmarks and Pinterest into Yummly. I would use this app everyday. I also love the shopping list feature!

title: Great App!
body: Since another website/app I‚Äôve used for years seems to have stopped working as well, I had to find an alternative.  Yummly to the rescue!

title: Best Cooking App Known to Human Kind!!!
body: I love this app! It‚Äôs design around your cooking needs and wants. It introduces you to a lot of different cooking websites and there contain creator,  Which give you the a lot range in selecting a recipe. Sometimes I‚Äôve gone to one of Yum‚Äôs contributing sites and landed on a better meal ideal, which is always a little more exciting and unexpected for a person like me who only likes to cook and not love it.

title: Best recipe app hands down!!!
body: I love this app for many reasons but I love the fact that this app allows you to easily filter out ingredients you are allergic to or just don‚Äôt like... so when you search a food you don‚Äôt have to worry if your results will have ingredients you can‚Äôt have... Secondly, when you favorite a recipe (yum) you can add the ingredients to a list for easy shopping...

title: Great app, not a fan of the new update
body: I love this app and have been using it for years. I don‚Äôt like that in the. We update that you now have to have a subscription to add meals to your calendar. One of the best things I loved about this app was being able to schedule meals. I still

title: Great recipes
body: I started this when we cut down gluten, cut out processed sugar and increased fruit and veg in our diet. I was getting bored with the recipes I had. Since signing up for Yummly, I think 2 years ago, we have access to so many good, easy recipes that fit our diet and lifestyle. I look up full-gluten recipes also on occasion and they‚Äôve always been good. I use this almost every day!

title: Easy and helpful
body: I hate endlessly searching for recipes online and this app has solved that. I use it almost everyday. You can search by ingredients, preparation type (I‚Äôm an instapot pressure cooking addict) or type (breakfast, dinner, desert, etc) which is what makes it great and easy to use.

title: I check regularly
body: I lost are of my written down recipes when a pipe burst in my new condo.,and overnight flooded all the downstairs with boxes on the floor.

title: Good, but needs updates
body: Pretty user friendly, but would like it where you can add your own recipes so it‚Äôs all in once place. The grocery list concept and love how you can create a grocery list based on the items needed in a specific recipe. Not a fan on searching recipes: it always says that it can‚Äôt find anything or I‚Äôm too broad. I do not eat red meat, but will eat chicken and there is no friendly options for those that may want a veggie based dish, but the ability to add a specific protein.

title: If you downloaded this app you are a foodie
body: I love that it‚Äôs multiple way to cook something, or like ready set cook - ‚Äúthese are the only items I have in my kitchen‚Äù it‚Äôs great to have options or change your mind half way through looking because you feel like trying something with spice or tomatoes or kale (if you are into that) I‚Äôm not, but with this app - I can if I want to.

title: Dietary Preferences
body: I am having a major problem with searching recipes in certain categories. It won‚Äôt let me view recipes and asks me to adjust my dietary preferences. I thought I just had too many styles of food selected in my favorites, but that did not fix it. It is like it‚Äôs forcing me to put if I‚Äôm on a diet or don‚Äôt like any foods, but I am not on any diet nor do I have and dietary restrictions. I love all food. It did not do this before so I do not know what is going on. If that fixes I will for sure give it 5 stars!

title: Great App!
body: Great app! It lets you search for recipes easily. You can use different filters to search and can scroll through the photos of the recipes, which is my favorite part. I love that they now added reviews to the recipes. It also easily lets you take a quick look at the ingredients and you can organize your yummed (saved) recipes by category.

title: Cooking made easy!
body: I love this app! I used it so much during the summer months when I picked up seasonal vegetables at the Farmers Market. I love being able to put in one ingredient and have a variety of different recipes available. I usually have most of the ingredients on hand so it makes my meal planning simple. The collection tabs are great and I have a wonderful library of recipes started.

title: Loving Yummly
body: So far I‚Äôm loving Yummly. It has tons of recipes for basically any diet and it‚Äôs never been easier to create a shopping list. Also, being able to save my meals to my calendar makes it really handy on busy weeks where I have to plan ahead.

title: Amazing app!
body: I absolutely love this app! So informative. I‚Äôve recommended it to friends who were transitioning to veganism and/or vegetarianism. They loved being able to try new foods. They loved that they were able to see a list of ingredients and cook times. Also, the nutritional facts are also incredibly helpful to track calories. Will continue to recommend. And will continue to use!

title: Amazing üíï
body: I hate that I didn‚Äôt find this app sooner. It‚Äôs so convenient in every way. Before I was using Pinterest to find recipes and they were so hit or miss but on here nearly everything I have tried so far (about 7 different recipes) have all been üî•

title: Easy meal planning FINALLY
body: I‚Äôve run my rampant of meal planning services, and I finally feel like I‚Äôve settled on Yummly. An amazing diverse array of diet options, allergy filters and tried and tested recipes. Plus when I‚Äôm looking at a recipe I can add the ingredients I need to shopping list at the tap of a button, and use that list in the grocery store. No more scribbling on paper or using notes or reminders. Thanks, Yummly!

title: Terrible UI/UX
body: The pictures are great, and initially seems very appealing, but the actual usability is terrible. Try to find a recipe you like, and then add it to a saves list or collection. Guarantee for 1st time users takes you more than 5 minutes. Since, that's a main focal point of the app, that should be a red flag for whomever designed it. Make it easier to add recipes to lists--not just add ingredients for shopping. Make it more clear cut on organizing recipes, and categories. Tried to like and utilize the app more than once, and it's they try to over do it. Much better apps out there for organizing and finding recipes.

title: Who Needs Cookbooks?
body: Talk about broadening your horizons.  You have, at your fingertips, culinary masterpieces from around the world.  Beautiful app with helpful suggestions and ideas based on your dining preferences and diet.  This is my go to app for everything.  My husband enjoys telling everyone how he‚Äôs rushing home for a dinner that is so much better than dining out.  Thanks, Yummly.  You made it all possible!

title: Update has made this app frustrating
body: I‚Äôve used this app for a couple of years now and appreciate being able to save recipes and find new things to cool every so often. I don‚Äôt use this app as much as I used to simply because every time you open the app it now asks if you want to get Yummly pro. Stop asking me that every time I open the app! It also feels like it crashes more than it used to.

title: Keeps me organized!
body: In the overwhelming world of food blogs, this site allows me to keep it all straight. It provides inspiration for whatever ingredients you have on hand and gives you a way to save all your favorites in neat folders. Best of all, when you have it open while cooking, it stays active (doesn‚Äôt dim) I use this site at least once daily.

title: I freaking love this app!!!
body: Yummly is my favorite cooking app!! So many awesome recipes!! Plus if you are needing specific diet needs like allergic to dairy, gluten, vegan, &/or vegetarian they show you only what you want to see!!! They also have a cool trick about if you don‚Äôt know what you want to make but have a few specific items in you fridge of cub bard they can create a recipe from the items you have!!! LOVE THIS APP!!!!

title: I love this app!
body: I love Yummly. I am newly married and love trying out new meals and so far my experience has been great. I've been using this app for 9 months and usually do at least one Yummly meal a week. I've only found 1 bad recipe and the rest have been delicious. I have introduced this app to multiple people and they love it as well. If you like trying new recipes, this is the app for you!

title: Yummly
body: I really love the convenience of being able to store recipes from many different sources, but recently the app has asked me to update every time I enter the app.  I have tried deleting and reloading and this is not helping.  It‚Äôs very frustrating especially when I‚Äôm in the middle of making a recipe. Please fix the problem because I miss the convenience and the frustration is starting to outweigh the convenience.

title: Yumming This App!
body: I do a lot of cooking and will try about anything in the kitchen. My mother was a French Cooking Instructor years ago as a hobby and I‚Äôve always eaten amazing food. So since I likely wouldn‚Äôt find a girlfriend who liked cooking as much as my mom I had to learn on my own. Now I do a lot of the cooking. The app I simple and intuitive to use and saving a recipe for later is a snap. Keep up the good work.

title: Easy to navigate
body: I have had opportunity to make a couple of recipes and I like the ease of navigation on the app. Also, I have the ability to update preferences. I‚Äôve recently decided to eat more vegetarian meals, and was pleasantly surprised to find that I could update my preferences. There is also the ability to adjust allergens - since discoveries are made every day!

title: Yummly for recipes.
body: I‚Äôm recently retired and have always enjoyed cooking. With my wife still working for a couple years I have been doing the daily cooking. Yummly helps me every day plan a great meal. Tonight I searched chicken breasts and picked Melt in your mouth Chicken Breasts. Simple ingredients I had. Meal turned out great. When you search there are so many choices you will find one that you want to try. Great App

title: It‚Äôs okay
body: This app is kinda weird it does not actually have the directions on the app and you have to go to google to make the dish. A problem with going to google is the amount of pop-up adds there are and I have to scroll all the way to the bottom. Also when I‚Äôm reading a review of a dish on the actual app it gets really stiff and won‚Äôt let me read the second review. But I do think it is a decent app if you just want a place to find recipes and store them as well as keeps a shopping list 4/10 IF COST MONEY I WOULD NOT BUY!!!!

title: Yummly review
body: So many recipes. So many ideas tips and opportunities to purchase equipment. Even if you can‚Äôt afford to buy their offers of differant things if your a beginner cook like me you can see different options of things you need or can use to do specific kitchen tasks any buy a cheaper version elsewhere only complaint is some of the directions have measurements I‚Äôm not familiar with. Like 1 ‚Äújigger‚Äù but learning is part of the fun.

title: Best app I‚Äôve found
body: I‚Äôve used a few other apps to look for recipes but Yummly seems to be the only one with easy and delicious recipes. The app even allows you to add ingredients from your fridge to the search! It‚Äôs super useful! I also use the grocery list frequently because it tells you what recipe the ingredients are used in so I can plan out my purchases accordingly.

title: Makes family meal planning easy
body: I love that I can pick recipes for the week and compile a quick shopping list. I hate to cook, but have taken the responsibility from my husband for a while. This app has made it possible for me to plan meals for the week, shop, and made them in advance efficiently. I am normally stressed about meal planning and cooking, but this app has taken the stress out.

title: My first go-to for all recipe needs
body: You can literally find any recipe you could imagine on this app. Usually several variations of each recipe. I absolutely LOVE this app and use it daily! I‚Äôve found several new favorites by going through the daily suggestions. I love that you can search by ingredient and even nationality (daughters project for school). Even my dads go-to for dinner ideas now.

title: Amazing all-around!
body: Great photos (makes you hungry looking at them), wonderful variety of foods, and I love how they give you all the nutrition facts, and allow comments on the bottom. They help with modifications you can make or reviews of the outcome of the recipe. Also, a very cool feature is that you can tell it what you have in your fridge and it‚Äôll give you recipes for it.

title: Yay for Yummly
body: Yummly is a lifesaver! I‚Äôve never not been able to find a recipe I‚Äôm looking for in here, and they‚Äôre loaded with new, fresh ideas!

title: Love this app!
body: A mobile cookbook, I love it! You can save recipes right through the app, they have recipes that are kid friendly (especially helpful for moms or pick eaters). I also like that you can filter ingredients and take pictures and the videos they have. Also the built in grocery list for the recipe you‚Äôre going to cook. This app is the best. I have it on phone, iPad and laptop!! üëçüèº

title: Great. There are endless recipes to choose from.
body: I love this app! Finally I can keep all of my recipes in one place and I have an endless supply of new ones. It enables me to search for new things to make based on ingredients I have in hand, dietary restrictions, particular recipes, or if I‚Äôm just looking around. I love it. If you‚Äôre a novice cook or always in the kitchen you should check this out!

title: Great Recipe Collections
body: Recipes are like clothes to me, I don‚Äôt want to use the same ones too many times in a row.  I am constantly searching for new and interesting recipes to try.  Using this app has helped me save a whole lotta time otherwise spent coming up with keywords to direct me to JUST the right site for JUST the right recipe for JUST the right meal/ingredient preference/cooking time/etc.

title: Yummly, getting worse with every release
body: I used to look forward to my daily Yummly time, great ideas, great photos, but over the past several months it has been coming up very short of expectation. First, after the last two updates, most recipes have no pictures come up, just a black screen. Then as if that isn‚Äôt bad enough, when you look up recipes, many do not even come up with a result... or it is missing many versions of the Yummly of a year ago. I am starting to try and find other alternatives, I really hope they get their app together soon.

title: Yums popularity icon too small
body: I love the app but the little number icon that shows how popular a recipe is is what too small or the font is just too light to see very well. It would also be really handy to filter those recipes by most popular.

title: Wonderful App!
body: I can‚Äôt tell you how much this app has helped me and my family. Not only are the recipes abundant and clear to follow. But, they can easily be found for people who have gluten allergies, dairy allergies, vegan or vegetarian preferences and for everyday folks. So I want to thank the team and contributors at Yummly. You have helped make our lives adventures as well as a little yummy. 10/10!

title: Great App during pandemic
body: Since I‚Äôve been home conducting Distance Learning, I look forward to cooking! My husband is considered the ‚Äúchef‚Äù of the house (he‚Äôs an excellent cook), but this app provides many recipes with the ingredients that I have on hand. My daughter and husband have been giving me two thumbs up! I also pay attention to the reviews, which have really helped.

title: It‚Äôs all there
body: I love to browse this place. So many choices. Now you can watch chefs cook. I pay attention to each recipe reviews, why because the recipes are from all over and not all are great. Most are but you can sure look at one recipe and see at least 10 more then choose. I like to add my review after making one as I rely on the reviews. Enjoy I do.

title: What happened?
body: This use to be the best app ever.  It was updated and now I have to sign in every time I want to use it to get me saved recipes. It is a pain whenever I want to quickly use the app, and I have to type a name and a password. I do not need all the extra like some people . I want to open the app, save a recipe, or use search to find a receipt. I would really like the simpler app you once had before theses last two updates. The app, to me, is not as user friendly.

title: Great Selection of Recipes!
body: Easy app to use, great selection, love the filters and store list options! I spend way too much time on this app, but it‚Äôs a rewarding experience and pays off at mealtimes! No matter if you‚Äôre looking for variety, easy and fast, something new, a challenging recipe, a certain number of ingredients....name it, you‚Äôre most likely gonna find it right here.

title: Go-to recipe bases
body: This is my go-to starter recipe app/site. There are so many incredible recipes in here! Not all are winners, but if you do dig around you will indeed find some gems. And boy are there some gems‚Ä¶ (search for inside out chocolate chip cookies - holy schinkes) Like any cooking venture, find a recipe you like and modify it until it‚Äôs perfect! I‚Äôll be back again and again. Thanks for this amazing resource!!

title: A Small Problem
body: This may just be on my end, but ever since a few months ago, I haven‚Äôt been able to organize my recipes like I used to. I tap Yum but the option to further organize my recipes into Dinner, Breakfast, and so forth no longer shows up and I can‚Äôt find out how to organize my recipes at all. I‚Äôve tried searching online and trying ever button on the app but no luck.

title: Great for food allergies
body: If you have foods you need to avoid , this app is perfection!

title: Seriously the best cooking/recipe app!
body: This app is super well-organized, which is a huge plus if you‚Äôre constantly trying to learn a new recipe. You can save them into different folders, which makes it so much easier having to look for it later on. Not to mention it literally has every recipe you could think of! Just the best!

title: Doesn‚Äôt work from suggestions in email
body: I love this app and use it often but it simply doesn‚Äôt work from the suggestions they send you in the emails. It‚Äôs so frustrating to click on a recipe from within an email or try to Yum it and it just doesn‚Äôt work. It sends you out of the browser or wants you to log in to the app and then you completely lose the recipe you were on. Grrrr

title: Joe Ames
body: There are so many recipes to chose from its incredible. From beginner to expert. Whatever your cooking skills are you can go wrong with this app. The fact that you can download all your ingredients while looking for a meal to make is awesome. It‚Äôs so cool to have. My friends and family are impressed with my cooking skills. I recommend this app to everyone I know cause everyone loves to eat.

title: My go to site for cooking and baking!
body: I have so many cook books, but I find myself going to Yummly anytime I want to cook and bake later. My family and I have loved the recipes I have tried and the advice from other users for adjustments they have made along the way. I have used a few recipes multiple times already. And it‚Äôs very user friendly.

title: Great app to have for anyone
body: I‚Äôm a college student, so I really enjoy being able to look for quick meal recipes and mixed drinks that I can make with the ingredients I have lying around. The app also tries to pick out meals that you like which is nice if I‚Äôd like to make a really nice meal. I can also save favorites and mark down ingredients I need for my shopping list right in the app.

title: Great meta site
body: I enjoy Yummly because it compiles all the sites I want to search but don‚Äôt have time to keep up with. By using Yummly I get to find new interesting recipe tailored to my preferences. I also like that I can search one site and get several options for a specific dish I want to cook. I enjoy looking at them all and taking the best pieces to make a version that is tailored to me.

title: Obsessed
body: I love Yummly. I have been using the desktop version and the app for years. It helps me to find recipes that meet my dietary preferences and gives me suggestions that I always love. It‚Äôs easy to share recipes with friends, prep for the store, make an ingredient substitution and really any convenience I need. Not to mention site and app are beautiful!! I recommend this app to everyone.

title: Best planning-Best recipe options
body: I've downloaded several apps in the last weeks-to compare and narrow down to the fewest. I'm deleting all of the others. This app is amazing!! One thing I would like to have is some kind of interface-a simple, quick way to add items to my Kroger/Smith's shopping list. One day! Thanks for making life more deliriously easy.

title: Absolutely Love the App !
body: This app is awesome! You can easily select your meals ! Plan them out for what days you will have them and create and send a shopping list to your local grocery store üè¨! This is a huge weekly time saver using this app plus the app being able to easily connect to your grocery store and add the needed ingredients to your shopping list !!! Love it !!!

title: Crashing Problem
body: Love the easy access to a plethora of recipes from numerous foodies, the tools to create shopping lists, and the ability to search for recipes per ingredient. Unfortunately, after the site was updated, it continually crashes when I try to do anything other than the preliminary search for a recipe. The screen freezes and it‚Äôs not my iPad. Is there any way to fix this issue? Otherwise, when it works, this is a five-star site.

title: Out with the old...in with the problems.
body: The Yummly app used to be amazing in helping me with finding recipies for years. Being in a culinary class, finding reliable recipes can be hard. Ever since the app was updated and I was forced to install a new app (since the old one apparently was discontinued), I have had nothing but problems. I have tried clearing the cache, logging out and logging back in, uninstalling and reinstalling but as soon as I open the app and tap on a recipe it freezes up before I can even see open it.

title: Great stuff! One of the best meal planning apps.
body: Only suggestion I would make is to better organize the grocery list. I hate seeing the exact measurements because it confuses me - it would be more reasonable to just write ‚Äúone lime‚Äù or ‚Äúalmond meal‚Äù, but I can see that other people would feel the opposite. It‚Äôs such a great app the recipes are genuinely yummy!!! A lot of apps similar don‚Äôt have yummy goods - just weird concoctions. I‚Äôm a vegan and this has helped my transition a ton.

title: I got my entire family hooked!
body: I have a huge family with various level of busy and cooking skill. We were talking about it over the holidays and I mentioned the app. The parents in my family loved it. The kids go through and pick out what they like...less mealtime bickering plus the kids get excited and want to be involved with making the meal.

title: Great meal planning app!
body: Super helpful, well organized and easy to use. Massive database of recipes. Love the calendar link and shopping lists.

title: Really love this app.
body: Lots of good recipes. You can adjust for # of servings and even lets you know when to start what so things are ready at the same time. I‚Äôve used this for meals every night last week and really love how easy it is to use. Comments from people who have already tried recipes really helpful as well for any tweaks you may want to make.

title: Nice Recipe App
body: This app compares very favorably to the Epicurious app.  Gorgeous pictures, nice display. The only drawback In my book is that it is slightly clunky to search. You have to go back and forth between screens in order to do so.   Least ways, I think it could be a little bit more intuitive than it is. Otherwise I have already made some good meals from it!

title: Best ever!!
body: I have been using yummly for years now because it is so easy to use and has the most diverse recipes in one place and the most ways to plan a meal! I use it for holidays and parties and people are always wowed! It‚Äôs makes it easy to make a dinner in under 20 min or you can customize how much time and ingredients ways you want to cook and so much more!! It‚Äôs the best!! Ever!

title: iPad: app won‚Äôt allow me to sign into my account
body: This is now the second version of the Yummly app for iPad that won‚Äôt allow me to sign into my existing account.  I can‚Äôt access my saved recipes, etc.   When I open the app, I am invited to create a new account, which is silly because I already have one.  There is no option to sign into an existing account.  That rates a ‚Äú0 stars‚Äù from me, but when I try to create a new account I get the message ‚ÄúOops, something went wrong‚Äù.   Altough the lowest allowed rating is 1 star, if it were possible I would give this app a negative 1.

title: My go to for recipes
body: I love this app for the ability to search recipes with ingredients I have on hand, it eliminates trips to the store some evenings. It also gives me great inspiration for new dishes and ideas. The shopping tab that allows tracking of ingredients needed for each recipe comes in handy and I can manually add or eliminate items as necessary. My go to cooking app!

title: My go-to recipe source
body: Yummly is just what you‚Äôre looking for; a goldmine of recipes! You can search for specific ingredients or methods of preparation. I love the variety. It is often the first place I look when I want to try something new. My only complaint is that the nutritional information is not always accurate because the servings aren‚Äôt included.

title: Love it.
body: I use Yummly often and they should pay me for advertising by how often I recommend it. Great filters. I wish there was a way ( Maybe there is and I‚Äôm missing it) to save favorites I want to repeat. I also hate that if I have a recipe up, it doesn‚Äôt stay there so I have to re-find it.

title: Use all the time
body: Easy to find great recipes and a very user friendly app. I like the recommendations they send you because they are spot on with what I like. I like the reviews and number of likes because it can help filter through recipes faster. My favorite part is that you can search for recipes based on what you have in your kitchen.

title: Almost unusable without Facebook
body: If you don't have Facebook, don't even bother. The app won't stop prompting you to sign in with your Facebook account.

title: My favorite meal planning app!
body: So many ways to personalize and schedule meals, nice grocery list feature. I‚Äôm a working mom that feels behind all the time but this app helps me stay on top of our weekly meals. I organize the week‚Äôs meals and schedule them onto our family‚Äôs shared calendar then easily share the grocery list with my husband to do the shopping.

title: Simplify!
body: I love the ability to search recipes (with filters for diet or allergy), schedule them for the week (with reminders of when to start!) and the ability to make a shopping list right from each recipe (with notes on which ingredients are for which recipe). Great app, have already recommended to family and friends!

title: Love it (mostly)
body: Love having all recipes in one place. Sometimes the links to directions don‚Äôt work and that can be frustrating. Love when there are embedded reviews from users on recipes but sometimes those seem to be missing or maybe folks just are not using the feature. Also love that you can create a shopping list or a meal from what you have available

title: I love this app!
body: I have looked at a lot of recipe and meal planning apps and this one is the one that works the best for me.  This app has dietary preferences like gluten free, vegan, vegetarian, etc.  I can save recipes I like to my own ‚Äúfolders ‚Äú.  AND...I can schedule a recipe for a certain day/time!  It fits right into my phone‚Äôs calendar and alerts me when it‚Äôs time to start prepping, etc. I love this app! It‚Äôs a win for me.

title: Provide a Quick View, Please
body: Overall, I like this app. My only complaint is that when you click on the directions, it takes you to a website where you always have to scroll through a long introduction/narrative and pop-up ads to get to the actual step-by-step directions.

title: Perfect
body: I struggle getting ideas for dinners. That‚Äôs why I got the app. I didn‚Äôt realize it had SO much more than that, breakfasts, sides, drinks, there‚Äôs seasonal stuff, you can choose many options for your dietary needs. This app is amazing. I refer it to everyone who asks me for ideas. The best part, they have a ‚Äúkid friendly‚Äù option. My 2 year old is in her picky phase and this is wonderful!

title: This is the best app ever
body: When I get this app I did it because I was starting my vegetarian life, between work and the house I barely have time to do new meals, but I find this amazing app that helps A LOT at the time to do some new Recipes and change our daily routine, if you are trying to lose some weight THIS IS THE BEST too, pretty healthy, definitely I LOVE IT, thank you team for this!!!!!!!!

title: Fantastic for everything!
body: This app has made my life significantly easier. Every recipe I have made from this app has been amazing. It categorizes recipes by different types of food and it provides recipes based on food interests and avoids foods you dislike! This app also includes a category for kid-friendly food which also has significantly boosted my rating.

title: Yummly would get a 5 star rating if...
body: If, via the emails or the app, I would be able to get the ingredients and directions to fit in 1 screen shot, I would love Yummly. When I select print, it doesn‚Äôt give a clear screen shot. I‚Äôm not always near a printer when I‚Äôm perusing the recipes. Otherwise, I have found new, more interesting recipes that have definitely been family pleasing, ie:

title: Love this app
body: Love the amount of recipes and have made quite a few. Some I tweaked for my family and some were exactly on the mark. But I think that‚Äôs what makes a great recipe... it can be adapted for you.

title: Amazing but short a few features
body: I love this app as you can find recipes anywhere and upload them to yummily if someone hasn‚Äôt already. It‚Äôs all your favorite recipe sites in one!

title: Absolutely Amazing!
body: I got this app not expecting a lot, but it‚Äôs been super helpful and has delicious recipes on it. I love how it helps you create a shopping list, and also allows you to buy kitchen appliances/utensils online, and the prices are fairly cheap, too! My boyfriend and I have made a couple dishes using this app, and so far we love it! My mom and his mom also find it interesting

title: Phenomenal
body: I‚Äôm a meal delivery service addict.  But this does it for you when you prefer to cook, it lets you save the recipe, But the best part is it takes you to another app that downloads the grocery stores in your area and I helps make a grocery list giving you the exact ingredients you need to buy to make that recipe at that store.  Easy. No forgetting anything!

title: So fun! And a little glitchy with the ads sometimes
body: Beautiful pictures and easy to use format for the most part. Love the diversity of recipes available. It makes searching for something easy! I don‚Äôt really like the way it makes you go to a recipe‚Äôs original blog page and then you have to deal with all the advertisements and glitches that come from them to get the directions.

title: Best Recipe App Online
body: Absolutely LOVE YUMMLY!!  This application takes recipes from all over the web, and puts them in one place! I‚Äôm organized, and can find my favorite recipes from my favorite sites!!  Plus you can, search, browse most popular, rate them, and make a grocery list!!! Thanks to Yummly, I‚Äôve gotten out of the ‚Äúsame meal slump‚Äù and made some amazing food for my family!!!

title: Great app, wonderful recipes, however it could have better search options
body: Great app for tons or recipes. It could have better search options for techniques and recognize multiple definitions of a word in a recipe, such as when searching  butternut squash ‚Äúpasta‚Äù it gave fewer options than when I entered something specific like butternut squash ‚Äúlasagna‚Äù.

title: Buyer beware, Used to be my go to for recipes
body: I used to Love this app. Just wish there was more ethnic food options. I‚Äôve had this app for a few years now and it‚Äôs since been converted to a pay for service kind of app I‚Äôm so sad to see it go this way. They should have kept it free for those of us that have been loyal. Also I don‚Äôt understand why they are charging if the recipes come from actual users and different areas from the internet. I will just stick to google and actual cookbooks from now on.

title: Dropped from 5 star to 3
body: I love the Yummly app and have used it extensively for a couple years now. I rated it 5 star but have changed that to 3 today simply because the shopping list does not tell you how much of the ingredients you need. Kinda hard to know how much of something to buy based on your list. I‚Äôm pretty sure the app used to have how much of each ingredient in the shopping list. Please update the app to show how much is needed in the shopping list.

title: Great app!
body: Pros:

title: Best app ever for meal planning with allergies!
body: I'm in love with this app, I can't eat gluten or dairy and I'm able to put in allergies and have only recipes I can eat pop up! Then I can take them off to find recipes for my family. Oh and it has an option to all all of the ingredients to a shopping list or you can pick the ones you need to buy. Saves me so much time!!

title: Awesome app
body: I LOVE this app! I use it all the time. Sometimes I follow recipes just how they are, other times I put my own spin on it. I have never been disappointed... Every recipe I have tried has been fantastic. The whole family enjoys the yumminess too!! There are simple recipes as well as more complex ones which makes it great for everyone. Highly recommend!

title: Healthy home cooked & created
body: Yummly has been my go to ap for a few years now. I have used the schedule a meal feature and like that is gives you ingredients to shop for a recipe. I also like that I can create my own favorites in a list. There are so many wonderful choices of so many kinds of food! They are a clearinghouse for many chefs.

title: Good Way to Find Recipes
body: It's been an awesome way to find recipes. My only quibble is that it's a bit tough to use due to it not having buttons properly labeled so I can easily use it with VoiceOver. However, all in all, I have to say that I have been pleased with the app and have been able to find some delicious recipes and new food blogs to follow by using this app.

title: It is the best
body: Wow! Where do I begin. This app has been my lifeline to cooking. Who needs a cookbook when you have Yummly. Unfortunately my phone screen gets really dirty because my food stained fingers are all over it but this app has ‚Äúeverything ‚Äú. I just put in a buzz word and up a recipe comes. I‚Äôm bragging on you guys to anyone who will listen. Thank you, Thank you, Thank you.

title: It‚Äôs okay
body: I enjoy Yummly a lot though I have a few gripes.

title: Love it but having some issues
body: I love this app, its so easy to find recipes, set cook times so you can get dinner done on time and create shopping list. The issue I have been having recently is that the app isn‚Äôt loading when click to open it. It shows an icon of a pot with steam coming out but that‚Äôs it. It never loads after that, hope you guys will be able to fix this bug.

title: I used to love this
body: I no longer love Yummly since they upgraded and created a two step login.  I now have to click the button to logon using iPhone, open an email they send, then click the link in the email.   I have to do this every time I want to use the app.  I do still love the integration Yummly has with scheduling onto my calendar and downloading the shopping list onto my regular shopping list. And of course, I love finding the awesome recipes that suit our tastes.

title: Love the App but needs Air Fry option
body: This app is great. When I first downloaded it their was an option to look for air fryer recipes. But awhile ago that option disappeared in techniques. Please bring it back. That is basically how I cook everything now. I know a lot of people who are looking for ways to find more air fryer recipes. Bring that back you it gets 5 stars

title: Something for everyone
body: I‚Äôve loved using Yummly and its my first go-to when looking for a recipe. It doesn‚Äôt seem to matter if I have something specific in mind or if I need to search based on a couple of items I have on hand, I always find a recipe. The app is simple to use and handy to have right there on my phone to follow as I‚Äôm cooking.

title: The vegan recipes are great
body: I really like how I can choose dietary preferences and they are the ones that show up always, even in the emails sent.

title: Great app
body: It‚Äôs really a great app. I only have one minor quibble and that‚Äôs when I receive emails with recipes I might like, whenever I click on the link it doesn‚Äôt take me to the recipe. It takes me to the homepage and I end up having to search for the recipe. Sometimes I find it, sometimes I don‚Äôt. It‚Äôs a little frustrating. Otherwise, if I‚Äôm just searching for recipes on my own it‚Äôs a fantastic tool.

title: Used to be good
body: This app used to be our go to recipe app, but it has been getting progressively worse. There are now times where 6-8 recipes in a row are the same thing just different interpretations. Also they are really trying to force the use of Yummly Pro, in fact as I was scrolling though I just had 18 recipes in a row that were from Yummly Pro.

title: Love!
body: Great app! Makes it easy to try all kinds of recipes. It's nice to try something new once in a while or needing a cookbook or tracking something down on the Internet and printing it  out at work and bringing it home from work to make. The other nice thing is that having the recipe on my phone means that I am never guessing at my amount of ingredients.

title: Variety and Ease of Use
body: I started using Yummly a few months back to come up with more dinner ideas.  I love how easy it is to use.  I‚Äôve been able to find any level of recipe and no matter what I‚Äôm looking for there are so many different options.   I used to go to Food Network to find recipes but now I automatically go to Yummly.  Love it!!

title: Great App for my recipes
body: My mother had all her recipes on 3x4 index cards - we have come a long way! I don‚Äôt cook often, but when I do I benefit from the organization, access, and tutorials offered by Yummly.  I particularly like the ability to put in  a list of the ingredients I have on hand and see what possibilities come up on my screen.  Awesome and easy to use.

title: Very helpful
body: Yummly is a great app for anyone to use! It has a large variety of recipes for cooks from amateurs to professional chefs. The fact that you can save and categorize recipes to use again is super convenient and time saving! I love the ‚Äúsuggested‚Äù page because it‚Äôs a cool way to find new recipes to try as well. All in all, I would rate this app a 10/10!

title: Like trying new things
body: I enjoy reading your recipes each day.  I get new ideas of what to cook and how to do it.  The gluten free items I have made have been very tasty.  Recipes are varied and the directions easy to follow.  Thank you.

title: App doesn‚Äôt open
body: I downloaded and used once. Thought it was great I saved a bunch of recipes and started tuning my recommendations. I wanted to check out my saved recipes before I went grocery shopping by the app never finishes loading. I closed and tried again... I turned my phone off and tried again... I did an iOS update and tried again nothing works to make the app load so I can use it... a developer response would be great.. I‚Äôm going to uninstall and try one more time if the app doesn‚Äôt remember me with my account log in I will not use again

title: Quite pleased
body: I am a cook that lacks imagination and creativity so this app is a lifesaver. If I have a map drawn out (this app) I will do it but if i have to figure it out on my own it‚Äôs not going to happen. I also love the feature that lets you add random ingredients you have and gives you recipes to make w them. I‚Äôve made 4 recipes in 2 days which is a lot for me

title: Amazing
body: I was searching through the web for a cr√™pe recipe, and there was so many to choose from. My favorite part is when it ask you about your preferences, when looking for a certain dish. It makes it so easy to find something I want, and only gives me options that it knows I will like. If I could I would rate this 6 stars.

title: Website slow to open
body: Love the recipes, but it takes a long time for the website to open, and sometimes I can‚Äôt even get to my saved recipes which is frustrating!! We have great internet service here in metro DC and I have a new computer, so it‚Äôs not a network or computer issue. Other websites that I use pop right up.

title: Life saving recipes
body: Love almost everything about this app. Easy to search. Easy to create preferences and solve for allergies. Tasty results most of the time. Hate having to link to another website for the actual recipe however and endure tons of ads on those sites or broken links or timing out and having to go back in through Yummly. Otherwise, I would use this every day without fault.

title: Great app!
body: I would absolutely recommend this app to anyone. It has such a wide variety of recipes and so many choices. Sometimes it‚Äôs kinda slow but that‚Äôs probably due to the amount of pictures and quality of the pictures in the app. Overall, this has recipes I would‚Äôve never thought of and taste amazing; plus it gives me more recipes to experiment with and put my own twist on :)

title: Former EMT
body: In home cook? That‚Äôs my title! Yes, I was once employed by a major city fire department. And, yes they trained me well in the art of cooking. You‚Äôre Fire-persons do a great job in the kitchen. We love some, no‚Äîmost of there recipes. Also, the so many, many more great cooks from around the world. Try them all! Yummy my friend, you‚Äôre a game changer for sure. Oh! Hats off to all ‚ÄúFirst  Responders‚Äù including those in 911/dispatchers‚Äîtoo. G üöëüöíüöì = üë®üèΩ‚Äçüç≥

title: Yum Yum Yummly
body: I have been utilizing the fantastic menu options in Yummly to enjoy fantastic dishes for several years now. I have never been disappointed when searching for just the right dish for the right occasion. Yummly‚Äôs recipe database seems endless, and it‚Äôs search function yields quick, effective results. Who needs a cookbook when you have Yummly?!

title: Best Recipe & Food tips App
body: I‚Äôve been using Yummly for about three years and it‚Äôs the best app ever .  they‚Äôve made a lot of changes and upgrades that have enhanced experience. I don‚Äôt think I‚Äôll ever get rid of it!!

title: I like it but not all recipes load
body: I really like the idea of this app. You have all the popular blogger recipes all in one, scannable app. This is like AllRecipes but better quality recipes overall.

title: Great App
body: Great app for consolidating access to a large volume of recipes.  App needs improvement with regards to social functions, sharing with other users, etc. and IMHO, would benefit greatly by integrating with Amazon's Echo, especially in adding the ability to add shopping list items to the Echo's shopping list.  The social aspect is critical, especially as a means to interact before I make a dish and not after knowing I messed it up.

title: Great recipe ideas
body: I really like using this app and the ability to search for whatever I want including things like how many things the recipe needs, type of cuisine, the time it takes, ingredients wanted, etc. I also like getting feedback from people who have already used these recipes which I find very helpful.

title: Makes you hungry
body: I do enjoy this app, it‚Äôs a great way to find all the recipes from around the web and the world in one great spot. Also as well save them to the app to try or make again. It‚Äôs definitely a time saver, so many great options to search for that recipe you‚Äôre looking for or what ingredients you have on hand. 5 stars no doubt

title: Love itttt
body: It has so many different meals and way to make it for literally all types of diets. It‚Äôs super freaking convenient and like others can comment on it so that they can say any alterations they‚Äôve made if you want their advice and you can see if others liked the recipe. I love it and would definitely recommend especially if you‚Äôre a beginner

title: Needs work
body: The app won‚Äôt rotate with your device, which can be frustrating, and the narratives and directions are poorly written, in terms of grammar and typos. Seems less than professional.... shoddy even. Have made two of the recipes and they were okay; not ‚Äúamazing‚Äù but okay. Wide variety of recipes available, but I‚Äôm not sure this app is really all that helpful: I can just type ‚Äúgrilled pork chop recipes‚Äù into my browser and get much the same thing.

title: Best app for moms
body: This is by far the best app I have found to not only organize my recipes but also search for other AND make my grocery list. It‚Äôs very user friendly and has extras, like allowing you to schedule your dinners and it would send you alerts when it‚Äôs time to start cooking to have dinner ready at a specific time.

title: LOVE this functional App
body: I‚Äôve been doing meal delivery for about 2 years but got tired of eating the same things. Plus it gets pricey. With this app I can find a recipe, and add everything to my shopping list, in the exact amounts, it couldn‚Äôt be easier. I‚Äôm cooking more things and I get more servings with leftovers for less money. Overall I‚Äôm loving this app it‚Äôs s lifesaver!!

title: Best recipe app
body: I love this app. I have had it essentially since it‚Äôs release. I‚Äôm not exactly sure how I found it, but I‚Äôm so glad I did. I deleted all other recipe apps.
