It‚Äôs great because you also get a visual of what the finished product looks like. It‚Äôs nice to have the tutorials and the shopping list as a bonus. I can‚Äôt tell you how much I enjoy this. I use it regularly.

title: Very good recipes for the most part
body: I‚Äôm not a fan of food trends...just good food, so if there is a rash of kale recipes or the diet-of-the-week recipes, I tend to skip over those.  But I have to say that overall, these are good recipes.  I like recipes that I cook once and know that I want to make again and there are plenty of those.  The app is pretty much flawless.  No complaints!

title: Great! But...
body: Love the app! A ton of amazing recipes, the ability to save ones your like, basically it has a bunch of awesome features. The only pain is that it doesn‚Äôt actually include the recipes themselves, just links to them. This can be a huge hassle when the site you‚Äôre linked to is so covered with ads and exposition that you‚Äôve gotta dig around to find the actual recipe on the page.

title: Great Back Up Plan
body: For Me I find Yummly to be a great back u plan, weather I‚Äôm bored with my same old dishes, or just want to try want to make a recipe of mine a little different it is a great source of information to do that with. There‚Äôs hardly ever been a time my family has not liked what I‚Äôve served with the help of Yummly ‚ò∫Ô∏è Like I said It‚Äôs this Mother‚Äôs greatest Back Up Plan

title: Yum yum yum
body: This is one of my favorite apps and I use it often. Love that you can just type in anything your craving and it gives you so many options of how to make it. Easy to use and I love that you can save all the recipes you like in one area so it's easy to find when you make it. I highly recommend this app. for anyone that loves to eat yummy food.

title: Highly Recommend!!
body: This app is one of the best ones out there for people who are looking to start eating healthier. Not saying you have to, but it definitely makes it easy to stick with a diet with all of its awesome features and costume food options. Also, the recipes on here are fantastic and always fits with what I would actually want to eat.

title: Yummly is my go to dinner app!
body: I love Yummly and use it all the time! It helps me store recipes and directions to recipes, dinners I‚Äôve prepared, grocery items, and much more! I can save which dinners I plan to make and which ones I‚Äôve already made (for future planning)...I truly do love this app and love their new feature offering guided recipes (for cooking challenged folks like myself). Thanks Yummly!

title: Uploading recipes
body: Totally addicting app!  Is there a way to have the recipe title automatically transfer during upload so it is the first part of the text? Otherwise  I have to type to in after uploading. It helps when searching my recipes without having to open it to see if it‚Äôs the recipe I‚Äôm looking for.

title: Loved idea but not user friendly
body: I downloaded the app and it appeared that it was going to be just what I was looking for. But when I open the app and attempted to use it it was the most difficult app I have ever encountered. At every turn I was getting bombarded with request to join or do something other than what I was there to do. I was simply trying to download a recipe which I thought I would like and it was almost impossible To do. Unless you change how your app works by moving on to another App that‚Äôs more user-friendly. I do not recommend this app to anyone

title: Great recipe app
body: I love the app and really how I can add outside recipes to my favorites.  If I could, I would add some features:  Have a recently added tab so that I can search quickly recipes I‚Äôve placed in my favorites.  The second would be to have some home keeping goods to the list function.  Items I normally buy while shopping for groceries like paper towels and hand soap.  Great app and I can‚Äôt wait to see more come!

title: Love Yummly
body: Out of all of the cooking sites that I am on, Yummly is my favorite! It is my go to site to find whatever I‚Äôm looking for and I love the fact that the organization of my favorites is easy.  I also love that the recipes include the calorie count per serving which is a significant added bonus that I don‚Äôt have to calculate it on my own.  Keep up the great work Yummly!

title: Great app.
body: It has thousands of recipes, allows you to specify by ingredient, by cuisine, and connects you to a million ideas for what to cook.

title: Really great app!
body: I can just throw away all my cookbooks now that I have Yummly. So many recipes with photos and easy to search for what you're looking for. The only difficulty is when you leave the app & go to Directions website, it becomes a little cumbersome. Lots of pop up ads & it jumps around a lot. But overall I really like Yummly!

title: Amazing website
body: I use Yummly to keep our dinner menus ever changing. There are so many quick and easy recipes that meals are never dull. We participate in international night with friends (prior to COVID) and the Yummly site makes it easy to prepare a speciality meal. There are also tons of vegetarian and vegan options available.  So many  different dietary selections right at your fingertips! ENJOY!!

title: Lots of good recipes
body: Sometimes I‚Äôm in a rut trying to think of something to make for dinner. I look in my pantry to get an idea of what I have and search through Yummly to find a way to put the ingredients together. I‚Äôve made some pretty good recipes and, as long as the family is happy, they don‚Äôt need to know that I didn‚Äôt come up with the recipe! Keep it up Yummly!

title: Like the ease of creating meals
body: So far so good. I like how easy and delicious many recipes are. One thing that is hard on my end is finding some of the ingredients but I substitute and it works more than half the time. This app has defiantly made me like cooking because I really don‚Äôt cook due to lack of enjoyment and convenience.... so this is definitely a good change.

title: Love the image recognition
body: I‚Äôve only had this app for a few days but have used it quite a few times. My favorite feature is the image recognition offering up suggestions for recipes. I like it that you can save recipes by category, I do hope though that they stay available over time.

title: New features make this app, indispensable!
body: The new features of this app, make it great for cooking. I love the fact that I can add the items needed for a recipe, to my shopping cart, then choose what vendor to use to make the purchase of said items. I can also edit out items that I already have before checking out. Awesome service!

title: Fav app
body: I love this app so much for so many different reasons. I was trying to find an app to help me plan dinners for the week and I couldn‚Äôt ask for more with this one right here. It has a huge selection of recipes and the ability to save those recipes to custom made folders. On top of that it can populate a grocery list for you! Truly amazing

title: Greatüëçüèº
body: I have been using this app for years to find different recipes and have never been disappointed.  You can easily find whatever you are looking for and will also create a shopping list for you right in the app. I highly recommend this app, you will not be disappointed üëçüèº

title: No easy way to reset password
body: Thanks for screwing up the app design guys! Now instead of a forgot password button, they offer a ‚Äúsign in through email‚Äù option, which then lets you tap a button on an email to sign in on your phone. However the button doesn‚Äôt work so you can only sign in through the phone browser. When you go to songs to change your password it requires you to enter the old one which you forgot, and if you try to navigate around this it just loops you around and around. Very frustrating!

title: WISH WE COULD IMPORT RECIPES (other than that LOVE IT!!)
body: I wish we could import recipes from websites online. They don‚Äôt have very many instant pot or pressure cooker recipes. Also don‚Äôt have a lot on their keto tag but all in all this is an AMAZING application. (Literally enabled me to go from ordering out every meal to cooking every meal). Love the simple streamlined ingredient lists and easy to save recipes!!

title: I didn‚Äôt think I would love this app so much
body: This is by far one of the most used apps I have. The instructions are easy to follow and my family says it feels like they are having restaurant quality food every night. This app makes it so easy to use your basic ingredients in a variety of different ways.

title: Yum!
body: Love the recipes and the variety and the ease of finding the recipe.

title: Yummly is my everything‚ô•Ô∏è
body: I have found and continue to find amazing recipes on Yummly. My family likes me to switch things up at the dinner table and Yummly provides a variety of recipes. Whether I‚Äôm looking for a seafood dish, pasta, slow cooker meal or a quick 30 minute meal, it's ALL here.

title: LOVE YUMMLY ‚ù§Ô∏è
body: They thought of everything. The pictures are beautiful which makes me want to cook. I finally found an app with healthy meals I want to make. The directions are easy to follow. You can customize the search to include foods you like and omit the ones you don‚Äôt. I love the grocery list option. This will be my go for recipes from now on.

title: Yummy recipes
body: I am not creative enough to come up with different ideas for meals.  Yummly has helped me create dishes my family really enjoys!  I like how I can create various folders to keep recipes to each category that‚Äôs easy for me.  Oh, the shopping list is perfect!  Just tick the selected item and it goes to the bottom as ‚Äúgot it‚Äù.

title: Love the app
body: There are so many things that I love about this app! I love the shopping list. I love how you can share the recipes easily with someone else. I love how the screen stays on when you‚Äôre cooking and you don‚Äôt always have to turn the phone back on to see the recipe. I love the way you can like and categorize the recipes. This is my favorite recipe app!!!

title: The best recipe app.
body: I love this app! Simple easy and delicious recipes. Took me a few minutes to figure out how to find the button to show directions.. i just clicked around until i stumbled upon it! Btw, tap the bottom right numbers that show how long it takes to complete the recipe and it takes you to the directions.

title: Excellent App
body: This is an excellent app for when you need a recipe for something.  You can list your available ingredients and then it will list many recipes.  You can also exclude things you do not like or are allergic to.  The only downside is that it is an aggregator of other recipe sites and can be difficult to print or download recipes without signing up for the other sites.

title: My go to app
body: I‚Äôve other resources for recipes, but this is by far the easiest to use. One of my favorite things about it is when I have some ingredient in my kitchen that I want to use, it has a great search function to help you find a recipe to use it in. I‚Äôve had much less waste and found fabulous recipes because of it.

title: Yes I like Yummly!
body: It‚Äôs so convenient and inspiring to go to this app when contemplating cooking with specific ingredients...both for every day meals and for special occasions!  We have recently moved and I had to discard tons of cookbooks...keeping only a chosen few ; more for nostalgia than utility..Yummly takes care of the latter wonderfully! Thank you, thank you thank you!

title: Nice App, but not perfect
body: Well done and pretty app. If you are looking for an app to find you recipes and plan your meals for the first time. This is the app for you, but if you are coming from another program and have recipes you like you will have to leave them behind or find them again. There is no import (Yes I checked online and in the app. If there‚Äôs an import it‚Äôs well hidden). At 4.99/month it‚Äôs the most expensive and I would expect an import.

title: Amazing app for all your cooking needs!!
body: I absolutely love this app because it has everything I‚Äôm looking for. I love being able to look up recipes and add items to my grocery list so easily. I also enjoy the ability to filter certain recipes based on my ingredients, time span, and cuisine preference. I use this app virtually every day now!

title: I use this app all the time!
body: I love that this app searches for recipes all over the internet and also allows you to save recipes that you find on your own in the app. This has become my go to ‚Äúcookbook‚Äù. I don‚Äôt like that some of the blogs it links to have so many pop up ads but that has more to do with the blogs than with Yummly

title: So far so good
body: Just started using it but so far so good, it's annoying to have to go to webpage is outside of the app to get the actual recipes, but that is made up for with the ability to build a shopping list. The shopping list alone has been key and I'm a big fan. Only doing four stars because I haven't made enough for the recipes, just reading the functionality right now.

title: Love the convenience
body: This app has all the best recipes.  You can add the recipes to your calendar.  There is a shopping list feature that is awesome since it organizes what you need by category making it easier to shop.

title: Most useful app ever!
body: This app makes cooking so much easier!! It keeps all the recipes, cooking tutorials, shopping lists(even allows you to change serving sizes), and your favorites all in one place! There are also reviews that let you know how it turns out. It allows you to filter your search in case of allergies! Totally recommend. üòäüëç

title: Great recipe app!!!!
body: Love Yummly!!!!!! I use recipes from Yummly 2-4 times a week. I love that u can see the ingredients before opening the whole recipe. My favorite part is the ability to review the recipes and add if it was perfect as is or what people added to improve it. I have reviewed many recipes and even taken other people‚Äôs advice on what to add to many of the dishes I‚Äôve made.

title: Best app I‚Äôve ever downloaded
body: I love Yummly, it‚Äôs a perfect app for finding recipes. Everything comes out great! I‚Äôve even referred 6 other people to use this app and they all love it!

title: Great App!! Love this App!!!!
body: I love this app. You can search a specific item or look at their list. It puts together a shopping list so you never forget an ingredient. Love it!!

title: Room for Improvement
body: I really do like Yummly, but it could be better.

title: YUMMLY IS THE BOMB üí£ ü§Ø
body: So at first it thought it would be like a lot like the other cooking apps.... ITS NOT! It‚Äôs way better! I convinced one of my relatives to help me with one of the recipes. So we made Cheesecake Cupcakes ü•Æ! They turned out amazing üòã. Anyway, the recipes are great quality, you can even make your own!!! But only if you log into Facebook. Definitely recommend üëçüèª.

title: Best Recipe App ever!
body: I absolutely love this app and look to it every time I want to try something new or am looking for a certain dish to try. I love the tutorials and the ‚Äòseconds‚Äô videos that show how easily a main dish can be cooked up in 15 mins or less. I love that I can save and categorize the dishes I want to make and have made. This app makes cooking fun and easy.

title: Super useful
body: We use Yummly a lot! Great for finding new dishes. I wish they would omit repeat recipes (5 different sites with the exact recipe will show up in the results). Would like to see more fringe sites indexed (I.e. vegan, international, wild game, etc). Would like to see the ability to log in to multiple accounts at the same time to share, view recipes that have been saved by significant other.

title: Tasty!
body: I love this app. This year I moved home to care for my aging ‚Äúmeat and potatoes‚Äù parents, with health issues. I myself have been plant based for over two years but I also got lazy about trying new recipes. Needless to say it‚Äôs been difficult planning meals we can all agree on. This is now my go-to app for flavorful, healthy alternatives we can all enjoy. Thanks Yummly!

title: Easy to use and organize recipes
body: I have made folders for different types of recipes. I even have a folder that says ‚Äúto try‚Äù as sometimes they sound good but do not turn out the way quite as you expected. I also love the search feature and I‚Äôve never been disappointed.

title: Used to be 5 stars
body: This is my favorite recipe app, but over the past couple of updates it no longer shows the picture previews, so I have to guess what the dish looks like from whatever the title is. Otherwise it would be 5 stars.

title: Great for the most part
body: I love the selection of recipes and the fact that I can look at them on my iPad without the screen going black after a minute. The not so good is that often I notice recipes that take 6 or 7 hours to cook, but if you add it to your calendar it tells you to start cooking only 30-60 minutes ahead of when you want to eat. Very misleading !

title: So many options to chose from and colorful pictures!
body: I love using Yummly ! It has not steered me wrong. I love that I can search just about anything! And then it also sends me ideas to my emails, for example seasonal dishes.

title: Easy navigation
body: I love the way this app is set up. Great to look through for the perfect recipe, pictures displayed nicely, able to add to a category for easy look-up when you want to cook it again, and reviews of the recipes are SUPER helpful when wanting exactly what you‚Äôre looking for. So review the item after you cook it ;)

title: Great Go-To App!
body: Yummly is a great app! Honestly, it has helped me solve the ‚ÄúWhat the heck am I making for dinner (or other occasion with food). Whether you are looking to use up an ingredient in your fridge, find a tried and true recipe, or try something new, you will find it here. App is easy to use! I suggest it for all kinds of cooks! Recipes are down to earth and easily explained.

title: Best recipe app ever!
body: This is my go to app for recipes! It lets me choose the types of ingredients that I like and gives recipes accordingly. I have recommended this app to so many of my friends that have food allergies and it has helped them out. I practice a plant based whole food approach to my diet and always having new recipes to keep my taste buds satisfied is so helpful!

title: Favorite app in my phone
body: This is my most used app on my phone. I highly recommend it to anyone who is looking for inspiration in the kitchen, someone who wants to try something new, cooks who want to save the creations, people looking to have dietary restrictions in their meals. It‚Äôs is my favorite tool to clear out my fridge and make the most yummy food possible. Bon appetit!

title: Better navigation
body: I love the recipes that I find on this app. This would be a 5 star review except that they make it such a chore to get to the recipe. Ingredients are on one page, you have to click to get to the directions which sends you to pages that sometimes take forever to load. Advice:direct links to recipe page and an open in safari feature. Bon Appetite. PS anyone else finding it annoyingly difficult to swipe up to ingredients? Still love ya yummly.

title: I love this app
body: I use it all of the time for new recipe ideas.  The organizing of recipes and the grocery list function make it really easy.  Only improvement would be to verify that the link to directions actually works.  I have found sporadic recipes that link to a web page that has changed.

title: So convenient!
body: I‚Äôve used Yummly for over a year and have found it to be the most convenient way to find a great recipe. My only complaint is that my phone locks mid-preparation, so that I continually have to unlock my phone to complete the recipe. That may be a problem I can solve by adjusting my settings, however. Other than that, Yummly is great!

title: YummyPanko crusted tilapia was awesome.
body: I love this website. Anything that I want to cook I find and the recipes are not just delicious but gourmet.

title: Great, simple recipes
body: I have been utilizing Yummly for 2 years now! The app has provided several useful recipes that has been easy to follow and turned out great! My children love the outcome of many of the recipes! I‚Äôm thankful for Yummly! It has broadened my ability to cook and contributed to food ideas/choices I never would have never imagined! ‚ô•Ô∏è

title: Issues with Yummly
body: Ever since I updated the app, when I receive Recommend for You emails from Yummly & I click on the recipe it no longer takes me to the recipe. Also I sent a link to my daughter & although when she clicks on the link it takes her to the recipe, it doesn‚Äôt take me there. I have reported this to Yummly & I was advised to delete the app. This did not resolve my issue. In fact it deleted ALL the recipes I had saved over the past few years!!!  This is so annoying & I can‚Äôt believe I am the only one experiencing this issue.

title: My favorite recipe app
body: I wish the full recipes were included in the app instead of through links, but I suppose that‚Äôs more fair for the sources that want full credit, and it‚Äôs done well without any broken links, so it‚Äôs forgivable. Great search features, and great system to save recipes even in several custom lists.

title: Love this App!!!
body: I am a stay at home husband.  So I do all the kitchen chores including the Cooking for my family of three.  I must tell you after finding and downloading Yummly.  My cooking skills have improved 1000%.  I now enjoy cooking weekday meals have become wonderful meals.  Our Sunday dinners have become gourmet meals!

title: Convenient ! Awesome!
body: I‚Äôve used recipes from several sites and usually just end up googling to find a specific recipe, but since getting Yummly I‚Äôve been able to go straight there and find every recipe I need! I‚Äôve even found some from blogs that I‚Äôve used before and love! Easy to use and love the grocery list piece of the app!

title: App won‚Äôt load!
body: Ever since you updated the app to run only on iOS 13 I can‚Äôt even access the app.  I used to use it weekly, it was my go to recipe app, and I had a lot of saved ideas that I can no longer get too.  Poor game guys, some people don‚Äôt have the ability to upgrade their iPad to the new platform and still run iOS 12, so they are unable to use the app. I‚Äôve tried deleting the app and reinstalling multiple times, but it still doesn‚Äôt completely install and therefore no Yummly for me.  I guess I have to go to AllRecipes or something.

title: My review
body: It's a good way to keep track of my favorite recipes, but I wish it didn't reset each time my iPad fell asleep. That makes it difficult to keep track of directions and ingredients when, for example, I am waiting for something to simmer and need to check the next step. Also, it keeps asking me to write reviews even when I've already done so. And again!

title: Lifesaver!
body: Love this app as a busy mom of two under two! I can look up great recipes quickly and see reviews as well. I‚Äôve bought cookbooks in the past and the recipes weren‚Äôt great...which equals wasted time and money. This app allows me to cook recipes more on budget and know my family will actually love eating them! Excellent all around.

title: Love
body: I enjoy being able to search for recipes based on different diets along with appetizer and desserts. I‚Äôm recently transitioning to a vegan lifestyle and being able to have savory tasty recipes available is awesome and Yummly provides just that! I have tried several recipes and they all have been amazing and kid approved. Thank you for this wonderful app!

title: OK most of the time
body: Recipes are nice but the emails send the same recipes again and again. If I did t want it earlier, I won‚Äôt want it the next 10 times either. Also, when tapping on a recipe from an email takes me directly to the app and the recipe I tapped on, then all is well. Unfortunately, too many times it takes me to the website and requires me to log in. When that happens, I just close the page and delete the email. Yummly needs to figure out their technology.

title: My best cook book
body: I love Yummly , every recipe that I‚Äôve made has been delicious. Like I said I don‚Äôt need cook books anymore, I simply look in my refrigerator and if I have chicken, shrimp or pork , whatever and I just can‚Äôt think what to do with it I go to Yummly and voila there I can find anything and everything needed for my new dish . It‚Äôs easy to use , I just love ‚ù§Ô∏èit .

title: Great Resource!
body: I really like the app because I am able to review several different recipes to get a good idea of what are the main ingredient the type of cuisine dish may call for.  The only draw back I find is many of the recipes the directions are on another website i.e. blog which then you need to open before you can get to directions and normally means reading through along article before even getting to how to cook the dish.

title: the delicious recipe you‚Äôre looking for
body: I love Yummly and use it several times per week. I have expanded my repertoire of nutritious, tasty meals and have learned new techniques I thought were beyond my ability. It‚Äôs handy to search for recipes using ingredients I already have on hand. I used to cook the same five meals on rotation. Not anymore! Try it - you‚Äôll like it!

title: Food-making made easy
body: I have used many Yummly recipes lately, all with great success. The site and options are so well-organized. I am a professional baker so I can especially appreciate the menu planning and ingredient lists. I can hear my teaching chef saying ‚Äúmise en place!‚Äù  Get everything ready BEFORE you start. Yummly helps you do that.

title: Easy meal planning and grocery shopping
body: You can filter by any dietary restrictions, save recipes to your profile, create grocery lists directly from the recipe and schedule dinners - saving and scheduling so when it‚Äôs time to cook you don‚Äôt have to go searching for it.  I use this every week for meal planning and grocery shopping and cooking.

title: Sincerely brilliant!
body: This is the only recipe app that I need. It‚Äôs flexible, easy to use, and convenient. I love being able to put in my dietary needs and look solely at those recipes. It‚Äôs like a search engine for recipes. It also gives me a grocery list for those meals which makes it to see what I need and what I don‚Äôt. It‚Äôs a very clever little app.

title: Mixed review
body: First off on the service the ap is amazing. Higher than five stars really. Love to customize ingredients for my wife‚Äôs allergies as well as take out the dislikes of the family. That‚Äôs awesome. The con is all the recipes(directions and recipes that is) are hosted on other sites. Not too bad except some of them have friggin novels to read through to find the ‚Äúhow to make‚Äù portion. If it could link directly to the exact spot that would be awesome. Otherwise it gets 3 Stars.

title: My go-to
body: Better than Allrecipes.  From the look, ease of app use to pulling in recipes from anywhere and everywhere.

title: My Go-To App
body: I absolutely love this app! I have been using this app for several years now and have found that I rely on it more and more. I tend to be a very good cook but occasionally want to try something new. Yummly has every recipe I have ever look for and even more sometimes. The recipes are clearly written and easy to follow and the layout is great! Thanks Yummly!

title: My Favorite App
body: This app has made meal planning soooo much easier-it‚Äôs a recipe box and shopping list all at once and customizable to what types of food or meals you want to focus on...have made so many meals from this app that my husband asks whenever I make something new, ‚ÄúIs this a Yumly recipe?‚Äù He knows it‚Äôs where most of my ‚Äúnew‚Äù stuff comes from.

title: Thanks for Excellent Food Choices
body: So, Yummy and their Wonderful Chiefs have provided many good recipes for all of us to enjoy and I‚Äôd like to thank them one and all for the great meals they‚Äôve allowed so many of us to learn, prepare, cook, display, and eat ... Again, thanks and we hope you continue to allow us to view and use your recipes for free ‚ò∫Ô∏è

title: App crashing constantly with latest update
body: I have been a Yummly user for years and love the convenience of this app for turning recipes easily into my shopping list. With the most recent update the app is slow to load my shopping list and I‚Äôm lucky if I can get it to work without crashing while trying to see what produce I needed to buy. I can no longer get the app to clear my shopping list either so it‚Äôs about a mile long at this point. It was so troublesome on my most recent grocery run that I‚Äôm now searching for another app.

title: More ingredients!
body: Can we add ‚ÄúSmoked‚Äù to the Technique Search Filter please?

title: Love the recipes-hate all the ads
body: I have been using Yummly for awhile and love the diversity of the recipes. Our family enjoys something new each week. I tried buying the premium package just to get away from all the pop-ups and annoying advertisements just to find they were as bad with premium. I have since cancelled the premium package and just use the free app. But lately I have been so frustrated I‚Äôm ready to find a new app.

title: My go to....
body: I love this app!  I‚Äôve been using it for years after it was recommended on a morning show. I was soon hooked.  I love to cook and the fact that I can key in what I have on hand and tons of recipes pop up with ideas for dinner.  It truly is my go to, pretty much on a daily basis.  Thanks Yummly for making my life much easier!

title: Good recipe collection app.
body: I like how I can look online, click a recipe, and the app will open it up for me. That part is true. I also enjoy the save and categorize feature. I find the filters are a bit much and don‚Äôt pinpoint as much as I would like, but that‚Äôs probably because they have soooo many recipes to sort. The app is easy to use, and works really well as a recipe box app.

title: Like it, but not love it
body: I would give it 5 stars if it had an option for ingredient substitution, visually need to see the days of the week for each meal that is scheduled so that I can see what I plan to make for the upcoming week, and would love a cooking mode or a way to see the cooking directions without having to scroll all the way to the bottom of the article. Thanks for your time!

title: Awesome!
body: Ability to deselect specific ingredients has made my life 1000x easier as I have multiple food allergies and intolerances recently diagnosed and have had to change how I cook/eat/prepare. Takes a TON of time out of manually scouring sites and I‚Äôve found all sorts of creative and yummy options I never would have done on my own.

title: Such a useful app!
body: If you love cooking and want to find new recipes easily, I can't recommend Yummly more highly! It's especially great for finding more unusual recipes, for dietary restrictions for example, and the filtering options are excellent. I've also been impressed with the developer's response to suggested changes. This a really solid, easy to use app. LOVE

title: Best Recipe App Ever!
body: I LOVE Yummly! They have amazing recipes, a grocery list feature, as well as a ‚Äúschedule it later‚Äù option, which is my favorite tool!! I can search for recipes, create grocery lists from my chosen recipe(s), and then have my phone prompt me when to start prepping to have a completed meal at my allotted time!! It has made meal planning so much fun! Thanks, Yummly!!

title: A good resource
body: My perception is that Yummly searches the web for recipes.  There are thousands of them.  In general I have found it useful.  It can be a little frustrating when moving from ingredients to directions as you get sent to the website of the recipe.  Make sure you save the recipes that you like.

title: My favorite app!!!
body: My family and friends will tell you I am a recipe freak! I am always searching the web.. magazines.. newspaper you name it and I was looking for recipes..their app saves me from all that! I found recipes that my granny used to make!! This thing was made for me, I just know it.. lol Thank you a bunch for such a wonderful app!! I love it dearly and use it a LOT!!

title: So many issues!
body: Most of these reviews have got to be paid for because this app is bunk! I‚Äôve just started trying to use my Yummly app and most of the recipes I try to use are either saying ‚Äúthis page no loger exists‚Äù or the webpage is blank and just won‚Äôt load!

title: Simply the best ever
body: I love this app, its interface and the beautiful photos. I have over a thousand recipes stored and organized. I like organization and being able to find recipes quickly.

title: Almost perfect
body: Would love to see a better integration with Instacart, more stores available for integration. There are stores that I can order directly through the app but for some reason only half of them integrate with Yummly shopping list. Also, couldn‚Äôt find a way to simply copy the recipe and food item and paste it into another app like Facebook.

title: Latest updates
body: This has been my recipe go to for years now.  Since this last update I am very disappointed.  When I use the search function it yields results that do not even match my ingredients, the top results may not even. And I am talking simple things like broccoli and chicken.  Also  if I get any results matching at all they are very few.  It has made this app about useless. Is this what I get for not upgrading to the pro version?? I hope that this gets fixed.

title: Amazing
body: I have been using this app for years and now is the time to give my honest opinion! I have used several of the recipes and they all turn out rather well and they‚Äôre tasty and you have a plethora of recipes to choose from, which I absolutely love! I couldn‚Äôt ask for a better app than Yummly!

title: Love this app
body: I love being able to track my favorite recipes, store some for later, and I‚Äôve really discovered some great versions of recipes I‚Äôve been wanting to try. I did whole 30 and I could store my meal ideas here. Super easy to use. And their push notifications are pleasant and not annoying.

title: Love Yummly!
body: My go-to recipe app. Always something new. I loved Epicurious in the 90s and early 2000s but it just hasn‚Äôt kept up. I like that home cooks post their own recipes and then I can make them my own. One of these days I‚Äôll get around to my own food blog...until then, there‚Äôs Yummly. An endless source of inspiration no matter what I have on hand!

title: Sooo is this bug fixed????
body: I like the recipes I‚Äôve tried. It‚Äôs the app that‚Äôs annoying. My issue is this: I receive an email from Yummly that looks good; it says ‚Äúopen in the app‚Äù, I open the app from the email and can n e v e r find the recipe in the email. Today‚Äôs example is from Alida's Kitchen ‚ÄúTaco Burgers‚Äù.

title: Great!
body: I use this app at least twice a week! The only thing I wish was different, and it has nothing to do with yumly, is the sites with the recipes! Some have so many pop-up ads that I can‚Äôt read the recipe. Luckily, I can just go back and find another recipe through a different website.

title: Perfect recipe app for me
body: I love to try new recipes and try to use what I already have in the cupboards. There‚Äôs also more than one food allergies in my family. That said, this app takes all that i to consideration and makes it so easy to find great, high rated, recipes. I use this app at least 3 times a week to cook and save recipes.

title: I cannot open the app since I updated
body: I love this app and use it a lot, but since the last update I can‚Äôt open it. It stays loading for a long time and nothing I have tried has worked. If not for this issue, I would have given 5 stars.

title: One stop shop for recipes
body: I love this app!  A friend of mine told me about the app and now I am constantly on it looking for new recto try out. Having the filter for specific items works great to when I have to cook for my niece who is gluten free. Or drinks that don‚Äôt require a lot of ingredients. Thank you for this app it‚Äôs been a an amazing piece of information.

title: Great App
body: This app does just what I need which is the capability to search for recipes.  There is always a large number of results for searches.  The recipes can be saved and organized.  I find I often use the List option to create a grocery list. I have not any issues to date with this app.

title: Recipes
body: I have in the past few weeks tried 3 different recipes and they have all been outstanding. My husband who is picky has loved them and told me not to alter any of them because he loved them. So impressed by how easy and delicious they are. Thank you will continue to fix more and repeat these that we love.

title: Wish I could search my Yums
body: I have more than 500 Yums saved. Wish I could search through them to get to the recipe I need. Would make things easier especially when you know the name of the recipe but don‚Äôt want to have to scroll through hundreds to get to it. Also would like to Yum to personal folders on mobile, which I can do on Desktop

title: Always helpful..
body: I literally use the app for almost all my cooking needs at this point. Basically I find recipes on here, use them as a guide, adjust to my palate if need be and then save (yum) it so I can have it whenever I need it. This app has been a life saver when I have very limited time to make food and/or I‚Äôm undecided on what I want to eat.

title: I never write reviews, but!!!
body: I love this app. I really do. I‚Äôm not paid to write this lol. But this really is a great app. From its awesome suggestions to its easy navigatablilty. Super user friendly. I have yet to run into a link that doesn‚Äôt work, and to go back to what you were looking at previously it‚Äôs all a breeze and scrolling through recommendations is fun.

title: Great planning tool
body: The more I use the app, the more I‚Äôm able to plan ahead and creat my shopping lists. The only frustration I find at times are poorly written recipes. Not everyone with a recipe blog has a good eye for detail, so on some (rare?) occasions the shopping list doesn‚Äôt quite match the instructions. Overall, though, it‚Äôs a good app.

title: Love the shopping list
body: So convenient to be able to select how many you need add it to the shopping list and delete it when you got it. It helps when you have a huge list and need to go to multiple stores. Also being able to add to the list right from the recipe is great!

title: THE BEST THING TO HAPPEN TO GROCERY SHOPPING
body: I don‚Äôt think I‚Äôve ever written a review for an app before, but I couldn‚Äôt NOT rave about this one. It‚Äôs everything I‚Äôve been searching for in a meal planning app, and I have tried EVERYTHING‚ÄîMyPlate, eMeals, Mealime, AllRecipes, literally everything, and this app takes the best of all of them and makes it easily accessible.

title: Can you fix the recipe loading time?
body: I love the idea of Yummly and use it daily!

title: Personalized recipes
body: It figures out what kinds of recipes you enjoy so they will give you the right kind of recipes. You can also change your preferences in the settings.  They also allow you to look at the recipes before going to the website they are on.

title: Turn me into a cook
body: Love this site!  Broad array of recipes, easy to access, easy to follow, yet just  challenging enough to lead me into new learning (about foods, kitchen tools, cutting techniques and much more)!  I am a single aging male with essentially zero prior cooking experience.  Now, I‚Äôm a YummlyGuy preparing a variety of delicious dishes and enjoying myself as both chef and dining enthusiast.  Many thanks.

title: Great place for great recipes
body: I like that this app pulls recipes from so many different places. It has gotten a bit more difficult to navigate. Some of the recipes take you to the sight and not the recipe. Then I have to go out of Yummly for the recipe. Some of recipes can have long blogs where they give directions but it‚Äôs difficult to find ingredients. Can be very frustrating.

title: Best Recipe App!
body: I searched and searched for recipes that fit my criteria for family food night, and I must have installed 10 apps and bought 3 cookbooks. The recipes on this app are amazing and I love that they detail it to what you like so you don‚Äôt get recipes that have certain flavors you don‚Äôt like. My favorite app to look at to see what‚Äôs for dinner üíïüôåüèº

title: Love
body: I love Yummly. It‚Äôs so user friendly and has any recipe you could want. The only thing I‚Äôd change is having to go to a different page for the directions on how to cook it. While on the directions page, there‚Äôs too much stuff going on. I don‚Äôt want the author‚Äôs biography and opinions no just want to make the meal instead of having to scroll through a ton of personal input

title: My go to
body: I can always find what I am looking for even when it is an old recipe from the many recipe books I own. Plus I love that you can adjust the quantity and create a shopping list, this feature makes me turn to it more often than Pinterest which is my other go to

title: Good, but Could be better
body: The types of recipes are great and some you probably wouldn‚Äôt find on other apps. I love the ability to quickly add to categories and the ingredients to grocery list. However, the add to calendar doesn‚Äôt work and I sometimes don‚Äôt get results for a search one time but then get a few hundred the next time I search the same thing. Not sure if it‚Äôs slow searching it‚Äôs database or what.

title: Luv this app! Great recipes!
body: Have tried many recipes from this app, mainly the easier ones and I have to say all have turned out great and were very tasty. This is my go to app when meal planning if I‚Äôm expecting guests, has great ideas and you can go from an easy recipe to more difficult recipes depending on your cooking skills.

title: LOVE LOVE LOVE !
body: I always use this app! Sometimes I just need inspiration or want to cook something but idk what ? Then it gives me questions if I wanna use something I already have , amazing ! Love this app so much ! I even have my boyfriend using it too and he uses some recipes to make our family some delicious food ! Thank you again Yummly ! Forever fans !

title: On tap
body: I can find any recipe I need... recipes on tap! Love it! Are you craving something in particular? Key in the items and you will have a 100 recipes to choose from. Even if you don‚Äôt know what you want to cook, you‚Äôll find something. I haven‚Äôt found a bad recipe yet. I could spend hours thumbing through recipes. Great app!

title: The Apron Is ON!!!!
body: Great for Busy families OR if you‚Äôre like me, I just like meal time to go as smoothly as possible with as little brain effort involved. The common family question: ‚Äúwhat‚Äôs for dinner?‚Äù can now confidently be answered without no need to dial the nearest pizzaria.  The apron is on thanks to Yummly! Did I mention it makes grocery lists and shopping ten times easier to do!

title: Awesome
body: I love the layout of the app.  I am intrigued by the ingredients option.  I haven‚Äôt used it yet.  But, I plan on trying it out.  I‚Äôll update this review once that‚Äôs been done a couple times.  I also really like the ‚ÄúYummed‚Äù lists.  It‚Äôs good for staying organized and makes life easy when you want to go back and find saves dishes.

title: Best cooking app!
body: This, in my opinion is the greatest cooking app on my device. It has amazing recipes and wonderful instructions, with dieting options. But the choices are vary limited when searching for something sweet that is low-sugar. I wish there where more alternatives for this. That is the only reason I gave it four stars. This app is awesome otherwise, and everyone should download it!

title: The best!
body: Best food app I have come across. It has so many recipes and so many look so so good! It‚Äôs also nice to be able to type what ingredients I have to find a recipe to fit that one, two, or three items. Anyone I know that likes to cook I tell them about this app , you can be a novice in the kitchen or a pro and still find recipes.

title: Lots of great recipes
body: There are a ton of recipes on here! You save the ones you want to try. If you don't like them, unsave & try something else.  You can look by meal type or by ingredient! You can also save the ingredients to your shopping list!!

title: Use this service year round
body: For regular meals as well as Holiday meal ideas and side dishes. It‚Äôs a wonderful resource for recipes and twists on old recipes and reminders about forgotten details. If you don‚Äôt have all the ingredients for 1 recipe on a dish many times you can find other recipes that require ingredients you do have on hand.

title: Delicious recipes
body: I love having recipes at the tip of my fingers. It's great to be able to try so many new recipes & save them for later. I've recommended this app to several people because I thinks it's wonderful. Only thing I don't like was the last update because I can't find the recipes I had saved.

title: Changed my rating to one ‚≠êÔ∏è
body: I‚Äôd like to see a dark mode. Also, a way to store and save your recipes from anywhere. And, a way to automatically adjust the recipes for different sized groups. Thanks!

title: A+ from me
body: I‚Äôve been using the app for almost 3 years.  My family and I have loved every recipe that I have made.  I like the shopping list and use it weekly.

title: A huge help
body: I worked 7-7 every day and traveled weekly when I was at my job in retail.  Fast food, take out, and delivery was how we ate in our house.  When I retired, I needed to learn how and what to cook.  YUM was the answer.  Actually, it saved my marriage ü§£.  only recommendation is to add a view of all meals scheduled.  I work ahead and sometimes accidently schedule more than one meal.  Am I missing something?

title: Best. App. Ever!!!
body: You have so many recipes to choose from and you can add it to your saved library and you can even add things you don‚Äôt have to a shopping list.  You can also set an alarm clock for when you want to eat and it tells you when to start prep so you‚Äôre eating when you want. So cool!

title: Past viewing
body: I wish that there was a feature so that you can see the past recipes that you viewed. Like I know that we can see our past searches and save recipes, but sometimes when I forget to save them. It would be great if that feature was there. Other than that I love this so much and I have been cooking and baking every day!!

title: Yummly in general
body: This is a great app. Not only are there thousands of recipes but multiple variations within most of the basic recipes. I have often surfed a general list of different ingredients and have found some very delicious meals this way. And lastly, the number of recipes seem to continually grow. Thanks for being a great app.

title: Best app I have
body: Let me tell you! I have tried a lot of apps and this is by far one of the best! So helpful and easy to use! I LOVE the shopping cart where it adds the ingredients to a list and puts them in categories! Perfection! And all of the recipes I have tried so far have been easy and tasty! Thank you yum for creating this resource!

title: So much better than Pinterest!
body: Great for meal planning!  I love that it lets you schedule meals (evening notifying you when to start cooking).  Also love the shopping list feature!  It lets you select what you need for the recipe instead of adding everything like other apps do.  I love how organized the list is also!

title: Great app!
body: From a technical aspect, the app works amazingly. There is a huge selection of recipes and it‚Äôs been really helpful as a guide. I wish there were more authentic ethic recipes but maybe that‚Äôll come with time. Either way this has become a go to stop for everything if I have questions about how to approach a dish.

title: So far so good!
body: This app is super easy and user friendly. We just transitioned into vegetarianism and the app takes the stress out of figuring out what to make. I used to look up items on Pinterest but got frustrated when all of the same recipes kept popping up. Very pleased with this app and love that I can categorize recipes too!

title: Most helpful Application I use daily
body: I use Yummly all the time! If I need to find a specific recipe  know I a find it here. And with my spouse going Vegan recently, it has been a godsend, since I am inexperienced in the Vegan world. I tell people all the time, especially the less experienced cook, who can now get a guided tutorial. Keep up the good work!!

title: Amazing app!
body: I‚Äôm new to cooking & just bought an air fryer. I looked up cooking apps and this is the first one to pop up. I found so many amazing recipes on here that I started saving to my profile and have actually tried a couple üòã so glad I came a crossed this app. I can‚Äôt wait to start cooking more for my growing family.

title: My Go To!
body: Yummly makes its so easy to find that convenient recipe while on the go, last minute and picking up groceries!

title: Great recipes app
body: I love Yummly and use it all the time.  I do have a suggestion for recipes that are saved and that is to be able to add notes to saved recipes so if it is a favorite and you want to back it again you may want to add notes about tweaking or adding ingredients to your family‚Äôs liking so that you remember it the next time you go to make it

title: Love the variety
body: I love being able to just search a food for recipes or finding a specific recipe. It helps when you can see how many times the recipe has been ‚Äòyummed‚Äô, so you can know if the recipe is on point, needs some changes, or if it‚Äôs not really that good. Will be using this app forever!

title: It‚Äôs great but is room for little improvements
body: I really like the app now that some kinks have been worked out. I kind of would like to be able to see directions on the initial page you bring up rather than having to click to another page. Sometimes I won‚Äôt want to choose that recipe because of the time and complexity.

title: Best dinner app ever!!!
body: I always wanted an app that i could enter ingredients and it would show me meals with those ingredients included!!! This does that and you can also take a pic and it will recognize the food!! Unreal!no more wondering what ill make! It can add meals to your calendar and even tell you when you should start prepping for a scheduled dinner!!! ‚ù§Ô∏è

title: Recipes at my fingertips
body: The only recipe book I can take to the store and get what‚Äôs on the list at my fingertips.

title: Long time user
body: I started using Yummly about two years ago and this app is an absolute life saver! The shopping list helps me save money and keeps me on trac a the grocery store. The recipes also make my life in the kitchen so much easier considering that I cook everyday. Thanks so much to the developers of this wonderful app!

title: Yummly is yummy!!
body: I love this app and service it is a great place to be inspired about what to cook when you are short on ideas. They have many customizable features that allow you to even put you grocery list together and shop at your favorite stores, base on the choices you have made.

title: I use this site for most recipes
body: I can always find a recipe when I need it. I bake a lot and almost all of the recipes I‚Äôve found on here. And they are delicious. It‚Äôs easy to use and you can even filter out the ingredients you want or don‚Äôt want to use which is really helpful to me. I strongly recommend!

title: Amazing, my constant go-to
body: Love Yummly.   Have cooked for my family of one and many gatherings using this app.   Always a crowd-pleaser.  Also a cooking education!   I‚Äôm pretty instinctive when it comes to throwing together an impromptu unprompted by recipe meal when the spirit moves me and I must say it‚Äôs educated guess work these days due to my following of this app for years.   Cheers!

title: Top 10 of all Apps
body: I love this app, when ever I have a gathering or go to one I always bring a dish. This app is my go to place for appetizers or other dishes. Nearly every recipe is straight forward and complete. The photos are great, that‚Äôs what always makes me stop and look at the recipe.

title: Great app but
body: This is a great app but I am having trouble with it allowing me to sign up thru the app on my iPhone!! It will send me the confirmation but when I click on the iPhone link I get nothing!! Please fix and I will make this five stars!!

title: Get this
body: I have been using Yummly since 2015 and it‚Äôs only getting better

title: Love Yummly!!!
body: Hate talkie video instructions. Just want basic instructions not lifestyle Babble children babble- love the video instructions that show ingredients being poured into a bowl with measuring specifics and directions on preparation - The rest is torture and if it looks like one of those videos I won‚Äôt even click on the recipe no matter how delicious it looks.

title: Easy and Serving Control
body: Love the app as it‚Äôs easy to search for what you want. Also like the ingredients being linked to other apps. But the ability to adjust the servings is really the best function. That way I know how much to make for my family or for a larger gathering. Definitely recommend this app.

title: Helpful
body: This app offers a wide range of recipes for all skill levels. I‚Äôve found a variety of recipes for a dish i was specifically looking for which had inspired some improvements in my technique and the dish. Good place to find a dish to make with the ingredients i have but not sure what to make. I haven‚Äôt found everything I‚Äôve wanted to make here but this is still my go to.

title: Turn my frown upside down!
body: I feel terrible giving yum only 3 stars. My reasoning is because of the extra added step to sign in. Before I was able to sign in easily. Now I have to sign in through my email account which makes the process longer. I still love the app and enjoy finding recipes so I can cook for my family. I would definitely give yum yum a higher rating if it was easier to access.

title: AH@&@
body: This is a unique app for recipes. I can‚Äôt say enough about it. It has all the types of diets , vegan, Mediterranean, Asian,French , etc. can be customized according to your diet. I really love it. Works really smooth, no disconnects issues. Any time I need recipe, I just open it and find smoothie, side dishes, or a dinner. Variety of millions recipes . I never regret it and glad I found it.

title: Love it
body: Love it!  So helpful in figuring out what to eat.  I‚Äôm a five ingredient type chef!  Makes me looney when there are 20 things and might have to go shop.  A girl just does not have time or money for that.  Makes cooking for the single girl easy, healthy !  Then it is easy when you‚Äôre cooking for that ‚Äúhe might just be the one‚Äù date!

title: Love the features but app is buggy
body: I love the features, especially when I can take any recipe from the web and store it in my app. But the app is buggy because when I go to check the recipes they disappear when I'm scrolling through the list. Super annoying.

title: If you have problems support is great!  Love this app!
body: give this a 5 star rating because I LOVE Yummly but when I did the latest update it erased all of my saved recipes!  Thank g I still have old version on my iPad so I don‚Äôt lose everything!  I hope this bug gets fixed and I get my saved recipes back.

title: No problems
body: Came to Yummly with no expectations but so was blown away! It has or has a link to anything and everything I‚Äôve typed in‚Äîand I‚Äôve typed in some very spontaneous things (silkie chicken comes to mind). Might try the upgrade eventually; but the basic app finds seems to fit my needs for now.

title: Too focused on pro
body: This was one of my favorite apps and it‚Äôs still great for finding recipes and making shopping lists, but lately it‚Äôs too focused on making all its users sign up for the paid version and it‚Äôs logging me out every time I close the app which makes it super tedious and annoying and tedious to use. Hopefully these bugs get fixed soon because it used to be a great and easy to use app.

title: Great but....
body: Yummly is a great app. I have been using it for years. I plan my weekly dinners and make my shopping list only on this app. I have become completely dependent on Yummly and it always makes my life easier. My big problem is that I recently downloaded an update and now I can‚Äôt open the app. Therefore, I feel lost and sad about it. Any ideas as to what can I do?

title: My most used app!!
body: Yummly has been a total game changer for me and my family!  I love how easy it is to use, so many wonderful recipe ideas for the same dish~ pick which one you like best! My kids have learned to be more active participants in the choosing/prepping/cooking arena thanks to this app.  I recommend it all the time to friends!!

title: Liking it so far
body: While I wasn‚Äôt able to put in diabetic for menu planning, there were enough other options to let me work around that. I like that it gives dietary info, the dump to a shopping list is very helpful, and I‚Äôm looking forward to being able to scale recipes up and down based on how many people are eating that meal.

title: Love It!
body: Enjoy the helpful ideas that make choosing tonight's meal and easy one plus the reviews. People who have prepared the dish often give you insight of how they did or didn't like the dish, plus ideas on how they improved it as well. My wife and I keep the app on both of our cells yummy easy to use and navigate. ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è

title: Cool app, but..
body: The app works great... However when I modify the number of servings for meal prep purposes it does not reflect in the grocery list. Say the original servings were 2 servings and I want to increase it to 6 servings . I increase it to 6  and add it to the shopping list. The shopping list quantitites still reflect 2 servings. I didn't mind doing the math at first but it got slightly annoying , nonetheless great app great meals

title: What everyone is looking for!
body: I have been extremely satisfied with this app from day 1! Such a wide variety of recipes. Best part to me - the customization options. Ideal for anyone with food allergies or restricted diets. I have not used the grocery list option much but a very helpful feature. Recommend to EVERYONE!

title: Almost Perfect
body: This app is great! Only issue I had is the fact that it doesn‚Äôt always work well on my iPad. Meaning, sometimes I have problems loading directions, and issues with making recipes based on ingredients.

title: Wonderful resource
body: Menus are easy to follow. Love the variety and personalization abilities. Pictures are clear and everything I‚Äôve made comes out looking like their pictures. The app is also very user friendly. I‚Äôve been using this resource for several years and will continue to use it.

title: Awesome
body: I have been using Yummly since 2009. I love this app I‚Äôm on it daily because i love searching for recipes and i recommend to everyone. My cooking skills over there‚Äôs have vastly improved thanks to skills i already had and Yummly!! It‚Äôs the only app that gets used just as much or even more than instagram sometimes lol.

title: Not very intuitive.
body: I like Yummly but it needs a redesign.  A good program is intuitive.  A first time user should be able to open the program and start using with very little research on how the program works.  I have been using Yummly and it is a little confusing.  Does the orange icon mean you have added the recipe to your list or does the white one Yummly icon mean this.  Make it easier to determine if the recipe has been added or not.  This would be most helpful.

title: Super App
body: Nice to have access to many different cooks, blogs, recipes from all over - right in one spot. The only drawback I find for myself is that it seems with each recipe there are a a load of pictures and every writer thinks the have to write a short story about how the recipe was created. I'm not particularly into that but I'm sure others are - so just personal preference.

title: Best app for beginners.
body: This app is amazing. I can select from ingredients I have on hand. I can set dietary preferences. I can schedule meals and will get alerted when it‚Äôs time to start prepping/cooking. The meals I‚Äôve made (more than 50) are all 5 stars according to my family. This app has made me realize how much I love cooking. Also, the meal inspiration is endless.

title: Love this app!
body: I love how you can add your dietary restrictions and it‚Äôll give you that version of a recipe. Much easier than looking all over the internet for different recipes, this app puts them all in one place easy to find! I‚Äôve made so many cool dishes from recipes I‚Äôve found here and tell all my friends about it.

title: Just the inspiration I needed.
body: LOVE this app.

title: Thank you
body: This app is amazing. I hate cooking because I have a lot of food restrictions, don‚Äôt know how to cook really and don‚Äôt have a ton of time to plan meals, write lists learn recipes etc. this app makes it sooo much easier by putting the shopping lists together and allowing me to find recipes that meet all my time/dietary requirements.

title: Awesome app when it works
body: I really like it‚Äôs functionalities, from creating a grocery list from ingredients, to being able to sort recipes by dietary choices, to finding meals based on ingredients or avoiding recipes based on ingredients. The only problem I have is when I have connection, it constantly gives me a pop up that there‚Äôs no connection. I also have trouble adding recipes I find online with the app.

title: Almost perfect
body: It‚Äôs a great app no doubt about it. Rather than one persons opinion and recipes you get a great collections of recipes from around the world that encourages broad commentary on how to improve, modify or more quickly enjoy the recipes. My one recommendation would be to integrate Siri or Google voice into the app. It can become a challenge to try and follow the directions and prepare the meal simultaneously

title: Long time user and devout vegan
body: I love love love this app. So user friendly and has a ton of vegan recipes to choose from. The absolute only reason I am giving it four stars instead of five is that I wish I could search the recipes I‚Äôve Yummed. I‚Äôve been using this app for a few years now so my Yum list is deep! Please stop the scrolling!!! Add a search function in the Yummed section please !

title: Ingredients
body: I love that you can put in the ingredients you have on hand and find a variety of recipes. The only thing I wish is that I could enter that I want one particular ingredient to be the star. Such as when I type in Pecan, I chose pecan because I was given two gallon bags of pecans and no idea what to do with them haha. It took a while before I found a recipe where pecan was the central ingredient.

title: great ideas
body: when I want to try a new vegetable I can always find not one but several recipes for the vegetable. I use Yummly at least 3 times a week!! I can always find a new variation of a vegetable or meat dish that I usually make but now find a updated version!! Yummly is mt go to app at least 4 times a week!

title: Used to love it
body: For several years this was my go to cooking app.  I have dozens and dozens of yums. However, each new update has made the app less and less user friendly.  It is a classic case of messing with something that is already great.  Lest you think I am just an old fart who is not tech friendly, quite the opposite is true.  Technology is the first place i go for most things.  Unfortunately, I have begun turning way from Yummly in my search for simpler is better.

title: Time Saver
body: This app has helped me save time when thinking of dishes to prepare for my meal prep. I‚Äôm able to organize my recipes within the app to sort through later. I also like the fact that it gives me the nutritional value for most recipes. It feels like Pinterest with a focus on recipes.

title: Best thing yet!!!!
body: I love the ability to have such a massive library of recipes at my finger tips for new and existing ideas. The ability to add items from any recipe to a shopping list with one click is amazing. Been using it for a couple of years without any complaints. Well done app!!

title: Great app; Think of an ingredient you want to eat and search!
body: There‚Äôs not another app out there that gives you so much flexibility and creativity with ingredients.  There have been many times I wanted to cook a with a particular meat or vegetable and searched finding so many options.

title: Helpful In A Pinch
body: My family has been saved by this app in a pinch or when we have NO IDEA what to do about dinner. We‚Äôve entered items we have in our fridge/pantry and have gotten simple and easy recipes. I love that I can customize the dietary needs so I don‚Äôt have to scroll past recipes that I have no use for.

title: Clear graphics with endless choices.
body: Easy to navigate and choices are limitless! Coordination with ingredients needed in a recipe and shopping list is also smooth. Best of all is the ability to bookmark a recipe that you know you will retrieve later. It‚Äôs a well conceived app that I return to often.

title: There‚Äôs No Other Way That I Could Cook
body: As a new vegetarian, this app has relieved so much strain on figuring out what I want to cook & even when I need to start cooking.

title: I love this app!
body: This app has been so helpful when meal planning or if I neglected to plan properly and need to figure out something to cook quickly with on hand ingredients.

title: Easy and Convenient!
body: I always like the results of having cooked something but don‚Äôt enjoy the hassle of hunting down the ingredients then what to do with them.  Yummly on both my Laptop and Phone makes it easy and convenient to shop for the needed ingredients then put them together as directed.  A great app!

title: Perfect for new ideas
body: This app helps me learn new recipes just by the ingredients I have. I can say what I want to make and it comes up with tons of recipes and you choose which one appeases you the most. I‚Äôve tried so many new things with it. My only recommendation would be if the app included recipes for more cultural foods. I‚Äôd love it if I could find West African dishes on here as well.

title: Great Recipe and Excellent Pictures
body: It is a good app, however it is a little sporadic in its development.  It tends to wander when applying a search.  Sometimes I have to repeatedly request things in order to receive the proper page. It does provide a tremendous amount of recipes in which I find are delicious!  Most important is the detailed instructions, which allows a novice to perform wonders.

title: So far, I really appreciate this app
body: Yummly is a genuinely good app. I am not the smartest person to use a smart phone so I wish the icons were a little easier to understand but I am sure if I was just a little more tech savvy like most people I would use this app ALL THE TIME. Right now I use it when I have time.

title: Love Yummly!
body: I use Yummly for all my dinners! There are so many options and you can find 20+ recipes for any given dish. Cocktails too! easy to organize all my saved recipes. Being able to change the serving sizes to adjust the recipe is key! I'm always making random amounts of dinner depending on if I need left overs for lunch or not. Great app!

title: Excellent
body: I was using the app on and off for awhile. However, now I use it regularly. Planning and making my meals are easier since I can schedule not only the date I want to eat, but the time. What's even better is that a reminder text is sent to me to begin preparing if I want to eat on time. Absolutely WOW!

title: The greatest recipe app ever
body: I stumbled on Yummly googling a recipe for something and O M G this is so perfect if you want to cook something for dinner with 2 chicken breasts or half a pound of shrimp or an eggplant it is better than ANY cook book EVER because it has everything you can eliminate things like butter ( who would do that though) how many ingredients amount of time. It‚Äôs the best!

title: Best COOKING APP
body: Highly recommend! I‚Äôm a Pinterest lover but this app is perfect to dwindle down ideas and put your shopping list in a convenient spot. Makes the process that much more enjoyable and practical. Plus I‚Äôm never overwhelmed by the options and how to organize all the recipes - a dilemma I usually run into using Pinterest.

title: I can find anything on this site!
body: Rather I‚Äôm looking for something sweet or something new or something low-fat, I always find what I‚Äôm looking for!  I‚Äôve told several of my family members and friends all about Yummly and how awesome it is. Would recommend this recipe site to anyone looking for a great source for recipes.

title: Easy to use, nice wide variety
body: I like using this app to search for recipes. Not having to sift through adds when I‚Äôm trying to find a recipe for dinner is nice. I switched over from Pinterest for that reason. I am a little discouraged that when I search a lot of my already hummed recipes come up.

title: YUM
body: I love YUMMLY it has introduced me to a plethora of recipe blogs and never fails to connect me to a recipe to match my mood (or more often the contents of my cupboard and fridge).  The suggestions are not always exactly on target but I love being able to peruse a variety of recipes for any given dish and select elements of each to make it uniquely my own. Thanks Yummly.

title: Love this app!
body: Over the last few years, I've enjoyed doing more of the cooking for my wife & I as well as family & friends. I found this app a couple of years ago and use it very frequently for new recipes & ideas. In my opinion it is an absolutely great recipe reference that is easy to use.

title: Love This App
body: I have been using this app over the years. They continue to make it better.  Extremely user friendly.  I can plan my week of meals pretty quickly with my library of recipes.  Can even make my grocery list on it.  Overall I would highly recommend!!

title: Pretty good
body: For a novice cooker this app is great!! I cook for 5-7 when I cook so the fact that I can change the servings are perfect!!! Only thing with this app is the recipes repeats itself!! Once you do a handful of main recipes you‚Äôre out of options . More meat recipes would be great. Not the same recipes over and over and over again. And make the app a little more intuitive....you would blow the competition out of the water!!

title: Great food app
body: List your ingredients you have and watch the magic! Also I like how it makes you read the peoples articles a little bit because you do learn a lot even though you think you know it all and you just want to get to the directions.

title: So easy & so Yummy!
body: I love being able to quickly save recipes from anywhere, and have them saved in one place, that can be accessed from anywhere. You can pull up a grocery list for any recipe anytime, which is good for me because I don‚Äôt usually think about it till I‚Äôm at the store.  The recipes are delicious, I‚Äôve tried many thanks to Yummly!‚ù§Ô∏è

title: Overall helpful app

body: There has never been a time that I needed a recipe for something and couldn‚Äôt find it! Being able to save them and have a little collection of favorites has made my life so much easier, along with the ability to filter based on my dietary restrictions.

title: Inspiration when I need it!
body: Love this app-whenever I don‚Äôt know WHAT to make or don‚Äôt know HOW to make something, Yummly has my back. It‚Äôs easy to find recipes for every occasion & dietary preference. And recipes are easy to save and find again. I can even find recipes to utilize whatever I happen to have on hand!

title: Best app ever
body: I love Yummly.  I love the fact that I can put in a recipe I want to make and I get the version for vegan/plant based option.  There are so many recipes it‚Äôs hard to choose.  I love the shopping list and the ability to use a calendar to prepare a recipe and it reminds me when to start prepping and cooking.  This is the best app ever.

title: Awesome app!
body: A lifesaver for a busy working mom of 3! So many options of meals, sides, drinks and treats. I absolutely love the shopping list I can create from the meal plan!! Best idea ever!! I just got the app last week and I have planned ALL dinners from it! Husband works late during this time of year and really likes the new variety of meals I‚Äôm making.

title: Great app, store recipes, find new ones easily
body: Love this app, will store recipes In customizable categories, will offer suggestions based on previous recipes stored or used.  Some have videos to help the less experienced chef of the household.  There are likes to help determine what you may want to try.

title: Best Recipe App
body: I use Yummly all the time!  I use it when unsure what to make for dinner.  I use it when I need a new passing dish for a dinner party.   I use it to find new recipes or a twist on a classic dish for the holidays.  So many great ideas to choose from and then a great system to file them away for when you are ready to make.

title: Fantastic recipe app
body: I love this app. I use it for most of my recipes weekly. It‚Äôs super easy to use, easy to modify settings and filter what sort of recipes you see. I love that they send me a weekly email of suggestions for me. It has helped me immensely sticking to my meal plans and finding healthy recipes. Love and highly recommend!

title: Easy Peasy
body: Recipes. Are always easy to follow, yummy to look at and delish to eat. Never had a problem trying to make one. And sooooo many to choose from. The best part.... never have to do a lot of signing in to see the recipe. Just open it up and there it is. Way to go Yummly!!! I love your site.

title: Hard to Navigate- Awkward
body: There are some great recipes on here but the app is just so awkward to use. I click on a pic of something I want to make and it just enlarges the pic. I finally figured out you have to swipe to find a sub menu to open the recipe. A lot of unnecessary paragraphs of useless info from whoever put the recipe in. Can‚Äôt get the print button to do anything. It‚Äôs just not user friendly.

title: Downloaded to deleted in 5 minutes
body: The profile setup and filter suggestions are incredibly annoying and intrusive, but forgivable. I think the app is trying to do too much and gather too much data upfront and thus alienates those who, like myself, simply want to search for a recipe.

title: My ‚Äú go to‚Äù
body: Cooking something you‚Äôve never made before, Yummly has the answer to your questions. Want to try a new diet alternative or cooking for someone with diet preferences? Just type it into search and you‚Äôll find what you need quickly, easily and clearly.

title: The ONLY Cooking App I Use
body: I love this app! I‚Äôve been using it for number of years now. I don‚Äôt feel limited in recipes, the recipes use normal ingredients and are  written by normal people for normal cooks and levels. Great app that gets updated pretty regularly; the admin people are also available and responsive.

title: Great app!
body: It encompasses so many different websites in one thing. I love the accuracy of the food rating and how popular the dish type is. But my absolute favorite feature would have to be how I can find dishes based on the ingredients I have, I can add or take away ingredients and it‚Äôll auto-populate more meals.

title: YUMMLY IS AWESOME!!
body: I‚Äôm a middle of the road cook. But definitely want to try more delicious and healthy recipes. Yummly has certainly been a great source for finding those recipes. You can customize and even search as new ideas come up. Very user friendly and can find any type of recipe I‚Äôm in search of. Thanks Yummly!!!!

title: Dear Yummly,
body: I‚Äôve been enjoying Yummly for years now and find it very inspiring. Just one more thing would make it perfect. It really should state what a serving size is. It‚Äôs impossible to figure out if 12 servings equals 1/3 cup each or 3/4 cup each. This is important information needed to supply the correct total calories, carbs, and protein  your family needs.        Thanks Yummly !!

title: Many Yummly Recipes are Yummy
body: I have tried several recipes from Yummly and have almost never have been disappointed. It frequently offers different recipes for the same dish. Usually, I combine some of them and create my own and most of the time I come up with a delicious dish.

title: My go to!!!
body: I love to cook and Yummly is a GREAT resource. I can‚Äôt tell you hope many times I have searched the web and been directed to their site. I do wish you would not be taken from the site to see the directions, but it still does not take this from being a5 star app!!

title: Great to find a new Recipe
body: I‚Äôve made many great recipes using Yummly and satisfied many tummys! The recipes are always detailed and straightforward and the best thing about the experience is how much variety you get just from typing in a single ingredient. I have also made of these recipes my own.

title: Great!
body: I love this app! It makes it super easy to find meals and especially love that you can scan the foods you have and finds things to make with it. My family also is trying to eat low carb and I can find lots of recipes that are super good! Would definitely recommend

title: Good reminders
body: Good reminders for old favorites; helpful ideas for expanded menus. Some top line ingredients lists have typos, omitted ingredients, and duplicate ingredients.  Scrolling through the unnecessary and narcissistic verbiage and repetitious photos to get to the actual recipe on each blog is tedious and annoying. But not YUMMLY‚Äôs problem.  I detest videos.  I can read faster and text is easy to re-see.

title: Love it!
body: Very easy to use and lots of awesome recipes! Love it a lot more then Pinterest when looking for recipes, can even enter what ingredients you have when you don‚Äôt know what to make and it will give you different recipes you can make out of the items that you have!

title: Convenient streamlined App
body: I love this app. It has simplified my life. No more running to the store with sheets of paper and handwritten grocery lists. I love that I can plan my menu and make my shopping list in one place and check off my shopping list as I shop in store or online. It makes eating paleo easier!

title: Easy to customize to your diet requirements
