body: Once you set up your diet requirements & the ingredients you don‚Äôt like or are allergic to, you can search by any ingredient within your parameters & save favorites in personalized folders. So easy to use & practical... and lots of new recipe choices. My family loves for our keto diet!!

title: Yum Yum
body: I have truly enjoyed using this app. My family loves the new recipes. I love the fact you can easily create a shopping list to take with you. A great tool to make cooking a lot easier. I really like the fact you can add ingredients you already have at home to find recipes also.

title: Lots of recipes.
body: I learned about this app from my son Mike. I have found many recipes to try and have tried many.  I have found many that have gone into my monthly menu. The coconut cream sauce has been my last favorite. Many have asked for my recipes. Thank you so much for this app.

title: Love you Yummly!
body: I've put off the review long enough... I go to this app almost every time I start to cook ! Every single thing I've tried... comes out amazing! I've forwarded to both my moms, sister and daughter in laws ! Even my brother... I enjoy trying new things. So much fun trying a new twist to an old recipe! Thanks Guys ‚ù§Ô∏è

title: Love
body: Thank You for sending this to me, it has great recipes. Everyday I get more and more, I am so overwhelmed because they look scrumptious and I don‚Äôt know what to do first. In the winter months it is so great to have these wonderful recipes and enjoy making then and sharing with family and friends.

title: Best Food App Period
body: There's no other food app with the variety of recipes that can be found on Yummly. I am a former caterer and have prepared hundreds of appetizers, entrees, and desserts. I have over 200 cookbooks, yet the the majority of the time I find the recipe I‚Äôm looking for on Yummly.  Yummly is an absolute must for both my professional and personal cooking.

title: Un-Yum
body: My only issue is when you want to remove a Yum, it does not always remove from your Yum list. When I called support their only solution was to send them a list of the ones I didn‚Äôt want. I have 10-15 recipes that I don‚Äôt want anymore and cannot get them removed. I‚Äôm not sending a list every time I want something removed

title: I Love Yummly
body: I use Yummly everyday no joke. I‚Äôm always looking for different ways to make a recipe to keep it new and fresh. Yummly hasn‚Äôt disappointed me yet. Wide selection, options to filter what you‚Äôre looking for, and you can filter recipes based off your lifestyle and medical conditions. The app is the just that darn good.

title: Lifesaver
body: I never use a cookbook anymore. This is all i need. I love that you can pick recipes that you like based on reviews and ingredients you have. I also LOVE the new function where you can type in a couple ingredients you have and search for tons of recipes that include those! So amazing!

title: great at finding recipes I like
body: Whatever algorithm Yummly uses is great at knowing what I like (though I should say that I like just about everything!). My one complaint is that the app doesn‚Äôt always pull the ingredient lists correctly from the websites where the recipes come from. So I tend to use Yummly as a search tool and not actually make recipes in-app.

title: LOVE this app!
body: Cooking is very new to me, and this app makes everything SO easy. Plenty of delicious selections to choose from, and not only can you read all nutritional facts but you can even buy the ingredients through the app. This makes crappy cookers like me look like they really know what they‚Äôre doing. :)

title: Every recipe at your fingertips
body: This is a very easy to use, all encompassing app. I‚Äôve yet to search for any recipe and come up empty.  By pulling recipes from different sites, this app lets you choose from a vast network.  The overview shows ingredients needed, then reroutes to that recipes website for directions.  I love it

title: Yummly is the BEST
body: I always look for my recipes on Yummly first. I especially love that I can specify what ingredients I need to use that day. The schedule eat time function is a little silly though because I take my time cooking. And the ‚ÄúScheduled and Made‚Äù recipe list that continues to be made, and I don‚Äôt like it being automatically created. BUT, fabulous collection of recipes nonetheless.

title: What‚Äôs for dinner?
body: Love this app! As a working single mother, I‚Äôm usually running in eight different directions. I‚Äôm not a fan of eating out much and I‚Äôm very careful with what I eat and what I feed my son. That being said, this app makes ‚Äúwhats for dinner?‚Äù Easier to answer since I can cook up something great within the hour.

title: Mixing Reviews
body: Like getting the recipes, bu get pretty frustrated with trying to find the directions after the list of ingredients. Wish there wasn‚Äôt as much verbiage & that the whole recipe with directions would pop up all at once. I do enjoy seeing recipes grouped together like the InstaPot or slow cooker recipes and categorized as Paleo, Low Carb & gluten free & sugar free. That has been a great help.  But sometimes I just give up because the actual directions are so hard to find.

title: Great for what you have
body: Have been using this app for years now. The best part about this is that you can put in the ingredients that you have or that you want to eliminate and it will narrow down recipes to fit those preferences. Website is also pretty nice to have in hand too.

title: Fantastic app so far! Would like a dark mode
body: LOVE the app so far! The only thing I would like to see in the near future is a dark mode option in settings where the recipes and stuff are white on black. Easier on the eyes for some people. I see it a lot in news app settings.

title: Yummly‚Äôs The Best
body: Yummly is the best recipe app I have ever seen. They have a HUGE collection of recipes for any occasion‚Äîbreakfast, lunch or dinner; parties, family gatherings or snacks; meat vegetables or desserts; soups, salads or drinks. They have made me a better cook with a variety had never dreamed of before getting the Yummly app. I would recommend this app to anyone from the beginner to the gourmet cook.

title: Love!!
body: Since downloading this app I have found many new recipes.  I no longer even glance at my other apps because it seems that yummly has all the recipes from my other apps!  I love the shopping list option as well. If you like to cook this is your app!

title: Love it!
body: This is the best food app ever! I use it daily. I also use AnyList to transfer and store recipes. Its cumbersome because one has to paste the steps into AnyList. I wish Yummly would fix that. Also when they solicit emails, the links to the dishes never work. So why waste time sending something that can‚Äôt be linked? Otherwise I really love Yummly but I wish they would fix these things in their app.

title: Most Amazing App
body: I love, love this App! My life has been made easy! I hated to cook and found allot of recipes to be way over my skill set.  This app makes cooking easy and delicious! I type in what I have in my fridge or pantry and I always find a recipe to make without having to go to the store.....I tell everyone about Yummly!

title: Best Recipe Site, Hands Down
body: If it has been prepared and eaten, Yummly has recipes for it. What I like best is finding multiple recipes for the dish I want to cook, and being able to choose one that sounds particularly yummy and is a good match for what I have in the fridge and pantry.  Many of our favorite dishes now are Yummly finds.

title: Yes and no
body: I find that it‚Äôs time consuming to get to all the information I need for a recipe. Once I am interested, I need to  print it out for user friendly instructions. The buffalo chicken dip was good but too salty for our taste.  A similar casserole was good, however my husband didn‚Äôt go back for more so that won‚Äôt be made again. Today we‚Äôre trying the carne al Pastor tacos. If these aren‚Äôt a keeper, I‚Äôll stop subscription.

title: Love!!
body: Love this app.  We have made so many recipes and they are a huge success.  It helps to not have the same recipes over and over with fresh ideas that make things fun.    My kids even look through it and pick recipes for us to try as a family

title: Amazing AP!  Best thing I have found!  Meal Planning Made Easy
body: This is amazing!  Used it to plan meals this week.  Made shopping easy...

title: Amazing app
body: I love this app and I get hungry every time I use it because I just can‚Äôt stop imagining myself eating all the delicious food it has. The one thing I wish was better is to share recipes and print them off easily but it may be because I haven‚Äôt used this app that much. üòÜüòåüòÉ

title: Nice
body: Awesome and organized. The pictures help out a lot so it can show us what a finished product looks like. I love this app because I can search by ingredient and find different recipes. For example if I need to cook some ground turkey- I can look that up and find different recipes that utilize the turkey. Love, love, love!

title: So much variety!
body: For years, I have been able to find good recipes here, no matter what I was looking for. I‚Äôve even increased my family‚Äôs ‚Äúfavorites by request list‚Äù.

title: Recipes
body: Sometimes the recipes are in metric terms so I have to convert. And it‚Äôs annoying having to scroll through all the blogging when I just need to see the recipe. Other than that I love how if I come up with something I‚Äôd like to cook but don‚Äôt know how there‚Äôs always a recipe available.

title: Good ideas
body: I usually go to Yum first for ideas on what to make for dinner. I‚Äôm bad at planning for a menu and sticking to it but I usually have an odd group of ingredients around. I can almost always find a recipe that will fit and tastes good. I have had very few ‚Äúfails‚Äù using the recipes I find on this site.

title: I love this app
body: My wife has a strangely specific diet and before this app we couldn‚Äôt find recipes that work. Being able to filter for anything helps so much. My one complaint is that it doesn‚Äôt always totally adhere to the filters. It would be nice if they had a ‚Äúthese ALMOST fit‚Äù warning before those recipes start.

title: Great recipes
body: Love Yummly! Refer to everyone looking for recipes. My one huge problem is logging in. Why do I have to go through putting in email and password? Time consuming and extremely annoying! I want to touch the icon and see immediately recipes to look at !!!!!!!!!!!

title: Great variety, buggy functionality
body: Searching and storing recipes is great. Recommendations make sense. Gettiing to the actual recipe how to‚Äôs is often a pain because this is a compiler website so the info provided is in multiple formats based on the poster who wrote the segment. Lots of room for improvement but the potential to be a great resource is definitely there.

title: Yummm is right!
body: I have a medical condition that has caused me to broaden my horizon when it comes to my diet. Yummly helps me explore recipes that I would never have found on my own. I like the filters and how it asks me questions on what I‚Äôm looking for.  Dry helpful when u don‚Äôt even know How to ask for help on a diet plan.

title: Love/Hate Relationship
body: I would love to make Yummly my primary go to for organizing recipes, meal planning, and grocery list making. I love being able to add ingredients to my shopping list right in the recipe!

title: Aspiring to Become a Better Cook
body: I love the variety of low fat vegan recipes Yummly offers.  You could say that my cooking skills are higher than the average American, and, because if that, I prefer to learn  from cooks that know more than me.  Sometimes, some recipes seem to be from cooks who have not made a dish enough times to make their best version of their recipe.

title: Almost perfect
body: I love the customizable features and the fact that you can tell it what you have currently and it will find recipes for you. I like to keep track of my protein intake. It would be great if you had an option for ‚Äúhigh protein‚Äù since you already have options for ‚Äúlow fat‚Äù, ‚Äúlow carb‚Äù, ‚Äúlow calorie‚Äù, and ‚Äúhigh fiber‚Äù

title: Love but wish
body: I really love this app for the versatility in recipes of all diet types. It really has helped with my transition to the vegan lifestyle! The only thing I wish I could do is save the recipes in a place to come back to later bs typing in search bar for it in hopes I can find again. Also, some video of how to make for beginner oilers would be a great add on:)

title: Yum
body: By far the best recipes app for those of us wanting to explore new and exciting food. So helpful to finding worldly cuisine and being able to create a shopping list. When going to the local store ingredients are easy to find, as when your memory fails and hand written notes are lost. Comfort in knowing stored recipes are on my phone.

title: Spectacular app
body: I‚Äôve been able to find so many great recipes on this app and I love the features that it has like, you can tell it what ingredients you have and it‚Äôll give you recipes with only the ingredients you listed! You should definitely give this a shot!

title: starving college student
body: I just started college with my new apartment so this has been a lifesaver with figuring out what to eat and uh, how to cook. the only thing is I don‚Äôt have an oven and only one stove top and there doesn‚Äôt seem to be a way to filter it so that it doesn‚Äôt give me recipes that needs an oven or simultaneous cooking. But besides that it‚Äôs been super good and useful and a life saver.

title: Love the app
body: This app has saved me out of a few jams. We get tired of the same old dinners so this app has given me recipes to expand our palettes. Thank you for creating something so easy to use that even my 10yr old daughter can use it and has. We had very creative desserts this summer.

title: Love this app!!
body: I use this app all the time! Like another user mentioned I don't like the fact that you have to navigate away to get the actual recipe, but I've gotten used to it. I haven't had any issues. I like the fact that you can create different headings to store recipes under. Makes it easier. I definitely recommend!

title: Could be better but I like it
body: I like the way the app works and there are a lot different recipes to choose from. However I would like to be able to see my meals by current week inside the app instead of having to view them in my calendar. I would also like to see the meals I have already made be removed from my schedule but not from my yums. It‚Äôs a good free meal planning app.

title: Proud user for years
body: This app is a staple in my life. I have been using it for like 5 years if not longer. I have allergies, food preferences and what not so this app is great for customizing and filtering recipes to fit my needs. Hundreds of recipes pop up as soon as you type in a couple ingredients.

title: My favorite app!
body: I‚Äôm not even sure how I stumbled upon this app, but I sing its praises all of the time.  It‚Äôs easy to use and offers a variety of recipes for anything you can name.  I previously had ‚Äúlimited‚Äù kitchen skills, but have grown much more comfortable and creative in my cooking ever since I started using Yummly.  Love it!!

title: Somethings wrong not user friendly
body: I will get emails from Yummly about new recipes. Once I click on it I get transferred to a web browser and at the top is a link to install the app. I already have the app and it should automatically bring me to that app. So I‚Äôll click anyway and then I get to the app. But where‚Äôs the recipe I wanted to see in the first place. Back in the web browser. So if I really want to see the recipe and possibly save it I need to search for it. Yummly can do better because other app are.

title: Great app but missing feature
body: I love this app but the description and intro after downloading say you can scan ingredients that you have for dish ideas. I have searched through the entire app and this feature can not be found. It was the main reason I downloaded it. But overall the app is wonderful.

title: Love this app
body: The best recipe app out there. I love all the recommendations it gives me and especially love the filter function on search. I use this app almost every day.

title: Basically Pinterest for just food
body: I‚Äôve only been using it a few days but I do love that the recipes are built into the app and easy to search through. Other great features are that it syncs with my iCal and creating your own boards to add organize recipes into.

title: Great Find
body: I have been using this for awhile and have found it really helps me to find most everything I‚Äôve tried to find in the Big Books that‚Äôs left me flat. I like the way it is laid out and it‚Äôs great for quick meals as well as the hard to find oldies.

title: Great recipes, dumb moderators
body: I loved the app until I got banned from posting. Anyone ever watch ‚ÄúF*** That‚Äôs Delicious‚Äù on Viceland? I said that with the asterisks to self censor it after making an amazing Palak Paneer and these puritans banned me from commenting. First of all they‚Äôre no fan of food. They would get the reference. Secondly, I bleeped it! This app has great recipes. Too bad it‚Äôs run by nuns. Dorks! Your mom is a b**** and so are you lol. Are you gonna tell on me? Go home to your mommy ya cowards

title: Brillant gem for sparking your own cooking creativity
body: I don‚Äôt remember how I found the app, but I‚Äôm so glad I did. I love that you can variations of recipes for a dish. Some of the recipes are embedded in cooking articles which is great, but sometimes you simply want the ingredients and directions. No complaints from me!

title: I LOVE THIS APP
body: I just recently chose to live a vegetarian lifestyle and this app has every recipe I need to execute this transition much easier! Also the cooking is so so so much fun and so far I haven‚Äôt had a bad recipe yet! I just go off the recipe with a few choice option and it comes out perfect! Beautiful app. Worth the money!

title: Good App
body: It is an easy app to access and has great receipes.  Someone said seemed not to be able to save the receipes.  Once a receipe is open you just need to click on the 3 dimensional square and save to your account.  It will ask you if you want to save as a dinner, lunch or breakfast or dessert.  It is a very helpful app.

title: Perfect every time!
body: This is my favorite app ! I can absolutely always find what I need and have lots of choices to choose from . The best is being able to mark it as a favorite and it goes in my on file ! I love to cook and bake and you have given me so many new ideas!

title: Great
body: It‚Äôs really awesome especially if your trying to find healthy meals it literally has anything you could think of but I just with they would show their serving sizes as 1 and not like 4 so I don‚Äôt have to divide the ingredients and if I need more servings it would just be easier to multiply

title: Change the shopping list feature back
body: Please change this feature the way you had it. It was much easier to look at a recipe for the ingredient you bought instead of changing the view your screen & pushing a few more buttons

title: I love this app!
body: I absolutely love this app! This app lets you plan your meals, make a shopping list Or you can use items you already have on hand. It even tells you when to start cooking the food so it will be finished in time for dinner. Forget Pinterest this is where my love is! üòò

title: Would have been 5 stars, but...
body: The new format makes it so I can‚Äôt listen to music on my phone while using this app. Makes searching through recipes a lot less fun. Makes cooking irritating, because I have to play records or switch to music on my computer. Hassle. Still, lots of recipes here. Several for random dietary restrictions, too. I‚Äôd do 5 stars instead of 2, but getting to have music in the background while I cook is THAT important to me.

title: Super useful
body: Very practical, with a streamlined interface. Easy to find and collect quality recipes from the huge amount of websites that Yummly draws from. Integrated shopping list is very easy to use. My saved recipes are easy to view. Basically every time I cook, I use this app.

title: Male in the Kicthen
body: It‚Äôs been great using Yummly I research recipes that I find appealing then save them after I test them to see if they are as good as they look on the pictures. I use the App quite frequently the only downside to it is I can‚Äôt put old recipes I have accumulated over the years. If they ever change that then it would be 5 stars

title: Love this app
body: I‚Äôve Lost 58 lb since I have been using this app. The discovery of spices and tastes have been amazing. My whole family are involved in meal planning. The one thing I wish is I could move around my collection, I made it the days of the week. It would be nice to put them in order

title: Yumazing!!
body: I truly love that this is still absolutely free. It has so many different recipes that can be found. I‚Äôve been looking for an app that offered truly free search of recipes to try at home and this is that app. Thank you Team at Yummly for keeping this free for users to enjoy like myself!!!

title: My most helpful app!
body: I use Yummly every week as I sit down to plan my meals. I love how it filters by diets and gives seasonal suggestions. And unlike other recipe apps, everything I‚Äôve ever made from Yummly has turned out just as the bloggers said it would.  No unrealistic meals that are impossible to execute.

title: Best recipes easy to use app.
body: I have tried many apps this one has great recipes as few ingredients or as fancy as you choose to be. Good vegan selection as I have one in the house which can be challenging. Find I can make vegan sides and main courses the whole family can enjoy.

title: Best app on my devices yet!
body: With the limited dining out options during this pandemic..., this app has the most amazing filter and you can use whatever you have at home!   I have only come across one recipe in my 80 something YUMs that didn‚Äôt turn out well!

title: Great app, perfect for finding new recipes
body: Yummly is a great app and is always coming out with updates. The only inconvenient thing is that it takes you to the websites that post the recipe instead of staying in app (to respect the source of the recipe) but it can be difficult to navigate. Otherwise it‚Äôs very helpful and has lots of great recipes!

title: My Favorite Recipes
body: I highly recommend this app! If you love to cook or if you just like looking at pretty food pics - this is a must have. Just about any category of food you can think of making is found here. So what are you waiting for? Download now!

title: Not perfect but the best one I‚Äôve found
body: One stop recipe finder with direct to calendar scheduling and shopping list builder.

title: Great to find and categorize
body: The app makes it so easy to find and track and categorize recipes. I love being able to make my "try soon" list, my "healthy snacks," and so on. There are so many ways to find something good to eat! Filtering by ingredient and diet style are also excellent ways to find a dish that appeals to my whole family.

title: My Go-To Recipe Source
body: Yummly is absolutely the best resource for finding recipes especially for people with dietary restriction or food allergies. I can always find excellent recipes to share at family gatherings and know that my food is safe for my family members who can't have certain foods.

title: Easy phone Access to Recipes
body: Many good recipes, however the authors of the recipes often get too wordy in their explanations, and their personal lives before you you can access the directions. But good app nonetheless. Limit the information in the app other than the ingredients and directions!

title: Great recipes
body: Yummly is a great resource for meal planning. It has many different recipes that cater to specific dietary needs and even includes an easy to use shopping list! It has helped me streamline the process of  shopping and prepping dinners for the week as well as choose great recipes for special occasions!

title: Really like App
body: One of the best Recipe apps I have used. Enormous number of recipes and cuisines to choose from.

title: Love it!
body: This is a great app. My husband introduced it to me and I've found so many great recipes with it. I love that you can filter by diet, calories, ingredients I DONT want, etc. My favorite thing to do is to type in a few items I have and then see what recipes pop up. Only thing I think it needs are videos. If it does, I haven't seen any...

title: Life Saver
body: This is a great app. So many times you are looking for something different to cook but are in a hurry. The recipes are right there with easy instructions. And there are variations of the same recipe which is fun to read. So you can borrow from one if another doesn‚Äôt fit your taste buds.

title: Love this resource!
body: I have been using Yummly for quite a few years! I am always able to find something that suits my taste of the day! I love to cook and it has tons of options to choose from. And being able to pick very specifically what I want! I love all types of Asian food..and I like how you can pick individual ingredients!

title: Yummly
body: I love Yummly, I can find easy keto recipes here that don‚Äôt call for crazy ingredients. A lot of the recipes ask for ingredients I keep in my kitchen so a lot of the time I just need to get 1-2 things from the store to make any recipe. There are also some more complex recipes if you‚Äôre into that as well.

title: Excited to Have the App!
body: I heard about it from a Nutritionist I am working with at health club, and I am excited to try the recipes I have received since joining recently- easy to use, geared for me per my profile and preferences, I am trying to do more meal prep and cook at home.  Doable and extremely tasty and healthful!

title: UPDATE: This STILL is my most used app!
body: UPDATE: I have consistently used this app for probably 5+ years. Never an issue, always great recipes to try, so simple to use. I recommend to EVERYONE!

title: Yummly!!
body: I can‚Äôt count the number of times that I have gone to this app to find a recipe or a meal to cook for that evening.  Other times I just see something that looks so delicious I make a special trip to the store to get my needed ingredients. Yummly has a way of ‚Äúmaking ‚Äú me do that.  Thank you so much for making these recipes available!!                 P. Dwyerüòé

title: Love this app!
body: My husband has congestive heart failure, so I‚Äôm cooking fresh food for us, only without the salt. Yummly has proved invaluable in finding flavorful recipes without all the sodium (if there is salt in the recipe I just omit it). It‚Äôs worth it for the pan-seared tuna steak recipe alone! It‚Äôs not a dedicated ‚Äúlow sodium‚Äù app but it‚Äôs really good for finding quick and flavorful meals.

title: Yum!
body: Great app for recipe ideas‚Äîcan just put in ingredients and bam! Dinner ideas for the week!

title: Yes to Yummly!
body: I love love love this app!!! Easy and efficient with great recipes and lots of reviews of most recipes! I have started cooking much more often because it‚Äôs just too easy to hop on here, plug in an ingredient I may already have in the fridge I‚Äôd like to use and, tadaaaaa! Select one of many delicious options! Thank you Yummly!

title: Great app, but add more!
body: I've used numerous recipes from the site so far, and I've been really happy with their success.

title: Almost 5 star
body: Love the app and make tons of meals of the recipes they offer. However, the only thing holding me back from a 5 star rating is how difficult it is to access the directions to some of the recipes. Hoping they come up with a more straight forward directions menu in the future!

title: My Go-To Recipe App
body: I really like this food app. It‚Äôs my app of choice for deciding what to make for dinner at the end of the day and in a pinch for ideas.

title: Great App, Sooo Many Recipes!!
body: This app is such a great source for a variety of recipes from all over the internet. When I decide to make something or that I want to find a specific dish, nowadays my first look is through Yummly and not Google. 10/10 would recommend to anyone (and I have!!)

title: The best app for a beginner, but also for anyone who wants to learn to cook a new dish
body: The best for a beginner, but also for anyone who wants to learn to cook a different dish. I love this app and I tell many people to try it. Manny yummy dishes in this app. I give this app 5 stars. It also gives you a video, list of grocery, and step by step.

title: No idea how to sort
body: It should be easy to sort through recipes when doing a search. There is no reason I need to see hundreds of 9 vote recipes to finally see one that has 29k. If the option is even available, it is not easily seen. Sort by popularity would make this app worth it. As it stands, it‚Äôs broken for me and only the website is worth the effort to find new recipes. Use this when baking and have then saved.

title: So dope! Saucey! (Literally & Hypothetically speaking)
body: This is the best food and drink app I‚Äôve ever seen! It has everything from breakfast to desserts to cocktails. Helps a lot when I don‚Äôt know what to make. So many good ideas and has options for every type of foodie out there. If I could give this app 100 stars I would.

title: Handy resource for all levels
body: Even for vegetarians and the health conscious, this app is great! I can always find yummy options. The photos make it easy to evaluate whether to click for the recipe. I like the filters too. Overall, the app is very easy to use and has a ton of great recipes.

title: 10 stars
body: Used Epicurious for years. The Yummly App blows theirs out of the water. Just downloaded Yummly in hopes I could find more recipes for the genres that didn‚Äôt have many in epicurious. I love this app so much I actually deleted epicurious and only use Yummly. So major ups to the creators of it. I‚Äôve been a chef for 20 yrs.

title: Yummly
body: I love this app. I love cooking pretty much every meal, and food of all different ethnicities. Indian and Asian are my favorites. You can find anything on this app. It‚Äôs also fun to scan through the home page and try things you‚Äôve never tried before. I definitely recommend this app.

title: Love this app!
body: I love the variety of sources the recipes come from, the ability to save and organize favorites, delete not so good ones. The photos are impressive, I look forward to the emails with suggestions and the suggestions upon opening the app customized to your preferences.

title: I love this app so much
body: Was and always will be my go to for healthy recipes. I love that you can put in the ingredients you have on hand and it‚Äôll select recipes you can make with what you have!!! I‚Äôve had this app for almost 3 years and it‚Äôs never been a disappointment.

title: Yummy Yummly
body: I have found some awesome recipes on here and I am a vegetarian. I have set my Yummly to vegetarian only and love the interesting, delicious recipes I have found.

title: Great app!
body: I love this app. It has saved me so many times when I needed a recipe for something new to try or when I want to just spice things up. It‚Äôs also great that I can save my favorites and those I want to give a try by using separate categories. I‚Äôve recommended Yummly to my friends!

title: My cooking has improved!!
body: I really enjoy this app! I can take something that I have in my kitchen or pantry and find the perfect recipe for it! My cooking has improved and my wife has taken note! I‚Äôm just following recipes on here and once I do it 3 or 4 times I start experimenting!

title: Love this app!!!
body: This is a great app to find recipes from basic to chef inspired! I recommended this app to my son because he's learning how to cook for himself and I would recommend it to everyone! It's easy to use and i love that it also shows the nutritional information for each recipe!

title: I could be better
body: This app is a great idea and works pretty smoothly, but I just downloaded it again looking for breakfast inspiration. Scrolled through about 50 individual pancake Recipes looking for something creative to eat... then deleted the app again. My eyeballs shouldn‚Äôt fall out of my head scrolling for some variety. There are too many of the same recipe on here.

title: Best ever App I love this App
body: Yummy is the best App every. I can fulfill my fantasy of being a Master Chef with one click of my Yummy Recipe App. Thank you Yummy. I Love you Yummy, but it seems that the upgraded app is super slow and frustrating, I like the old app better. Yummly if you were a woman I‚Äôd Marry you.                            .                                   Wayne E.

title: Eh it‚Äôs okay
body: I really enjoy using the app, however a huge concern for me is saving my own recipes and editing recipes I have in my private sections. It‚Äôs annoying bc sometimes the recipes are not exact, like some are too soupy, too sweet, too salty, too thick, not thick enough, not sweet enough. It would be great if I could add in my own ingredients to the list of ingredients on my side which isn‚Äôt viewable to the public eye.

title: Unstuck Yourself
body: Constantly stuck in the same routine for dinners, desserts, snacks and drinks? This is the app for you. Guaranteed to find something new just by punching in one ingredient and filtering from there based upon questions from the app. 3 years running and loving how it constantly updates as well.

title: Former Fan
body: I used to love using Yummly, but I just applied the new update and all my saved recipes have VANISHED! I hate when that happens.

title: New fave
body: I‚Äôm enjoying the variety and quality of recipes, and really like the filters you can put on a recipe search. I DON‚ÄôT like that the ingredients and directions are not easily available on the same page‚Äîthis format is kind of a pain and could definitely use improvement.

title: My favorite source for recipes!
body: Whenever I need information for a certain dish, I am never disappointed when I look on Yummly. They offer varied, interesting and easy to follow recipes. Some are based on old, proven resources while others are creative and interesting v

title: An Inspirational Recipe Box
body: I have been using Yummly for years.  They keep building new and useful features.  There is a ton of reliable content hosted here, rated and commented on by users.  I come here when I am stuck, seeking inspiration, or when I want to find a mock recipe for something famously delicious.

title: Tons of great recipes tailored to your preferences!
body: I love this easy-to-use cooking app. My favorite feature is that there are a lot of filters you can use to find recipes that match your skill level and the ingredients you already have as well as your taste and preferences.

title: Use Yummly constantly
body: Besides the NYTimes Cooking app, Yummly is my go to for recipes. What I love about Yummly is it has features no other site has - like the ability to adjust ingredients by serving size, top notch search functionality that lets you filter by a variety of preferences, and so much more!

title: Best recipe app ever!
body: I use Yummly almost every day. I can easily find so many options of every recipe I can think of and then some. If I‚Äôm out of ideas for what to cook for dinner, I open up Yummly and voila, I find a recipe I never would have thought of. You‚Äôll never use another recipe resource!

title: Yummly is superb!
body: I‚Äôve been using this app for a few yeas, and it‚Äôs been simply fantastic. I like to browse for ideas and love looking at the pics. The collection of recipes seems endless! I‚Äôve got a bunch of really fine cookbooks, but love grabbing Yummly for new stuff. Seriously, I use it almost every day. Love it!

title: Use it multiple times a week. Now my kids use it too!
body: I love this app. All inclusive go to app for most anything you might want to cook. My kids (ages 10 & 13) have caught on, and now they use it to find food they want to make, and suggestions for family dinners.

title: Great App
body: This is one of my most used apps, absolutely love it. I have not tried the new feature where you can search by ingredients you have on hand but so glad that feature is available. Love how easy it is to keep your loved recipes organized.

title: App developers please look into a couple of issues
body: 1. Can‚Äôt delete multiple grocery list items quickly because the app often reorders items.

title: I liked it enough to write a review
body: This app does really good to connect people with a wide variety of recipes. For a free app I was a little skeptical because nothing good is usually free. This app is great and I would recommend for people who don‚Äôt cook very often and even for avid cooks. Hope this helps

title: Best recipe app!
body: It is tailored to your diet restrictions so you don‚Äôt have to think of your substitutions and the recipes are actually good and easy to follow. But the shopping list is probably my favorite! Separating items based on aisle ... makes my shopping trips much easier. My husband thanks you.

title: Freaking Amazing
body: I have literally introduced this app to all my cooking friends! Yummly hands down is my go to for any recipe. I love how I‚Äôm able to tweak the recipe and increase the servings sizes. It would be too cool if one could create a meal prep for like the week with a full grocery list for it and all. I swear I‚Äôd use this app 10x more.

title: Never scrounge for recipes again!
body: I love this app in particular because you can browse recipes by what ingredients you have. If you only have a few measly things in the pantry or fridge, you can still make a great meal. It‚Äôs been quite the life saver for a college student such as myself.

title: Why 4 Stars
body: Like the app a lot and use it quite frequently, however the reason for the 4 stars. It doesn‚Äôt tell me how to link to my calendar but always shows a pop up error message when I log in, that my calendar is not linked. Other than this... it‚Äôs my go to place to look for recipes!

title: So. Dam. Great.
body: Super easy to use. LOVE how it creates ingredient lists for you, you can check em off as you add em to your grocery cart and will even let you make recipes with ingredients you should already have from previous shopping trips.  Different options too for different dietary preferences.

title: Good app BUT
body: I'm new to this tool and got it because I love to cook and wanted to try some new recipes. I went through and created some categories to save recipes under for easy retrieval. However, I've saved about 150 under Dinner and when I go back to look for them I only see about 20 even though it shows 150. I don't understand why I can't see all of what was saved.

title: Get to it already
body: I like using this ap, specially the customization feature, but I hate having to scroll thru all the dialogue & ads before getting to actual directions to make a recipe. Sometimes the ingredients measurements is incomplete and you have to return to beginning to see the ingredients list. You cannot print the entire recipe at once. Very annoying!

title: Easiest way to search and store recipes for particular diets!
body: As someone who is allergic to gluten and dabbling with veganism, finding recipes can be tricky! Yummly makes it easy to search by dietary preferences, specific ingredients and level of complexity. My cooking life has  greatly improved since downloading the app!

title: Novice Cook to Phenomenal Chef
body: Yummly is my mom, grandma, auntie, and a 5 star restaurant international chef all rolled up into one! My kids and hubby raise their eyebrows and applaud when I bring out the aromatic, colorful, and delicious Yummly plates. The recipes are so easy to follow my kids cook, too! And, it has our favorites and the option to try new exotic dishes. What shall I cook tonight?!!!!

title: So Easy
body: I love having the ability to find new recipes in a matter of minutes.  Being able to file them and pull them up at a meter date is great.  No paging through numerous cookbooks trying to remember where a certain recipe is.

title: Accessibility flaws:
body: Your app has various accessibility flaws for users with assistive technology. There is ambiguous information where buttons and other areas that need activation are unclear if you are using a screen reader or magnification program such as Zoom or voiceover. I encourage you to review application and web accessibility guidelines. Deque University and Web Accessibility consortium are a good start. Learn about WC3 Web accessibility standards.

title: Download it; you'll thank me later!
body: This is my favorite app for meal ideas. It's extremely user friendly, and chock full of recipes that earn me compliments from family members and friends. I highly recommend taking the time to download the app and see for yourself!

title: Great app
body: It is a great app for when you are bored and want to do something. I love to just browse and look through all the recipes. I have some food allergies so it lets me chose the what allergies I have and it will try not to give me recipes with those foods in it. But overall amazing app!

title: Used it for holidays and everyday cooking. Also easy to find healthy recipes
body: They have so many easy recipes that are quick and easy to make. So easy to use and so many options of the same recipe to fit your skill level

title: What happened with new update?
body: My app updated to newest update and now forcing me to log in and create an account. Fine. Did that but now where are all the recipes I have saved for the past few years? How do I get them back? If they are gone will find another app that does what yours used to do so well. Have had requests to login in the past updates but could choose to not and still use the app now apparently you can‚Äôt access your past saved recipes.

title: Great recipes!
body: Anytime I‚Äôve needed to find a recipe for something it‚Äôs always available.  I appreciate the reviews and just wish there were not so many ads between the ingredients and recipe section.  However this site has a lot of great recipe ideas.

title: Overall a helpful app
body: I like the search features and being able to save recipes by category.  I would have rated a 5 if the recipes directions were immediately after the recipe ingredients without have to click through advertisements.

title: My go to
body: I love having a virtual cookbook! Easy to find recipes based on ingredients you have. Or research new ideas and techniques. I wish it was easier to add recipe sources that are not part of the app. I‚Äôm not sure how it works, but it seems some companies are not able to participate.

title: Yummy Yummly!
body: I love to cook but my husband went on keto, and I just didn‚Äôt know where to begin. Yummly‚Äôs search ability helps me find new delicious possibilities each day, which helps him stay true to his new healthy lifestyle. It also has taught me new tips to become an even better cook. I love it.

title: Very helpful
body: I love to use Yummly! It has very good recipes and they are easy to prepare. Most of all I enjoy being able to search by ingredient. I makes my decisions easy to make. The only but, that I find, is that, I have it programmed for keto recipes, and it gives me all kind of low carbs recipes. It is just a detail, but one most be aware of it,

title: Lots of inspiration
body: I don‚Äôt follow many recipes to a T,  but do like to search recipes for ideas.  This app has great recipes that I search to discover ingredients that I would probably overlook or not use otherwise.  There‚Äôs not a lot of grilling recipes, but that‚Äôs ok, I use the Weber app for those.

title: Great reference
body: This app is great.  Having access to so many different recipes is fantastic.  I like looking at the reviews before I decide if that‚Äôs the one I‚Äôm going to make.  Every dish I have made using this site has been a hit.  Who needs cookbooks anymore ( freed up more cabinet space).

title: Best Food App
body: Love the variety of recipes, the ease of use, and a grocery list that allows you to refer back to a recipe if needed. So many great features. I use it throughout the week to plan menus, search for recipes according to ingredients I have on hand, and put together grocery lists. Indispensable!

title: UBcookin
body: Every time I don‚Äôt know what to make I go on yummly and I always find something great to make! On top of that you get several recipes to look over to find the very best one that suits your taste!!! This is a well designed app I give it 5 stars because thats all there is!

title: Why?!?
body: Why can‚Äôt you upload your own stuff and why is it that the directions open on web?

title: Great app for recipes
body: I enjoy this app a lot I‚Äôm able to literally type it anything I want and there are many options to make something instead of just one recipe so you have many different options to choose from

title: Organized grocery lists? Sold
body: The app & interface is very user friendly, generally just easy to use. But when I realized that the app automatically organizes your grocery list by category, I was hooked. I‚Äôve been telling everyone to get this app.

title: Yummly
body: Update your foodie game with recipes from Yummly.

title: Always something at a swipe
body: Looking for a meal or a side? Maybe you just want an easy treat for you plus one. No matter what you are looking for you have found that perfect place to find all of the best possible and most tasty recipe combinations you will ever need.üëçüëç

title: App is great but performance leaves a bit to be desired
body: The app is wonderful and has lots of great recipes but using the app can be annoying as it sometimes lags in reference to touch and overall isn‚Äôt a very ‚Äúclean‚Äù UI. Very busy and sometimes hard to find what you‚Äôre looking for functionality wise.

title: App sign in issues
body: I‚Äôm having trouble signing back into the app on my phone, the ‚Äúsign into iPhone‚Äù option on the email I‚Äôm being sent is broken and won‚Äôt redirect me to the app.

title: App is too complicated
body: I love the look of the recipes but then opening and saving the recipes becomes so complicated.  Sometimes you have to sign up to another site to actually download the recipe and I have not figured out a way to save the recipes I like simply.  I am not computer illiterate and the fact that there isn't a simple button to press to save is beyond me. I have spent way too much time trying to figure out how to work this app, more time than I have. It's a pity, the recipes look great.

title: Really annoying
body: This app has a range of recipes but no single search facility as far as I can see. There are a number of really annoying features: it has so many ads popping up all the time it is impossible to read a recipe without inadvertently hitting one of the very annoying pop ups; there are no metric measurements! Come on guys, who on earth bakes with 10 tablespoons of butter! Even the use of cup measures is so imprecise and variable. Pity because there are a number of interesting recipes. Am deleting this app!

title: Best recipe app
body: There‚Äôs so many features I want to gush about. Like being able to search recipes by diet preferences, by available ingredients, and the shopping list. I highly recommend this to anyone wanting to meal prep as well to save money and time through the week.

title: Great app for us novice chefs
body: I love all the choices they have plus just started KETO lifestyle and there‚Äôs plenty of helpful KETO friendly recipes here and you can save your favorites so you don‚Äôt need to dig around for the one that turn out amazing

title: LOVE THIS APP
body: I love the variety of recipes this app offers for anything you want to cook, it‚Äôs user friendly and caters to all kinds of special diets. You can also save the recipes that are a hit with your family. LOVE, LOVE this app and HIGHLY recommend it to anyone, no matter what experience you have in cooking !

title: LUV THIS APP!!!
body: Of all of the apps I've used over the years to help find recipes and planned meals this is above and beyond the best one I have ever used. I highly recommend it,  especially, if you have difficulty finding new foods and recipes to make for supper on a limited time schedule, it really helps!

title: This app is awful
body: I downloaded this to see a recipe on my iPad. It had a small screen that was full of annoying ads and at the bottom, featured a band with social media links that continually bounced up and down and no way to stop it.

title: No more cookbooks for me
body: I have thrown away my cookbooks and have switched to Yummly/.

title: Such a Helpful App!
body: I love that you can tailor recipe suggestions to your dietary preferences and get daily emails with recipes based on your interests/needs. I‚Äôve also found some terrific new dishes by searching the app for the ingredients I have on hand and need to use up. The exhaustive database of recipes is amazing.

title: Love to have on hand for recipes.
body: It‚Äôs nice to have this on my cell phone to have favorite recipes to pull up for meals or appetizers or desserts. Yes I do use some of the recipes I save as favorites or I change the recipes to suit my family‚Äôs needs and likes. It gives me a starting point or a recipe to use. THANKS.

title: Fantastic recipes!
body: Yummly is a great app that provides so many different recipes for any interest. It‚Äôs like being in a bookstore looking for a great book!

title: Can‚Äôt get much better
body: The only thing I would change about this app is that I would not have it mention the pro version every single time that the app is opened. I don‚Äôt have the budget to go pro at this time or I would.

title: Features?
body: All these test features make it more annoying than useful. It also makes the app very glitchy. Sorting through the searches are difficult to filter. I mean you can‚Äôt sort the recipes by the most yum‚Äôd. That‚Äôs best a long time complaint. Strange they haven‚Äôt fixed that yet because it‚Äôs a frequent complaint for quite a while‚Ä¶ I‚Äôll use, but it‚Äôs not that impressive as it was in the early years.

title: A great app for finding recipes
body: A great app for finding recipes with filters to adjust to your dietary wants/needs. I‚Äôm rating this app four stars because now you cannot adjust the serving size amount. I think you would have to pay for the monthly to be able to adjust the serving size amount.

title: Does the Pro version really support Family Sharing??????
body: According to Yummly‚Äôs app features, it supports Family Sharing. However, my daughter on my family sharing plan, under my Apple ID, and she purchased the Pro Version. Unfortunately, it will not allow me access to Pro recipes.  A pop up prompts me to subscribe for Pro access and when I click YES , it tells me I‚Äôve already subscribed üò©Both of us have Gamily Sharing AND Share Subscriptions turned on. How do we resolve this problem?????

title: Disappointed
body: This was my FAVORITE app and have been using it for years. It was very user friendly, highly enjoyed all the ways I could filter what I was looking for and offered so many great options all in one place. Dropped down to 2 stars because now it‚Äôs an app you have to pay for in order to use at all. Very disappointed as this was my go to. Now I guess I will be going back to Pinterest.

title: Great recipes
body: I‚Äôve been using Yummly for about two years and have never had a recipe that failed me. I do some catering and Yummly is invaluable to me but also perfect for what to make the family for any meal. Highly recommend this over any other recipe site.

title: Too many Pop-ups!
body: When I‚Äôm trying to get directions from a recipe I get a pop-up for needing Yummly app, which I already have, too, if I pick open in app it takes me to unknown recipes, which have nothing to do with my original request.....

title: Easy search
body: I am not the most dedicated cook so always look for easier recipes, fewer ingredients, fewer steps for tried and true recipes.  Yummly gives me so many options based on all of the above.  I can always find recipes that turn out great!  Thanks!

title: Just Awesome
body: This is a great way to find new recipes and try new food. Searches can be customized by ingredients and/or by food type. I‚Äôve found some great new recipes that are definitely keepers. If you‚Äôre looking to expand cooking skills and try new foods this is the place to be.

title: The new
body: I have been so bored with the same old same old. Thank you for the different recipes that make that bland same old same old something kinda new your site is amazing just what I needed I was so food bored till I found Yummly.         Thank you will

title: Made me love to cook
body: I have never been a person who cooked. Not for myself, and not for years of marriage (my poor husband). I found Yummly and it made cooking look easy and fun. I‚Äôve found some incredible recipes and I enjoy looking for new ones. Highly recommend this app.

title: Great Recipes
body: A very good app. Has wonderful recipes. My only complaint would be that you can‚Äôt access certain recipes unless you upgrade to Yummly pro, but that will cost 4.99 a month. Although there is a free trial offer, I‚Äôm not sure I would want to spend the 4.99 a month to access a few extra recipes.

title: Yummly is my fav!
body: Yummly has been so helpful when cooking for my family. I have a lot of dietary restrictions and Yummly shows me all recipes that do not include the foods I cannot eat. It is awesome (it‚Äôs the little things üòâ). In addition the app is easy to use. I recommend Yummly to as many people as a I can.

title: My go-to cooking app
body: If I want to look up a specific recipe, an ingredient, suggestions for a cooking style or, really, about any cooling question I have this is the first place I go. Easy to navigate, easy to understand. They source recipes from many cooks. I highly recommend it.

title: Excellent ideas
body: Although I rarely follow any of these recipes, I frequently look at several of them, then use different ideas & cooking methods to make my own concoctions. I‚Äôve tried this with other recipe apps & usually get disappointed.

title: Pairs great with web app
body: This has been a go-to for me for a while now due to the pairing and filtering options on the desktop and then bookmarking recipes to pull up on the phone or tablet while cooking. I just wish some of those extra desktop options were here too, like sorting by most popular.

title: Good app
body: This app seems to collect recipes from the internet.  I have found it very useful looking for new ideas for meals.  It links you to the original recipe with on the internet but you do get the added feature of being able to see the ingredients from the app as well as ratings.

title: Nothing‚Äôs wasted
body: Yummly is terrific. I have used this app for years and love it. It is especially helpful when you have one or two ingredients that you need to use up and haven‚Äôt a clue how. Pop one or both in the search and voila! - you are off to the kitchen.

title: Love the app
body: Would be better if the main page wasn‚Äôt centralized around sweets and desserts. I only make dinner recipes, but it‚Äôs always showing smoothies & desserts.

title: Sign in issue
body: This app sort of did work until past couple of weeks. I dislike having to sign in each time. It‚Äôs a lengthy process.  Past couple of weeks I have not been able to get in app because of the sign in process.  When I go through the email verification process and into the website I have to sign in and start the process all over again.  Can‚Äôt get into the app.  Why do I need to sign into an app just to view recipes.  Am I doing something wrong?

title: Must Have Kitchen Tool
body: It‚Äôs a very simple guide for recipes. Pretty much will find all versions of a recipe for a dish you‚Äôre trying to make which saves time hunting around. Home page is updated daily with fresh meal ideas. As a line cook, Yummly is my go-to guide for creating whichever dish I‚Äôm trying to prepare.

title: A must have!
body: I‚Äôve never been disappointed by the Yummly app. I‚Äôve shared it with all my friends and now they too use it regularly. I love the feature that allows you to put in a few main ingredients you have on hand to find new dishes to whip up. Simply the best!

title: Love
body: This is by far my favorite out of the recipe apps I‚Äôve had downloaded in the past.

title: Life saver
body: So much easier to cook healthy meals! Love that I can filter out ingredients as well as search for recipes that have a specific ingredient that I might need to use before it expires (or working with limited options until I go grocery shopping again).

title: Delicious, easy-to-make recipes
body: I don‚Äôt really like to take the time to cook good meals, but I want my family to eat well. With Yummly, I find lots of varied recipes that suit us, and that are easy to make. With the ‚Äòsave‚Äô feature, I can always find my favorites again. Highly recommended!

title: Wow Amazing
body: Whenever I need a recipe I just look on here there are so many wonderful things and so many options. Wow if I could make everything on here I would!!! Also a great way to learn how to cook. I learned a lot of things on here just by looking at how to make things. Again just WOW!!

title: My most used app
body: I‚Äôve been using Yummly for years and it‚Äôs been such a great tool for me as I teach myself to cook. Its flexibility and ability to choose ingredients/time constraints makes it easy to find the perfect recipe. I‚Äôve yet to find a recipe app that is as useful and user friendly as Yummly!

title: Like but....
body: I haven‚Äôt been able to log on to my account for a few months now. I click on where it is supposed to connect you and nothing happens. I can still search the recipes and it‚Äôs nice to able to scroll through all the pictures. But I can‚Äôt save anything or access all that I‚Äôve already saved and I really miss that.

title: Great app
body: Whether you want to try something different or get a new take on an old favorite, this is a great app. Of course not all the recipes are for my palate; but, most of what I‚Äôve tried have been absolutely delicious. I‚Äôve gotten many dishes I‚Äôve put on heavy rotation from this app.

title: A non cooker‚Äôs best friend
body: I can‚Äôt cook but I can read, and this app‚Äôs easy to read, step-by-step instructions, often illustrated, have made it easy for me to make many meals and learn techniques. I really like the shopping list feature, which I use to buy the right ingredients.

title: Great all around app
body: My husband does the majority of the cooking, but I wanted to start trying a bit more. This app helps me find recipes with ingredients I have on hand, or allows me to add them to the little shopping list feature. The prep, cook and serve time reminders are also a great help!

title: The Most Helpful Food And Recipe App (maybe) EVER!
body: Beautifully done and easy to navigate, Yummly gives recipe ideas for novice cooks to 5 star chefs. You have allergies from certain foods? Yummly gives recipe options for that. You only like veggies? Same thing. And the idea for a grocery list section is magic. Great app.

title: Excellent App
body: I love this app. It saves so much time when looking recipes & creating a weekly menu. I was using the Paprika app for years but this is more convenient. The only thing it‚Äôs missing is the ability to put in a web address & save from that.

title: Awesome App
body: I‚Äôve been using this Yummly app for years & it always rescues me when I‚Äôm searching for a new meal recipe or if I‚Äôm entertaining. I like the new improvements over the years & appreciate being able to put in my dietary restrictions so I never get a recipe that isn't an option for me.

title: Great recipes that vary in complexity
body: I have made some wonderful dishes using recipes on Yummly. Many were successful, some not so much. I like that I can always find a recipe for whatever I won‚Äôt to cook. For a person who is not a natural cook, Yummly has help me improve the meals I make for my family.

title: Helpful App
body: This app makes my life as a single mother easier. So easy to use and amazing recipes.   The only thing I would change about this app would be to add the ability to ‚Äúshuffle‚Äù the Yums to choose meal plan. Right now, I have to scroll all the way through all of the yums to pick my meal plan for the week.

title: Yummly review
body: Sometimes I‚Äôve had a problem once I click on the ( read directions). Don‚Äôt know if that has anything to do with Yummly. Still 5 stars because I love this app. Tried many of the recipes and haven‚Äôt made 1 we didn‚Äôt like

title: Great recipes!
body: Whenever I am looking for a recipe, I go to Yummly first! I can always find a selection of delicious recipes to choose from. I love that Yummly keeps current recipes and some retro recipes. Their recipe bank is always growing so you can always find exactly what you need!

title: Great app
body: Easy to search for recipes with different foods. Easy to add a shopping list. It's okay but now filled with intrusive ads, and suggestions pop up while you're trying to read a recipe. Do these app makers not realize we just want to see the recipe? It's super-annoying to scroll and be inundated with ads!!

title: I‚Äôm a better cook because of this app
body: I recommend this app to all of my friends and family. It helps you become a better cook and teaches you skills that you may not have known. You can also customize your search by diet.

title: Fabulous
body: Love the variety of recipes that is offered. You can enter an ingredient and find out so many great recipes with that ingredient. Or search by a dish and see various recipes for that dish.

title: Amazing app!
body: This app is amazing! It has so many recipes to choose from, and it lets you save your favorites and place them in categories to organize them.  I also love the reviews from users that show if a recipe is good on its own, or if it needs to be tweaked.

title: Only cooking app I use!
body: I enjoy the recipes on Yummly and hoed you can create your own cookbook by tagging favorites. My husband and I changed over to ‚Äúplant based meals‚Äù and is is great how I was able to adjust my preferences and have only plant based choices brought out. I very much enjoy this app.

user_name: Nikki the Italian at home cook
title: Simply amazing
body: I‚Äôm a pretty great cook growing up Italian but Yummly has open so many new recipes from baking to Asian food and everything in between. I use it in a daily basis. Some times fro inspiration and sometimes to follow and great new recipe!!! If be sure to tell your friends about as I always do!

title: Exceptional!!
body: Many thanks to everyone who has contributed to Yummly. Every recipe we have tried turned out wonderfully. Yummly is a great resource when you run out of ideas on what to eat. There is something here for everyone regardless of your dietary needs and/or restrictions.

title: Love Yummly
body: I haven‚Äôt downloaded any other good app because Yummly meets my needs.  I love it.  Great recipes.  The search tool works wonders to find recipes that I can use.  I am sure in the thousands of recipes in the app, there would be some impractical ones but haven‚Äôt found them yet!!

title: My go-to app for meal ideas
body: I return to Yummly daily for ideas for meals anytime of day. So convenient, it‚Äôs awesome! Input ingredients I have on hand and find several recipe ideas. I can compare several recipes for old favorites for ideas on how to switch it up. Use it every day!

title: Where are the recipes?
body: Beautiful pics, great stories. The issue is the ingredients...when you select ingredients ‚Äúlist‚Äù it automatically takes you to shopping page which is empty.

title: Planner
body: This app helps me to stay organized, find great recipes, make a grocery list from those ingredients! My fav is that each ingredient has a small label for its corresponding recipe invade you decide not to make something you can easily omit it from your shopping list!

title: Never Disappointed
body: Like tonight- it‚Äôs cold and I want chili, but I‚Äôm out of the chili packets from the grocery , so I‚Äôm counting on Yumly to come through with another amazing recipe!

title: Excellent Kitchen Helper
body: I've enjoyed this app so much as it makes cooking a no brainer. We like to keep it varied on our menu so it's been nice to discover the way other talented cooks use our favorite ingredients. The best part is being able to filter by diet type and search by ingredients.

title: New to Yummly
body: I am new to Yummly, but so far I am enjoying the suggested recipes that I have been receiving from them. The 3 recipes that I have made so far have all been...well...yummy. Anything that makes cooking easier for this designated chef is welcomed. I am not one who enjoys the cooking experience.

title: Best recipe app EVER!
body: I and my wife collect cook books, we have an extensive collection. This app however makes it easy to quickly find a recipe, it‚Äôs super intuitive and easy to use. I absolutely love this app, I highly recommend it to anyone who wants to explore their culinary imagination!

title: Makes meal planning easy
body: Makes it easy to plan my weekly meals.  Helps me ensure I am including a variety of nutrients in my diet by helping me change things up weekly. Also makes my grocery shopping easy and by getting what I need for the week I have no waste.

title: Best app ever
body: Love this app gives you the recipes of different Variety and you can narrow your choices it gives you step by step to understand it as it explains what‚Äôs need to be done and also tells you what you need as of items etc.. love it

title: Download this app and you‚Äôll eat like a king
body: This is one of my favorite apps. I only have three cooking/recipe apps and Yummly proves itself over and over again. There are a variety of great food and drinks. Not to mention, they help you find recipes according to your diet. I absolutely love this app!

title: Brilliant app
body: I love, love, love this app.  It makes menu planning for the week so much easier.  I just type in the ingredient I want to use, and dozens of recipes from the web come up.  Saves me from having to look all over the internet, or pour through my cookbooks.

title: App rating
body: So far I can find a recipe I‚Äôve seen before if I have the title.  Plus additional recipes. 2 nights ago I was looking at a recipe and couldn‚Äôt get the directions to come up when I tapped on it. It was really late, so I just went to bed. If I had been actually up cooking, that would have been a bad thing.

title: Helpful
body: This app has been helpful to my wife and I to quickly browse through new recipe ideas to inspire new directions and save us from a rut when life gets busy. It gets really pushy, though, about some features and connectivity. I would use it more if the devs would just back off.

title: Good, but needs better calendar features
body: Recipes are great, meal planning features are almost awesome, but it's hard to figure out what you've planned for each day of a week, since all the recipes show up as a jumble. I want to be able to look at a 7-day calendar and see what meals I've scheduled for each day.

title: Great app
body: The sign up wasn‚Äôt working, but somehow it logged me in so as long as it doesn‚Äôt sign me out, it‚Äôs good. I hate to cook and I don‚Äôt know why I looked through the recipes here, but I‚Äôm so glad I did! I have found so many recipes that will work for my very picky family members. This is great.

title: Building family memories one recipe at a time
body: Thank you for this fantastic. I have had a chance to make some really neat recipes with my boy since I put this app on my phone. We look together on the app to find recipes we want to try, and then try them.

title: Finally a meal planning app that I love
body: I use Yummly constantly. Has a lot of recipe variety, even as a vegan, I‚Äôm impressed. I love the shopping feature as well as the feature that lets you put in what you have in your fridge and bike a recipe off that. Great app. Recommended to friends already.

title: Helpful and good recipes
body: Really like the ease of finding good and useful recipes.  Helpful to pick out some new ones based on particular dietary needs.  I have found great ideas for meals with friends and for trying new flavors when  making something new.

title: Wow!
body: I love this app! It's my only recipe go to, now... I've had everything, and they gave me a mix of cheap recipes that weren't my style. With this app, I always find something new that I love and so many different ideas. They always know what I'm looking for, before I do. Thanks for all the help (: !

title: Yummly is my go to!
body: I have made countless recipes from Yummly and have not been disappointed. It has allowed me to serve up wonderful, flavorful dishes for family and friends time and time again. Having an electronic recipe catalog has saved so many trees (no more paper recipe files)üò¨. Thanks Yummly! ~Saphyer

title: Love this app!!
body: I love this app! I thought to myself I wish there was an app to give me more vegetarian recipes and bam Yummly answers. I like that it adds ingredients to your shopping list so the next time you go to the store you have it available.

title: Fitting on hand ingredients with recipes is a great idea
body: But there is a problem with it.  You cannot remove items from the list.  You attempt to hold or highlight or click on them and it goes to that single ingredient.  You see a flash of an x for a moment, but you can‚Äôt hit it.  It just goes into that one ingredient.  PITA.

title: Mr. Les Walters
body: I truly enjoy the easy to make recipes with exception of one or two recipes I have utilized they have been Great.  I would suggest that you create a section that talks about paring wines and also suggestions for side dishes to go with the main course!  Keep up the good work.  Merry Christmas

title: Easy to use
body: Yummly is mostly user-friendly.  Occasionally, you will come across a recipe that is ‚Äúvideo-only.‚Äù Many cooks prefer a written recipe. That‚Äôs the only reason for four stars instead of five... that doesn‚Äôt stop me from browsing/using Yummly every day!

title: Excellent Selection
body: Whenever I get the energy to cook, yummly always has the recipes I need. Especially when I'm looking to try something I've never done before. I've also gotten many recipes that I make frequently from it. Great app!

title: Awesome app!
body: Anytime I don‚Äôt know what to cook I refer to this app with searches regarding what‚Äôs in my fridge or freezer and have totally enjoyed switching up some of my cooking easily though this app!

title: Love Yummly
body: I love Yummly.. Every time I think, what do I want to eat.  I look to Yummly!! And I always find something delicious. The recipes are always delicious! üòã I love being able to save recipes and look at them later. The pictures are always so pretty and true to the recipes. Thanks Yummly. ‚ù§Ô∏è

title: Love it
body: I have my go to meals for the family, but sometime I need some help and Yammly has been great. My sister who never cooks I recommend her this app and she is cooking and really good meals. It‚Äôs a very helpful and easy app to use, that I always recommend people to upload to their phone.

title: Now my go to consolidator
body: Most recipe sites are made up of content from other locations, Yummly is similar. The difference is that they make it easy to locate the originator, easy to import your own, easy to review recipes, and easy to use overall.

title: Great Recipes but...
body: Great recipes and you can pretty much find any thing you want. However, there are not a lot of reviews by others after making the recipe so, you typically will have to select one that sounds good without being able get much feedback from others. Also, I hate that the directions aren‚Äôt easy to access.

title: Such a nifty little app!
body: Such a nifty tool! I‚Äôve only been using Pinterest to search for recipes. Many of the recipes come from similar locations (mommy blogs), but this is the perfect platform for searching for recipes based on what I‚Äôm feeling or what‚Äôs already in my pantry!

title: Great app
body: I spend a lot of time on this app especially over holidays when planning special meals. I can‚Äôt remember the last time I pulled out one of my tried and true cookbooks. I‚Äôm thinking about taking them all to Goodwill. I doubt I‚Äôll ever use them again.

title: Love Yummly
body: I‚Äôve been using Yummly for a longtime and I always look here first for a recipe.  I‚Äôm not to thrilled with pro though because its seems like more recipes that would usually be available will not be locked behind a pay wall.  Other than that it‚Äôs awesome.

title: Love!
body: I find so many great recipes and ideas on this app.  It has taken over for other recipe sources I‚Äôve used for years. I like how easy it is to save and categorize recipes. I do wish there was a better recipe rating system, but sometimes that can be misleading.

title: App review
body: This is turned out to be one of the best resources I can find online.  Recipes for almost anything you can imagine at your fingertips on my phone or tablet. Yum please keep the recipes coming I have tried many with great success with my family.

title: Awesome app üëçüèæüëçüèæ
body: I love this yummly app, it has made my world of cooking so much easier, no more trying to figure out what's for dinner, I love the fact that you can personalize your own recipes based on your own preference of what you like to eat, Keep the recipes coming...... totally cool loaded with awesomeness

title: Great recipes
body: One stop shop for recipes on the internet. Love the search bar! I can enter any ingredient from my pantry or freezer and find loads of options.

title: Great for new ideas
body: I‚Äôm always wondering what to make especially since I‚Äôm a vegetarian this site helps a lot you can specialize it to any allergies or dietary restrictions and it gives you some of the best results and new things to try I highly recommend this app

user_name: No time to stress over dinner
title: Life saver!
body: I love this app! I can plan meals ahead with a shopping list all while tracking nutritional value.  It‚Äôs all in one place. I have enjoyed every recipe and they turn out great.  I‚Äôm a busy wife, mother and career woman and this app saves me a ton of time which is much more valuable than money!

title: Clunky
body: For sure a lot of recipes- but why after looking at a recipe I‚Äôve saved, the app takes me back to the ‚Äúbeginning‚Äù of all my saved recipes. You can‚Äôt just look at one and pick up where you left off. Instead you have to scroll through all saved recipes each time. This is such a waste of time. Please fix!!!!

title: My Favorite Recipe App!
body: Yummly is a great app, it has such a wide variety of recipes. My favorite feature is the one where you can use up any ingredient(s) you have on hand, it‚Äôs extremely helpful! I would recommend this to anyone who needs fresh new cooking ideas!

title: Yummly
body: Ever receipt I have tried has been very good I even made Broccoli soup for someone and I didn‚Äôt think I would like it but when I tasted it it was delicious i‚Äôve been getting their recipes for quite a long time now and I enjoy everyone of them keep it up yummly

title: used to love this app
body: used to love this app, but their support team is a joke. certain recipes get ‚Äòstuck‚Äô and are unable to be removed from your saved recipes which is really annoying if you made the recipe and didn‚Äôt like it. rather than removing those recipes from the app/website since there is a glitch, they want USERS to delete their accounts with hundreds of recipes they‚Äôve saved, and make new accounts, and READD all their previously saved recipes.

title: Because my family thinks they need dinner every night üòâ
body: This app is a life saver! So easy to navigate and everything is stored in convenient categories. (Dinner, Snacks..) Anything from needing a quick weeknight dinner idea, to impressing your in-laws with your amazing new spin on a old favorite. This is my go to app.

title: Favorite Recipe Anything
body: My absolute go-to food and recipe app! Not only does it have great recipes but the app itself is extremely user friendly and just so enjoyable to use. I recommend it to everyone and am always happy to answer "Whoa, where'd you get the recipe for this??" :)

title: Favorite app!!
body: This app is so easy to use. It breaks down the things you need, nutrition info, and steps. I love the variety and the updates on new and different recipes. I use this every week to help me plan my meals. Only one con. I don‚Äôt like that it exits out of the recipe after a while but you can open the recipe in your browser

title: # 1 Cooking Helper
body: I‚Äôve used Yummly for many years now and I am never disappointed. There are many recipes that I have used and enjoyed or have added a little spin on many to make even better. I would definitely recommend this app for anyone.

title: My go to every time!
body: When I wanna try something new or not sure how to make I go to Yummly! I have the App on my phone, so it‚Äôs very easy to find what I need while at the store or while I am cooking. You have many options to choose from which I find great! Absolutely love Yummly!!!

title: Excellent recipe access
body: This app does great at what it‚Äôs meant to do. It brings recipes to my fingertips. It also has a convenient shopping list feature.

title: My go to recipe store!
body: The more I have used Yummly the more I love it. Tons of variations on whatever you want to make and the recipes are always excellent. I also like that you can file them in whatever fashion you may want to look them up in the future.

title: It does everything!!
body: This is the perfect app for those of us that are....cooking challenged. It literally tells you what to do next and you mark it off as you go. There‚Äôs even a built in timer when you‚Äôre ready to start.

title: Review
body: Great recipes. Nice variety in every category. Easy to follow directions in many of the recipes. Do not need to be a ‚Äú Top Chef ‚Äú to follow these delicious recipes. Enjoy the video step by step instructions. Overall I would recommend this to family and friends.

title: Sooo close
body: Long time Paprika user, love that my screen is always on and can read offline recipes. This app is soooo close. But it doesn‚Äôt let you share from safari to Yummly, it also doesn‚Äôt import instructions. It imports ingredients, the.
