body: I really love cooking and making up things putting my own spin to it and this app is a Great CookBook on the go or at 3am when snack time Attacks. The fact that it helps you make a grocery list of things for certain recipes and can add whatever you think you need to that list I looooove this Yummly App sooo much! I recommend this to the chef at heart the beginners ;) you definitely have a helping hand and it's FREE!!

title: Life changing!
body: This app has allowed me to actually make a lot of good decisions with my eating and even spending habits. Knowing all of these wonderful recipe ideas has inspired me to cook and create more things instead of just eating out all the time. The filters for food preferences as well as allergies, provide a wonderful array of options despite those said preferences. Definitely recommend!

title: Love the app but can be very frustrating
body: You are able to find recipes you like and put them in in an area that says "My Yums". When you go into your Yums, it will tell you have so many are stored in there, like maybe 30. But when you tap on that area, only 21 of them will come up and you have to do a lot of messing with the app for the rest of them to pop up. Love the app otherwise, but very frustrating when I try to go back and find the recipes I want to make!!

title: Yummly is my favorite
body: If I have no idea what to cook, or bake, or make, Yummly always works. I can find any recipe to follow by just typing in the ingredients I already have at home.  I like the nutrition information and the filters especially. The app's interface is also very user friendly, soft, and intuitive. The colors and logo are appealing. It's evident that a lot of work went into creating this app.

title: Super awesome!!
body: This app is so helpful! It lets you pick out a palette and dietary restrictions and then gives recipe suggestions according to them. You can also turn the restrictions or certain flavors on/off when needed, so it's been super great for days when I want to eat healthy, plant based meals, but also on days when I just want some meaty comfort food. A great app overall. Also great organization.

title: Incredible and helpful
body: Cooking is one of my favorite things to do. This app seems to work flawlessly. It is amazing that it gets to know you and suggests recipes according to preference. Every suggestion so far is spot on and sounds very tasty. I love the way you can mark what you would like to make and can add to the shopping list accordingly. Every foodie and/or aspiring chief should get this app. Perfect.

title: Too legit to quit
body: I don't usually write reviews on apps, but this app is awesome.  Almost everything I've cooked using this app has been delicious.  It's super easy to use and has more recipes than you can shake a stick at.  Anytime I have a hankering for something, I just type in what I'm looking for and there is always a wide variety of things to choose from.  Well done Yummly, well done.

title: My new Fav
body: You can do so much with this app. You can search for recipes, filter results based on lot of things and save recipes into different buckets. I loved the ability to create shopping list. You also have an option of getting them delivered via instacart. Love the new design changes around personalization. Yummly has become my goto app for anything cooking related

title: The app I have wanted forever!!
body: I have 4 little kids and cook for them and my husband almost every meal. I go grocery shopping once a week on Sunday and do not go back with 4 kids in tow if I forget something. This app is so well designed, visually stunning, and useful! I would pay for this app and with my husband being an app developer, this says a lot. Well done Yummly!!! Thank you!

title: I don't always rate apps
body: But when I do, they have to be as awesome as this one.

title: Amazing!
body: I am in love with this app! Not only does it offer amazing recipes from basically every food blog possible, but it also allows you to add the ingredients directly to your shopping list. The fact you can also receive recipes based off your likes/dislikes is fantastic. It is so personalized. It is like a little, endless book of recipes right at the tip of my fingers!

title: Great but . . .
body: Love this app, really helps in adding variety to my meal planning.  Great photos.  Too bad I can only use about 1 in 5 recipes as I always get error message when looking at the directions.  I can always see the ingredients.  Either the directions won't pull up at all or right in the middle of making something the directions say error in the kitchen and disappear.  This started happening with the last version update.  I now make a note of where the recipes are found so I can go there directly.  Very annoying.

title: Love this App!
body: It's like a Facebook or Pintrest for FOOD! I like to eat clean so it hard finding recipes on the other apps that work for me and my family. But this one does the trick! When you sign up you select foods that interest you and waalaa! - it updates with recipes that fits you! I found and tried countless recipes from here that have been a BIG HIT with my husband and daughter.

title: I use this app everyday!
body: I absolutely love this app. Not only does it have such a large variety of delicious recipes to choose from, I love how you can sort the recipes and create new categories personalized to you. I made a "Already Tried" and a "New Recipes" section myself, and it helps me stay organized. I use this app everyday and I would highly recommend it to anyone.

title: LOVE this app
body: This is probably the only lifestyle app that I am constantly going back to you. I love everything about it ‚Äì the clean user experience, how are you can pull together all of the ingredients you need into a segmented grocery list, and the consistent quality of the recipes that I try through this app. It's the only app that I recommended to my family and friends.

title: Amazing!!
body: This app is awesome! You can save recipes, change serving size, and add ingredients to the shopping list. The ingredients on the shopping list are categorized by type of food and you can check off each item as you get them. This is exactly the kind of app I have been looking for!! Definitely recommend trying it out for yourself..you will love it!!

title: Just awesome!!!
body: This app is great! Got so many recipes and of so many cuisines. So far tried 4 items and all of them were great. I am a newbie at cooking and this is the first app that is inspiring me to cook more! I love the way it's organized. Just one thought: it would be better if there were photos of the ingredients or a link to google search from the app. Other than that I am loving it.

title: Best Recipe App!
body: I love this app! Every time I've needed a recipe this has suggested multiple ones that I would have loved to use. The down side is having to choose! It makes it easy to find just the right recipe to fit what you have in your cupboards or what you can substitute if you're missing something. Everyone who loves to cook and try new things should have this app!

title: Needs better syncing
body: Great app - I love the layout but the syncing of lists between iOS devices is inconsistent at best. My wife and I are constantly trying to reconcile our lists as they drop out of sync or don't sync at all, requiring one of us to sign out (list is deleted) sign back in and re-input our list. The rest of the app for food suggestions is quite helpful.

title: Love
body: There isn't a day that goes by that I don't open this app. I use it everyday and it's amazing. Out of all the cooking apps out there, this is the one I rely on. You can change the serving sizes and it will adjust all the ingredients accordingly. That has to be my favorite part. That and all the amazing recipes! I'm vegetarian and this app still works surprisingly well for me. Thank you Yummly!! I love you.

title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
body: I love using this app on a daily basis. I always discover new, delicious recipes that I can't wait to try, and all the recipes so far have been delicious. Being able to organize your food into different categories (lunch, dinner, etc.) and being able to create your own category makes recipes very easy to find. I rarely review apps, but this one was worth writing a review for.

title: Diverse Compilation of recipes!
body: I love this app. It combines Pinterest, every food blog you've ever heard of, as well as HomeCooking and All Recipes, and Food Network. You're not going to find more recipes or a better, more diverse compilation of recipes anywhere else on the Internet. Plus there's that nifty 'shopping cart' so you can remind yourself what you need for the recipe! Two thumbs up, 5 stars, love this app.

title: Great app now even better!
body: I like the collection of recipes available, I've found some really delicious ones that are now regulars in my repertoire.  It used to be that when I'd save new recipes to my collection, they wouldn't always show up in my list and some recipes that I deleted (tried them & didn't like) would still be there.  Haven't had that problem lately so they must have fixed it.

title: My go-to food app
body: I love this app! Not only are there a million delicious recipes to choose from, but it makes meal planning a breeze! I previously was using this app just to discover and cook recipes with 1000+ likes.  Recently I started using the 'shopping list' feature I can plan my weeknight meals within seconds, purchase all the ingredients needed, and waste less food.

title: Too much advertising
body: Used to absolutely love this app because you could put down you're eating criteria and it would find to recipes to fit your lifestyle. However, recently I've noticed that when you try to read a recipe you are sent to another website and many times there's all kinds of advertising that inhibits you're being able to read it from your phone. Very irritating. I give it three stars because it used to be very good.

title: Get This!
body: A hand full of days before the Thanksgiving Chaos, I got this and a few other apps to keep my mind organized.  The other apps didn't even come close to what Yum did.  I'm always losing or forgetting lists of items I need from the grocery store and what recipes goto what.  This will definitely take care of any scatter brain mother's out there with a crap ton to do.

title: My number 1 app to figure out dinner
body: The part that totally won me over is the fact that I can search for a meal just by typing in one or two ingredients, for example "spinach and ziti", and up comes a plethora of recipes involving those ingredients, and they're all to-die-for recipes. I have raved and ranted to my friends about this app and I figured it's about time to give my 5 star review!

title: My one stop planning tool
body: I've used other services like this app years ago to plan out my weekly menus, but they didn't conform to new technology and are annoying to use. I love this app and use it a lot. It has great sharing capabilities on platforms like Pinterest, which other style apps do not. I also like that it pulls from all over and is a database of blogs and websites.

title: Too much screen clutter
body: This app looks beautiful until you actually click on a recipe.  As you scroll through the directions it is covered by a bar at the top of the screen, a bar at the top of the screen, a share bar that you can expand, but not get rid of, and an arrow to quickly scroll to the top.  If that wasn't enough, if you stop to read something an ad pops up at the bottom to block another portion of the screen.  It is a terrible use of screen real estate, and too annoying for me to use.

title: Just OK
body: Good concept with grocery list etc. totally agree with review #4. I put in my likes, dislikes app tends to ignore. I continually get things pick for "me" on my dislike list.

title: Exactly what I've been looking for!
body: this app is amazing for me not only because I love to cook because I've also been trying to eat healthier lately. It has designed special recipes to help with my needs, foods that I hate, and my allergies. I think this is the most GENIUS APP EVER and I rarely give out reviews but I loved this app so much I had to rate it!! Besides its a free app, what are you missing out on!?

title: Easy and convenient
body: I have been using the app for a while now. Saving recipes I like, adding them to my own categories under my yums. Now, I can create a shopping list from selected recipes, have those items added to Instacart, place the order and have them delivered within two hours.

title: Best food app
body: I've been using this app now for over a year and I feel it is the best one out there due to its ease of use speed, efficiency and just sheer volume of available recipes.  Also, added features such as being able to save (Yum) recipes and add a grocery list are fantastic features.

title: LOVE IT!
body: All the recipes at one place. Yummly  searches the web for the best recipes around the globe and makes them convenient for you. You can find anything for anytime. Additionally they have a shopping list you can use to make sure you get all your ingredients! I use this App all the time and the variety of recipes makes my friends jealous. The BEST of Food Search in YUMMLY! HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!

title: Absolute Must Have Food App
body: My family have enjoyed many different recipes from breakfast to dinner. Now that my wife and I are dieting we can find things to fix for dinner that even our children enjoy. The recipes are easy to follow and the ingredients are easy to find at many grocery stores. Rather you want something to cook in a crockpot for hours or something to make in an hour this is the app for you.

title: Good app BUT
body: I love your guys website and the app is useful but sometimes I prefer the website because you can't do the search with "included ingredient" but every freakin time I go to your website all you do I spam your app and the banner that covers the entire window can't go away. The "x" button isn't even a link it's just for show please stop spamming your app on the website or fix the button

title: Great app for finding healthy recipes
body: I am vegan and try to eat healthy food.  This app is great for finding new recipes.  If you create a profile you can select your diet and the app will filter out recipes that aren't on your diet.

title: Love it but I have one request...
body: I absolutely love this app! However, one thing I think would be nice would be to have the feature of making notes on recipes. I made a recipe or two on here and made adjustments with each that I'm afraid I'll forget the next time I make them. If the app had that feature it would make it even better!

title: Should have been 5 stars
body: I have used this app for a long time now. Love the preferences section and the personal library.  Now that it keeps crashing every time I back out I must say,....I expected better work from you folks. Bring the old version back if you have too or I will have to switch apps, and we don't want me to do that.

title: Best food app
body: Best food app. Allows you to filter food to exactly what you like. Has endless recipes and with detailed instructions. People will think u know how to cook. One cool add on or fix which I know would be too much but it'd help. Is that It should give alternatives to ingredients, like generic brand of an ingredient or any other brand to ur shopping list or whatever. Either way, great app!

title: Get rid of the adds - please!
body: I've never written a review of an app before but an doing it now because of how useful I have found it so quickly.  The only thing I don't like are the adds. As I'm scrolling through the directions I keep touching the adds.  I'd happily pay to be rid of them. A one time fee a monthly fee.  Done. I'm there.  Those adds drive me nuts!!!!!

title: Great Recipe Selection!
body: I enjoy being able to find ideas and recipes quickly through this app. You can filter the selection by your dietary preferences, so your not seeing options that don't work for you. I've tried a quite few recipes and they were all relatively easy to make and delicious. Great way to insert newness into your weekly meals.

title: Plethora of recipes & User Friendly
body: I use this app on the regular and have turned many friends on to it. Totally comprehensive. You can literally type in anything- as broad or specific as you wish and find tons of recipes with multiple variations. It's a staple. As long as this app exists, I don't really need anything else! Highly recommended is an understatement. üëçüèΩ

title: Great for beginners
body: I LOVE this app! I love the shopping list feature. It is super helpful when picking stuff out at the store. You are not scrolling through the directions and mentally checking of the items. The app does the work for you. I am also SUPER looking forward to when their new partner, InstaCart comes to West Palm Beach, FL. I will definitely use that delivery feature all the time.

title: Favorite cooking app
body: Beside my Betty Crocker cookbook, I use the Yummly app for a good portion of my cooking inspiration. I cannot remember how I found this app, but I am glad that I came across it about 2 1/2 years ago.  I use the Yummly app often in my home because I love to try new dishes. There are a variety of easy to follow recipes to choose from for any given occasion. This app is by far my favorite cooking app.

title: Love nutrition facts
body: I love this app and scrolling through all of the delicious photos. Getting all of the ingredients, nutrition facts and directions at my fingers makes it easy to know what's good.

title: Can't get enough of this app!
body: Super user friendly and easy to understand! The recipes are affordable, even on a starving college student fund. Shopping is much easier with the shopping list option. The only change I would like to see is the option to filter ingredients by more allergies, not just typical allergens (like cinnamon!)

title: LOVE LOVE LOVE!
body: Im not one to leave these reviews but I really feel this one is an exception! I LOVE this app! It's been a critical piece to my meal planning and even to my diet changes as it's so easy to search for recipes that are low cal and low fat without weeding through the delish and tempting richer meals. Aside from a few glitches here and there, it's perfect! The shopping list is the best feature! It very well thought out! Ty!!!!

title: Best food app!!
body: I have used multiple food apps and they have all been missing some part of the equation for me each time. This app does it all and every recipe I've made so far has been awesome. The shopping cart is perfect. Nutrition facts is useful, and the serving size that you can adjust and it automatically adjusts ingredients is super convenient!!! Best app I have for sure...

title: Love it - but let me write notes!
body: Great app - perfect for those that love to cook and those who want to have last minute inspiration. The ability to search the app and also add new recipes from the web is great. Only complaint is that I would love a notes option for each specific recipe to keep track of different cook times/recipe tweaks/etc.

title: LOVE this app!
body: The concept of this app is to die for and its so easy to use. I love that it crowdsources great recipes from all over the Internet, puts them in one place, and then allows me to seamlessly add ingredients I may need to complete the recipe to my shopping list with a simple tap. The only thing that could make this better is adding more sources from other popular food blogs.

title: Love it!! Lots of gluten free options.
body: I love this app. It is so versatile! I recently found out I have a gluten intolerance and the idea of planning meals for myself and my ultra runner husband (who needs a high carb diet), and have it be gluten free seemed daunting! But once I edited my filter to show only gluten free recipes I realized how easy it really is! I didn't give this app 5 stars because some of the gluten free recipes actually are not! I always have to read the recipes very closely.

title: Excellent App, but could use some fine-tuning.
body: The app overall offers a wide selection of recipes and a good amount of search filters. The shopping list is probably the most annoying feature. As you're checking off items you already own, the app decides to re-sort the items in the list and you start to click on items you didn't intend to. WHYYYY.

title: Nice but a few bugs
body: Overall, this is a great app but there are a few serious issues. First, I have "yummed ten recipes but only five show. I have no idea how to go back and see the others. Second, whenever you want to add a quantity of an item in your shopping list the quantity box quickly disappears and you have to start over again. Third, the app keeps requesting a review even if you hit "no thanks." I hope they fix these problems soon.

title: Delightful recipes!
body: This is the first sight I always go to when I'm looking up a recipe. Sometimes after reading further I discover that I would rather make something different and it has never failed me it is delicious. I think all of you who have sent in recipes in addition to giving the nutrients and calorie count it is amazing thank you.

title: Server is always down/need food cats added..vegan/vegetarians
body: I take my iPad everywhere, and every time I try to access, search, or add it says "there's trouble in the kitchen, our server should be up shortly" or something to that effect. Am I ever going to be able to use this?! Also, it would be helpful to have food categories added for people with gluten allergies, or vegetarian, vegan etc. my mother is vegan and I thought this would be helpful in finding something to cook for her while she comes to stay with me. Might be deleting.

title: A Wonderful Discovery
body: When I came across the Yummly app I was skeptical. I don't download apps very often, so I was a bit hesitant. Once I had browsed it's contents, however, I was overjoyed!! I have already used many recipes that I've found on Yummly, and am planning to use many more! The organization part, when you save a recipe, is very nice. All of the drink/snack/dinner recipes are Amazing!!

title: It is the best !
body: It is an app with a great interface and the pictures are extremely attractive and make you want to cook! My friend and I made cookies and we had barely cooked before but thanks to the precise instructions from yummly everything went fluidly and easily. The instructions are clear and simple , really recommend this app to amateur cookers it is a great application!

title: Love but keeps shutting down
body: This is my favorite recipe app and the only one I have but it has been acting up recently. I go to look at a recipe and when I want to go back it completely closes the app on me and I have to restart it. Please fix this problem. I want to keep this app on my phone but if you can't fix it I'm forced to find a new recipe app üòï

title: Excellent!
body: I have used this app multiple times to find and make delicious meals! My only criticism would be that when I have a recipe open in my phone and I am idle for awhile, when I click on the app again it doesn't stay on the recipe and I must find the recipe again. Other than that, great app, great recipes, delicious food, and emails are great too! Thanks yummly!

title: Annoying!
body: I find this app, and their website, terribly annoying.

title: Update blows!
body: I have loved this app ever since I discovered it. The newest update, however, has some major flaws. I'm unable to see my recent "yummed" recipes in my lists! They are nowhere to be found. Also, I'm not getting nearly as many recipe recommendations as I did with the old version! It seems to be the same 20 or so recipes it's showing me, when it used to be new ones every time I refreshed. I have also lost all my saved recipes twice now...over 300 recipes each time! It doesn't recognize my email login anymore for some frustrating reason!! Please fix!!!

title: Great App but...
body: I love this app! However, I'm very disappointed that there is no way for me to make notes attached to the recipes, or change the ingredients to fit what I actually used in the recipe. This is a good app but I cruder this lack of modification range a major flaw. I'm not going to remember what modifications I used, and it's a hassle for me to store the recipe somewhere else in my phone when I already have a space dedicated to recipes.

title: Great app!
body: Was using tastebook until they shut down the recipe section. This is heads and tails above tastebook. Only slight downside is the ability to edit a recipe that you bring into your recipe box. It locks it so that it can't be edited. You can always type in the recipe manually and adjust it however you want, but that's more work. All-in though this app is awesome.

title: Amazing for beginners!!
body: I honestly have to save this app saved my life lol. It's helped me learn how to cook such a wide variety of dishes healthy and not so healthy with step by step directions and such great pictures even has ingredients list too! I love the dinner time you can add as a reminder to cook that dish. I use it all the time and have gotten a lot better in my cooking so thank you :)

title: Fantastic app!!
body: This app is great. I have found recipes on here that I have been trying to find for years and some of them are actually healthy while being comfort food!!! My only suggestion is they fix the ingredient list, if the name is long the text goes off the screen and it's hard to tell what they are asking for. Wrap around text or scrolling text should be used instead.

title: Amazing!
body: The only thing holding me back from giving this app 5 stars is there isn't a discover feature. You can search and that aspect works extremely well, but I can't just open a tab and click dinner ideas. That is, if there is a way, I haven't found it. Other than that, I love it. I've used it and I've been told by my family that I am not allowed to stop cooking.

title: Where is the meat
body: I downloaded this and thought it would be handy. I went through the settings and indicated that I eat meat. I also specified the cuisine that I liked, such as Asian, Chinese, Thai, and Japanese.  But as I started to browse the suggested recipes I noticed none included meet and very few were Asian cuisine.  So I did a "meat count". That is, i counted the number of recipes in the first 50 suggested recipes that included meat as an ingredient. Zero included meat. I came to the conclusion that the app is either not using my settings or it has mostly vegan recipes.

title: Perfect!
body: This is hands down the best recipe app out there. It allows you to set filters according to allergies and specific undesired foods, so when you do a search, recipes you can actually use pop up for you. This has been wonderful for me and my son, since we both suffer from celiac disease. Thank you to the fantastic people who came up with this app!

title: Awesome!!
body: I love love love this app! I am always looking for new and healthy recipes and always find it here! It's extremely helpful also because it not only gives you places near you where you can find ingredients cheaper, but the nutritional values as well! My husband is diabetic, so being able to know what the carbs are is very important to me! Thank you!!

title: Amazing
body: I absolutely love it. I have a strict diet and this app has such a variety and it let me completely customize the diet that I have. There were so many options and it just really made me happy. I also love that you can favorite and send the ingredients to a list. Its such an organized and customizable app which is something I can really appreciate.

title: Awesome App, Awesome Recipes
body: A must have app for all occasions and cooking. Love the shopping list. You can check off what you already have. Also can text to my hubby so he can get exactly what we need. Another cool feature of shopping list is that it suggests what section it's in for quicker navigation around the store. Love this app! I'm totally starting to love cooking / baking now!!

title: What an amazing app!
body: Been using this app for about six months now and I love it. Changed our eating habits and cooking habits. Learning new stuff everyday and new food. Easy to use and is usually very accurate. Must have app for all your cooking needs. Apple Watch portion is also very nice. So easy to just look at the what's recommend on my watch. So awesome! Much needed.

title: Incredibly useful!
body: I could use so many food puns to describe how deliciously useful this app can be. But... I don't feel the knead to do so.

title: My #1 Go To Recipe App. Love It!
body: It love this app. It have found so many delicious recipes on Yummly. My son's friends, my my daughter, son in law, and grandkids LOVE the recipes that I have made from Yummly. It is my go to app when I am looking for something new to make! I have gotten so many people to download this app because they enjoyed the meals and/ or desserts I have made from the recipes I tried on Yummly.

title: Love it!
body: I've tried a bunch of different cooking and recipe apps and ended up deleting all of them. I love this one! And I never write reviews so it must be good! I love the big pictures of the food so I know what I'm trying to make and the fact that I can sort by meal. It's also a huge plus that I can make my shopping list straight from the meals I want to cook. <3 it!!!

title: Clean design = most useful recipe app ever
body: The design is clean and the response is snappy. Easy to like, save and organize recipes from all over the web. The shopping list is easy though a bit in accurate as a few times I had to refer to the recipe to get the correct amount of what I needed. Still, easy to go back and forth in between. Can only see improvement for this app. Love it.

title: Simply awesome.
body: Love the range of recipes, and the fact that I can do a quick view of just the ingredients without having to scroll through any kitchen blogs to find it. The nutritional info upfront is also a plus. I've managed to find the inspiration to hide a lot of veggies in my sons food thanks to ideas I found through recipes on this app.

title: Good app
body: This app is a great idea and runs well. I'm not a big fan of introducing sponsored recipes, but I get that you have to make money somehow. I also don't particularly like that after you choose a recipe for a particular dish all the other recipes for that same dish show up on your home screen. If I found a great recipe for chiles rellenos I don't need any more so it seems a bit redundant to have them on my home screen.

title: Love to Cook? Then get this app!
body: I love having Yummly update me on recommended recipes. Some of the best recipes I've tried recently have come from Yummly. It's a well-written app, too. Yummly makes it convenient to keep track of recipes I want to try later, without having to attempt to save the webpage or email the link to myself. Hands down, one of my favorite apps.

title: Great app!
body: I really love the Yummly app because not only is it a great collection of recipes for every occasion, every recipe I've tried has been easy to follow and results are always excellent. The only problem I have is that I wish there were a more direct way to print out the recipe. Navigation is not as user-friendly as it could be for printing recipes. Otherwise, I love it, and it saves me a lot of meal planning time.

title: Cooking Inspirations
body: I love Yummly because it offers dietary preferences and adapts to personal tastes. Yummly has inspired me to become more innovative and creative. I have some basic principles from Alice Waters and Moosewood Cookbook, but Yummly has taken my cooking to a whole different level. I deleted all the other recipe apps a couple years ago, this one, by far, trumps them all and I am keeping it.

title: I LOVE this app!!!!
body: I use Yummly for cool new recipes all the time. I love that it now has the break down of nutrition information for each recipe as well. I would love to see links for stores that carry the ingredients at the most competitive prices near me. So perhaps a geo-feature would be helpful to know where to pick up these items. Otherwise, it's great!!

title: Love new recipes
body: Love to try new recipes so when I hear of something new on the Cooking channel or try something new in a restaurant I log on to Yummly and find the recipe. Sometimes I just search for new ways to prepare an old standard like Chicken or short ribs.  Love not having to print anything and just being able to grab my phone and log on to Yummly while in the kitchen. Great App, couldn't live without it.

title: Best food app ever
body: This is easily my favorite app I have had on my phone for a few years now. The organization, aesthetic, and amount of things you can find on it is endless. I use it every time I can't think of something to make or just for some new food/drinks to try making to change it up a little!

title: Fun and easy!
body: This app has it all! From fun and easy healthy eating recipes to my yummy indulgence desserts and cheesy favorites! It's very continent to simply type in the ingredient I'm looking for and Yummly suggests a variation of different dishes! Also my friend is vegan so whenever she comes over or we plan a cooking day we go to Yummly bc it has an array or recipes for any specific diet! Love it and highly recommend!

title: Seriously my favorite app of all time!!!!
body: I LOVE THIS APP!!!!! Even when I'm bored I can go on this app and be inspired. Anything that I'm interested in finding a recipe for, this app has it! I've been a cooking fool ever since I downloaded this app and myself and my family could not be happier. So much fun to try new things and the app is super easy to navigate. I recommend to EVERYONE and anyone!!!

title: A pretty sweet app
body: Great faceted searching to find exactly what you want. I do wish there was an option to search by vegetable, though. I love that you can save a recipe and then add the ingredients to a shopping list. You do need to be connected to the internet to see the recipe because it links to its online source.

title: Beautiful App Design
body: The design of this app is amazing--it's worth it just for this. Scrolling through beautiful pictures of food has never been easier. They also have great filtering options, so you can browse items that have low carb servings, low spicy, filter by vegan diets, and indicate ingredients that you don't like.

title: Custom categories and shopping lists!
body: Solves my "I don't know what to make for ... " dilemma!  Easily browse tons of great recipes and save in one or more categories I've created. Then I just go to a recipe I've stored and tell Yummly to create a shopping list, and off I go!  The list even sorts ingredients by store section and I can mark items off as they go into the cart. Great app!

title: Terrific!
body: If you're looking for something special -- look no further. You'll find it (or more likely a dozen "its") right in Yummly.  Delicious recipes, often quite simple, and usually with ingredients you have on hand. I've recommended this app quite often since I downloaded it, and have received comments like the one I wrote here. Enjoy!

title: Love but need a few tweaks
body: I really really love all the recipes that this app has and I like that it shows new ones every time based on my preferences. The only negative for me is all my yums don't show when I try to look at them. Only half are listed but I know they are still there because they will show up when I use the search bar. If this was fixed it would be perfect!

title: MUST HAVE APP!!
body: This app is awesome for those who are venturing out and trying to learn how to cook basics and new things. We have discovered so many recipes that my family loves!! And I LOVE that is has a shopping list feature that allows you to quickly add items for a recipe to a grocery shopping list. best app ever! One of top two favorite apps tied with Pinterest! üíóüíóüíó yummy Yummly!! üíóüíóüíó

title: Yummly every week
body: I use Yummly every week to plan my meals for the week and I love it!  There are so many great recipes and I have only scratched the surface of what is provided. It is easy to search for anything in all recipes or just what I have saved. I especially like that I can create my own categories and search for what I am looking for in each.

title: Love this except....
body: I really wish somehow you could have friends on here. I love adding my time but it would be nice to see others recipes and share. I know you can share recipes but I wanted to say "add" my honey so we can both see the things we like and make comments or whatever social interactions could take place.

title: BEST DECISION EVER!!
body: This app got me excited at 5:39 AM. As soon as I opened the app it began asking me personalized questions regarding my diet and preference. As a vegan, this is SO convenient and comforting! The app looks out for the ingredients I avoid for me. I have only scrolled threw a few recipes and I just had to rave about it to you all. I am so stoked to cook with this app. Definitely one the best downloads, hands down.

title: Health & MyFitnessPal
body: Works with health for nutrient tracking purposes but I have to manually delete MyFitnessPal calculations if a added from in Yummly. That means checking each nutrient to see if it's double logged.

title: Love this app
body: I use this app almost exclusively for cooking and have loved the food I've made. The more I Yum the better the recommendations have been. Having said that, I have Yummed enough recipes it is hard to go back and find my favorites. I wish their was a favorite designation and a way to make notes about any adjustments I may have made.

title: Love the recipes BUT...
body: I love the recipes, however there are a few things I dislike:

title: Easier than most places you want to access
body: I am not that computer literate, and it scares me when I am trying to do one thing and it turns out it directs me to another unwanted spot. I appreciate having at my fingertips something useful and easy to use. I have made many new recipes and they were very good. Thank you!

title: Must-have app!
body: If you cook, or want to cook, or just want someone to cook for you....get this app! Great for cooking, shopping, and inspiration. The recipes are endless. The videos are great for "watch and learn".  Shopping list was a must when I was in the grocery store. Or if you prefer, stay home and use Instacart for your ingredients delivery. I love using Yummly on all of my technology.   Thanks Yummly!

title: Needs fine tuning
body: I get about half way through reading a recipe and the page reloads and I'm back at the top of the page. Which means that if I'm trying to actually follow the recipe I'd have to stop cooking, chopping, or stirring and scroll back down to find my place in the recipe. Please, PLEASE fix this! Also, as you continue to develop the app, please remember that what is so beautiful about it is the simple yet useful design of the user interface. No need to muck it up with animated back buttons and such.

title: Nice
body: I love the shopping list function and the fact that you can (kind of) access favorited items offline. I just wish that the search was a little more like the website and that I could see a boiled down version (pun intended) of the recipe offline once I favorite something. That would help me choose a recipe while I'm walking around the grocery store.

title: So Many Choices!!!
body: I love this app! I've always been a good cook who can imagine what a few ingredients will taste like together and make an awesome dish with them. But this app is a dream come true for inspiration! I use it constantly! There are countless, savory dishes, and the filter will lead you to what you're looking for, whether it's a lean meal or a hearty one in all kinds of cuisines and techniques!!!

title: My new go to
body: This app is my new go to whenever me and the wife can't decide what to cook. We've made a resolution to cut down on eating out and this app definitely makes it easier to do that. Why eat out when you can cook like a gourmet? I still need to work on my presentation skills though as my food is not quite ready for a Gordon Ramsey twitter critique LOL üòÇ

title: Wonderful
body: Just feedback.  Great app!  Your protein section in nutrition doesn't exist.  It doesn't tell you how much protein per serving.  Another awesome add on would be a diet/ healthy eating section.  Type in bulking and get healthy pasta recipes.  Type in cutting get lean high energy meals.  Type in weight loss. Get healthy salads and light carbs.  Make it easier for new cooks to navigate and find recipes they like suited for lifestyle.  Just an idea.  Still awesome app!

title: Great app
body: This app is amazing and is a lifesaver for a college student not trying to eat fast food every day. The only thing that seems counterintuitive is the refresh button at the top of the screen. It's not always there but when it rolls down or up, it flings the page a bit and it's kind of annoying. Other than that, this is probably one of my favorite apps

title: Great recipe search engine!!
body: I love to cook and finding recipes has never been easier. The fact that I can enter different ingredients to search and get recipes that include them is priceless. Nice being able to organize into my own categories, recommended list always helpful, and the user interface is very simple.

title: Snazzy and Scrumptious
body: I love this app! I've only had it downloaded for about two weeks or so and I haven't actually used a recipe from it yet. However, I love the layout of it and it's wide variety of settings. The filter option is fantastic and offers several choices based on dietary restrictions, etc. I plan on using a recipe tonight! Love it :)

title: Absolutely love this app!
body: I have been using yummly for the past few months. I love being able to categorize recipes and create custom categories like "this week". I love having my cookbook with me at the grocery store, it's great to refer to the app to know how much of an ingredient to buy. I have been a more creative and much better cook with this app!

title: Great app
body: I love this app. All the great recipes and the shopping list feature is awesome. We never had any ideas of what to have for dinner before and that meant usually eating out or making something from a can or a box, but with the easy recipes on this app I actually cook dinner for my husband now so he's excited about that too.

title: Best cooking app
body: I was skeptical about installing this app at first. It randomly popped up when I was googling a recipe for chicken thighs but just installed it anyway. I'm so glad I did because everything that I cooked using this app has come out DELISH and got raving compliments from everyone who tasted them. I have yet to be disappointed and doubt that I ever will at this point.

title: Great personalization, except for one thing
body: I love the personalization this app provides, it makes it easy to find recipes you will like. The only problem is that the "diet" selections are only for vegetarian, vegan, and paleo.  People on low cal,  low fat, low sugar, etc,  plans don't have any selection, so we have to wade through high cal/fat recipes to find ones that work for us. Luckily, we've gotten good at substituting!

title: One of the Best Apps
body: Use the app on your phone or log in on the computer. I Love the pictures included with the recipes and ratings by people. You have the ability to save and categorize your saves the way you like. Most importantly there are several recipes and various ways to make a dish. Fantastic app keep up the good work.

title: Yummly Review-Deliciously helpful
body: For me, Yummly has opened up doors into the world of cooking. It allows me to explore recipes that I otherwise would not have had the opportunity to do, and has an organized, easy and simple design. A feature that I believe would be helpful is to be able to write onto either the image or ingredient list, so that you can add your own notes to the recipe.

title: Lots of good, a few things could be better
body: Pros: very attractive UI, great recipe selection, great functionality to add ingredients to shopping list.

title: Love it! ‚ô°
body: This app is super useful! It makes recipes really easy and fun to look through, especially with the great pictures. You can even organize your favorite recipes into folders you can name yourself. I also love that it suggests recipes in your home feed based on other ones you've saved! All around, awesome!!

title: My Yums menu=FRISTRATING!
body: This app is an awesome app. Everything about it is really well crafted... Except the My Yums Menu. Half of the time it says you have more recipes then what show up when you click on the category!! Then you're forced to try and remember the name of what you had put with something in the My Yums Menu. Please fix this so all of the recipes you put in My Yums come up, not just some of them!

title: Love it!
body: I love this app so much its helped me make much healthier eating decisions that are just as tasty as unhealthy foods! My only complaint and the reason im giving it 4 stars is that while im scrolling through recipes the app keeps freezing and i have to keep closing it and reopening and then have to search for the recipe i was looking at. Fix that and ill be one happy camper and itll get 5 stars as intended when i first got the app üòÑ

title: Yummy is the best
body: This is one of the best websites for meal preparation.  It's simple, not complicated; tells you exactly what you will need and how to execute it.  Most of the meals have been great and if something went wrong it was because I improvised üòä.  I recommend it for all cooks.  And the variety is just vast.  You're sure to find something to fit your tastebuds.

title: Thumbs up!
body: I love this app. It is a comprehensive app that searches blogs, food network, all recipes, and so on.  It gives multiple recipes when you search so you can find the one that's just right for you.  The only thing I don't love is the search capabilities-it's super sensitive and be careful with spelling errors. Otherwise...it's fantastic!!!

title: Insta-Chef!!
body: YUM is a boost to your food ego. It's the little idea engine that turns your kitchen into creation station. Never again will people rely on you to just bring the relishes. You'll call their relishes and raise them a Chicago Deep Dish Pizza. You'll confuse and shock your family. Mass hysteria will erupt when Grandma's Chocolate frosting is replaced by your Genache. Get this app and release your hidden superpower!

title: Awesome Recipe App
body: I love Yummly!

title: Makes cooking much easier!
body: I never enjoyed cooking before because I hated organizing it all. Now I can search for recipes using what I have or create a shopping list on my phone. I have at least 10 go-to meals my family enjoys that are quick & delicious & I try new meals pretty often. The photos are great too.

title: Men Who Can Cook
body: I appreciate this app a lot! As a bachelor, I'm forced to cook my own meals every night and the Yummly app is the perfect tool to help me do that. Whenever I need to learn how to cook a certain dish, I open the app and am impressed by the array of recipe choices it provides. I've cooked many a meal from the Yummly app, so thank you! Without it I'd probably be eating TV dinners and In-n-Out burgers (lol).

title: Loving it
body: I hardly ever write reviews, but this app deserves it! I've used it a lot and find it very helpful to get ideas for dinner, parties, etc. The grocery list is brilliant! I also like that you can now categorize to find things faster. Now if only they can estimate your grocery bill based on your local prices...that would be magical.

title: Freakin love this app!!!!
body: Ah mannnn. Everything fit together so well, so intuitive, and it all works! Even makes internal exceptions for my food allergies! Love this app, of the hundreds of apps I've downloaded in 4 months that I've had this iPhone5c, I think Yummly is my favorite so far. Wish I could get a bonus for how many people in tellin! Make life easy, Grab Yummly now! :)

title: Amazing
body: My sister and I were never cooks before we started using this app, and now we love to cook!

title: Has revolutionized our cooking!
body: Love everything about the app. The food restrictions, search functions, shopping list, etc...I only wish you could add your own recipes that aren't available through the app, so they could all be in one place. And there are some bugs in the shopping list.

title: Amazing! Find all my meals here!
body: Ever since my husband found this app I do not use anything else for my weekly meal plans. Been using this for a month and a half and we love it! We have found so many new exciting meals! We are also pescatarian and they allow you to put your diet preference like vegan or vegetarian or nothing! Love it. Thank you!

title: This is a really great app!
body: I really enjoy this app. It is colorful. It has a huge variety of recipes. You can customize it to whatever meals or events you want. I haven't figured out how to import outside recipes but I know you can do that. I see only 1 shortcoming and that is you can't make notes on the recipe for changes you may want to make.  Hence the reason for the 4 stars and not 5.

title: Very Convenient
body: Yummly is my go to app when I need recipes, hands down. I used to google recipes when I needed them but since being introduced to yummly I have long given up Google. I like how it has all the recipes in one place, and you can save the ones you like and organize them to your satisfaction.

title: Super Convenient
body: I am so happy I found this app.  The cool thing is that you can tell it what type of recipes you want and it will return lots to choose from.  Select the ones you want and you can add the ingredients to your shopping list. Just check them off as you buy them. Serious time saver.

title: Great app
body: I love this app, it is my go to when looking for new or old recipes. I like that you can add different recipes to groups that you create, like Pinterest. I also really like that you can change the servings and it will automatically update the amount of materials needed. I recommend this app to all who love to cook and bake!

title: Love it
body: I have been using it for a few years. As my dietary options have changed, I have continued enjoying the app using filters and finding types of food that meets my criteria. I add my favorite recipes to self created categories and revisit as needed. It is often my go-to app and I find it handy. Thank you for your great work!

title: Sweet!
body: I love it! Very helpful recipe app with lots of content and an amazing design.  Very good at compiling the groceries I need into a list.   One thing I have trouble with is syncing yums from the web app to my phone, it sometimes doesn't work as expected (recipes not available on the mobile app).  Also, it would be nice if the recipe names didn't disappear when you scrolled down on the main recipe list.

title: A must-have tool for chefs of all levels
body: This app is great on all aspects; good content catalog, updated often, great UI/UX on iPhone + iPad. The fact that you can filter based on dietary preferences (e.g. vegetarian, no pork, etc.) puts this app for beyond the other "major" cooking apps out there.

title: Better than the food network app
body: At first I was a little doubtful it would be as good as the food network app but turns out it was even better, simple beautiful clean layout and simple functions, gets to the point on how many calories, ingredients and cooking time and is ver very easy to use or learn to use.

title: LOVE this app!!
body: Yummy is by far the best recipe app I have used thus far. the recipes are creative and unique. this app gives GREAT selection for all the recipes you are looking for. i enjoy using yummly and love trying their new recipes. however the calculated nutrition facts are not always correct so if you count calories, ect. you may have to calculate them yourself.

title: Best Food App Available
body: This app is fantastic.  The app uses your input like age, cooking level, likes and dislikes, etc to suggest recipes. Then you 'yum' the ones that you like and they are saved. When you like a recipe you are given the option to save all needs ingredients into a categorized shopping lists. Ingenious. Kudus to the developers

title: Missed Punchfork, no longer
body: I loved using Punchfork before the site was bought out and I wasn't sure if I would find something similar to that. So far, this has been a great replacement. Colorful photos, I love the suggested recipes and how you can save what you want to try and/or what you've already made.

title: Used to be my favorite...
body: The app isn't showing me all the recipes I've yummed, for some reason. Neither from the "all yums" screen nor from the specific lists, however if I search by name for a specific recipe I know I've added, it says I've already yummed it, even though it won't show up in my lists.

title: Genius!
body: Oh my goodness, I just love yummly, being able to choose what recipes I see, the calories and nutrition facts, etc. the app just takes it to a new level! Being able to make a mobile shopping list in app, and the way it can connect to the health app is just fantastic! 10/10 for this diet enthusiast.

title: Best recipe saving app!
body: I love this app!  I have tried several and this one is by far the best.  Easy to save your favorite recipes into the app. No having to copy and paste recipes or web addresses.  Easy to classify or organize your recipes.  The app will also give you recommendations based on your likes, allergies, and other preferences.  Love it!

title: Great App
body: I'm making a transition from vegetarian to vegan and it's not easy coming from a Hispanic (or any culture) that considers meat to make the meal or else! This app is making it easy to experiment with new foods! I love that you can modify it according to your any allergies you may have or what you like or do not like to eat! So many recipes to try! Thankful for this app!

title: Beginner cooks...üò±üòÅ
body: I wasn't cooking for a few years and then I found this app and it's so customizable that when I'm on a health kick I can find something and when I'm on a fried food binge I can find something ALL IN ONE PLACE!!!

title: Great tool for meal ideas
body: My boyfriend and I love this app. We have been wanting to start cooking healthier but we are always on the go with our work schedules. This app is so convenient because we can share recipe ideas durning the day and the first person to get off work runs to the store to pick up the ingredients for the recipe.

title: Delicious recipes- great shopping cart feature!
body: Has a great selection of recipes to make and many healthy options. You even have the ability to add all the ingredients to your "shopping cart" which is very helpful when at the grocery store trying to figure out what you need to buy.

title: Best Cooking App
body: This is the best cooking app I've been able to find and use. I've made several recipes from Yumly and they're all very good. Recipes are easy to find, save for later and rate. I tell everyone about it and always recommend it to friends and family when they're looking for recipes to make.

title: Finally!!
body: I've been looking for a one stop shop app like this for a couple of years!!  What a well thought out sight.  A breeze to get the hang of and fantastic recipes that please my picky fam!!

title: Needs a few changes
body: I love yummly but sometimes when I "yum" a recipe and then try to find it in my "yums" it's not there! I also find it very frustrating when the directions for a recipe won't load. Like another reviewer, I dislike the auto refresh on the home page. Would also be nice to view recipes in a side by side grid instead of single.

title: Loveeeeeeee
body: Love this ap! I use it every week when trying to schedule lunches/dinners for the week. I wish we could sync it to a shopping ap other then what they provide. That way when I add to shopping cart it goes to the normal ap I use. But that won't keep me from continuing to use this for our weekly meal planning!

title: Love this app!!!
body: I absolutely love this app. It's easy to find recipes, and I love that I can store them in different categories. It's the only app I use for my recipes. Lastly, I love that there are reviews on the recipes. I can see variations or changes that others have made. I've tried other apps, but always come back to this one!

title: Best Recipe, Meal List, Grocery List creator EVER! ‚ù§Ô∏èüòé
body: I have been looking for an app that does everything Yummly does!  Like other pin to board apps but this one creates your shopping list and tells you what you are buying the item for, in case you change your mind!  Love it üòç!  Thank you, thank you, thank you for making this app!

title: My go to recipe app
body: I've been using Yummly for about a year now.  It is a very simple app to input what you want to eat or what you have available. It's pretty amazing what recipes are in the library.  You can also categorize the things that you make in the things that you want to make extremely convenient.

title: Awesome app !!
body: Great app I love the fact that has great and different recipes. I can wait to try them. I like that it breaks the recipe into steps. Just few suggestions put tips and easier ways to sub ingredients.. Other than that great app keep up the good work . I think you should let us invite people through Facebook and twitter .

title: One of my most used apps
body: This app is crazy good! I love that it inventories recipes from all over the internet, so I know I'm getting the best, most varied selection of recipes. My only wish was that you could search for recipes that use one specific ingredient instead of the title alone, but I think that's a very minor flaw.

title: A lot of hype for nothing!
body: I downloaded this app thinking it would make life a whole lot easier. It has a lot of nice features, but when I try to access recommended recipes from e-mail it keeps pointing me be back to downloading the app which I have already done. I have not found any way around this. It's quite annoying. I found it easier just to look for the recipes on my own outside their app and pin to Pinterest. Please fix this or this app is useless to me.

title: So Entertaining and Comforting
body: I absolutely love this app. I enjoy reading all of the recipes and there are thousands to search. Another great feature for me  as my family is the calories as serving sizes, as well as the number of ingredients that it takes to make the recipe. I would suggest this app to anyone who loves to cook or to read cookbooks!

title: Yummly love
body: I've had a bunch of various food apps over time.  This is the one I use all the time- for everything from ideas for what to do with my ingredients to full meal planning ideas before I do my grocery.  Plus you can adjust the servings and it automatically adjust all the ingredients.  Yummly is the best app for this lazy natural minded mom.

title: Love this ap!!
body: I'm a married woman in my late 40's so I have some experience with cooking and recipe hunting. I love Yummly!!  I use it almost everyday, and have found many really, really good recipes.  If you are working on your culinary skills, or just looking for something different for breakfast, this is it. Download it...you won't be disappointed.

title: Excellent app!
body: I've already made a variety of different dinners by using Yummly alone and my family loved every single dish! I'm not that experienced of a cook, so when it gave the exact measurements and ingredients needed for every dish that helped me tremendously. Really recommend for those wanting to try different dishes to make for dinner or any occasion!

title: This app is bomb af
body: Love Yummly! It's my one and only stop for finding recipes from breakfast to dinner to desserts! The most wonderful part is adjusting my settings to how I like because sometimes I want vegetarian options and other times I might really want to try out a new way to cook meat, etc. 10/10 would def recommend!

title: Everything I need it to be for now
body: Great resource for meals and have to say I've only had maybe one meal not turn out to my satisfaction. The app has nice features like the shopping cart (although I'd like it to be a little larger for more detail) and a nice direction feature that I wish was before the backstory write-up so I could just get right to the making.

title: 'Yummy' has thought of everything!!
body: This app is fantastic, and its creators have thought of everything. You can choose between cuisine type, culture, diet plans, ingredients, and they'll even tell you when to start cooking in order to have everything done by a certain time. I'm in love!

title: Excellent with room for growth
body: This app is fantastic for finding recipes & shopping. It needs a few things to be perfect - an extension for adding recipes from Safari, & either iCloud syncing/ sharing with family, or an ability to sync to Reminders. Still, it's the best cooking & shopping app out there, by far

title: Wonderful but needs more classic dishes
body: I have been using the Yummy website for several years and the iPhone application for a couple. There are a great variety of recipes ranging in preparation and cooking time, number of ingredients, and also in origin. There are many fewer classic recipes as compared to home made concoctions, which is why I'm rating the app/website a 4/5 and not a 5.

title: Easy To Find and Save Recipes
body: Yummly has been a great tool to find and save recipes catering to what I'm looking for.

title: Good App with lots of recipes
body: I really like this app. It has lots of options. My only problem is that I have issues with corn and all corn products and it isn't one of the "preset" dietary issues. As a result I have to manually enter it as an exclusion as well as each individual variation each time I do a search. If I didn't have to re-enter it each time I would give 5stars.

title: Great App. Easier than a Google search
body: So easy to find new recipes, no matter what you're cooking. Love the compilation of ingredients and cooking times separate from directions. For someone just getting into the practice of cooking, this app makes it fun and easy to try new things and while staying in one's comfort zone.

title: Great app
body: Overall I like it.  Well designed and useful.

title: Very helpful!
body: I love this app. It's brilliant for when I have a party or bdays coming up and I need to think of a recipe that I haven't done a million times already. The shopping list is convenient and while it took me a bit to learn the bells and whistles of the app, once learned you begin to appreciate how smartly it is put together.

title: Live for YUM
body: This app is everything!! It provides nutritional info, recipes, and more!! You can even quickly start a grocery list for your choice of recipes!! It's extremely helpful for someone on the go that enjoys cooking new and different things .. The visuals are amazing too!!! Live for this app!! So does my family! üòâ‚úåüèªÔ∏è

title: Vegan made easy!
body: I love this app because of the customizable dietary preferences and accurate recipe results. I also like that the ingredients are given in a simple, easy to read list before having to open a website.

title: Easy to use but can lose place
body: I find the app very easy to use and have found some new and great recipes even for unique dietary needs.  I just wish it would remember/keep your place      - frustrating to have to search again for same recipe you were using just because u had to switch apps in the middle of using recipe.

title: Best recipe app
body: This app is so customizable for food preferences and dietary restrictions. It lets you chose everything from taste preference to calorie count to prep time. You can even pick ingredients that you don't want in recipes. When you choose a recipe you can add the ingredients to your shopping list in the app. I highly recommend this app.

title: so easy and simple.
body: I started using this app because I was getting bored, eating the same thing week after week. The recipes are easy to make and you can find almost anything you're looking for, from simple homemade recipes to the extreme and even drinks. This app has saved me so much time because I always have dinner right at my fingertips.

title: Great App But
body: I love this app it has some very good qualities about it. I like that it is easy to navigate and that you can use keywords to search for recipes... My only down side that makes me hate using this app is the ads that take over when reading, redirecting me to the App Store... It's annoying enough to not use it and just go to google and search...

title: The only recipe app you need
body: I love this app. It pulls recipes from every source. From All Recipes to Ina Garten, they come up with pictures so its easy to select the recipe you want. Then there is an easy list of ingredients that you can use as your shopping list. I got rid of all the individual site apps and just use this one.

title: Great app but it doesn't sho...
body: I really wish the app would make the dish titles whole. All the titles of the recipes that I wade through are truncated. For example:

title: Terrible
body: This is what is wrong with the internet these days. A website is built for collecting recipes. But you are forced to download an add filled app to even view the recipes. After scrolling past the life story of how someone is always reminded of the first time they met their husband over chicken wings at a super bowl party. And scroll past 40 other click-bait recipes for more football recipe favorites. You finally get to the original recipe you were looking for in the first place. Just to see what the ingredients are. Complete waste of time.

title: Wonderful recipes
body: Yummlyhelps me plan out meals for the week so when I go shopping I get everything I need and I don't have to wonder what are we going to have for dinner depending on what I can find in the cupboards!  It's nice to save the recipes that work for us and they are all in one place not scribbled on pieces of papers that wind up scattered. I love yummly!

title: I ‚ù§Ô∏è YUMMLY!!!
body: This app is AMAZING!!! I absolutely love this app! So good! I am a baker/chefy person...? (Or at least trying to be one when I get older) and I am addicted to this app. My family always has the same old same old dinners, but now with Yummly it spices up our dinners with a new suprise! Like "OH! Hey this is a do-over!" But overall, great app, love it to bits, phenomenal job. Thank you! üòò

title: Good but not yet perfect
body: I like Yummly but its programmed meals features isn't working too well. It doesn't let you put your progress so the app know where in the process you are. It would be nice if you could also add update suggestions to the recipes (sometimes the real time it takes to make something is very different from the one listed)

title: A true lifesaver
body: This app makes eating at home fun, easy, delicious and attainable. The recipes can accommodate endless food allergies and dietary preferences, they make grocery shopping easy, and most importantly, the app helps you manage your time with reminders of when to begging cooking in order to have dinner on the table at a goal time.

title: Useful!
body: Great app! I have made several recipes from it already. So easy to just pull up my 'yums' and follow along on the instructions. I love the feature of adding ingredients to a shopping list. I just picked up my phone at the grocery store and was able to see exactly what I needed (for multiple recipes!).

title: Greatest Thing Ever!
body: No longer do I have to waste time writing down recipes or money on cookbooks! Everything I need to find is within this app! Recipes sent to Facebook timelines disappear after a period of time but not to worry! Type it into search and Yummly will find it and save it to my yums! Pictures and videos are priceless; you won't get those in a cookbook!

title: Great App... I use it often
body: I was looking for a cooking recipe app for a while and came across this app a few months ago.  Ever since I started using it, this app has become my first app to look for recipes.  Some quirks like timeout login takes back to the top of the page rather than scrolled mid position, not a great  resolution etc can be improved but overall a great app.

title: My favorite
body: Best food app ever! It makes looking for recipes so much easier. I would appreciate it more if I closed the app and the app would remember where I left off because it currently makes me start the process all over again every time it closes (I switch apps or minimize it). Overall great.

title: Great app for all diets!!
body: This app is so much better than most.  Most recipe apps either don't have enough recipes for all diet types or have ads like crazy or want you to purchase recipes.   This app also does shopping lists for recipes you want to use and has a website to use on a computer.

title: Chef approved!
body: I'm a cook whose been cooking professionally for 5 Plus years, and am a pure foodie. This app is a godsend, absolutely live it! The app is easy to use, the pictures make your mouth water, the shopping list feature is amazing, and the option to save your recipes in different categories is wonderful. Absolutely Amazing job!

title: Great app!
body: Yummly is a wonderful recipe app. The layout and design are smart and pleasing to the eyes. Ingredients, calories and directions are easily accessible and the recipe filing system is really helpful with custom naming! My only problem is the occasional freeze up when connecting to sites for directions on recipes. I'd highly recommend it.

title: The Only Food App You'll Ever Need!
body: Update, everything is functioning much better! My go to!!!

title: Great App!!!
body: I love this app! I have been using it for some time now and it is the best! It's great for new recipes and I like that you can put ingredients and it will give you recipes. I also love that you can put what you don't eat and it will filter the recipes that way! By far one of the best recipe apps I've come across!!! Happy cooking!

title: Makes Life Easier!
body: Not only can you find great recipes without having certain ones "locked," insisting you pay for them like most recipe apps...but you can also schedule your meals(they will show you what time to start cooking) and add all needed ingredients to a shopping list!

title: Love it but need and enhancement
body: I love this app and use it regularly to fix meals. However I just wish I had the ability to add personal notes to the items I Yum. Sometimes I make little tweaks to the recipes and want to keep those changes on record. I would love it if you added this to the app!

title: Clean and useful
body: I'm working on learning one recipe a week and this app makes it easy to find and keep track of things to try and their ingredients. I do wish it could host the directions in app though, as websites tend to refresh at the top and the text is not optimized for mobile.

title: Highly Recommend this app
body: Love the presentation and the options presented when searching receipts.  I do wish once I've added a recipe to a category (dinner, healthy snacks,...) I could add notes like add potatoes and add my own items to the shopping list.  But love this app and have recommended it to friends who want to cook more at home.

title: Extremely well designed app!!!
body: The best food app in the AppStore right now! The UI is great, very snappy and clean. Sharing on social media is easy.

title: Pretty Neat
body: Not a bad app and I do love the large selection of recipes. That being said the filters need work, I'm a vegan and when I put on the vegan filter I still get recipes with meat and eggs included. It'll take a much better filter to get me to switch from my vegan only apps to this one full time. For people with no dietary restrictions it'd be a must, for me it'll only be an occasionally, at least until the filters are tightened up.

title: EVERYTHING YOU NEED!!!
body: I have visited plenty of food sites, downloaded recipes, bought cookbooks, but Yummly has it all! Everything I search for I find- that and several other versions of it. If you need diet, healthy, or something downright sinful, they have the recipe. It's easy to maneuver - what more could you ask for. I love it.

title: Broken shopping list feature
body: The shopping list is glitchy at best. After adding fewer than ten items, several category headers (Breakfast Foods, Dairy) started duplicating and their items would all but disappear into thin grey bands. When I tried to move those items between categories to try and refresh them, the app simply crashed. Deleted after a couple of minutes; +1 star for other potential features I neither needed nor cared to test.

title: Awesome App
body: Do you like cooking? The this would be a good app for you. You can search for foods and "yum" the food if you like it. You can create folders to put your yums in. You can find out what you need to bake the food. You can also add your own cooking recipes. It's a fun way to learn how to bake and if you already know how to bake on! Enjoy the app!

title: Love this app
body: I love this app. I had it for probably a little two months, I already used at least twenty recipes. The one complaint that I have, I don't like how the app goes back to the home screen when the phone goes into rest mode. Also, I can't see all of the recipes that I save. I have to do a search for them. Other than that, i use it a lot.

title: Nice Job Yum
body: This is a great app.  It is always nice to see the developers put solid thinking into what they are doing, and they did with the Yummly App!

title: Great app!!
body: We were Looking for a recipe app and this fits the bill perfectly.  Really enjoying the ability to "yum" recipes and essentially create your own custom cookbook.  Clever design, easy to use and full of great recipes from several different sites.  My wife and I have really enjoyed this...oh and the kids too

title: Makes Paleo Life Easy
body: Thank you, thank you, thank you for adding so many Paleo recipes and making it an option under dietary preferences... You've managed to make an app I love even better!

title: I Want to Give It 5 Stars But....
body: Having access to all of these recipes is great but only a small portion of those that I save actually show up in "My Yums". I have to actually remember what each recipe is called and search for it or use Yummly on my computer. I don't know about you all, but setting up my computer in my kitchen would be a pretty big pain.

title: Great App
body: This app is quick and easy. Just look up what you want to make. Choose the recipe version that seems the most appealing to you and go. I love having the option to choose from many different versions of the same recipe. It makes it easy to tailor to your likes.

title: Used to be great but now doesn't work at all
body: I've spent a lot of time yumming and categorizing recipes and for the past week or so, it won't let me in the app (iPhone 6 / iOS 9.2). It gets stuck in the sign-in screen and when I press "Continue with Facebook" nothing happens although it used to work just fine. Same if I go to an external recipe site and try adding to my Yums; it tells me that I don't have a Yummly account which is clearly not true. The website seems to work just fine. Please fix your mobile app!

title: My go to app
body: This is by far the best app i've ever used for recipes! It is also the first place i look before preparing a meal to see if i can add something new to my recipe. I can search for anything i have a taste for and i haven't had a bad dish yet. I also like that i can modify the serving size and it will calculate the recipe for me.

title: My Go To!
body: Yummly is my new go to cookbook. I can sort and sift through versions of recipes to find the one that suits what I want. Calories and ingredients are posted upfront, saving me scrolling through 50 ads and twenty paragraphs to make my decision. Then I can sort and save my favorites to access them easily again.

title: This app is doppppppe
body: Every recipe you could ever want to make is in this app! I just scroll and scroll and watch cooking videos and yum recipes all day. Then at the end of the week I put together my shopping list on the app from the recipes i yummed and have everything delivered from instacart. Saves me so much time.

title: Game Changer
body: This app is amazing. Just tried it out and absolutely LOVE how easy it was to get my list for the week ready to go, and how convenient it was to shop as it categorized all my foods, making my trip to the grocery that much quicker. I will definitely be using this for the foreseeable future!

title: Useful time and money saving app but...
body: Awesome tool for getting what you need done.  The time saving grocery list and Instacart ordering is fabulous.  Choosing entrees and building menu collections is nice.  Wish list includes a a more robust menu planning function with a calendar, but otherwise it's on the right track.

title: Amazing!!
body: I use this app all the time. Perfect for finding all types of recipes! All the filters are pretty much the best thing ever. I love it so much.

title: To many processed food ads
body: In the beginning I loved this app it was my go to app for cooking. But now after a year I have noticed that the first couple of recipes that appear are from their corporate sponsors and these companies just want to push their processed food items. I am now getting email about recipes from them as well. It is annoying and I am over it. Yummly just ruined their app by selling out. Good look finding decent recipes that don't market to you to buy processed food items. Real food yummly not fake food. Very sad.

title: Awesome
body: This app really inspires me to try new recipes. The search function works great, and the recommendations they give you for "yumming" are great too. I never head to the grocery store without opening up this app first! Best shopping companion because you make a grocery list in Yummly. And it's FREE! I won't need another food app anytime soon!

title: Love Cooking? You'll Love This App
body: This app has a lot of amazing and powerful features for any chef. The database of recipes is huge and only getting bigger. And with it you can even connect it to some of the most popular fitness tracker apps helping you in your journey to become fit or a healthy eater. This is a must for any foodie!!!

title: So useful
body: I love this app. I cook so much and this app allows me not only to save a recipe but categorize it. I just wish there was a category with a reminder of what you want to make the following night, I have 4 kids and I can use all the proverbial post-its I can get!!
