This is a great app, the pictures are pretty spot on.

title: Yummly is my Sioux Chef
body: Yummly uses data to give you intelligent recipes. Yummly's powerful ingredient search features yield a treasure trove of ideas that inspires my cooking. As a vegetarian, Yummly filters my results to only show me things I can eat! The preferences are  invaluable to people with allergies or other restricted diets. Definitely the best cooking app available.

title: The cooking App I use the most
body: Why be tied to one site for inspiration for your next meal? I absolutely can't say enough about this app, other  than I love it and always look forward to what great recipes I'll find in the "community" out there in Yummly land. Share with everyone and rate the recipes, it helps!

title: Beautiful app!
body: I love this app! It is very user-friendly with great photos to accompany the recipes. The search filters are really useful; they have helped me find lots recipes that work with my diet. I like that it's easy to save and organize recipes, and (almost) everything I have cooked has been delicious.

title: Calendar sync!!!
body: I've always appreciated Yummly but every once in a while I would stop using it for several reasons but when I signed back in after a while I saw their new update where it works out the prep-cook-eat times and then syncs it with my calendar-- exactly what I needed. Kudos Yummly team!

title: Very useful and functional
body: I love this app. It's simple to use, but has a wide variety of options that pop up. Perfect if I want something standard to make, or want to browse for an off the wall new recipe. I am also getting a lot of use out of the 'add to shopping list' function. So great!

title: Super excited‚Ä¶but
body: So excited Yummly finally made an app. Was just a matter of time. The app is beautifully designed and works great. I hope for the future updates to include Collections and being able to add "Yummed" recipes to the collections. Also the World uses METRIC systems. I hope future releases will have some fancy algorithm to convert the recipes. Thank you Yummly and lets see you SOAR.

title: Best Cooking App ever!
body: This is my go to app for everything cooking. I absolutely love that it searches the internet for recipes and I can chose the one that I like best. The other feature that I really use a lot is that you can put the recipes in a folder to use again. It's the absolute best app out there hands down!

title: Outstanding!
body: The app has a great interface and top notch features. Like any assortment of recipes culled from the web, some recipes are better than others. But that is not the fault of the app, just the nature of the beast. I've shown this app to a lot of people and almost all have installed it on the spot.

title: Scrumptious App!!
body: Has it all organized for you! Right at the tip of your fingers! Easy to use! Best feature is the "Shopping List". When you see an ingredient that you don't have, tap it and it goes into a shopping list so you don't have to write it down, then lose the paper...uh...oops I forgot the list!! Love it!!

title: Good, but could be better
body: This is a helpful app and I appreciate the layout and ease of use. However, I thought the shopping cart feature would fill with selected recipes, but it doesn't seem to do this. Also, some searches bring up items that have nothing to do with the search words that just wastes time.

title: Nice app.... But
body: Lately a lot of recipes have an error display on the directions page. Not all recipes but a lot. Even ones I have saved have errors. It says the referring website is experiencing problems. I have reported to customer service to no avail. Wish they would check & correct the links associated with their recipes.

title: The Perfect Food App
body: This app does it all, yet is easy to use. I love the beautiful photos, and easy to follow directions. The part is that it allows you to create a grocery / ingredients list with the touch of the screen. I also like the way you can set filters for allergies and foods you don't like. ‚ù§Ô∏è this!

title: Where is the full recipe?
body: The app is good for inspiration, with beautiful pics and nice filtering options. I also like how you can add all of the needed ingredients to a well organized shopping list. The problem is that you don't get instructions on how to make the recipe, just the ingredients. That makes the app pretty worthless to me. If the entire recipe was available and the grocery list could be shared with another person or another app, then this would be a great app.

title: Great recipes, but app doesn't always work well
body: I love the recipes and I recommend the app to everyone  who is interested but the app doesn't always work well on my iPad. It frequently freezes or just quits while in use. In fact I had to write this review 3 times because it quit on me.

title: Almost Perfect!
body: I absolutely love this app! Only thing that I would like to be able to do is swipe left on a recipe (I will never like or want) and it will be gone forever. This would be nice so I'm not scrolling through a lot of repeats. But hey, it's not that big of a deal, I still LOVE it and will continue to use it!!

title: Best food app period.
body: I seriously love this app! I'm already a good cool but have a hard time thinking of new ideas. With this app that isn't a problem anymore. Something you guys should add is a way to go straight from email to mobile app. Especially if you like the recipe. I use yummly exclusively on my iphone.

title: Love this app!
body: Learning to cook has been... interesting, but this app really gets me excited about trying new recipes. I love that I can search and find so many great recipes. And after I've "yummed" a few, it gives great recommendations. I've had no trouble with the app at all and I use it almost daily. Love it!

title: Love this app
body: I love this app. Especially that you can make your grocery list with it, so convenient and easy. Only one thing is sometimes it will cut off part of the ingredient if description is too long for the line so you have to open recipe to see what that ingredient really is. But great recipes and very easy to use. And you can save your favorites.

title: No more boring meals!
body: I was searching for a grocery list app and found Yummly. After only 10 minutes of browsing the app I had five new dinner menus for the week.  I love the way it integrates the ingredients into my grocery list. Better yet, I can select the ingredients to add to the list. Very well designed app.

title: Too much fun!
body: I LOVE this app. My boyfriend and I are learning to cook together, and the recipes are easy to follow for us beginners. I also like that we can up the skill level of the recipes as we progress. Plus you can't beat the variety and being able to search recipes by specific ingredients!

title: The best
body: Love‚ù§Ô∏è. You can glance at ingredients and then view the whole recipe plus instructions. Most recipes have multiple reviews which are invaluable. Plus an option to save favorites or ones you want to try. I use it everyday. Absolutely the best recipe app there is; and I've tried many.

title: Great Recipes!
body: This is the best app for recipes that I have found. Great recipes...photos...instructions. It's easy, fun and addicting to organize all of your favorites. Add your own categories too. Also makes shopping easy since you can make your shopping  lists of ingredients right on the app. I love it!

title: Even my husband can use this app!
body: Really enjoy the simplicity of using this app-I used to use

title: Easy, organized, and delicious!
body: I've tried many recipes in that this app and they've all been delicious. The layout very effectively explains amount of servings, nutrition, ingredients, and cooking time. This app is simply made me a better cook. If you're looking for a Nother cookbook on yourself, save the space and download this app!

title: Got a single guy cooking
body: This app has helped me a lot. I had minimal cooking knowledge. I was able to immediately jump into cooking meals for all times of day.

title: Favorite
body: Easy as it gets, only thing I would change is adding a new yumms section so I could have those separate to sort into the other categories. Searching is great on here, still has link to cooking blog so you can read more about recipes...my favorite app.

title: Great app but needs expanded shopping list
body: I love the recipe searches and auto grocery list population!  The only negative is that the only non food item category for the shopping list is "other" which makes you go all over the store if you need to get paper towels and toothpaste.  You should be able to edit your categories.

title: Fun App For Dieters!
body: I'm currently on a low cal, low carb diet, and it's so easy for me to run out of ideas. This app solves that problem without issue!

title: Too soon for a star rating but..,.
body: I got this app for my daughter and SIL because they eat gluten-free and have other dietary restrictions. I entered these in the special diet section but when I search for recipes the results include many recipes that gluten and the other restricted items. What's the point of entering all of those things if the information doesn't screen your recipe options? Am I missing something?

title: Simple recipes
body: My wife and I work long hours, but are trying to find time to cook more. This app has been great for finding simple recipe ideas that don't take too long to prepare at night. The shopping list feature is also great for picking what we need at the grocery.

title: Amazing
body: Love this app. I use it all the time and find delicious options for me and my family. Can look by cuisine or what I have in the house. Either way easy to use and some of the sites it leads you to lead you to other great recipes. I don't think I can live without it or want to try!

title: Like it a lot
body: Like the selection and ideas!

title: Most used resource in my house
body: We love to cook, and love trying new recipes. This app has introduced us to tons of things we might not have found otherwise. And I have even found a few recipes (like chili) where I found one I like better than my old standard one.

title: Tons of recipes at your fingertips!
body: I love that it keeps my food preferences (there are a lot of things I don't eat!) I love that they are all stored in one place and I can keep them organized. I love scrolling through the feed of recipes suggested just for me. Found a lot of great recipes using this app.

title: Pretty simple
body: Took me a while to figure everything out but I love it. Love that I can add my own groceries to my list and not just the ingredients from the recipes I added. I bring my list up on my Apple Watch when I'm shopping. With two little ones having my list on my wrist is awesome.

title: Love love love
body: I'll think of things while out and all I have to do is search a few ingredients I have or search something specific & bam the perfect recipe. I also recommended to my friend who's little boy was just diagnosed as having a gluten allergy. Enter in preferences and you have whatever needs met.

title: Yum!
body: Great app overall. I love that you can filter recipes by foods that you don't want in them. I wish there were a way to call up recipes with just certain ingredients in them (e.g. recipes with tomatoes and jalape√±os), and as others have said a note section with each "yummed" recipe and maybe a rating system too, but AWESOME work so far! I've recommended it to many :)

title: International cookbook!
body: Yummly is an amazing platform for directing what you specifically like as far as meals. It connects to food bloggers around the Internet with anywhere from as far as Syrian dishes to good old fashioned American. The sky is the limit because of its connection. I've used it for months and can't get enough. Say goodbye to the random Google recipe searches, Yummly's got your back!

title: Best food app ever
body: Best food app my wife and I have ever used. Great detail and the pictures show what food should actually look like. Blows Food Network away, doesn't take forever to load and it's not full of advertisements for products and TV shows. Love love love it. Please don't succumb to the advertising!

title: Beautiful & Functional
body: I love how sleek and pretty the app is and being able to filter and search through so many recipes has made it abundantly clear how I can eat with variety and stay healthy. My only issue is how I end up back at the home screen if I'm in the middle of the recipe and my phone locks. Other than that I love, love, love this app.

title: Great app for recipes and shopping list
body: Really like this app for recipes and shopping list. Wish it were a little more intuitive. In the shopping list part of app I wish I could add categories to shopping list. We seem to be  limited to "alcohol, baby food, bakery,...etc". There are other sections of grocery store that are not represented.

title: Inspirational but...
body: I go to this app often for inspiration, when I have an ingredient but can't decide what to do with it. However, with this new update, all my "Yums" were deleted and so now I wish I had written down the recipes I enjoyed.

title: Excellent
body: This app has become my standby for recipes. Rather than just one recipe for a meal, you can view several variations and decide which you would like better. You can create a shopping list from the ingredients, filter for allergies, and specify ingredients in your pantry. Love this app.

title: Amazing
body: I absolutely love this app, it has so many great features. I've started to check it otw him from work to find whatever recipe would work that night for dinner with the ingredients I already had.  The categories of any kind of diet and allergen to select or avoid is amazing too!

title: Handy app
body: Couldnt have found an amazing app but this one! I have been making for 2 weeks recipes from yumly for my husband and me and not only we lost weight but everything is delicious and easy to make. Love this app! All kinds of food is here üòâ

title: The best  food app ever!!!!
body: It's easy to use and gorgeous! This app has mouthwatering recipes that you would want to make. Plus by seeing how many people selected "Yum" you can tell how good it is, or be the first to give it the first yum to let people know how delicious. You can organize your dinners & side dishes too. It's amazing!

title: Very Nice App
body: This app does what it is intended to do. I can search for recipes and store them neatly in the app. I could do the same thing on Pinterest but then I would have to fish through all the other stuff too. This app is quick and easy to use. I have recommended it to friends.

title: Good Resource
body: This app comes in handy to search for recipe ideas. Instead of having to search multiple websites this app does the work for you. Sometimes the search is more limited than I like but it still works. Also, the recommendations can be redundant at times if you already saved a very similar recipe.

title: Nutrition facts...?
body: I have had this app for about a year

title: LOVE IT!
body: I love this app, based on what I like I get other recommendations.  everything looks delicious and easy, and I just skip the sponsored ads because I'm all about being healthy and eating good food and most of the sponsored ones have a bunch of junk in them, but other than that I love this app!

title: Great app, very easy to use!
body: I love this app, I use it every day. I would love to see it expand to a calendar. Where I could create a weekly menu and grocery list. It has a ton of awesome recipes that you can save for yourself. Would highly recommend this app to anybody no matter their diet allergies. Thanks!

title: Could not live without it!
body: Some many good things on this app. My favorite thing is how i can add ingredients to my shopping list on the app and I can still use the same list to add other things even if the recipe is not on the app so no need for a second shopping list.

title: Beautiful app
body: I really like this cooking app!  The app is layed out really well and easy to search.  However, some of the recipes I've put in my "Yums" and/or categorized are not showing up when I go to look at them.  I've tried resetting the app to no avail, this needs to be fixed.  But overall, a very easy app to use with lots of Yummy recipes!!!

title: Love the App!
body: This is my go-to recipe box! Nice variety, ability to filter results based on allergen, and easy filing and searching. My single frustration is having to search again for a recipe I am currently using if the phone times out and locks or if I briefly switch to another app.

title: Easy cooking and good food
body: Recipes are great for beginners and for busy mom and dads always on the go.  Always has something simple and great for any occasion.  There are more complex recipes but generally everything is easy, quick, and inexpensive.  I tell everyone about the app and use it regularly.

title: I use this app almost everyday!
body: I love that this app adjusts to your tastes and has filters to eliminate foods you don't eat or foods you are allergic to. The way the recipes are organized is helpful. You get all the basic information about the recipe before you are taken to the complete recipe.

title: Used to be awesome
body: Would have been 5 stars, but something has changed, and NOT for the better. When I first got this App a couple months ago, I absolutely loved it. It worked great and you could save recipes into your own personal recipe box to retrieve later. But now, it is

title: I love Yummly! It's even better as an app!
body: It's awesome having your fav recipes, and ones you haven't even discovered yet, at your fingertips. Much easier to use the app than the website from a mobile device. Well done, thanks to this app, I cook way more than I used to!

title: Great pictures!
body: I love cookbooks with pictures to show me what it suppose to look like. The site is somewhat user friendly. The recipes are available on different sites so it takes a little to navigate through and the sites aren't all the same so you have to dig through to find it sometimes.

title: Vee
body: Great photos and recipes. Tends to crash after prolonged use and while I love the menu suggestions that are sent via email; it doesn't know that I have the app already when I touch a picture of the recipes and I have to "go fish" for the "Recipe Suggestions." Maybe fix that so a user can access it quickly. üòâ

title: Yummly makes cooking awesome and saves you money
body: Yummly makes cooking way more fun because it provides me with a wide variety of food with many options to narrow down exactly what I want. I am now a genius chef and my girlfriend loves me more than ever. Get this if you want a girlfriend, or boyfriend. Whatever, I love this app.

title: I'm addicted!!!
body: Finding recipes used to be annoying. Going from website to website was NOT fun. Having Yummly makes it so much more efficient. I use it at least three times a week. The suggestions the app gives me are always on point, too!

title: Last update
body: I have been using this app for a long time and, as a personal chef, it was a godsend! However, the way it is set up now....well, it's awful! Clicking on a recipe and getting lots of other choices you have to wade through through is time consuming or it tells you it's no longer available.

title: Too much commercial interference
body: While the recipes are in itself good and accessible. The commercials and interference by 3 parties or parties steering you to their sites makes me often times just Google the recipe I am looking for. The site needs much improvement, including personal saving tab, notes to edit recipes for self use. Memory that goes back to previous recipe

title: Find good food you 2 can make
body: You like food. You like to make food to impress the ladies. This app can make you into that Fabio food crafter your sexy lady friend has been secretly longing for all this time. So what are you waiting for? Download this app already and start improving your love life via food.

title: Frustrated
body: The info is great. Easy and user friendly as far as the recipes go. But the app logs me out every time I get out of it. When I reopen it I must log back in in order to save a recipe, etc. Then it takes me to a login screen, I log in and then it closes! So I cannot use the feature to save recipes for later. I can only search them as a guest. Why won't it leave me logged in?

title: BEST FOOD APP!
body: Tired of your Pinterest getting filled with other junk when you search for recipes? The YUMMLY app will make you recipe hunting a breeze! User friendly interface makes it easy to search, learn and store your favorite and new recipes! SERIOUS GAME CHANGER!!...I now feel like I belong on the Food Network! HAHAüëç

title: Wonderful app
body: Love the layout and photos of food. I also enjoy how many sights it pulls recipes from. My only complaint is that in order to view directions for the recipe  from some sites, you have to become a member first. All things associated with yummly has been pleasant.

title: Gorgeous and easy to use
body: Doesn't really have a feature for adding your own recipes (or I haven't found it?) and it would be cool if you could browse by more categories--as it is, you just get a recommended list. But it's fine the way it is too

title: The only recipe app I use
body: They've just been so far ahead of others from the beginning when it comes to usability and they showcase the food with beautiful pictures. I love the recommendations too. I have other recipe apps but don't even use them anymore!

title: Download this app!
body: Absolutely love this app. Great recipes and so many to chose from. My favorite part is I can type in a food item that I'm looking to get out of my fridge and it gives me a list of meals to make with it. And it's full of vegetarian recipes too! Can't recommend this app enough.

title: No Logic & Too Many Ads
body: Logic issues in the flow of this app. If you leave a recipe open and come back, POOF, it's gone! Also, when you open a recipe, people want to see the ingredients AND the instructions without having to click extra buttons. Then, a million ads pop-up. Half the page with ads is overkill! I don't need to go shopping for everything on the ingredients list. 85% of them you should already have!

title: Yummy Yummly!
body: This app is awesome as I have tried so many new foods due to this app! No matter what you're in the mood for, sweet tooth, healthy bites, down home cooking or Thai food, Yummly had a recipe for you. And don't fret about missing ingredients because you can make a grocery list for the recipe. This app is so awesome. Oops I said that already! üòÅ

title: Mary N
body: It's quickly accessible, and has A LOT of great recipes that are easy to follow. You can get as gourmet or as novice as you'd like. I refer to it often with our busy schedules. It's great that you can rate your own recipes and save only those you would consider making again. Great app!

title: Love the Settings
body: I love that I can choose the level of difficulty, my favorite foods, what I'm allergic to, and any diet restrictions!

title: Love his app!
body: I've started dieting 70 days ago and it was starting to get harder to come up with new recipes until I found this app.  I recommend to anyone that is trying to change their lifestyle in eating.  Or like me looking for new ideas to keep your new life changing eating habits.

title: Awesome and free
body: There really isn't much you can complain about when you get a quality app for free. Only thing I might suggest is editing the format of the recipes bc the font and stuff is sometimes hard to read while I'm multitasking between reading and cooking.

title: Yummy
body: I found this app. out of desperation to help me come up with a recipe for my take on apple pie. I got some great ideas. Now I use it for home meals when I need to come up with "Mom what's for eats". Since summer started and the heat is just relentless I've also enjoyed using it to help me come up with some cooling smoothie ideas YUMMY!!!üòä

title: Cool
body: This is a great app for households that have a lot of dietary restrictions.  If I had any suggestions it would just be to add more diet plans -- high protein, for instance.

title: So close to being the perfect app
body: The customizable criteria is perfect for all of my diet restrictions! The only problem, and it's kind of silly, is that I wish there was a bigger variety of recipes. For example, I was looking for some classic Hispanic dishes and there were few variations of the same dessert and some just didn't come up at all.

title: Great app
body: I often turn to this app for some ideas mostly for dinner. It's very easy to navigate, my only complaint is that the recipe results can be quite redundant at times, and I wish there was an option to search 2-3 ingredients and have matching results, rather than the title of the recipe. I must stress this is still my favorite recipe app!!

title: Open in Safari, please?
body: I love this app, but the review feature bumped the ability to open recipes in Safari. I do a number of things with Safari, like using it to put recipes into my favorite grocery shopping app. Pleas bring back the ability to open a recipe in Safari or add it to the share menu

title: I'll be fat if I keep using this app!
body: I've downloaded many recipe apps but this is by far the best. I've had it for 2 days and have already cooked 4 recipes. It has everything you could imagine. It's also super easy to use and has many dietary filters.

title: I hate this app!
body: Won't let me log in through Google (because button doesn't enable) and then couldn't navigate back to find a recipe I wanted to try that was the last thing on the screen before trying to log in. Searching didn't turn it up either. Lousy app; don't bother to download.

title: Best food app I've used!
body: I love that you can look at all different kinds of recipes and see what is different from one to another! I love that it also has a filter that has dietary preferences or to stay away from certain foods! It also suggests recipes you might love!

title: Deliciousness At Your Fingertips!
body: I absolutely love Yummly!! The layout is great and the recipes are abundant!!  Everything that I have tried has been a huge THUMBS-UP with my family! Having the convenience of this app while at the grocery store is priceless!! Try it... You won't be disappointed!!

title: What I've been looking for all along
body: This is the app that I needed for inspiration but never knew I needed. The pictures make everything look delightful and serve as wonderful motivation for making a 5-star dish every night. Whoever thought to create this app is a genius, and I am indebted to him/her.

title: Changed what I expected from recipe apps
body: The pictures and the menu options alone put this app above the rest.  I love how they actually curate the recipes and take you directly to the internet source of the recipe.  It would be even better if one could directly pin the recipes to Pinterest or Pepperplate or even an offline viewer.

title: Love this App!
body: I absolutely love this app! It gives me so many options from my norm. Especially when it comes to chicken. I didn't rate it a 5 star because it slows up a little too often and freezes on occasion. Also some of the recipes require you to go through two more websites before u get the directions.

title: Best app! Will use daily.
body: This app is the best! Type in an ingredient and get an extensive list of delish recipes and reviews. I will use this everyday to spice up my menu. If you are tired of making the same things try this app and get inspired to try new recipes. Pictures are gorgeous. Easy to use.

title: One of the Best Cooking Apps
body: I've had many cookings papa and out of the dozen or so I've tried I liked this one the best. It takes recipes from all kinds of places so there is a nice balance of fancy and simple dishes. Also the filters for searches are very helpful and has lots of options.

title: A must have app
body: Absolutely Best App Ever

title: Repetitive recipes
body: This app seems great at first: very customizable and aesthetically pleasing. The problem is that I see the same recipes in every category. Where is the variety? Another thing is that if you click on a certain category, like vegan, it'll just give you a bunch of drinks. Yeah, they're technically vegan, but I'm looking for food. It's the same with certain ethnic cuisines. Annoying.

title: Endless Recipes
body: This app has a lot of recipes. You can search recipes based on main ingredients which is quite useful. The variety of ingredients is quite awesome. I've tried new recipes that have introduced me to a new family meal which is perfect since I'm always looking to make something out of the ordinary.

title: Frustrated
body: I used to use this site several times a week, if not more, either for recipes or ideas.  Lately however it is nearly impossible to access directions to the recipes so I'm using it far less often and will probably discontinue altogether.  Extremely time-consuming and frustrating."

title: Pass On this App
body: Downloaded app and signed up/in. Few days later I received an email from them about cauliflower breadsticks, which looked good, so I clicked it to open in the app to see the actual recipe and all the App did repeatedly, four times, was open up the App Store to a casino app to download. After a few attempts, I was able to access the settings section of the app and signed out. It then asked me to rate it...big mistake! Junk app with way too many bugs and redirects to unwanted apps.

title: Good, but could be great!!
body: Yummly is loaded with content. But, there are some items that REALLY needs work.

title: Love this app!
body: Great to-to for me when I need a quick idea about what to make & no more digging through the World Wide Web and bad search engine results. I only wish the app would stop crashing every now & then, which is usually in the middle of my cooking

title: Use it more than I thought
body: This is a great app for me all though I haven't used any other recipe app. Easy to navigate and all my dishes have come out delicious and looking great. I've been able to up my cooking skill level as well. Won't be deleting this anytime soon.

title: Not a single thing wrong with this app.
body: I love cooking and this app not only provides me with an astounding number of recipes, but also allows me to sort and collect the ones I like and want to try. Absolutely worth it downloading, you will not be disappointed!

title: Go to app for meal planning
body: So many great features! One annoying thing is that the recipes don't stay open if the phone goes to sleep, however, I think that encourages users to open the recipe in safari and I assume it's better for the recipe authors to get visits to their websites.

title: Best recipe search engine
body: Yummly asks you for your diet preferences in the very beginning. I didn't think much of this at first, but being a gluten free cook, I'm always on the lookout for tasty GF recipes. Yummly ONLY shows me GF recipes which is AWESOME because weeding out the gluten-full recipes can be a pain. I use Yummly now for my go-to recipe search.

title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
body: My husband and I have this app on our phones.  Whoever is going to the grocery store, has the list.  We have made a Costco list, too.  It is user friendly and requires very little setup. You can add to list even when one person is at the store and it will "pop up."

title: Useless update
body: This used to be my favorite app but now with all the changes with the new update the recipes often stop loading. Or if I do manage to find one I like I try to read the directions and the page will refresh and send me back up to the top. That makes it so I can't even read the directions. This happens over and over until I finally give up. I LOVE the recipes on this app, I love the search, and the categories, but what good is any of that if it can't be utilized?

title: Lifesaver!
body: I absolutely looooove Yummly. When I had to go dairy free for my son I had no idea what to cook for dinner anymore and I was starting to lose creativity. Thanks to their app's ability to filter out food by skill level, food preferences, and dietary/allergy needs I was able to get my groove back in the kitchen!

title: Best source for recipes
body: Yummly is my go-to source for finding recipes. I used to use another popular website to find recipes, but after several failed attempts I decided to make the switch to Yummly. Every meal is more scrumptious than the last!

title: Pawherbst
body: Incredible site!  I came across it several weeks ago and have already tried several recipes with great results.  It searches a LOT of sites to come up with an amazing assortment of recipes. This has quickly become me favorite food site!

title: Wonderful!
body: This app makes cooking easier and FUN! It has lifted my spirit on telling myself that I CAN cook. There are varieties of cuisine for everyone. From meat eaters, vegetarian to complete vegan! It is amazing. So easy to use. I love that you can customize your diet habits and it shows you recipes for those requirements only! #YummlyisAmazing

title: It doesn't work anymore!!!
body: I upgraded my phone in July to a 6 Plus from a 5S and not only did it delete all of my lists, but it also stopped working all together. It would only crash and crash and crash. You have no idea how frustrated I am with this because I loved this app. I loved everything about this app. I have tried deleting it and redownloading but it didn't work. This newest update said that there would be 6 and 6+ compatibility but alas it still doesn't work!

title: Very helpful app
body: Love this app! Especially the recipe to shopping list feature. It is a huge timesaver. The pictures are especially helpful and the social media integration is appreciated. It would be great if you could add a feature that allows Yummly "friends" to share recipes.

title: Very Helpful
body: I mostly use the shopping list portion. Would have given more stars except it could use more categories. I.e. Canned goods so I don't have to put canned corn under vegetables. The recipe part is good except sometimes the recipe won't load because it is connected to a website. Particularly annoying when it's one you've used before and want to use again.

title: Great App
body: I have tried several recipe idea apps over the past couple of years and Yummly has consistently suggested great recipe ideas.  And the email suggestions are not clutter. I do not instantly delete them because they have great suggestions in them as well.

title: My go to place for meal planning
body: Great app for when you want to try something new or when you've had a request for something specific and need a recipe. Also great for planning a special menu. It's my go to place when I need to get inspiration.

title: A-
body: Would like it to make suggestions more diverse. If you like 1 recipe, then it always suggests the same dish. I've pretty much seen most of that specific dish, that's why I selected it.  Now show me others recipes I might be interested in. Example: I liked a "rib" recipe after tons of research in the app, then later it suggests noting but "rib" recipes to try. Dude?

title: Many recipes all in one app
body: Yummly is easy to use, and has access to thousands of free recipes. You can save recipes locally to your profile, which makes personalizing easy. I highly recommend this app if you often struggle to figure out what's for dinner.

title: My new favorite food app!
body: It is well designed and easy to use. I love the pictures that go with the recipes also. I tried my first recipe tonight and it was given five stars by my family. I will definitely use this wonderful app again and again!

title: Creative easy recipes & beautiful pics
body: I'm so happy I found this app. It's easier to use than other food apps. See a recipe you like and in one tap it is saved to your favorite recipes. This will be useful when trying to think of meals to cook for the week.

title: Pretty good
body: I love having a recipe app on my phone for quick reference. I do have a suggestion: When we add something to our yums, we should be able to add notes to it. I made something recently but made some adjustments and didn't want to forget next time but there wasn't anywhere to make notes!!

title: Best Recipe/Cooking App - Hands Down
body: Fresh, unique ideas to cook. Most of them are super easy to do and dot take much time, but taste sooooo good!

title: Fantastic & Fun
body: I use this app almost too much. You can filter recipes to work with your diet/ nutritional needs and it finds many interesting ideas. I also love the shopping list, you can add your own needs as well as things from the recipes you've "yummed"

title: More appetizing
body: It's just more appetizing than EVERY other recipe/cooking app...

title: Good, but needs one thing...
body: I love the app and use it frequently, but I always end up going to their website instead to further customize a recipe I'm trying to find. I cannot find where one can "add an ingredient" to their recipe search on the app. If Yummly had this on their app, I'd be more likely to use it more often.

title: Best Food App??!!
body: I personally think this is one of the best food Apps for iOS today to date. It is a great companion app for the website and also as a standalone app. I'm young and I'm making a real effort to try to eat healthy and this app makes finding recipes for nutrition easy. Give it a Try, it's Free!

title: Cooking newbie
body: This is perfect for a college kid on a budget with strict dietary needs! I am gluten-free and a vegetarian and it is my first year living in an apartment/cooking on my own. This app enables me to come up with yummy and creative dishes that my friends can enjoy as well, the instructions come with all the ingredients you need so cooking is no rocket science! I LOVE this app!!!

title: Vegan friendly!
body: As a newer member of the vegan community, I was at somewhat of a loss at the kind of meals I could have that were not only meatless but dairy free. This app has been insanely helpful and I couldn't imagine some of the creative vegan recipes they have. I also LOVE the idea of savings meals in different groups

title: App makes discovering new recipes so fun!
body: I downloaded the app & within seconds it was showing me so many delicious recipes! I've used Yummly for a while now & love the site. Now I'm loving it even more since I can give up my paper shopping list today & replace it with this app!

title: Like, but...
body: Like the ap a lot but:

title: Awesome App!!
body: Whatever recipe I want to look for, this app has it! It is very easy and convenient for me to use, and searching for recipes is easy as pie. I would highly recommend this app for anyone who likes cooking and is tired of the same old food day in and day out!

title: Useful and intuitive
body: This app is completely worthwhile--it's layout and overall user experience is much phone-friendlier than using the browser site. The shopping list function in particular has proved useful.

title: The best recipe app
body: I love this app. It's great for clipping recipes you find on the web. It's great at suggesting recipes. It displays the recipes beautiful. Searching works perfectly. And best of all, it asks you for your dietary preferences and then 100% respects your choice, NEVER showing you things you don't want to see. Yummly FTW.

title: Convenient, varied, beautiful
body: Not only is there a nearly endless selection of recipes, but they're presented in an aesthetically pleasing way and it's easy to navigate the app and save things you like. This app makes me hungry all the time, and it's given me the courage to try to make new foods.

title: Love this!!
body: I am so glad I found this app. Seriously so cool and so customizable. Although, I am on a iPhone 6s Plus, things are a little stretched out on the app and doesn't seem to really fit that well but it's not that big of a deal. Will be recommending to friends and family :)

title: Love to cook
body: I love love love this app. Actually cooking the foods and having my family try them has been a blessing for me to give to them. I especially like the different recipes that I can pick from and if I don't like one I still have others to choose from!

title: Changing my cooking
body: Changing my diet and really just trying to eat better. Found this app and it is making it easy for me to find alternative tasty easy healthy recipes. This 30 day challenge I started will turn into a life changing diet thanks in part to Yummly

title: My go to idea/recipe app
body: I love scrolling through this app for ideas. Pictures are helpful in catching my eye with something I'm craving. I can just input an ingredient I have, and work with that to start. Useful when preparing the dish; love that some people post their variations to try as well.

title: Needs work
body: This app is really great looking. But my shopping list is never saved. Every time I turn my screen off on my phone the app insta-crashes forcing me to reload my shopping list.

title: Umm
body: Beautiful app with pretty pictures and it's fairly intuitive to use, and I'd give it high marks if not for one HUGE problem. You have to click on the recipe to see its full title. Stupid and inefficient. There's definitely room. Instead you end up scrutinizing the photos, trying to figure out if that darkish splotch is something you like or something you hate. All the pix means it doesn't load super fast, so that back and forth is very irritating.

title: Love the organization!
body: Great app for recipes. Love being able to organize my favorites and as vegan, I love being able to go ahead and set that as a filter. Also like that it's is broken down into ingredients, nutrition and directions. My new favorite app to pass the time.

title: A lot of interesting recipes!
body: Love the diversity of recipes. I have been looking for more recipes featuring vegetables in various ways and the website did not disappoint. My only complaint, and it is minor, that sometimes the links to the various websites housing the recipes don't work.  It is rare, but it has happened to me 2‚Äì3 times.

title: Love this app
body: Such a great app. Does everything that I want it to do. Great search functionality, simple and easy interface, and even a shopping cart function that aggregates all of the ingredients from the  recipes that you use into one list. 5 star, 100%

title: Love, love, love!!!
body: Since I switched my diet, excluding gluten, dairy and meat I've been stumped on what to make. Now I just type in an ingredient and an hour later dinner is on the table. Definitely takes the stress out of what to cook or if I need to substitute an ingredient or want to make from scratch. Keep up this amazing app!!

title: Awesome App
body: I've been using this app for a few months and it's my go to for all things paleo, gluten and sugar free! I've found so many great recipes that I either leave as is or make a few changes to depending on what I have on hand. Thanks for making life easier Yummly!!!

title: Love it!
body: Excellent tool. Every time that I'm in a hurry for something different, new, easy, I always find my answer using this app.   They use products easy to find, the instructions are very friendly and the pictures invite to try the dishes.

title: Great resource
body: Love this app and website. Great resource for inspiration. Really great suggestions based on profile preferences.

title: Rocket
body: This is my go to site for recipe ideas.  I like the suggestions that other's have made, and knowing the number of people that have made the recipe.  The app is easy to use and has a huge variety of recipes. Highly recommend it.

title: Amazing!
body: I absolutely love this app, I've showed it to all my friends and now they love it too. It's so simple and they always have so many recipes to go with what you type in. You're able to save your "Yums" into categories as you would in your recipe box. Amazing! Love it!

title: Wonderful!!
body: This app is so wonderful to use!!! Love finding new recipes and especially healthy ones. Great to see them coming from different blogs that have done the recipes and for them sharing! You will not be disappointed getting this app!

title: Needs to be a LOT better
body: On first use, this app is actually pretty good. You can search for recipes and add ingredients to a shopping list. But the dietary preferences are limiting and don't offer many choices. I tried searching for cauliflower Mac and cheese recipe. There are a ton of recipes out there but this app couldn't find even one! That's ridiculous! And I could barely find any recipes for LCHF. If they could allow importing of recipes from the web and meal planning this app would be a much better.

title: I absolutely LOVE it!!!
body: 1. I love the high definition image quality.  Makes it look SO delicious.

title: Best recipe app so far
body: I like the shopping list and the suggestions that come up. It takes a while to figure some features out, like how to edit an ingredient on the shopping list, but give it time and it really is user friendly.

title: Love love love this app
body: I have used numerous recipes from Yummly and am in love with the ease!  I love that it lists number of ingredients before I even open the recipe because I do 10 or less ingredients only!  Also, it's so easy to change the number of servings, and make a grocery list!

title: My favorite recipe app
body: This is my favorite place to find clean recipes. There's so many paleo, gluten free, high protein, and whole food recipes to choose from and save.

title: Love!
body: This is an efficient app, combining the best of what the online recipe community offers. I wish I'd get new recipes more often, as they often recycle the same old ones over and over. Hey folks! If I haven't "yummed" it and I've seen it four times, I'm probably not going to! But aside from that, very convenient and useful. A favorite of mine.

title: The best app for recipes hands down!
body: I consider to be a shabby cooker (not a professional one though), but cooking for a family of 3 sometimes has its limits. But thanks to this app I can cook from a variety of selections from Asian to Spanish plates in a matter of 30 minutes. Just love this app!

title: Highly recommend
body: I love this app. I search and read recipes daily. I'm very inspired by the variations of common comfort foods.  I also like the search because you can list items you have on hand and find recipes to use them in a new way.

title: Time saver!!!
body: I am loving this app and am wondering why I never stumbled upon it earlier!!!  Meals at my house will be more creative now that I've got a decent selection of recipes mixed in with inspirational photos all at my fingertips!  And grocery shopping will be so much more efficient as well. Genius!!!

title: Awesome!
body: The most bestest, awesomest, unbeatablest, comprehensivest, and coolest app! If only it would provide pictures of ingredients as it is hard to identify sometimes the herbs, cuts, legimes, etc AND if recipe directions would be in uniform style without taking you to different sites - it would be most unbelievablest!

title: Fabulous App
body: This is a great app for so many reasons!

title: New cookers
body: This is a great app

title: This app is dope
body: I'm a 23 year old bachelor and this app helps me cook for all the hot chicks I bring over (2 this year). I cook like Wolfgang Puck when I'm prepping for the beautiful women that come over. And on football Sunday all my bros come over and we eat 5 star dishes like the pros we watch. I highly recommend!!!!

title: Wonderful app for great cooking ideas!
body: I use it weekly when I've got some food and I don't know what yo do with it. It's easy to use and works very well. I highly recommend it to anyone that just needs a few good ideas and is comfortable around the kitchen.

title: Bad programming changes
body: Generally, I love this app. However, it's suffers from programming issues. In the newest version on the computer you can no longer search your recipe box. Ridiculous!  I have over 200 recipes saved and no way to search them. Yummly knows about the problem but it will likely take months to fix. Pretty sad they can't get their act together and maintain the functionality.

title: My fav go to!!!!
body: I love this app.  I can find any kind of recipe on here.  I just have one issue, all of a sudden, I can't open the app on my phone...is there some kind of problem with it????   I love this app & I need one of my yums recipes. It just keeps kicking me back to my phone menu.   PMEASE fix it ASAP!!!

title: Awesome recipe app!
body: Awesome app that gives all types of recipes & allows you to search by particular ingredients, specific item, or easy quick/healthy recipes ! Food comes out tasty and much faster than searching the internet for recipes.

title: It's Awesome!
body: I love this app! I'm new to the whole cooking for myself by myself thing and this app has helped me learn to do basic recipes and not so basic recipes with ease. It shows that there are lots of things you can do with what's in your cabinet. So many ways to cook a chicken! üòçüòç

title: Love this app!
body: Love this app because of the extremely large variety of recipes on here.. (ANYTHING you can think of times hundreds of variations of it), the great photos they have posted w each recipe and the easy to use design. I also love how you can now sort your "Yums." Great app!

title: Perfect app
body: This app works so well wether you're cooking, baking, or grocery shopping. It covers so many recipes from many different sights including light or low fat selections. And the shopping list is perfect for me because I always leave my paper list at home! Thanks!!

title: Love this app.
body: I'm really enjoying cooking these days. One of the best features is the grocery list. Also, I have other food and recipe apps but not all have photos (if I've never made the dish I want to know what it looks like). Lastly,  I enjoy the recipe reviews because it's here where you find modifications to the recipes. Love this app.

title: Real helpful
body: Great app, I find easy and interesting recipes and have since learned how to make rice.  Gives you the calories and ingredient count which saves a lot of time when I browse through the recipes.  Would recommend to anyone

title: If You Cook, You WANT This App ‚Ä¶
body: This app is amazingly good at searching the Web to find new, tasty and intriguing recipes. It learns and adapts to your preferences to locate what you want when you want. The pictures of each dish provide a feast for the eyes that match the palate. Highly recommended!

title: I LOVE YUMMLY!!!!!!
body: This is one of my favorite Apps! So easy to use, love that I can find, organize and use recipes- along w seeing what other people rated it, as well as comments on how to change the recipe one way or another! When referencing a meal I cooked, I talk about Yummly side by side w any recipe or food!

title: Love it~
body: They have very delicious recipes, the app is very convenient to use, and most of the recipes have a plethora of reviews for accurate quality. Their recommendations are usually spot on too, so sometimes you don't even have to search for a brilliant recipe

title: Great App for Anyone Who Loves to Cook
body: I love using this app to find recipes. I have yet to look something up and not find a recipe. The results are not what you will find anywhere else and are all from high quality sources. If I come up empty on Google, this is the place to go.

title: A must have app
body: Absolutely love this app. Even so I am a chef myself, sometimes I come home don't know what to cook. Open frig and look what I have and " search the app with that ingredient " and so many possibilities.  Even so I put my own twist on everything it's always delicious.

title: Love this app
body: Have made many delicious meals from here some are keepers n others weren't ( picky kids). Our favorites include crab rangoon dip, orange chicken, stuffed shells and many others. Easy to follow recipes n tells u exactly what u need. Follow the instructions and u will not fail. This app is great. Use it all the time.

title: Best recipe app I've used
body: I have tried a few recipe apps and decided I prefer searching the web. Apps just didn't do it for me. That is, until Yummly. I used 2 recipes today and loved them both!!  I love everything I have tried about Yum. Thanks for this great app

title: Awesome app
body: There is nothing better than an app with great usability. This is has all the features I love. Easy to search, easy to shop w recipes and ingredients, well documented recipes and an easy way to manage your food intake and calories. Only negative is sometimes the links don't open in new windows.

title: It keeps Ideas Fresh
body: I've been in inventive and relatively progressive kitchens, as are many of my friends, and this is great when you need a little inspiration. As with most recipes, I usually do my own version of the recipeI find and then I have a new, OG recipe. Anyway, this is great for pros and ams alike üôè

title: such a HUGE help!
body: My favorite feature about yummly is that you can select/deselect ingredients for the recipe you're searching.  Sometimes I have everything on hand for pancakes and when I don't, I know yummly will come thru with some delicious options.

title: The best app ever
body: I've got a food allergy to both milk and eggs and yummly has amazing great recipes that don't have either of those ingredients added and also you can change the serving size and it will account for it in how much to put in your recipes.

title: Can't live without it!!!!!!
body: Cannot say enough about how easy this app is to use & how often it comes in handy for preparing meals from easy with few ingredients to vegetarian to  complex and detailed recipes. We use this almost every night

title: The best app ever.
body: I recommend this app to every single person I meet. I love to cook with this app. I myself am a vegan and it's constantly feeding me awesome new recipes!! I love that it has a built in grocery list that you can add things to. It's super well organized and very well done. Round of applause.

title: Great for beginners
body: I am new to cooking and this app has really helped me find new recipes to try. Everything I've made has come out great the directions are easy to follow. The app is super simple to you there is a recipe available for jest about everything.

title: Amazing!
body: This is a really great app, I really enjoy how you give personal preferences and it will show you food you would enjoy. Since I have a large family, making dinners can be difficult but this makes it much easier. Love!

title: Very useful
body: I like the search function for this app so you can search by ingredients pretty easily.  I also like the calorie breakdown how it lists the ingredients in the beginning so you have a preview before you look at the recipe.

title: Love yummly!!!
body: Yummly is the best place to find recipes, it takes just seconds to find a recipe to either match your ingredients, or any recipe you want to find. Don't know what you want? Yummly does. Yum things and it will give you suggestions based off of your choices!

title: Yummly is Awesome
body: I love this site! From the pictures to the categories! It is very easy to navigate too. They have great recipe ideas. It helps to know I can find something when I open the app!! I even got my mom started on it!She happens to enjoy this site too!!

title: Great app
body: If I have something I want to use in my fridge, I can do a quick search for the ingredient and find a fast, healthy meal I can make when I get home after a long day of work...or look at pictures of delicious food while at work

title: Great app
body: Love this app so much. It's so easy to look up recipes and make them. In the few months I have had this app I have looked up and made over 50 different recipes. I highly recommend this to everyone from beginner cooks to advanced ones .

title: Great App
body: I love this app! As an avid cook this app is my go to menu creator! 1 thing I would like to see is where you could enter what ingredients you have available and the app make suggestions based on that data. Other than that this app is as near to perfect as it could be. I wish I could give it 4.5 stars!

title: Best and most visited app i have
body: I love the large variety of all kinds of recipes I now have access too and the how well organized it is set up!! I also really like the the option of organizing my favorite recipes into saved categories.

title: Love Yummly!!!
body: I had followed a similar website a while ago, which mysteriously got taken down. I was so happy when I found Yummly! It is amazing. It is so easy to search for the exact recipe you want, and then easily add the ingredients to a "grocery list" within the app!

title: Grand-excellent cooking app!!‚úÖüòÄ
body: I really this app a lot. It helps me get new ideas on what to prep for dinner/menu for the day or week.  Only thing is that, depending on the recipe- when clicking on the directions, it goes to another website. Which maybe they can improve on instead of this route.

title: Truly Yummy
body: Loving this app! Lots and lots of great recipes from many sources. The app itself is easy to navigate and allows you to search for specific recipes or search for new ideas when you really don't know what to make for dinner.

title: Awesome App
body: You can create filters if you want recipes with no cheese, etc. I love this app. It's really organized and is a great way to get better at cooking, but also for those that have been cooking for years and just want to try a different recipe.

title: A Must Have Recipe App For Foodies
body: I love this app. It's the first of its kind that lets you customize the type of recipes that you see based on you likes, eating style, and cooking abilities. I have and will continue to recommend this to anyone with even the smallest interesting in cooking!

title: Have Only Had It For 10 Minutes
body: Like the title suggests I've only had this app for 10 minutes and I already love it. This is my second time ever reviewing something so you know it's good. I highly recommend this to anyone who enjoys eating. So everyone.

title: Great food inspiration
body: I used to swear by Pinterest, but for recipes yummly is the absolute best. No dead links and spam, no single link duplicated a million times. Just awesome recipes linked from different sites and food blogs. Not to mention they help you build a shopping list.

title: My "go to" app for recipes
body: My "go to" app for recipes when I want to try something new or can't find my recipe. There are recipes from down home meat and potatoes to gourmet; easy to expert; crock pot, vegan, gluten free, paleo, fat free, vegetarian, "back of the box", etc. If you can't find it on Yummly, it doesn't exist.

title: Yum Yum Yummly!
body: I absolutely love this app. I find myself going to this app to find dinner ideas when I'm just plan sick of cooking the same old things. I also pull this app up when I'm being just a tad bit lazy and don't want to run to the store to pick up any thing. üëçüèæüëçüèæüëçüèæüëçüèæ

title: Two Thumbs Up
body: Always really liked this app, the recipes are great and I love having things suggested in the feed. Only problem is that it doesn't always save my dietary preferences, so I keep seeing recipes heavily involving, say, tomatoes but I can't eat them. Not a huge problem but a little annoying.

title: Great app!!
body: I LOVE this app! It's my "go to" when I want to try out new recipes or change up ones I already make. I have one request though - can you add a "favorites" button so the recipes that I've made can be accessed easily? Thanks for doing a great job!

title: Nice overall
body: App itself is great for finding recipes and then adding to your grocery list. Super easy.

title: Blown Away
body: Fantastic in almost every way. You can tell they spent real money on the design and execution of this app. Well thought out and beautiful to use. I'm impressed and I hate almost everything. Still hate the name Yummly but I'm over it. This app is too good.

title: This is my go-to app
body: I love Yummly! Probably not a day goes by that I don't use this excellent app. I love to be able to search for some ingredient I want to use and find so many amazing recipes. I seldom use my vast cookbook collection any more because this is so much better!

title: Wow!
body: This is exactly what I've been looking for! I love the pictures, the number of ingredients, the instructions, how you can organize and most of all, the calorie counts. It's easy to find exactly what you're looking for. I recommend this app to everyone who loves to cook!

title: Yummly is awesome!
body: I absolutely love this app. It has beautiful pictures of recipes. The search engine on it works wonderfully. It has great ways to organize everything you want to save. You can also read reviews on all of the recipes.

title: Extensive Recipe Selection
body: Yummly has a huge selection of recipes from a variety of sources. Searching for recipes that use a particular food item is easy and often have many options.

title: Review
body: I thought maybe if I wrote this review that they would stop asking me to write a review. We'll see.

title: THIS IS MY FAVORITE APP
body: This app is Awesome!! I love it. I just started using it and realized I can't put it down. I'm cooking Grand Meals for my love ones. Breakfast isn't boring anymore. Now I'm the breakfast King! And DINNER!!! Dinner is a Epic Challenge every night. My wife loves it. More like loves the fact she's been NOT cooking for the past Week and a Half!! üëçüëç‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

title: Awesome app!!
body: I can't tell you how many times I've used this app to find a recipe quick either for a meal I'm planning or on a whim.  The pics of the dishes really make the recipes quite enticing to try.  Thank you!!   I recommend this to all my friends who cook at home!

title: My savior
body: This app saves me a few nights a week when just needing new ideas for supper! I've got a few friends hooked on it as well. Helps me find cooking sites I would have no other exposure to. Truly a part of my daily routine. Love the new partnership with instacart!

title: Extremely Useful and Interesting
body: Always looking to cook something new. This app really guides you through recipes so you can cook something exactly how it should be. Tons of amazing recipes. The app is better with the new update- more recipes!!

title: A Must!
body: Ever get sick of the same-old, same-old?

title: Best cooking app around that's FREE!!!!!
body: I really like this app. If I want to try something different and can't find a certain product the app will help me find the stores in my area that sells it. OMG the drinks the drink I have made so many different drinks I had to go out a buy a fancier blender. I love this app.

title: Best app ever
body: This changed my life completely I love it! I have gluten free and fat free diet because I have GERD and lots of headaches and I was tired of trying to change my life with a diet I thought was impossible! But then I came across this app on the Internet and it was the best app ever it changed my life!

title: Awesome
body: This app has been awesome! Not only have I been able to find recipes that are from my own memories (living at home), but it has helped me expand what I know about cooking different cuisines! The shopping cart list has been great, too!

title: Best recipe app of all! Really.
body: I use this app more than any other cooking app and I have them all. There are so many choices. The app is also very easy to use including saving your favorites. There is a recipe for everything and everyone in this app.

title: Yummly
body: I've used Yummly for a couple of years now and have yet to be disappointed. Type in just one ingredient you have on hand and get loads of different recipes to try. It's that simple. I've  recommended it to everyone I know. It's my go to!

title: Best App
body: I have more than 100 apps on my phone and Yummly, by far, is my favorite!  It's so well-designed and easy to use. When some apps get this good, they're often tweaked over and over till, finally, they're ruined. Please leave it alone :-)

title: Dinner made easy
body: My go to app for weekly dinner planning- recipes and shopping list in one app!!! Makes healthy eating easy.

title: Indispensible
body: I don't ever write reviews, but this is one of my favorite apps. It works smoothly, quickly, and has lots of content. I've tried many recipes that were excellent, and saved many that I have yet to try. Thank you!

title: Menu planning
body: I love that it's easy to find and save all those great recipes you see on Facebook, and then assign them to a day in my menu plan. Best of all is the link to Google calendar so on that day it's super easy to find the recipe and actually make it!

title: My savior
body: Being avid cook I'm always looking for new ideas. This app has become my daily search and it is awesome. I cook something from here almost daily. If you are looking for simplicity and like pictures you will love this app

title: Love ‚ù§Ô∏è Yummly
body: I've been using this app for over a year and it's my go to app for recipes I love seeing the pictures for the recipe it helps so I can see if it's the recipe I want to try I also have recommended this app to many of my friends and they love it also

title: Functional app, EXCEPT when it's not
body: I love the layout, search feature, filter options, & overall functionality of this app.

title: Doesn't get any better
body: Yummly is the best cooking app ever and that's simply all there is to it! Try it out yourself and I can undoubtedly say you will not be disappointed. Not to mention I am completely inept at cooking and this app makes me feel like a professional chef!

title: Just FAB!
body: I was apprehensive initially about putting any faith into a food app but after seeing how easy it was to navigate I was hooked!  The photos are great, the recipes are easy and very tasty - the whole experience was fun!  I love just thumbing through it and figuring out what to cook next.

title: LOVE
body: I really like this app. I can cruise through the recipes and glimpse at the number of ingredients and the amount of time it takes without having to read the entire recipe. It makes looking for recipes quick and easy.

title: Nearly perfect app
body: I use Yummly all the time for cooking and baking inspiration. I'm a complete novice but using Yummly has really made me excited to cook and bake for my family on a regular basis. Great app! I would like to have the ability to add comments or modifications to recipes I've tried etc. other than that nearly perfect.

title: THE BEST FOOD APP EVER!!!
body: I truly use this app just about every night for dinner!  If I know I am going to make chicken, I just search the app for "chicken" and end up with so many great ideas.  And I love how the recipes are rated...you know if thousands of users have "yummed" a recipe, then you know it will be great!

title: The Best
body: Yummly is simply the best good app available.  We have 7 kids and do a lot of home cooking.  Always fresh new ideas, the recipes are accurate in their prep time and a huge selection.  All this makes using Yummly simply and fun when feeding our crew!

title: I love it!
body: Provides a great variety of recipes that you can easily find by searching a few ingredients. All the recipes I have tried have been very good from the simple to the more involved. It is my go to for recipes and ideas.

title: Recipe genius
body: An amazing app that allows me to type in basic ingredients and give me multiple different recipes using those ingredients. Love the numerous options I get for some of the things I can put in. Would recommend this app to anybody.

title: Love this app !
body: I love this app and cook from it almost every night.

title: Forcing people to download your app is shady and pathetic
body: As a consumer, I hate it when businesses force people to do things that's completely UNNECESSARY! I tried to get a recipe on the Yummly site from my mobile device.

title: Sleek Design
body: The design of this app is definitely more unique and organized than other apps but my only problem is that sometimes it takes a while for your favorited recipes to show as favorited. Regardless of that I love the app and seeing recipes I've never seen before.

title: Best recipe app ever
body: Ok so this app is everything, especially if you already love cooking. I find myself skimming through this app while at work, it's so addicting! If you at any point want to expand your meal options this app is the place to go. The pictures alone make me want to cook and eat everything!

title: A Foodie must have!!!
body: Talk about good inspiration! It will have you rediscovering old favorites and trying out new dishes that will sure please your taste buds and belly. Type in an ingredient,a dish or a cuisine and your flooded with dozens of options WITH PICTURES! It's my first go to app when I'm looking for a recipe.

title: Awesome app!
body: I use this app almost everyday! Hundreds of new recipes from all different kinds of cuisines. My family and I have a new meal from this app at least once a week. Would highly recommend it for any level of cook!

title: Best recipe app by far!
body: I absolutely love it! I use it almost everyday to find new ideas. I also search by ingredients i have in my kitchen to see what I can make with them and receive plenty of recipes to match! It is everything!

title: Best app ever!
body: Yummly has made me become a cook!  I hate cooking and I have a very busy life style. I am a bus driver, make the meals in the middle of the day stick them in the fridge for the man to finish or rely on the slow cooker recipes. I also don't like recipes with lots of steps and thanks to Yummly I get that!

title: My GoTo App
body: Beautiful design! A few things to learn but once you do it's a snap to search. All my favorites saved in my recipe box. Choose your filters for any diet or omit any ingredient from the search. I love this app! Yes there are ads!! It's FREE! Just skip over 'em and move on. :)

title: I LOVE this app. There just one thing...
body: This is the best food app I've ever used. I love how easy it is, and the grocery list is THE BEST. So convenient! The only thing I'd say that you could make this app better (and earn five stars, in my book) is to make it compatible with MyFitnessPal so I can log my calories easier. Pretty please? ‚ù§Ô∏è

title: Easy to use
body: It's very easy to search with a ton of options for any kind of dish. I also like that other users can review a recipe to give you a better idea which to choose. It has become one of my go to recipe apps üòä

title: Pictures will make you want to salt your screen.
body: Great app beautiful pics. A couple of the recipes don't have directions that was the only bad thing. But the had all the ingredients listed and once you put the ingredients together, with moderate cooking experience they worked out.

title: Love this app
body: There are so many different options and categories to find the perfect meal on this app. I have to eat specific foods so the preference option is very handy and with many options. Also, the option for the type of cuisine (I.e. American, Mexican, Italian) is nice.

title: Great app; customization could make it better
body: Great app that aggregates from many different websites. You can even add recipes from websites that yummly doesn't have, but you can't add photos. So I have a bunch of recipes with no photos. Good integration w PC. wish you could print directly from the yummly recipe page.

title: Simplifies grocery shopping too
body: Very nice to be able to access all of your recipes in one place. This is especially handy when at the grocery store and you need to double check your ingredients

title: Best Food App Yet
body: This has been the best recipe app I've ever had! Yummly is sleek yet user friendly setup. There are pictures, dietary info, and directions (not to mention you can customize your food selection). The only downfall for me is that the app will sometimes crash (I will say though I have an old iPhone 4).

title: Special Diet
body: The app is super slick. I was continually impressed with the ease of use, look of the app and the features it offers like recommending certain types of meals based on your eating restrictions. I'm focusing more on a paleo style diet so I got a lot of different ideas. I will keep using this app!

title: Really love this app!
body: I love how easy it is to find exactly the food you want. It has beautiful images of the food and an easy way to categorize food.  With that said, I wish this app had the ability to share menus with another person to streamline and coordinate dinner menus with two busy adults.

title: Favorite
body: Such a wonderful app I use it all the time !!!! The best is not only does it let you know what to eat health wise but it also tells you the food times so when I am on the go I know what to find if I need to only make a 15 minute meal

title: Love
body: This app gives me so many recipe ideas...I'm actually on a diet and they have so many recipes of detox drinks that I actually use along with healthy cooking options...my kids love the fun recipes which all involve sugar but hey they're kids!!! The slow cook recipes are Devine..this app is awesome sauce

title: Almost a five!
body: I love the recipes and being able to search by several categories. It seems to jump around a lot and I often see something that catches my eye and I can't get back to it. Otherwise, it's user friendly and easy to save recipes.

title: Great content, but flawed
body: Navigation is not very intuitive. I found myself accidentally tapping random links and would have no way to get back to what I was initially looking at without going to the actual website and tapping the "take me to the app" button. When I finally got back to the recipe, it told me to "watch the video".... There wasn't one. Still, great content, just not very user friendly.

title: Great app for meal planning
body: This app is easy to use and has made meal planning a breeze.  I love that I can search for easy, healthy recipes that meet my family's dietary restrictions (kids with allergies and a picky husband).  My family loves going a month without repeat dinners.

user_name: I can't live without the drop!
title: It's okay
body: I love everything about this app, except for the fact that every time I push the back arrow it closes the app!!!!!!!!! This is soooo frustrating!!!!!! I literally almost want to delete the app because of this problem!

title: App not working after update!
body: App freezing after clicking on a recipe after updating today. Can't look at ingredients or directions. Please fix as I usually like this app and look up recipes all the time!

title: Used Daily !!!!
body: I love this app and what it has to offer. The resource of recipes seems endless. I enjoy cooking all different ethnic foods. When I'm looking for different recipes from other countries they are easy to find. This app is very user friendly.

title: I love it!!!
body: This app is awesome! Whenever I have ingredients at home and don't have a recipe in mind, I punch it in the search bar and get a ton of great ideas! I downloaded this app because I grew tired of feeding my family the same rotation of meals. With Yummly, I get to change it up. üòä

title: My mobile recipe book
body: Love the app; shopping list adds are easy to do and you can find almost anything your palate might crave; wish I could add recipe notes but other than that it's one of my favorite food apps

title: Must have app
body: I used the recipe for husbands German chocolate cake from this site. Everyone absolutely loved it. Tried many different recipes from this site all excellent. I love the different variations offered when you search a specific recipes.

title: Useful and user friendly
body: So many great choices. The main things I like are that you can personalize which types of recipes you see, put those recipes into categories, and import the nutritional info into the Health app

title: Great app
body: Lots of delicious üòã recipes.  Loads of features inside the app. Especially like the shopping list feature. Oh and I love pictures üì∏.

title: great app
body: I really enjoy this app! a few things I think would make it better:

title: Unbelievable App! Best hands down!
body: I don't typically rate apps at all.  This app deserves every bit of the 5 star.  Its user friendly, easy follow, organized and most all its great for shopping with.  Hands down best app on my phone!

title: I FEEL LIKE A CHEF!!!!!!
body: Ever since I've used this app, every dish that I've cooked has been some of the best dishes I've prepared. I consider myself a good cook, but this app has made me better! I have improvised a lot of dishes and my family have been impressed and enjoyed everything I've cooked!! Great app!

title: Something for every taste
body: I like this app and use it by picking out a main ingredient for my fridge and seeing what it finds. Many options allows you to pick a recipe that's ingredients are in your cupboards. The only downfall is that once your phone locks and you try to come back to the recipe it automatically jumps back to the top of the page.

title: Must-try
body: The interface on this app is beautifully designed and the recipes look delicious and are well-organized in a logical manner. I usually consider apps in the food/cooking/recipes category "junk" but this one's definitely a keeper

title: üòä
body: So far I'm really enjoying this app. A lot of awesome recipes to fit my lifestyle :) I love the "filters" feature which allows you to only see recipes that are customized to your own personal diet guidelines... Only thing I'd like to suggest... Is perhaps allowing yummly to be able to sync with myfitnesspal ... That would be awesome!

title: My most "go to" for recipes
body: Like any other app, it could use some improvements. Most apps are not perfect and need much improvement. But, it works pretty well. If I don't like how a website displays a recipe, I will just go and print it out. Sometimes, the printed version is so much better.

title: Outstanding
body: Love, love, love this App. As an avid cook, I'm always looking for new recipes. I used to use Food Network or my cookbooks, but now this is my go to helper. I really like that I can search on a specific ingredient. And I like that I can look up My Yums on my computer as well.

title: This is my favorite cooking app
