body: This is such a cool app! I mainly use Yum and Pinterest as my go to apps. Yum especially great for recipes and I can pull it up where ever I am traveling to when I'm wanting to whip up some great dishes at friend houses around the globe! There are so many amazing recipes. Love it!

title: Love browsing these recipes!
body: I have a blast looking at new recipes and love to save ideas for later. Everything I've made has been great, and when I search for ideas I almost always find what I'm looking for.

title: I use this app constantly
body: I turn to this app about every day. The emails are always inspiring and I have made so many original categories in my Yuma If you don't want to be creative and adventurous with your cooking this is the one to have.

title: Good app easy simple to use
body: Was Impressed by this app very effective If I need a quick recipe wip out my phone that easy.. There's search criteria to help narrow down my selection for certain dishes. Overall great app with easy mechanics and a simple design 5 stars

title: Mel
body: I opened the app up and I just can't get enough WOW I AM AMAZED!! My family is going to eat better meals all around, I was so sick and tired of cooking the same old things now we can all sit down together and decided what we are going to eat, I am very impressed!!

title: Only One Thing...
body: I'd like to request a few additional search filters:

title: Great app to filter recipes for allergies
body: I love this app! The diversity of recipes is amaizing, but my favorite feature is how well it filters to your family's needs. Need a dairy free recipe? Gluten free recipe for the play date this afternoon? You got it! I love it! It's my go to app for recipes! Keep up the awesome work yummly!

title: Very helpful
body: I love looking on here for specific ideas and needs. It's very helpful and fun to just browse through all the different recipes. I look at it almost daily. Have told my family and friends about it.

title: Great for planning meals and shopping!
body: My wife has specific dietary requirements and I used to struggle to find stuff that we could of both eat. This app is perfect for her restrictions and makes shopping and planning for the week very easy.

title: Absolutely love this app!
body: I love trying out new recipes and being able to search for recipes with items on hand is awesome! Been so easy to access recipes again We have loved with the Yum feature!

title: Love this app!
body: This app is great and easy to use. It counts calories, tells the number of ingredients in each recipe, time to prep and cook. Ratings are pretty accurate to how the food tastes. I've already recommended the app to multiple friends and they love it as well!

title: User friendly
body: I like that I can find recipe ideas and also read comments and suggestions which adds to get ideas or parts of the recipe that can be changed.

title: Great for random things to make
body: I find this is a great app to find random ideals and stuff to try. When I do search for something (i.e. rye bread) I get a bunch of recipes using the item but not ones to make my own. Sometimes just easier to search the web and find what I want than to use this app when it is a specific thing.

title: Love the app, hate the account sign-in
body: A great app for recipes and inspiration in the kitchen! Search feature is great, as well. However, I have neither a Facebook or Google account.  So, it seems I am not worthy enough of the app's full functionality. It would be nice to be able to creat a direct account with Yummly, rather than use an existing one with a third party.

title: Easy and useful
body: I don't like cooking and this app makes things easier for me. I can find easy recipes that are super yummy in no time without having to search cookbooks or the internet. A plus for anyone who likes or dislikes cooking.

title: Love it
body: Very intuitive app interface, I only wish the names of the recipes would stay while you scroll and not disappear if your finger is not physically scrolling, otherwise beautiful pictures, easy to use ingredient section, and great recipes! Just need more recipes now!

title: Awesome app
body: Great ideas. Each time you open the app it gives you new ideas based upon what you have told it in the past you liked. Some have videos to help you along! Plus I like the grocery list!

title: Amazing!!
body: This app is way better than the Food Network one. More variety of recipes, although some don't have the instructions, but for the most part, all the recipes are very well structured. My favorite cooking app so far!

title: Amazing app for food lovers
body: It's incredible how similar this app is to one I dreamt of years ago. A dream that got me started programming. I didn't gain the skills I needed fast enough though. Yummly is just too perfect. I guess I'll have to build something else now. Thanks guys!

title: Useful tool for wannabe chefs
body: My family is vegetarian so finding new use of favorite veggies and finding ideas for meals can be a challenge. I've found some recipes in here that have become faves. The grocery checklist feature is very helpful.

title: Great recipe finder and cooking app!
body: Not only a great way to find recipes but this app has great instructions for cooking those recipes. Very tailorable to various dietary needs or restrictions (like allergies). You can also filter recipes by how long it takes to prepare and methods of cooking.

title: Awesome enough to get me to write!
body: I usually don't review apps. I'm rarely compelled enough- either by love or hate- to make the effort. But I love Yummly. It's a great resource- especially if you love to cook. It also makes shopping easy with the "add to shopping list" feature.

title: Best cooking app!
body: I'm taking my time to write this review because of the nothing but pleasant experience I have had with Yummly. Limited ads, personalized recipes, custom shopping list and ease of use are just a few qualities to name. Can't stop raving about it!

title: Like, but...
body: Really like getting all the fabulous recipes but I wish there was a way to mark ones I've actually made and enjoyed---something like a "double yum" button. (I use the Yum tag to select ones I want to make.)

title: A great resource
body: I enjoy this app and find it helpful in my quest to declutter. Instead of having pages of printed recipes, I can just save good looking stuff to the app. I do wish that there was a way to record comments to myself about the recipe, like substitutions I tried or how long it too to cook in my oven.

title: Very good app!
body: This app is addicting for anybody that is looking for new recipes to try. Gives you all the ingredients needed and even tells you the nutrition content of the foods! I would highly recommend this app to anyone as it is very addicting!!

title: Very resourceful and packed with cool interesting recipes!
body: I really enjoy this app because it has lots of different recipes and gives a variety of options for all kinds of dishes! It's really awesome also how you are able to choose exactly what kind of search you want to use.

title: Helpful and user-friendly
body: I like how easy it is to find recipes from multiple sources and organize them. I think they've also fixed that problem where you lose your spot in the recipe of the phone goes to sleep, which is nice.

title: Yum Yummly!
body: Yummly encompasses recipes from a wide variety of cultures. Culinary skills required range from basic to advanced. I love planning meals on my phone at the grocery store then preparing the food with my tablet in the kitchen. Yummly makes it easy to share and store recipes also. It's awesome!

title: Really love IT
body: I absolutely love this App. I love to cook and it gives me great ideas for different things to try. I always seem to use the same ingredients the same way all the time. So, with this app I can type in one ingredient and get tons of great recipes. Only thing is it's a little complicated at first!

title: Best recipe app ever
body: Everything you can think of to cook is right here in this app. The recipes are easy to follow, so even if you are a beginner you can use this app. No more searching the web for a recipe...you can find pretty much any recipe in this app.

title: Love Yummly!
body: This app is wonderful! I wish it would let you choose your category the way it did before the update, without having to open the recipe but otherwise it's awesome and I use it all the time!

title: Awesome!
body: I've really enjoyed this app. Besides giving me great recipes, it's motivated me to eat at home more often! All my friends love the recipes I've made from here. I do wish it gave the option to filter recipes by food group, meal type, ingredients, etc.

title: Has potential...
body: This app had so much potential for me... Until I saw the nutrition content tracks fat, carbs, and some vitamins, but not protein?  Why track only two of the three caloric bases and not include the most essential for a lot of people?  Essentially makes this app unhelpful in keeping a balanced intake.

title: THE BEST RECIPE APP!!
body: I love this App!! I can find any recipe on here! And it is a very easy app to use. I can also store all of my favorite recipes on here. I no longer have to write my recipes down or print them out. I just look them up on here and save the ones I want to save!!

title: It's the best source I've found!! I can always find what I'm looking for and it always turns out gr
body: Always find something yummy when I can't think of anything different and exciting. Love it  and the reviews give you something exta!!!

title: So easy to use
body: I love that I can just browse from the front page and look for something interesting. This is a great site and I appreciate all of the different sources they look too. Easy to use and very helpful.

title: Beginning cook
body: Makes life simple and since it's always on my phone I can easily access recipes from the store. I love the ideas that it churns out with one simple word "orzo." Great app for anyone that cooks but specifically those normally intimidated by cooking

title: Great App!
body: I have already made 3 recipes I found on yummly (and I only downloaded a few days ago). Wide variety of recipes from vegetarian to buffalo turkey meatballs. Everything I search seems to have at least a few results. Very fun!

title: Great for recipe lovers!!!
body: I love new recipes, but they so easily get lost in the electrons of the internet. This app organizes and let's you choose what makes sense for your taste and then makes suggestions. It is pandora for recipes.  Easy to navigate, quick glance information, and a search feature...LOVE it!

title: Great app good for Apple watch users
body: I really like how pleasing this app is to the eye.

title: Pretty pics but inaccurate ingredient lists when compared to actual recipe
body: The ingredient list (specifically quantities) sometimes differs from what is listed on the app quick view and the recipe's home website. It is a little bit of a pain to always have to go to the recipe's website to correctly make the recipe.

title: LOVE
body: I recommend this app to everyone - it has every type of food and meal type you can imagine, from gourmet desserts to back yard BBQ platters to gluten free entrees. I use it everyday and all the recipes I have tried on here work too! Absolutely worth the download :)

title: LOVE IT!!!!!!
body: I don't usually write reviews but this app deserves it. This app is wonderful; I have used it many times when I can't figure out what to make for dinner. It's becoming my only reference for healthy meals for my family. Great job to the developers of Yummly! üëçüèªüëçüèªüëçüèªüëçüèªüëçüèªüëçüèªüëçüèªüëçüèªüëçüèª

title: Awesome App
body: This very user friendly food and drink app is already changing the way I plan my healthy goals. It's free and it offers great visuals, lots of filter options, the ability to customize your dietary needs and is very easy to navigate. Thanks Yummly!!

title: Inspires culinary creativity
body: My favorite food app by far! I love that I can search anything and save into different categories. The only thing I wish I could add is being able to follow others recipe profiles like on Pinterest.

title: Love this app!
body: Best app I have found. There are so many recipes to choose from and it is really catered to your personal preferences. I love that you can list ingredients that you dislike and that the shopping list is so easy to use!

title: Always trying new recipes!
body: I love this app! I have found some great meals in a pinch just by searching simple recipes using the ingredients in my fridge as well as tried new ones that I never would have thought of.

title: Great for dietary restrictions
body: The search option is wonderful in that all of the hits are within dietary guidelines that you set. Which is convenient if you're trying to find a vegan cheese sauce you can simply search "cheese sauce" and only vegan recipes come up.

title: THE BEST recipe app I've ever found
body: I LOVE the shopping list and how if I have more than one recipe on there and the same ingredient in both, it groups them together so that I know the total of that ingredient for all recipes. I also love the options for diets and allergies...

title: That was a QUICK Fix!!
body: Rechecked the app today to see if it's working and BINGO it had an update with no more crashing!! Woo hoo! I have become quite reliant on this app. I recommend it to everyone. It has every recipe you could think of!!!!

title: Must have!
body: I love this app and I have been using it since the very beginning. It gets better with every update! This is the only app I recommend to all my friends for cooking, recipes and shopping list.

title: üåüA must downloadüåü
body: This app is amazing!!  So many wonderful recipes with pictures, ingredient lists and the ability to make shopping lists. You can lose track of time as you explore all of the recipes!  Have fun!!

title: Great concept; poorly executed (i4)
body: I have this app on the iPhone 4 (antique!!). I think the concept is amazing-search, filter, create shopping list.

title: So many awesome recipes!
body: I have found so many recipes that are just awesome! I've tried about 10 & they have all been great! I love the shopping list feature, though I wish that were on the iPad app as well.

title: Must have App
body: This is a must have app if you are a fan of cooking and trying unique recipes. I do all my cooking from this app. With thousands of recipes to choose from, you will never have to cook the same thing twice.

title: The best app of all apps!!!
body: Perfect for finding specific recipes, getting ideas for tonight's dinner, or a snack for right now!! Love that I can type in "dinner for kids" or "low fat snack" and tons of recipes pop up for me to choose from or save for later!

title: Go-to recipe app
body: I love Yummly! This is my go-to app any time I need a recipe. My only complaint is that there needs to be a way to copy the URL for recipes within the app. Currently, this is not an option in the "share" function. You have to open the recipe in Safari, then copy the link from there.

title: A plus recipe app
body: Yum is a great way to try new things and i love the variety in the recipes! Also the filters are amazing because my friend is a vegan and i can never think of food to make when she comes over

title: Really nice but recipes don't stay open
body: Because the app is pulling recipes from all over the web, there isn't any set look/feel for what recipes look like. Tricky when you're trying to read directions off your phone while cooking

title: Better than Pinterest!
body: Since downloading this app I have visited my Pinterest cooking boards much less frequently! I love having the nutrition information and times right there and the photos are amazing!

title: Useful has a few bugs
body: I like how you can add the ingredients easily to your shopping list from the recipe. Sometimes app shuts down or there can be a glitch while using the shopping list. However, I really like the app and would recommend.

title: Hungry vegetarian
body: I love this app! So many vegetarian and vegan options. Regular food too of course. This app is so much easier to use then other food apps and you get a variety. I've recommended this app to a few friends. It's a must download.

title: Fun
body: I like the way you create a profile of the types of food you like so you don't have to sift thru a bunch of recipes you won't eat. Sometimes the app refreshes but doesn't show any new recipes though. Overall it's a fun app and I have recommended it to other Foodies like myself!

title: Would be amazing
body: This would be an amazing app if it wasn't so bug filled. From signing me out randomly, not showing something I just saved, constantly resetting to the home screen, things not showing up where I categorized them, and on and on.

title: Top Notch
body: I like to cook but I get tired of the same old thing. This app delivers simple yet satisfying new ideas that are spot on for any occasion. I have actually found several ideas that are now family favorites.

title: Great place to keep recipes!
body: I love that the app allows you to store the recipes in different folders for you to find later! I love using it with my watch so that I'm not constantly unlocking my phone while cooking!

title: Simple. Easy. Tasty
body: If I'm ever in a bind and don't have much time to cook a meal or can't think of anything, yummly is there to the rescue! They have amazing recipes that are easy to cook. I just type in an ingredient and Yummly gives me hundreds of recipes based on that 1 ingredient. I love it!

title: This app used to be great
body: I just did an update to get some recipes for dinner tonight. There are so many pop up ads when you start reading about the directions and prep work it is absolutely unbelievable! As you're scrolling and reading everything will shift and you'll see an ad for something that has nothing to do with anything,totally inappropriate ad placement! I get there trying to make money but this is ridiculous.

title: Most used
body: I have downloaded so many recipe apps and I use this one the most. I also very much appreciate the emails sent with suggestions based on my Yums. Those emails have helped get dinner on the table and saves me from dinner routine ruts.

title: Yummly
body: I found some good recipes, but you need to scroll through photos and similar recipes to get to the directions. And when I tried to make something a second time I was constantly interrupted to write a review. I give it three stars for the recipes because the app lets me eliminate ingredients I don't like or don't want to use.

title: Love this app!
body: Fabulous and easy recipes for your food lifestyle.   I've tried so many recipes and always had good luck with each.  I also really like the nutritional info so that I can ensure I am staying true to my health goals.  Thank you Yummly!

title: NOT facebook/google
body: I'm in the *Yummly* app. Not facebook. Not google. I don't want to connect to those to use Yummly. This severely limits my experience & renders most of the features useless.

title: Great App!
body: I have downloaded other apps on cooking but this app beats them all. Food is always attractive when there is a visual presentation.  Yummly with their highly attractive photography makes cooking very enticing.  It is very easy to use and a great tool!  Thank you

title: The New Go To App
body: App is great!  Great search features and I've found new sites I enjoy through this recipe tool. We'll organized and can log in from PC as well. Was better before the 'sponsored' items became prevalent, but I get that too.

title: Updated version doesn't work
body: When I first downloaded this app it work great and I loved it, however I updated it to the latest version and I can't not open the app now...please fix as I enjoyed using it

title: Great app!
body: I have been trying to live a healthier lifestyle and this app helps so much. It has meals and snacks for any time of day and you can filter the results to what you want in the meal like calories or stuff you don't like/ allergic to and ugh I love this app alot

title: Wonderful
body: This is a great app. Easy to use and works well. Makes it convenient to quickly look up recipes and get great meal ideas even when you're not in front of a computer (or cookbook).

title: I LOVE THIS APP!!!
body: I am cooking more at home and I find myself exploring new recipes! I've never attempted to make sauces before and this app really made it easy for me to try! I came out of my comfort zone and now my lunches and dinners are newer and fresher! Whoever created this is simply genius!

title: One Stop Tool for Kitchen!
body: This app is too helpful! It's actually a good cooking app with each and every thing you think a recipe app should have, has it!

title: Great App
body: Wide variety of recipes and very easy to navigate. This is an app for the entire family. Our teenager is assigned one night a week to make dinner, and this has become her "go to" place for her recipes. A must for the busy Mom.

title: My go to!!!
body: Yummly has been an incredible app for me! As a mother with nothing but boys in the house, this has helped broaden their options. I never had any help learning how to cook but thank to Yummly I have become the chef for the boys. Thank you Yummly for the wonderful and so tasty recipes!!!

title: Best one so far
body: I like the recipes. I like the way you browse and sort. I like how easy it is to add ingredients to your shopping list.

title: It's not working! Please fix it!
body: I have never had an issue with this app. But for some reason I opened it today and all my saved recipes are gone. The app ask me to sign in, but it's not recognizing my email and it's not opening through my fb neither.

title: Love this app!
body: This is a great app for people who like to try making different foods. The only thing I wish is that there was a way to add your own personal recipes so that you can share them with others.

title: Awesome app
body: Best recipe app I've had. I eat Paleo and I love that you can choose whatever diet you're on and it will cancel out the foods you shouldn't eat in the suggested recipes. You can also select any foods you don't like and it will do the same. Love it!

title: My go-to recipe AP!
body: I cook for many people, with a variety of dietary restrictions. Yummy is fantastic because I can put in any ingredients and will find recipe options. I also love a portable ap where I can have everything conveniently on my phone.

title: Makes cooking easy
body: I love the way it has a different tab for ingredients, instructions, etc. Tells you calories. There are tons of easy recipes. It's really made cooking less daunting from start to finish.

title: Great App!
body: I've been using Yummly for around a year now and still finding new recipes. The crashes are minor and I wish they would add a barcode feature to check off what ingredients I have in home already. Over worth the time to download

title: EXTREMELY USEFUL!
body: I probably use this for every other dinner/breakfast. The recipes on here are phenomenal and I can search for pretty much anything! I love to sit and just scroll through the recipes as well and save the ones I want to try.

title: Helpful App for any cooking skill
body: At home, I try my best to cook low carbs food and with this app I can choose how many carbs, fat, protein I want on the food. It also has more than you need choices of food so you can have meal plan, really easy.

title: YES FINALLY!!
body: This has been the best app for recipes by far. I've tried many others but enjoy the variety of recipes Yummly has to offer as well as the comments and suggestions posted by others. üëåüèºüëåüèº

title: Great & Not
body: The app is great, tons of ideas and features, very useful EXCEPT FOR ONE VERY BIG PROBLEM you have to connect to Facebook or Google to use almost all features of the app except the search function ... Would be a great app otherwise ... I am so sick of everything needed to connect to FB to be able to use it. I hate FB and don't feel the need to share my every moment with everyone or anyone.

title: Motivational
body: During my current, "health kick" this app provides me with the opportunity of looking at all of the savory foods I don't want to eat. That is until I beef up the muscle mass and I can increase my calorie intake, therefore expanding my food options.

title: LOVE this app
body: This app has saved me so any times. I get tired of cooking the same ways so all I do is type is certain ingredients and BAM so many different options pop up. And they range from easy simple recipes to master level. LOVE THIS!

title: Wonderful
body: Yummly is a wonderful app! If I just have an idea of what I want all I have to do is search and find the best recipe option! Varietals of recipes I had not thought of and ratings of each. And I love that they email me ideas too!

title: Great yummy app
body: There is a lot of combinations that work really well together when I go through the recipes. I love the fact that this app gives me a variety of different recipes to try. I have a big family and we get tired of  the same thing every week!!!! Great app!

title: Use this all the time!
body: Love this app! Wonderful to flip through so many recipes and pick the exact one you want. Everything looks so delicious, and all the steps to make them are at your fingertips.

title: Love it but annoyed
body: I love everything about this desktop/ app however if I'm on my phone and I want to quickly find something and look at it, I don't want to be asked a million times if I want to see it IN THE app and have the screen blocked. It's so annoying.

title: So many ideas!
body: When looking for ideas for dinner, I can never go wrong with the recipes found on Yummly.

title: Tasteful recipes!
body: I haven't had a difficult dish or something I didn't like yet. I been using yummly for years now and use 90% of my stuff on here. Therefore I'm giving yummly a 5 stars for having the best and easy to make recipes. :)

title: My savior from full diets
body: I'm trying to eat heathy and these recipes make it delicious. I don't feel bad around dinner time because the meal was so excellent. It really simplifies the thinking process at a time when I'm hungry and not thinking straight.

title: Aesthetically pleasing
body: I've always looked for a good app to supply recipes and this is the one. Not only does it have delectable recipes, but it also presents them in a sleek, organized  way. Even includes a shopping list. I recommend it!

title: Unsure__?
body: 2015 I had this app and used it for one recipe. I enjoy the ease of making a grocery list for items needed for recipes and all the varieties of meal prep, but it has become slow and lacks the variety it used to have. Please check and fix for all to enjoy.

title: Yummly- a source of tasty recipes
body: I have been using this app for over a year. It hasn't disappointed me. I can easily organize recipes by categories. I also like that receiving a weekly email of trending recipes.

title: Great App Most of the Time
body: The app has a great deal of recipes. Not all come out the right way but the majority does. My biggest problem would be that the explore section has not worked for me for a couple of months.. Otherwise, I use the app often.

title: All-Star App
body: I'm new to cooking and baking and since retiring from business, this has become my passion. Yummly is a fantastic app. The recipes are are among the most interesting and delicious I have found anywhere. When I need a recipe, Yummly is where I go.

title: Love this app!!!
body: Very pretty and useful app.  Great to shop with your list of grocery and plan for what you are making. So many recipes to look at and if you find one on a website you can add it as well to your yum. I love it!

title: Personalized recommendations are great!
body: Love that this app is smart enough to ask/learn what I like and show me more of that type of recipes. Has been a game changer for me - I don't like to meal plan but I always have a list of great recipes to try now.

title: Great!
body: I love this app! Its so original and and unique, just like all the recipes. I have found so many new things to try! My boyfriend loves the things I've made from this app. I just love looking through all the yummy pictures!

title: Great app!
body: I've been using this app for over a year now and I love it! This is my go to app whenever I need new ideas. I've found some great new regulars and a few I wasn't crazy about but that's part of the fun! Overall it's great.

title: Crashes
body: I'm running the latest iPhone software and just updated this app. It immediately crashes after I open it. I have deleted and redownloaded, and restarted my phone to try again. I liked the previous versions of this app. I only updated because I was in the middle of cooking dinner and a message popped up saying there was a new version and it would not let me go back to my recipe without updating. Not cool!!üò°üò°üò°

title: Love this app!!
body: Found great recipes.. I love the pictures! Cant wait to keep trying new recipes. Only thing i wish is that the recommended recipes arent just different types of things ive already picked! Otherwise my favorite app

title: Loving this App
body: This app is great.. I love that I have it right at my fingertips to use when cooking or shopping... Recipes are interesting, taste good and are healthy.. I have removed meat from my diet: I now consume only seafood, veggies, and some carbs.. Yummly has a lot of salad & smoothie recipes.. I am in love... Thanks Yummly!

title: Go-to Recipe App!
body: I don't usually bother to write reviews for apps but I love Yummly! It has a beautiful layout and lots of delicious recipes. I was looking for a good recipe app for a while until I found this one. It has everything you're looking for!

title: Outstanding!
body: Captivating from the moment you open the app. Yummly has a GREAT user interface and it's not complex at all. I love it and they really have an amazing amount of recipes to find and explore! Definitely giving it my recommendation :)

title: The only thing missing
body: This app was a game changer for my eating habits and I've never been more great ful! They just need like a section for non food items so I can make my grocery list fast and easy and use it for everything. Other than that it's purrrrfection

title: LOVE IT!!!!!!!!üòçüòçüòçüòçüòç
body: So far I have cooked two recipes off this app. And my family loves them both. I also love that they even tell you when ingredients are on sale for the recipe you plan to use. Thank you for creating this app.

title: Food lover life saver
body: I recently found out I can't eat dairy, eggs or wheat. This was a very difficult transition for me. I have found Yummly to be a lifesaver. I have found so many great tasting recipes that others have enjoyed as well. This app is incredible.

title: Awesome!!
body: I don't leave a lot of reviews on apps but yummly is not only extremely useful and easy to use, but it's one of the most beautifully built interfaces I've seen. Will definitely keep spreading the word about this app

title: I love this app!!
body: I use this app a lot when I'm trying to figure out what to cook for my family and I when we want something different. Couldn't ask for a better and simple to use app. :)

title: Perfect!!
body: Great app. I've been using it for one week now and have made at least 10 different recipes. Very easy to find what you want and everything has been delicious so far.

title: Completely changed the way I eat
body: I've always struggled to cook. This app has changed that. The recipes are great. You can find anything at any skill level. I eat delicious and healthy things every day now.

title: Yumly is well YUMLY !!!!
body: Love the app the recipes are numerous and varied always something new to try and love saving my favorites with the ability to give a review and give feed back on any modifications I made to the recipe ,,it's my go to Recipe guide no more searching different sites NO NEED I LOVE YOU YUMLY !!!

title: Hat's off to you
body: Yummly is great but here's the schtick...There's no rating system of the recipes. Having this feature would make the system more user oriented and help people know which cookies really are better than the last 12 dozen chocolate chip recipes one can try.

title: Yay so good
body: I am in love with this app. Cooking at home has always been challenging for me because finding a recipe that fits my family is really hard to fine( we are all picky eaters) but this app makes it fun and easy. So if you like cooking get it!!!!

title: Godly
body: My husband was showing his mom this app because she has extensive food allergies and it looked cool so I got it too. Wow. Tons of resources for any kind of food you want all within your personal parameters. I can get loads looking at this app.

title: Awesome!
body: Honestly yummly is the best recipe app I've found. Super user-friendly and convenient. All the recipes I've tried so far have been great as well! I never recommend apps to anyone but I have recommended yummly to sooooo many people!

title: I love this app.
body: I use this app all the time.  I'll use the search tool and enter the one item I want to base my meal around ex. Fennel, and be inspired by hundreds of recipes with this ingredient.  I also like how the ingredient lists are the tap of a button.

title: Use it several times a week!
body: Best way to find and compare recipes when you're looking for something specific or just want to browse.

title: Good variety and suggestions but enough with the ads
body: I really like this app ( would rate higher) with the suggestions, options shown when searching and the consolidation from all sources of recipes. However I really wish there was an (paid) option to get rid of all the ads. I really just want the recipe and the ads are more than a nuisance.

title: Organizational Heaven
body: I love the way you can find any recipe in any category and then save your favorites in your organized folders. Allows this disorganized person to appear like I've got it all under control!

title: Awesome so far
body: With lots of food intolerances, it is great to have an app that searches on a key ingredient, filters out what I can't have, and keeps track of my faves. I'm really enjoying the simplicity of using this, and the great recipes as well.

title: mummlyyummuly
body: Unfortunately my teen daughter found this app and now she bugs me to make "this and that...oooh that looks yummy...!" and "c'mon try and make this" We both love to cook so this app is a great "addition" to our "addiction".  Great graphics too...so pleasant to look at...!

title: Love it
body: I love this app.  It would be nice if instead of bringing up the actual website for the recipe that the directions come up in the app itself.  More of a convenience issue.  But, for the most part, i like it.

title: LOVE.
body: Yummly is one reliable app I use on a regular basis that eliminates the need to keep looking at different food blogs to find recipes I am interested in. Just type in ingredients you have on hand and rejoice! It is well-designed and neat, simple, and free! I'm keeping it.

title: The Best!!!
body: I love this app. I was looking for a shopping list app and stumbled on this. The shopping list is only part of what this app has to offer. I love the all-in-one aspect of the app (shopping list, recipes, etc). It's definitely a must-have!

title: So helpful and easy
body: I love that you can select your food preferences. I eat Paleo and inflammatory free for health reasons and I love having a free app that helps me plan meals for my family- I can find recipes right as I'm grocery shopping and it's so easy to use!

title: Makes cooking super easy!
body: I love this app for when I don't know what to cook for dinner or a party. I just do a search for ingredients that I have and it gives me tons of options.

title: The rocking recipe app!
body: This app rocks!!! This user-friendly layout combined with the awesome recipes you can find there makes this my favorite kitchen app. I love how it easily organizes a shopping list for you; making the preparation to cook, much faster.

title: Awesome!!!
body: This app is one of the simply most efficient cooking Apps I've ever encountered.

title: Fantastic Recipe App!
body: The ability to find such a variety of recipes in one place has gotten me into cooking so much more in the last 8 months. I love the app, and my husband loves coming home to find another new recipe to taste test!

title: Good app overall
body: Yummly features a great selection of recipes and the shopping list feature is very helpful. Unfortunately, the app freezes quite a bit. I will say, though, that even with this flaw it's still worth downloading.

title: Best Recipe App Ever!!!
body: I have used a few other recipe apps for iPhone and Droid and none of them come close to this one. Every recipe I search for is on here and are easy and taste great! I would definitely recommend this app to everyone!

title: Fabulous App for My Food Allergies
body: I love how I can tailor my recipe searches to match my food allergies. I also love being able to filter out certain words so that I can search for 'oysters', yet omit recipes containing either 'oyster mushrooms' or 'oyster sauce'. Very easy to flexible.

title: Easy recipes with common ingredients!
body: I use this ap all the time. It covers everything from slow cookers to grilling. And I love that I generally don't have to chase down fancy ingredients. Great fir everyday meals and some fresh easy ideas.

title: It's Awesome
body: As a dad and husband. I find myself relying on yummly a lot when I want to cook something good and different for my family. I also love baking pastries and sweets. And yummly has proved more than helpful when I take on those tasks too.

title: Love this app!!
body: I've been using this app this week for the first time and love it. Whatever I have on hand, I search the item and have recipes that I can choose from and are easy and delicious. Im using it for dinner tonight! ‚ù§Ô∏è

title: A favorite
body: My go to recipe app. Very customizable, with a limitless amount of recipes. If you love to cook, this app is your best friend. Mostly easy to use. I only wish that the grocery service they use with in our area of the country

title: Fun app
body: I have found some recipes that have blown me away on this site. Easy to use, good for inspiration. Sometimes it is tough to tell how good a recipe is but that is almost better so you try new things

title: Nice app
body: Well made and easy to use. Only gave it four stars because the suggestions it offers me are usually repeats so that gets redundant. But the search option is great! And it makes a grocery list for you if you want that too.

title: Small fry
body: I'm always using the app, however I dislike that every 2 seconds it refreshes my personalized settings. So then I can't look at the recipes following what I just looked at because they've been cycled out. That's my only gripe, other than that it's awesome lol!

title: I love this app!!
body: I think Yummly is brilliant!  I love that I can select types of cuisine, diets, allergies, and foods that my family dislikes so I only see recipes that I want to cook. I also like being able to see the nutritional value of the meal.

title: Best meal/recipe app
body: I love having Yummly to go to for new dinner ideas. I get so tired of the same old dinner every night. Now I have lots of good ideas at my finger tips and I can decide on which recipe based on ingredients or time to prepare.

title: Love this app!
body: Yummly just keeps getting better.   They are the ONLY app that makes recommendations just for me.  Love the easy access to my shopping list.  This app just makes my life easier in so many ways!!

title: Paleo Goldmine!
body: I just switched to Paleo cooking lifestyle and was searching for one single app that had every type of recipe.  This is it. Easy to print recipes or copy to my IPad when offline or on the road. My new best online recipe book.

title: Absolutely Love It!!!
body: I love this app!  It has a very large variety of recipes from simple 10 to 20 minute prep and cooking times to more complex and creative recipes that takes a bit more time to prepare.  Highly recommended.

title: Surprisingly good!
body: I originally saw a recipient that I wanted to make, and it would not let me view the recipe unless I downloaded the app. So I did. I was annoyed at the marketing techniques, but I'm happy with the app, after a few questions it now shows me all the recipes I'm interested in.

title: great for picky eaters!
body: I myself being an extremely picky eater and also a vegetarian found it difficult to find recipes online. With yummy you select what foods you don't want and it finds recipes to fit your needs! Awesome.

title: Very useful
body: I use this every week. Has a great pool of recipes! Only problem is when you create a new category, some of your saved recipes will not show in the list even though it says you have "x amount" of recipes in there.

title: Love it!!
body: I love yummly! Not a day goes by I don't use it! The shopping list is awesome! So Convenient! I've recommended it all my friends. So easy, so fast, always satisfied! Filers are great and always find what I need! Yummly makes breakfast lunch and dinner the best time of the day!

title: Finally
body: I think this app is one of the best ones for recipes out there! Not only do you get pictures but you can sort your recipes based on your food preferences, eating likes and dislikes and dietary restrictions! Great idea Yummly

title: Yummy is great!!
body: I got this app out of curiosity, but it has proved helpful many times. Today, for instance, I felt like something tex-mex, and I got many ideas from the response. Now the only problem is deciding which one to use!!

title: First week with it
body: I'm getting used to the app, and so far I find it highly useful both before and during grocery shopping. The recipes have all been great as well. Other reviewers suggested good updates already... I recommend this app.

title: Great concept, almost lives up to its potential
body: Truly a brilliant idea: a recipe filter that you can reset to fit your needs. The way different sites format their recipes can throw off some filters, though. Once that hurdle gets jumped, five stars all the way.

title: Great Recipes but ...
body: My only issue with the app is that if you choose a recipe & start cooking following its directions the app won't stay in the recipe of your choice. It times out & goes back to the main menu. This means you have to search for that recipe all over again. So your attention is divided as you have to keep touching the screen so it doesn't time out.

title: Nice app
body: In this excellent app you can see the recipes and every thing you need to cook. You even have the list of thing that you have to buy and for what number of people you want a do it

title: Just about what I want
body: The cataloging and organization of the app is beautiful, my only gripe is that some recipes and websites come through a bit odd. Almost all of them display nicely, but some sites display just as they would on a laptop or computer.

title: GREAT APP
body: Such a great app. I am always looking for new recipes and love that the recipes in this app come with the nutrition information! My only suggestion is that the nutrition info can be linked to other fitness apps such as lose it or my fitness pal

title: ‚ù§Ô∏èLove‚ù§Ô∏è
body: The photos and recipes are wonderful.  Motivates me to try new foods.  Very simple and easy to use, and the food photos are outstanding.  I would recommend it to seasoned and novice cooks!

title: Love the simplicity
body: Recently my diet has changed to a very strict one; peanut, sugar,artificial sweeteners, soy, and corn free. Gluten, dairy and eggs are limited. I LOVE yumly! It has made the transition so easy for me and I haven't had to go out and buy an entire new library of cook books. Thank you!!

title: One of my two most favorite and used apps!
body: Throw your cookbooks away! Yummly is all you will ever need. Wether you are looking for something old or new to cook, find it here. Invaluable if are on a specific diet (it makes dieting easy and fun).

title: Yumm!
body: I absolutely LOVE this app.! I go to it for recipes 98% of the time (when I'm not looking for a family recipe) and it never fails to deliver.  It has a huge array of recipes that will blow your mind and you'll definitely want more time in the day!

title: Best recipe app for iOS.
body: In my opinion, this is the best recipe app for iOS. I love the filtered search options. The integrated shopping list is so convenient it's replaced my GroceryIQ app. Not to mention the UI for this app is beautiful; clean, simple, and user-friendly.

title: Best of the best
body: This app is the best you can find in recipe apps, it look for recipes in other websites and it makes really easy to organize your favorite recipes, plus the app looks beautiful and clean and is really easy to use.

title: Amazing!!
body: I've tried a few recipes already and they have been a huge hit with my family! Simple and easy instructions and quick to throw together! I love you ü•ëüçóüßÄüç£

title: Visually appealing
body: I love this app. I prefer using it over other apps because of its beautiful colors .. I do sometimes have problem opening some recipes (delay from other sites).. but nonetheless, I still love this app.

title: Very useful
body: I love it! I use it very often to find recipes for my cooking group. They always turn out delicious.

title: Love love love this app!!
body: I love this app. So easy to use and helps me decide what I want to make quickly!!! Absolutely perfect app from the itemized grocery lists, the dietary preferences, and the fact that it based quantities off my family size! Love love love this app.

title: Solid Recipe App
body: Great app for finding meals that would cater to you and your family. Wish they would include clean eating to diet selection, otherwise easy to use and navigate, grocery list helps.

title: Very very helpful for me!!!
body: No to cooking this is very good for me. I understand what needs to be done. And the app takes me step-by-step what more could you want? The recipes are awesome I don't care what you were looking for. Good job

title: Great recipes
body: Yummly has great recipes and makes it convenient by creating a shopping list.  I've already tried several items from the app and they were great.

title: A useful app to have!
body: I'm just learning to cook and the app has been a huge help. It lets you avoid ingredients you dislike, choose how many you'd be cooking for and select and save recipes that intrigue you.

title: Very fun!
body: This is great place to store recipes. I like that it creates your shopping list for your selected recipes, but it is so hard to find your selected recipes when you are ready to use them. I wish it'd move anything selected to a new list or to the top.

title: Best recipe and grocery list app
body: Can't ask for a better app than what this does. Lots of great recipes in the site with very specific dietary filters. But it's the grocery list plus the recipes that really make this app great

title: Amazing App. Personalized to taste !!!
body: Great experience and very easy to use. It guides you through simple steps so it can get to know your taste better later uses that information to create recipes that your into.

title: Great for restricted diets
body: It is really convenient if you have need a special diet such as gluten free. The "Just for you" option will filter out only the gluten free recipes for you and the recipes are from all different sources so you get a great variety.

title: Great app but has some issues
body: Love the app. Only a few things I think can be improved. 1. Pages load slow or not at all. 2. Sometimes shows me same recipes over and over when browsing thru. Otherwise great app!!

title: Love this app!!
body: I just love this app! I grew tired of the repetitive menu-week after week, esp. after eliminating meat from my diet. I downloaded the app, and I have been trying new recipes and I can't complain about the leftover. Just yummy!

title: Delicious decisions
body: Whenever I find myself stumped for meal choices I open this app - Input what's available in the kitchen and see what yummly gives me to prepare. Easy to follow instructions and pictures during preparations and I'm a cooking king!

title: Dietary preferences are pointless
body: I downloaded this app to get some new vegan recipes. I went through all the dietary questions, stated I was vegan, no dairy, no meat, etc., and after filling out all the info, one of the first 'personalized' recipes that popped up for me was cheesy cheddar biscuits. One of the main ingredients is Parmesan cheese. This might be a good app if you have no dietary restrictions but if you do, this won't work for you.

title: My go to recipe app
body: I love this app!!  I have found so many recipes that I've tried.  It's so easy to navigate, I have recommended it to friends & family.  I only wish my grocery store was in their data base.

title: Poor design
body: I needed this app while I was at the store today since it was is the day before thanksgiving. I decided to trust it to store the recipes I wanted for thanksgiving. To my surprise the server was down. Causing me to have to do searches for these recipes and was a huge waste of time. I even forgot a recipe I needed and had to run back out. Will not be trusting this website anymore and will be storing backup files which shouldn't be necessary.

title: Great app for foodies
body: Love the recipes on this app. It's now my go-to app for trying new recipes. It takes a little bit of a learning curve but once you figure out how to add recipes by clicking on the "yum" it gets easier.

title: Great app but missing a few features
body: It works well to search various recipes and it is also easy to create a shopping list.   I wish directions of recipes of my collections can be viewed offline. Also it will be nice if I can add my own notes to the recipes that I collected and my own recipes.

title: Learned to cook
body: I'm a 40 year old man who burnt scrambled eggs and undercooked burgers - now with this app it has given me ideas for meals and deserts and showed me how to make them.

title: SuzLynnS
body: Love this app! So fun to get browse through all the Yummly recommendations. I always find a new recipe I want to try. Plus the shopping list feature is awesome‚Ä¶I‚Äôve started using it every weekend to do my grocery shopping.

title: Excellent
body: I couldn't ask for a better app for my phone. Great pictures and directions to cook are very easy to read and make out. I love love yummly and everything I've made is delish. No complaints here.. Thank u thank u

title: Indispensable.
body: Make a hard list of everything that's desirable about the gathering and preparation of food in the modern world... These devs have not only responded, they've superseded. From the continuous and personalized offerings to a beautiful and intuitive design, I'm hooked.

title: Love this app
body: I found countless good recipes for my family and me. Love it. My only complaint would be, on my phone and tablet, it forces you to open the app instead of continuing to browse or read detail on a recipe. When you forget your password, that's a pain!

title: Love the shopping list and delivery option!
body: So easy to get my favorite recipes in one recipe box, one shopping list. As a busy mom, being able to pick a recipe and have it delivered via Instacart is so helpful.

title: Go to app
body: Yummly is by far the most used app on my phone, I use it to plan my meals every week and can always find recipes by searching whatever is in my fridge. Highly highly recommend!

title: Beautiful design
body: Can't believe I hadn't found this app sooner. Almost Everything I would want-- can easily mark things I want to try and tag them to find things easily later

title: Great app
body: Have found lots of great recipes on this app. I have tried a few, which came out great, and have a lot more on my list of things to try. I really like how they make finding recipes so easy.

title: Good app
body: This is an awesome app. I'm probably never going to make much of these things but whatever. You can filter out type of stuff like ingredients that you don't like or are allergic to (quite useful). One thing I want is to be able to browse by category.

title: Not iPad friendly
body: I want to start off by saying that the function of the app is great. However, it only appears in portrait mode. If I am using a device for recipes in the kitchen, the iPad in landscape mode on a stand is the logical choice, not an iPhone in my flour covered hands. If an iPad app with landscape mode is made, then I would give Yummly 5 stars.

title: Mommy of two
body: I absolutely love this app! It's great for the kids and daddy to enjoy plus I have a new hobby! Loving to cook with all new options and ideas. Only flaw is the instructions can be a hassle at times but nothing to pout about ;).

title: Passion for cooking
body: Over the last two years I've become more involved with cooking different meals for dinners and holidays and finding this app has further added to making much for delicious meals.

title: Yummy
body: Incredible I have been looking for something like this a long time. It's easy

title: Best cooking app to date
body: Best looking, very functional and most fluid cooking app I've used. Shopping lists are great and creating your own custom lists of recipes by food, course, etc makes for easy organization

title: Love this app
body: Beautifully made. My go to when I want to see other ways of making some yummy food or find a new recipe.

title: Disappointing
body: I was so excited about the app. Love the questions and set up and the entire idea to personalize recipes based on one's preferences... the problem is i am an advanced cook and when I entered that my preferred recipes would be Indian, Moroccan and Asian, all I received in my feed was chicken dishes that are american recipes. This app represents that it covers all sorts of cultural recipes but they don't have much except mostly pasta dishes and chicken dishes.

title: Great for cutting calories!
body: I have relied on yummly to find low cal dinner recipes that I can enjoy.  I love that you can filter by fat, carb, and calorie!  Also, the "share" feature makes it easy to send recipes to friends and family.

title: Genius!
body: The recipes are simple, the pictures make you excited to make them, and being able to print them out is handy!

title: Amazing App
body: This app is one of my favorites! It has great recipes and is easy to use! Type in one item within a recipe and it can suggest a bunch of options!  I recommend this to everyone I know who loves to cook!

title: Recipes my mother loved to make!
body: After my mother passed away I felt that her recipe secrets had gone with her. Happily, this app/site came along and filled in many of the missing pieces to her recipes! I love trying the different recipe variations posted.

title: Life changer
body: I never really felt confident in my cooking abilities, yummly has made it so easy to be great in the kitchen. It has eliminated everything that was annoying about putting a meal together, except for the clean up. Seamless app. Beautiful design.

title: wow
body: easily the most useful app on my phone, never has led me astray. it has helped me overcome my fear of cooking and has helped me survive moving into my first apartment and cooking for myself for the first time. Four months later I'm practically a chef!

title: Love recipes and improved
body: Recipes are great, but sometimes the little glitches when getting directions. It has improved a lot. Thank you!

title: Very efficient
body: Love the convenience. Gives nutritional facts and very descriptive recipes. I also love the pictures for those of us who are visual. I like to know what the recipe looks like before I decide to make it. All over wonderful app.

title: Yummly is super!
body: It's a great resource for finding all kinds of recipes. The rating system gives you an idea of how tasty they will turn out and how easy or hard they will be. I use it often!

title: Great resource
body: This is one of my go to apps, as I am always looking for recipes and things to do with particular ingredients in my home. Some of the sources are not as great as others, but I'm sure that will evolve over time.

title: Glitch since the 7.0.3 update
body: I love this app. And now after 3 seconds of being opened it crashes. Can you please update this app. To be compatible with this phones new update. I have so many recipes that I would love to try since I have nothing but time on my hand for the next 12 weeks.

title: Love this app!
body: This app is awesome, easy to use, and functional! Viewing it on my iPad isn't that nice tho. But that's okay. I actually prefer view this on my phone rather than the desktop view. Nice user interface!

title: Google sign in
body: Can you please update this app. I'm trying to save recipes but it won't let me yum because I need to sign on my google account. But when I try signing in the app just shuts off. Thanks

title: Good app but could improve....
body: I like this app a lot.... However, there is room for improvement. For one, I always get an error message, "There's trouble in the kitchen"

title: Amazing!!
body: I'm an experienced cooker with lots of curiosity in cuisines from all cultures! This app has been amazing for me to branch out and cook really delicious meals I probably wouldn't be cooking without the ease of Yummly. It's great for personalization of your own online recipe book!

title: Best recipe app ever!
body: I love being able to search for recipes gluten free and eliminate a few other foods I cannot tolerate too.  Having access to amazing recipes all over the internet ensures I can always find a recipe I'm searching for.  Easy to use and save recipes to My Yums.

title: Absolutely LOVE this app!!
body: Lots of reasons to love this app, but my favorite is that it makes the shopping list for you.  I'm sure others do it as well, but very comfortable with how this works.  Use this almost daily!!!

title: Great! When not buggy
body: This app is a must-have for anyone that cooks at home. I save all my favorite recipes and can categorize them in lists of their own. The app is a bit slow or buggy at times, but overall still a life-saver.

title: Great app.
body: Happy to write a review cos i love the app. Only improvement I'd make would be adding a function to swipe out of recipes and back to search, it would make the flow of searching a lot faster!

title: THANK YOU!
body: this app has revolutionized the way i eat and even makes me excited to cook. there are so many recipes and such an enormous range of options from burgers to vegan. thanks for helping me make it fun to eat healthy!

title: Great App
body: Helps keep me organized. Love how it creates a shopping list and that you can edit and add other items even off your recipes. Very user friendly with a good selection of recipes

title: Love this app!!
body: I love being able to look up recipes and simply adding the ingredients to my shopping list.

title: Plenty of recipes and easy to use.
body: I love how simple and user friendly the site and app is. There are a huge amount of recipes for any type of dish.

title: Can't log in via Facebook
body: I have a profile on this app when I signed up using fb over a year ago.  Now for the past 6 months including today I cannot log in on my phone via fb and it's very annoying.  All the recipes, my profile, my preferences...all gone.  I'm assuming it's not just me and its been long enough for this to have been fixed/updated.

title: Love it!!
body: Yummly is an amazing app for finding any recipe you could possibly think of. I love that you can search any kind of food and get more than a thousand results of what you could make with it!!

title: Lots of recipes
body: I love how I can filter recipes. I have celiac disease and an find great gluten free recipes. I wish some of the recipes would come from food network or allrecipes. Also, it would be nice to be able to further filter based on rating, amount of yums, and ingredients.

title: Download now
body: This app is amazing! If you're tired of making the same old stuff and want to spice it up, download it! Have not been disappointed yet with a recipe I've tried!

title: So much!
body: So many recipes and types of cuisines. Very user friendly and shows everything you need to make the food. Also has diet preferences, which is a nice addition too.

title: Easy
body: I like that I can customize and save results easily. Not crazy about the new way of viewing directions. I run into A LOT of ads since this change happened. Still, having a ton of recipe ideas suited to my dietary needs is awesome.

title: Really?
body: I found a recipe online I wanted to view but it wouldn't let me without downloading the app. I finally decided to get the app to see the recipe. When I opened it up it wanted personal info. I skipped that because I just wanted to view the recipe!!! The recipe popped up but when I tried to open it, it disappeared and about a hundred other recipes appeared! Could you make it any harder just to look at a recipe? I will be deleting the app.

title: Mandatory account?
body: After exploring the app for a bit, the most obnoxious part is the sign in pop-up. I don't think it's fare that you HAVE to link or create an account in order to save recipes. I don't want to feel obligated to sign into an app, and unfortunately with Yummly, that is the case. 3/5 stars is the best I can give it.

title: Perfect aside from one thing.
body: I love this app! The only problem I have with it, is when my phone locks, it kicks me out of the recipe and I have to go back to find where I was in the recipe. Other than that, LOVE IT.

title: Only Recipe App You Need
body: With recipes from all over the internet, this is the only recipe app you need. It's very easy to use and allows you to save what you like in the collections you create. It's my go-to any time I cook.

title: Top choice
body: One of the best recipe apps out there. Really intuitive and easy to use. Beautiful photos submitted and awesome links to different websites that can further your interest in foods. Also love the widespread ingredient options

title: My favorite recipe app
body: Love this app! This is my go to app for any recipe. When we are craving anything I type in what ingredients we have and the app finds recipes according to what I've typed in. Very easy to use and save recipes for later :)

title: Deliciously beautiful app
body: Content, visuals, and usability are superb and my go-to for finding recipes. I'm by no means an avid cook but enjoy discovering new food blogs just the same.

title: Great for helping meal plan
body: This app is awesome. When you find a recipe you like, you can add all the ingredients to your shopping cart with one click. Makes going to the grocery store much easier!

title: Love it!
body: I found so many interesting recipes that follow my interest and being able to put what I dislike helps in my searches. Will be keeping this app for good for all recipes

title: Full of great recipes
body: I really like this app as it has a recipe for anything. The easy to use search feature allows s few words and will bring up a ton or recipes associated with thT word

title: Excellent Recipe App
body: I'm using the app more often. I love the website because it combines various recipe websites all into one convenient place. And the mobile app brings that convenience to the mobile device.

title: The BEST App Around
body: I absolutely LOVE Yummly. It's detailed and user friendly. I've downloaded and had to delete multiple other apps before finding Yummly just recently and I'm SOLD ! Actually addicted to it. Great app! And it's FREE !! Doesn't get better

title: Love this app
body: The app is the ultimate cookbook for anyone. Has so many recipes and you can customize it to showcase recipes that interest you. Definitely recommend this to anyone, I love it and use it all the time.

title: Yum is Right!!!
body: Love this app I discovered has amazing recipes I've tried quite a few already and they rock the buds def offers mega variety of recipes you can customize ur likes no crash problems thank you YUMMLY

title: Latest update is neat
body: Noticed you can review recipes through the app now, cool. I used to get ticked that it would show 3-5 recipes for the same type of dish in a row, seems like it does this less now.

title: This app is too Lit
body: Ok, so my fianc√© always tell me I make the same foods over and over so I decided to give this app a try. It was totally worth it. The recipes are amazing,  things I never thought I could cook I prepared perfect. I love love love this app üòçüò©üëåüèª

title: Love it!
body: Have tried a few things off of the app and have loved every meal so far! So easy to follow and if I'm craving something particular I search it and find something amazing every time!

title: AMAZING!!!
body: Love this app!!! It's so easy to use, has so many options to choose from and great filters for dietary restrictions. The grocery list can be checked off, texted, emailed, etc. This is my go to app for recipes and they are soooo Yummly! ;)

title: Awesome!
body: I love this app!   It makes it so easy to help me decide what I want to cook.  I search whatever I think I want to make and it shows me a ton of recipes that match it. Sometimes I just search one ingredient and whatever cuisine I am feeling....it always finds me something!

title: Love this app!
body: I've found so many great recipes from this app -- it's easy to use and organized well. The shopping list feature is really handy. Highly recommend!

title: Great way to organize meals
body: I don't think I even use all the features yet, but I like the way you can make a shopping list from the ingredients or on your own.

title: A solid 8
body: Easy to learn and is user friendly. They have great ideas and a selection. I like how I can personalize the recipes that I want. Though, it has brought up recipes with ingredients that I marked  "disliked". I wish they would have a mark for the lifestyle or diet: gluten free, paleo, ketogenic...

title: Fantastic app
body: I have most cooking recipe apps and this is bar-none a fantastic app , I wish it would put stuff in alphabetical order in all yums though , other than that it is a truly great application !!

title: This app is awesome!!!
body: This app is amazing!!! I really love the fact that it has settings to help accommodate allergies and vegetarians when searching. Being a fellow vegetarian for years I would highly recommend this app to anyone!

title: Dido!!!!!
body: I agree with the other reviews. Love yummly! I've used it for about a year and everything I've tried has been delicious! Helps me find recipes quickly for my friends w/ food allergies or restrictions.

title: Food is good, update kinda lame
body: I love the variety and options the only thing I don't like is when it updates my feed as soon as I log on and I see food I like and then I can't find it!

title: Amazing app - don't hesitate!
body: One of the best recipe apps - great filter options, amazing visuals and pulls from so many sites I would have never come across on my own. I tell all my foodie and non-foodie friends alike that this is a must have!

title: Great Resource.
body: I really like the dietary restrictions feature. I myself am vegan; so it helps immensely. I will say though, the ingredients are off a bit. But when you go to the directions page, showing the website, things are cleared up.

title: Great App
body: Has so many recipes that I wrote down in my own books! I have made my mom, grandma's, and aunts down load this app! I will continue to use it daily. Recommend to anyone who knows or wants to cook!

title: Absolutely wonderful
body: Yummly is absolutely wonderful. You can organize recipes by cuisine, dish, allergies, preferences, there are so many options. If you want an app to find recipes you're guaranteed to love, look no further.

title: Yummly App
body: Best cooking app I have used. I have never been much of a cook but this app has helped gain a passion for cooking. I have made so many yummy recipes from this app and I now use it regularly. My little family thanks you.

title: Fun and Easy!
body: I really love this app! As someone who has never been particularly apt in the kitchen, this app give me all the tools I need to make delicious and healthy meals. I especially appreciate the "Shopping List" and the fact that you can add ingredients from the in-app recipes to this list.

title: Easy to use but wish it pulled more recipes
body: Good app! It's easy to use and even allows you to create shopping lists direct from the recipe. My only gripe is that it doesn't give a wide enough variety of recipes IMO but definitely worth checking out.

title: Optimize for iPad..Please!
body: Yummly is by far the best recipe app on the planet! After trying several other apps I downloaded Yummly and my cooking experiences has become YUM everyday! I only wish the developers design an optimized version for the iPad!

title: Absolutely love it
body: I love Yummly. This app makes it so easy to find so many delicious recipes especially for me since I'm dieting. I have gotten so many rave reviews for my meals that I finally had to tell people where I got the recipes.

title: Fun to use
body: Great pictures, fun suggestions. However, searching is somewhat difficult- filters aren't intuitive and don't refresh automatically.

title: Awesome app
body: I've already cooked two meals using this app. It's so easy to use and the shopping list feature just makes it even better when I decide to cook somethin special.

title: Awsome!
body: I have 4 other recipe apps on my phone and this is the one I use the most! I live the pictures it gives in case I want to find something new I want to make. Easy to use also!!!!

title: Beautiful app
body: This app is gorgeous! The pictures of the food always inspires me to try new recipes. However, I'm knocking off one star because I get a connection error and periodically lose connectivity, even when my wifi is full strength.

title: Best App Ever!!
body: This is by far the best food recipe app ever. I love it! It comes in handy when ever I need a new recipe. Easy to use. Has many options. Everyone needs this app on their phone. Well everyone that loves too cook does ! üòäüëçüèºüçΩ

title: Great... but not perfect.
body: Great resource for a broad-spectrum of recipes from all across the net. Only problem is that it doesn't save the website from which the recipes come from. If the recipe goes away on the originating website‚Ä¶ You're out of luck.

title: Love love love but....
body: I love love love this app but the disliked ingredients i put on the list keep showing up in recipes that i really want but cant use such as shellfish, which I am highly allergic to. Other than that this app is amazing and gets me all kinds of recipes i have yet to try!

title: Best cooking App
body: Always comes in handy when you have no idea what to cook. It has a variety of recipes. The interface is very easy to use. I definitely recommend it.

title: Cooking is no longer a hassle!
body: I finally found a cooking app I can go to and find a recipe without searching all over Google. It has great images, reviews, ingredient list and a recipe box.

title: Horrible app!
body: I've used this app for a long time (around a year or so) and after the latest update, it has been horrible! It constantly crashes or can't connect to the server. If my screen locks when I'm in the middle of a recipe, the app refreshes and takes me straight back to the front page and I have to hunt down my recipe again. Sorry, Yummly. I will be leaving you and finding a new recipe app :(

title: LIFE MADE EASIER
body: This app has changed the way I grocery shop, and has added SO MUCH variety to our lives. My favorite part is adding ingredients to the shopping list and being able to delete them as I shop (or delete them if I already have them at home).

title: Use it every week!
body: I love looking at the different options when I don't have the slightest idea of what I want to cook for dinner. Then when I have an idea I simply insert the ingredients in the fridge and yummly does the rest!

title: Yummly
body: I love this app!!!‚ù§Ô∏è I think it's awesome that you can catagorize your recipes.  I find it super easy to navigate through! Everything I have made so far is delicious!!! In the event you don't like something you can un-yum it!!

title: My go-to source for every kind of recipe!
body: Yummly is like having a library of recipe books that fits right in your pocket!  I hardly ever have to go anywhere else to find something to cook!

title: Great app
body: Awesome recipes from a wide variety of sources.  Having the nutritional information upfront is also incredibly helpful.  I use this all the time for meal ideas.   Interface is nice and easy to use.

title: So Useful!
body: This app makes it easy to meal plan, store recipes, make grocery lists, etc. I like that I can make my own recipe collections and that I can alter the servings and it will adjust the ingredients. It made meal planning so easy!

title: Easy to use, good recipes
body: This app follows my favorite sources for recipes: smitten kitchen and Martha Stewart. I wish there were a way to mark and comment on the recipes you've made, but otherwise, it's a very user-friendly app.

title: Too much fun
body: This is loads of fun! I'm on a strict diet, and a lot of the recipes are diet friendly. The only reason I gave it 4 out of 5 is because once I tag a recipe, such as sole, it gives me more suggestions that are too similar. The shopping list option is great!

title: Great resource
body: This application has been indispensable in the tracking down of hard to find recipes and methods of cooking. It has single handedly replaced every other recipe related application I use.

title: Great app!
body: This cooking app always has great recipes along with detailed shopping list and step-by-step directions. I use this app almost every single night to get dinner ideas from.

title: The BEST!
body: This is the only recipe app I use now--Forget all the others! Awesome pictures, tons of recipes, and pulls from so many different blogs and other recipe apps. Thanks from our family, I really stepped up my cooking game!!!

title: Breakfast Smoothies
body: I'm dieting and needed to add some variety to my breakfast smoothies. Yummly help me do that and I was able to keep up with the nutrition facts at the same time! I haven't tried any savory meals yet, but I'm sure they won't disappoint either!üòä

title: Great app/great recipes!
body: Im a vegan for 17 years and have accumulated enough recipes but this is way better....right on my finger tips i can look up all of them! especially when im food shopping and can't remember ingredients, i can just "yummly" the recipe and find all my infos!

title: Nice looking app
body: I don't cook much, but am trying to change my ways. Not only does Yummly make cooking look more appealing, it makes things so much easier with the shopping list & categories features. I'll be on Top Chef before you know it.

title: Amazing recipes, but crashes constantly
body: The app is amazing and very user friendly...on the off chance it's working- which with this current update- I can't close the hints, or use the filter without the app crashing- and upon opening again, saves none of my work.

title: Charming
body: The photos are terrific and the layouts great. The variety of offerings is excellent and the recipes easy to prepare. The only part I don't like is the push toward specific when others might be cheaper and better-- the feeling of being manipulated.

title: Best cooking app of them all!!
body: It really is!! There are so many great recipes. I love that you can search them by whatever you're looking for (eg. breakfast no egg). Why are you still reading this? Download it & get to cooking!

title: The bomb
body: I love this app.  I rave about it to all my friends.  I especially like the Shopping List feature.  I would ask that you develop a way to let us share our Yums with friends.

title: Awesome app
body: I love this app. It is so much easier than going online & sifting thru a bunch of different sites. With this app I have recipes right at my finger tips. It also makes it easier with a 2 yr old!!!!

title: Great Fun To Use
body: No more searching around for different website recipes.  Alot of recipes are right here in one place.  Complete and concise and easy.  A time saver.  Recipes are clear and easy to follow.  I'm glad I found "Yum"!

title: Love the iPhone app, not the TV app
body: I love the searching options on the iPhone app, and how you can sort for diet specific options. The TV app needs to have better options for searching.

title: Love Yummly But Needs Improvements
body: This app has great recipes but sometimes the direction part is difficult to access. That makes it harder to actually make them the way intended. But overall it is wonderful tool.

title: Wonderful
body: I love the app it is easy to use and I can find most any kind of recipe. It makes a shopping list for me and I can get what need. I can make anything so easy and quick. Love it

title: Handy app to keep track of recipes.
body: Some web pages won't "grab" properly but most do. The most straight forward app for recipe organization I've found.

title: Has become my go to!
body: Yum has become my go to for instant recipe ideas. I'm no shaft but I am not an office enjoy cooking for my family and coming up with creative and fun ideas for the recipes and meal combinations

title: Love the variety
body: Sometimes it can be overwhelming with all of the choices for a particular recipe, but I suspect there's a way to control which ones show up that I have not searched for yet. But it is definitely my go to app for recipes!

title: Love it!
body: This app is awesome and the design is effective and easy to use. I love Pinterest but hate being launched into third party sites for recipes.  Yummly has the great recipes, directions and ingredients... No third party all in one app... The best thing ever for foodies!!

title: I love this app!
body: I like that I can search for recipient within my diet restrictions. I also am a big fan of being able to make grocery lists while I make my menus for the week!

title: Love the integration with the Apple TV app!
body: I like to use this app when I get inspired in the grocery store and it's nice to review them on my 4th gen Apple TV to show others. Will definitely be using this for a long time.

title: Yummy recipes & easy to follow
