body: The app is full of delicious & easy to follow recipes. And it makes grocery shopping much easier because the recipe can be transferred directly to a list. Nice work, Yum team! Thank you!

title: Always makes me hungry!
body: Easy to use, easy to navigate and easy to find delicious recipes. The only problem is that I'm always hungry five minutes into using this app. :)

title: Love it!!!
body: Gorgeous app! The interface is super friendly and easy to jump around between the ingredients, nutritional facts and directions... the shopping list is one of my favorite things üëç

title: My favorite
body: Perfect app for cooking! You can filter recipes based on you me diet or allergies, build a shopping list from the recipes you like and then rate the food so other people can see. üôå üôå

title: Hotel General Mgr
body: I have managed restaurants for

title: Gluten Free
body: Being gluten free has a set of challenges, but this app really helps make dinner more exciting. I love how you can filter out foods you can't eat and tons of options are still given to you.

title: Great app
body: I use this app all the time.. it gives you recipes from a bunch of different sites without searching those sites individually. All in one spot shopping so to speak.. love it!

title: Yummly
body: I've used this site for about four years now and I have found so many recipes I've tried from it and have never been disappointed. Thanks Yummly!!

title: Above Average
body: Exceedingly great combinations of foods for a vegan, but searching for a recipe was incredibly annoying when I only ever got one or two recipes unrelated to my search word. For example, I would type in "Tofu" and get one recipe on how to make a smoothie, one small ingredient being tofu. Is there nothing out there that isn't under 300 calories, 12 carbohydrates, and 10 grams of fat?

title: Best recipe site
body: The variety of recipes is excellent! The app functions flawlessly. The only perk missing is a way to make personal notes on a recipe after having tried it.

title: Great app
body: Great app I love all the features but ever since the new update it closed and crashes all the time and I have not been able to click on anything without closing it used to work perfectly now it's not ...

title: Best recipe app ever!!
body: Never seen so many recipes in one place! This app has everything I need and even for my low carb diet I am finding tons of awesome recipes. Very pleased with the interface and ease of use as well!

title: Great App!
body: I love this app! It's easily customizable to anyone's preferences and cooking skills. The choices and variety of breakfast dishes, lunches, dinners, salads, soups, smoothies, desserts and drinks are fantastic! I'm recommending this wonderful cooking app to everyone I know, and it's absolutely free! This is for foodies everywhere!

title: Save my day

title: LOVE IT!
body: This has been a phenomenal app for me.  I'm a registered dietitian and this app allows me to quickly find healthy and delicious recipes.  The app is so easy to use and I recommend this app to my clients and patients when I can.  Love love love!!

title: Love it
body: It's my favorite recipe app. Love that I can create a shopping list with recipe ingredients. I only wish they had an option to search recipes based on ingredients you already have.

title: Whoa! Where have you been my whole life??
body: This app has changed my cooking life. I LOVE the clear pictures which make all the dishes look oh so appetizing! Thanks and don't ever leave the app world...my family's dinner life depends on it! Ha

title: MOST AMAZING APP
body: Whoever designed this app is a genius.

title: Amazing App
body: Love this app! Very helpful when trying to find ideas for meals.  The shopping list feature is the best!

title: Gets me Started
body: I love food. Reading about food is almost as good. The emails with suggestions and recipes to get me started is nice. The layout is easy to follow and helps to make a decision to read further.

title: Yummy app!!
body: It has all sorts of recipes. Search with a word and there it is your favorite recipe. Sometimes I look for  something else and end up finding more yummy recipe than what I was looking for.

title: Great App!

title: Great app, very easily replaced my other cookbook!

title: Love It!!
body: A great place to find new and delicious recipes!  I love that it had kinda taken the legwork out of searching all over the web.  So far, I have tried about 5 of the recipes and they have all been DELICIOUS!!

title: Definitely worth the download

title: Great App!

title: App keeps crashing
body: I love this app^_^ but it keeps crashing. Tried rebooting my phone, doesn't work. Always need to delete and reinstall app for it to work again.... please fix ASAP üòî

title: Yummly
body: A handy pocket sized cookbook. Very well laid out. I'm a vegetarian and have found many recipes. It is also helpful in telling how many calories a dish is, even how much fat content, and how to make a lighter version.

title: My Favorite Recipe App
body: This is my favorite recipe app all of the recipes are great and the app has an amazing design and layout. You should definitely get this app if you're an avid believer in finding amazing new recipes in a visually pleasing manner.

title: Daily use!
body: I am on this app at least twice a day. It inspires not only a nutritional diet, but menus from around the world. Easy to use and convenient. Never had a recipe that has been a family fav! #yum

title: Amazing

title: Great app for recipes
body: I use the app and the website to get ideas for meals. I'm new to cooking and appreciate that Yummly gets their recipes from a variety of sources, as an aggregate site. It definitely tops my list for a useful cooking app!

title: Love it!
body: I really love this app but it's annoying that the full recipe takes extra navigation to get to--it should be more readily available.

title: Go To Recipe App
body: Yummly is super easy to use and is  "Google" and "Pandora" combined, but for recipes. Love it! The app does need a way to search only the personal saved "Yums," but otherwise very useful app and easy to navigate.

title: Very Helpful

title: This is nice

title: Totally solves my cooking + shopping needs
body: The UX could be improved - I don't love the main menu folding concept (it's slow to use). But the features are all there and work well.

title: User
body: Say I think this is the best user-friendly app I've used. The programming behind it messed taking a long time because it is so wonderful both visually and functionally.

title: Love it!
body: I have found so many good recipes. This is my go to site when I am looking for something yummy. So many categories & recipes to choose from, plus I can save my favorites.

title: Very handy
body: This app is highly convenient for someone as experimental,  but somewhat clueless as myself when it comes to cooking. Love the different options. I always find a recipe to try.

title: Yum yum Yummly

user_name: This will be the death of me!!
title: Love it!

title: Very Concise, Lovely Recipes, buuut...

title: AWESOME !!!!!

title: Best App Ever

title: Life saver and game changing

title: Love!!!
body: I really love this app!! I use this app to find meals for my family. I also use the shopping list! It's great! Amazing! I would like to see a way to use it as a calendar. That would be truly awesome!! Keep it up!

title: Awesome

title: Fantastic ideas, inspiring photography
body: The food looks amazing. It makes me want to get off the chair and go make something great!

title: Great App!

title: Beautiful user interface
body: I love the ability to create a shopping list from one of the recipes. It makes trying new recipes easy!

title: By far my most used app!

title: Uh, yeah, it's yummly!

title: Awesomesauce

title: Amaaaaazing!
body: It's like Pinterest for food with a built in grocery list! Phenomenal app!

title: I love this app!

title: Absolutely Everything

body: Whenever you select a an item to view it the app crashes back to the springboard. No sure why. Just a heads up.

title: Crashes constantly
body: I loved using this app on my iPhone 4S, but when I upgraded to the iPhone 6 and try using it, the app crashes every single time I use. This app has great recipes, but they are I good if you can't access them. There was an iOS recently that (I thought) was supposed to fix the crashing issue, but it didn't.

title: Too Bad
body: Yummly required an update so I attempted to do so. It's been updating ever since, that was about three weeks ago. What gives? I'll just find myself another app to fall in love with.

title: Great App

title: Amazing Amazing
body: The way this presents options..transition between pages and ux design is simply awesome. Just installed and used for 5 mins and wanted to write review. That's how much am impressed with this app. Will update review based in the recipe contents soon.

body: I love this app so much that I'm app to look in my freezer and create some new and delicious that my whole family will enjoy. It even made things super fun for my 11 year old daughter who loves to cook.

title: Troy Holmes
body: This is the best app specially for moms who run out of ideas. Every single recipe I have tried on this app has turned out amazing and the whole family eats all of it!!!! I've become dependent on Yummly!

title: Excellent App
body: Has everything one needs to organize a great meal or just work with whats at home. I also like the way I can organize and archive my likes.

title: Love!
body: Love it! One stop shop! You can save recipes for later & they even suggest things you may like based on your history! I love to cook & love Yummly for my explorations. Also, I love to just read recipes!

title: Great recipe app!
body: I love that I can choose what type of recipes I want to see. My daughter has multiple food allergies, and this makes finding recipes so much easier.

title: Love love love this app
body: I absolutely love this app. I have used so many recipes and they all have turned out amazing. This app is incredibly easy to use and it builds itself off of what you like.

title: Love Hate
body: I love hate this app.  When it works it's great, but for the last few months I've had to use it without my account because it wouldn't link.  I've deleted and downloaded the app over the months due to this issue.  Still keeps happening.

title: Awesome recipes
body: Love this app. I love how you can store and organize recipes and add ingredients to a shopping cart. The recipes are so delicious. So far my favorite is the healthy chicken Marsala. Just follow the recipes exactly and you can't mess up.

title: Yummly keeps me sane!
body: So easy to search for recipes. Save them ("yum") and then make a shopping list. I check my pantry and fridge, then go shopping and check things off the list.

title: This app is saving my life
body: I have multiple food & drug allergies. I can enter my allergies, dislikes, & preferences & get TONS of recipes without everything I'm allergic too. This is the exact tool I needed to learn to cook differently!  I'm truly grateful!

title: Yummy yummly
body: I use this app every time I cook dinner anywhere. I might sub out types of fish or meats, but these ingredients and recipes are cheap and easy. If you like to cook but don't know where to start I'd download this app!

title: Truly brilliant!
body: I'll never be bored or out of ideas again! I'd been waiting for something like this to become available. Truly my favorite app for cooking!

title: Beautiful Pictures
body: I absolutely love love the pictures of meals ..presentation is everything ..the recipes are awesome not only do they look good they taste good.. I turn to this App when I need idea for dinner ..thank you

title: I really like this app!
body: They have a wide selection of recipes! I can always find something delicious rather quickly! It makes cooking easier for me!

title: Love it !!! Only...
body: I just love this app it's the best recipe app ever I would love it even better if you could add recipes to the app instead of going online for it. Hope it's for future update possibly.

title: I love yummly
body: Yummly makes it easy find a variety of dishes, just clicks away, and boom you just suddenly become a pro chef :p anyways, i like this app ! I think i can save money from buying cook books :)

title: Love the app....but now it won't open!
body: After the update and even a delete and reinstall, it crashes as soon as it launches.... Sure wish I could use it to help plan thanksgiving dishes for this week! Please fix soon!

title: Best cooking app ever
body: Yumm is my go to recipe app.  Works great, easy to use.  I wish it would keep the recipe I've got open when my phone goes to sleep.  It's a pain to need to find the recipe again.

title: Amateur chef
body: LOVE this app! If you want to search for an ingredient in your kitchen and be inspired - this is it! I also love that I can filter for only vegan recipes to show up in my searches. Couldn't live without Yummly!

title: Amazing App.
body: It's amazing has so many recipes but in my opinion I think for people who don't know much about ingredients that they should include a picture next to them so people know what they are. But other than that amazing I love it.

title: So easy! So in love with this app!
body: Impressive variety, easy interface, wonderful photos, convenient grocery lists, clear instructions - I may never go back to cookbooks!

title: Great concept
body: Great if you know what kind of meal you want. Just type in let's say chicken and scroll down until you find something that looks good to you.

title: Move over!
body: I have told all my other recipe apps to 'move over'! Yummly has made most of my other recipe apps unnecessary, and has introduced me to many that I was never aware of.  I'm happy!  :)

title: Would be five stars
body: Visually appealing. Easy to use. Only issue is that some recipes are linked to other sites and difficult to read.

title: Help me with this great app!!!!!
body: Really like this app, but not sure why my wife and I can't share the shopping list anymore, despite being logged under the same account. Anyone have suggestions? Thank you.

title: Cooking made easy
body: Easy to use.  Nice layout with ingredients list for shopping, Directions for making,  and nutrition for My Fitness Pal.  My Yums is very helpful for keeping those favorite recipes.

title: Pretty....
body: much a pain to use. All these inviting pictures seem to only lead to content from other sites that render awkwardly in the app. If they did as good a job extracting the instructions as they do extracting the ingredients and nutrition this could be very useful. For now it is rife with frustration and disappointment.

title: Could be better
body: My main gripe is how you yum a recipe and then 100 recipes for the thing you just yummed come up. Give me similar things, not the exact same things! I also want a better way to sort recipe categories. Right now theres no quick way to just look at Mexican for example. Improve these and 5 stars

title: Great Recipe
body: I think it is great with having the visual along with written recipe side by side. Along with making a grocery list for that recipe. I found that the recipes I  use have all been a success .

title: I like it
body: I've been using Paprika for years and love it. This is better in that it has all the suggestions for you to browse and search.
Better than wasting money on cookbooks and being able to select the actual recipes you want

title: Love it!... But crashes.
body: I absolutely love this app. I love cooking and finding new recipes everyday to try. But when I am organizing my categories or my shopping list, or if I'm just on the app for a long time, it crashes every single time.

title: Great App
body: I love it. I can find recipes fe sides to desserts. Easy share feature, save feature and shopping list creation. It's great for finding new recipes when you want to break up the monotony!

title: So Many Recipes! You name it.. It's here!
body: I love this app and it's amazing photos and options. So many recipes including beverages, breads, desserts, fancy or casual eating. It also includes calories to each meal which is very helpful.

title: Wow
body: This app is amazing I found myself cooking and eating foods I had only seen in restaurants so easy to use and just tap on the food you like to add it to your shopping list

title: Addicting
body: I can't believe how addicted I am to a cooking app. Whenever I'm bored I don't go on Instagram no more, I would rather go on my Yummly app. Precise and concise ingredients and directions. Definitely worth a try.

title: I'd be lost without it!!
body: I love it!! If I need to cook chicken and have no idea what to make I just type it in and the recipes are amazing!! Would definitely recommend it to others!!

title: Excellent resource for diverse cuisines and aptitude levels!
body: I use this app all the time! It is a wonderful starting point for menu planning and/or looking up a way to jazz up an old favorite!

title: LOVE THIS APP
body: Looking for recipes has never been easier!! It's like a one stop shop for meal ideas and being able to put different dishes in separate catagories is big time!

title: Wonderful
body: Love the recipes! Gives you a chance to try something different that's not to difficult to make! Great suggestions for your tastes!!

title: Great idea app!!!
body: I love looking at this first thing in the morning. It's easy to use, fun to search and I love the fact that it gives you great ideas for dinner with simple directions and you can even create a shopping list!!!

title: Best!
body: Love everything about this but mostly how beautiful all your custom categories are stored. I have it loaded on my iPhone, my iPad, and my Mac. Easy to create categories and manage recipes!

title: Awesome recipes
body: I love this app and refer it to to all of my friends! I love that you can search for anything, and it gives easy instructions. My favorite go to for trying new recipes!

title: Love this app
body: This app is great. I love all the ways you can look up items to cook either by style (crockpot) or by items that you have. Plus the email recommendations are great!

title: Great for meal planning & grocery shopping!
body: Love the ease of use and being able to change serving sizes, while also adding all ingredients to a shopping list. Perfect!

title: Ok to awful...
body: Bottom line: ads take up half the screen and keep popping up over and over and over, its visually exhausting.

title: Great Application
body: This application has been great during my new eating habits. It provides from healthy to some other great yummly dishes. I would highly recommend this application to anyone.

title: Great App!
body: This app is very awesome, like I love it. Every recipe I've ever found off of it has been up to my standards and it always turns out great even with modifications. I only wish they had the option to make your own recipes!

title: Love it!
body: I can't say enough about Yummly!  The custom search options and content are fantastic!  The apps ability to add to a list and portability make it a must for any family!

title: YES
body: I've had this for 5 minutes and I'm already obsessed with it. Have to get this and you get to choose your diets which I'm very happy about being a vegetarian.

title: Wish recipes had a tab for reviews
body: Love this app, great set up, graphics and search engine. Please add a tab in each recipe to review recipes so I could make something that many people have succeeded with and review recipes myself. Thanks for this great free app. Love it...

title: Aesthetically pleasing!
body: Pros: Functionality, looks great, easy to navigate, helpful, quality interface

title: Doesn't cater to food sensitivities well
body: I love the variety of different recipes available, however we have multiple food sensitivities and the search doesn't always filter and find recipes ready to accommodate our family needs.

title: Love this app!
body: So far all the recipes I have tried I love. I love the pics, the shopping list is very useful. I would definitely recommend this app to anyone who is not cooking savvy like myself.

title: It's the Greatest
body: I love this app.  There are so many recipes I have tried.  My daughter told me about it and there is so much it offers to a person.  It is truly worth getting

title: Favorite cooking app
body: This is my favorite app to cook with. It is very user friendly with a sleek modern design. The recipe suggestions and shopping list part are some of my most favorite features.

title: Exactly what I've been looking for!
body: Amazing app! You can't go wrong with this one! Loads of new and different recipes and shows calorie count for most of them!

title: Great app for a non-cook!
body: I hate to cook, but I do it one night a week at my husband's behest.  Yummly has made this unpleasant task palatable.  Quick, easy recipes are easy to find and I love the grocery list function.

title: Great inspiration...
body: Still loving this app!

title: What a great app for searching recipes
body: I love this app.  It's great to search for recipes, to save the ones you really like and compile your shopping list. Best app of this type that I've found.

title: Simple and convenient
body: This app allows you to easily add recipes, categorize them and add the necessary ingredients to a shopping list! The days of losing/forgetting your grocery list are gone!

title: Best Cooking App Ever!
body: This app is so convenient! It is by far the best cooking app I have used. It is easy to use and tells you exactly what ingredients to use and has endless step by step recipes! Download it!

title: Nice app!!
body: I really like the recipes and how I can keep track of the ones I use the most. Would like to give 5 stars but the app is a little slow but other than that it's great especially if you have diet restrictions!

title: Great recipes
body: Love Yummly!  It's great to be able to search for recipes over so many site in one fell swoop.  Great that you can search by ingredients, calories, prep/cook time, etc. or combinations of categories. I just wish the calorie counts were more accurate.

title: Very handy
body: Quick access to look up ideas (e.g., how can I get rid of extra Cheerios). One glitch: prep time is way off on most recipes. Also, takes you to new sites but hard to find Back button.

title: Great app but runs slow
body: This app is great but graphics are too big or server is too small as it all loads slow otherwise keep up good work and include a few more sites in your database of recipes please!

title: Best app for foodies!
body: As a fellow foodie, I just say that this app is perfect for finding new exciting and delicious recipes. So far I've tried about 6 recipes that I had found on this app and they were all very good meals.

title: What I was looking for!
body: An app with great photos and access to many recipes. Definitely recommend and in fact just did.

title: Must Have!
body: This is one awesome app!  Great pics, pertinent info, and links to detailed step-by-step directions.  It can even become your grocery list!  Very handy little tool!

title: Highly Useful
body: The app itself is beautiful. Functionality really sparkles, navigation within recipes and interaction shopping list make this very handy. Recipes are awesome too üòâ

title: It's about time!!
body: With all the allergies I have, i've been waiting forEVER for yummly to release an app. I check every so often, and it's finally here! THANK YOU!! So good to finally have Yummly on the go!

title: Too many advertisements!
body: A beautiful app and seems to have a lot of yummy recipes.  Only problem is the amount of ads and I can't navigate through the recipes without accidentally clicking on them. Also, the Screen refreshes and moves so much it becomes frustrating. As a result I don't us the app and will most likely end up deleting it from my iPhone altogether.

title: Practical
body: Quick easy recipe finds by search or though the site recommendations. Site is also simple to navigate. Recipes are all great so far!!

title: Great Ap
body: I love this Ap. there are tons of great recipes and it is easy to search through what you have saved. My only complaint is that there aren't general searches. For example I wish I could search "crock pot", "high carb", "high protein", "Asian food", etc.

title: Wonderful!
body: I love this app!  I find recipes that are unusual and  also those that are comfort recipes. It is easy to use and has become my favorite goto app to answer the "what's for dinner" question!

title: I'm finally learning how to cook!
body: I really like cooking but don't know any recipes nor do I really think of any to look up on my own, so suggestions from this app are a lifesaver

title: Saved my life
body: No joke. Dinners were the most stressful thing for me to do for years until I found this. Thank you for making this!!!!

title: Great and resourceful
body: I've been using this app for a long time and I love it. Easy access, I always find something I need and it is very user friendly. It's my go to.

title: So many yums!
body: This app makes shopping so much easier. You like the dish,and it creates a shopping list for you! Plus the filters for food allergens or special diets is fantastic!!!

title: Fantastic!
body: I was looking for an app just to get some new cooking ideas and I am blown away by how intuitive, thoughtful, and well executed this app is.  I couldn't ask for more.

title: Amazing
body: I absolutely LOVE this app! I highly recommend this to anyone. It's very easy to use and I love that you can just click on the ingredients and add them to your shopping list. Best recipe app ever

title: A real Friend !!!
body: It is a real Friend in my kitchen, really easy to use, and the best way to cook depending what you have at home rather than go and buy everything for a new dish, it is one of the best apps!!!!

title: Excellent App
body: This is a great app for recipes. I'm vegan and I use it regularly to find unique recipes and always find something way better than what I was looking for!

title: Awesome App
body: I'm a working mom/wife and this app is so helpful!  I love the recipes and the ability to save them into folders saves time when looking for something to make!

title: Baker
body: I give this app 3-stars based not on its content, which is fabulous, but for the bloody hoops it puts you through in order to get into it in order to print a recipe. It requires you to sign in every single time, even if you know exactly what recipe you want. It's annoying.

title: Near perfect
body: This is the best resource for cooking though the ux needs some slight changes. For example the directions takes a lot of scrolling for me to even find it and started to think it didn't exist

title: Number Feature Fix!!!!!
body: The number count of how many times a recipe has been made is really helpful in finding a trust worthy recipe, but the number count has gone away now! I've had to redownload the app again and again to fix this glitch! Would be a five star if this was fixed!!!

title: The perfect recipe app!
body: Yummly is perfect for anyone that loves to cook and try new things. It's like a never ending database of recipes. They're easily searchable whenever you're inspired to cook something classic or something new.

title: Set up is nice
body: I love how the app is set up. It doesn't show you everything but it shows what you'd need for the recipe and it always has a picture of the course which I find better and more appealing

title: It restored my love of cooking
body: I love this. The filters are great and help me find the perfect dish. I love that I can search for course and length of cooking and it filters out allergies!!  It's how I find dinner almost every night.

title: Great App
body: If you like or love to cook, this may be the only App you need. They have limitless recipes and they're really easy to follow. I already used a lot of the recipes and my family loves them.

title: Peep this!
body: I give this a 5 * for sure. Everything about this app is helpful, even down to feeding my family great every time. Awesome food, and very inspiring dishes, makes me look like a  master chef!

title: AWESOME APP.
body: I LOVE LOVE LOVE this app. Everything I I have ever wanted to make, how to make it, and what I need to make it is all here in just 1 easy place. I have traveled the world and now I can share all those great dishes with friends and family. Just AMAZING!!!!!

title: "Yum" Filter!
body: I like the app, mom loves it.  There needs to be a new filter added though based on how many "yums" a recipe has.  We would find this incredibly helpful because we only make the recipes with the most "yums", as those are the most reliable and yummy!

title: Great app, highly recommended
body: This has brought nothing but great idea and food into my life! It appeals to everyone and has a variety of recipes for any level of food master!

title: Dietary restrictions
body: The app is amazing for finding recipes, creating shopping lists that are useful, and storing my favs for the future.

title: Ymmy yummly
body: I'm overly a novice chef( very limited skills!) everything I've cooked from this app was delicious & the cooking process was easily explained!

title: Very Convenient
body: This app helps me make whatever it is I'm in the mood for and if I don't know what I'm in the mood for it offers an endless amount of suggestions.

title: Best app ever!!!!!üòçüòçüòç
body: I absolutely love this appüòçüòç!!!! It's easy to locate recipes and they are sooooo delicious, being since I'm a vegetarian I'm always looking for new ideas .... I find everything I'm looking for in this app.

title: IsabellaLotusB
body: I love this app!  It is easy to use and has a wide variety of recipes.  I like that the nutritional information is available because I cook for a type 1 diabetic.  Thank you!

title: Love it
body: Super easy to navigate along with helpful search tools.

title: Best recipe app
body: This application is simply a must-have for any home cook. Not only is it stellar for looking up recipes, I enjoy it for last minute meal ideas and brainstorming based upon ingredients left in the fridge.

title: Food planning is so much easier with this app!
body: Now I don't have to go all over the place to find and create my library of recipes!

title: Culinary 4 Dummies
body: Where has this app been all my life...!!!  This app is Saving my life and my food bill!  Takes all the guesswork out of shopping, nutrition and being the next Gordon Ramsey.

title: Favorite recipe app
body: So many awesome recipes. My only grievance is that when you close the app and come back to it, you have to reload the recipe. Other than that, it's fabulous.

title: Gourmet Chef in the Making!
body: I never enjoyed cooking or baking until I found this app! So many delicious recipes, everyday I wake up excited to find something new to make for dinner!

title: Wonderful and inspiring!
body: Love so many of the recipes and how it shows recommendations based on what you like and some dietary restrictions. Just wish it included diabetic and low cholesterol options.

title: Great app!
body: Saves me a lot of time when trying to figure out what to make for dinner. Several recipes to compare ingredients. One of the most used apps on my phone.

title: Rocking My Kitchen
body: Ever have one of those days where you just don't know what to make? This app can help! With detailed pictures and an unmatched search database, you can find just about anything to satisfy the foodie within.

title: One of my fav food apps!
body: I have a few food apps so I'm using this one first to give it opportunity and it hasn't failed me since I got it about 2 months ago.

title: Practical
body: Very practical. Find the food you want to eat. Click on it and find out if you have the ingredients. Make the grocery list. Come back and use the instructions to make it!

title: Love it!
body: I've found so many great recipes! The directions are simple, food easy to make, ingredients easy to find, and food tastes great. Made a new recipe tonight and it was a hit! The app does stall on occasions tho. Only issue. But you can exit and reopen it.

title: Great app!!
body: I love this! It gives you fantastic recipes, and tells you how to make them with the added bonus of what you will need from the store.

title: So helpful.
body: Whether I'm at the grocery store figuring out what's for dinner or finding a recipe for a special occasion, this app and the recipes found on it have come through every time.

title: Nice looking and useful app
body: I love how neat and put together the app is. When I find a recipe I want the instructions and photos are very helpful and detailed. I use this app whenever I want to try a new yummy recipe.

title: Elegant and useful
body: This app is wonderful for new and exciting ideas. The only drawback is not having the ability to take notes on your favorite dishes, i.e. Changing ingredients so that you'll remember the next time, etc.

title: One Stop!
body: I love that I don't have to search multiple sites/apps anymore to find something appealing! Definitely my new go-to app for finding uses for those items I receive in my co-op variety basket every week.

title: It's alright, allergen concern,variety
body: The app is great, aside from the fact that my (online adjusted) taste preferences don't sync up with it, and I have used Facebook to connect with both. It is a main concern for me because I am allergic to both wheat and peanuts, and when I am online I mainly only get drink recipes, some more variety would be nice with the recipes.

title: Love it!
body: I love this app! Always my go-to place to find recipes & try something new! You can find anything with just a quick search!

title: Too Much Fun
body: I really love this app. The flow and ease of navigation makes finding interesting bloggers' and chefs' ideas on food a snap. Plus it's got a great folding interface and the ability to store favs.

title: Love!
body: I absolutely loooooove this app!! Its so much easier than using google to find recipes and it gives you better ideas and more options. Its fabulous :).

title: PERFECT
body: The shopping list feature is awesome and so useful- everything works great! They have all kind of diet preferences like pescatarian and no tree nuts. All the complainers that don't give this five stars are full of it!

title: The Pinterest of Cooking!
body: Great way to quickly filter and sort recipes by ingredients or name. And then save them in your own little online organized cookbook!

title: Need New Recipes
body: I love the app but cannot give 5 stars because they need to put more new recipes on daily. I always see the same recipes daily, I have deleted the app and reinstalled the app months later. Guess what the same recipes pop right back up

title: Love this app
body: Makes all other recipe apps useless. Easy to make folders of current recipes. Always find new ideas and old favorites.

title: Excellent
body: Good recipes with the number of people that have liked it. Also, allows you to make a shopping list.

title: This is my go to app!
body: It is easy to find a new recipe ideas!  I recommend it to most everyone that is complaining about "what to make for dinner"!

title: Losing fear of cooking!
body: I began with dietary limits and, most importantly, time limits. If it takes more than 45 minutes, I can't cook it. I am past that limit and it is so EASY to find a tasty recipe on here!

title: High quality app
body: All the recipes are available for free! They have various dietary options available as a filter! Such a great app highly recommend

title: Superb app!
body: What can I say? Need any kind of recipe????? You can find it here! And there is plenty of variety no matter what you are wanting to prepare! Also I they send emails with great suggestions! Love it!!!!

title: Must for any cook!
body: I grow a garden every year and this is the fastest way to figure out what I can make with what I grew. Love the shopping list feature and how everything connects.

title: Extortion
body: I am not a lab rat. This advertisement driven app simply want you to jump through (One too many) hoops for every morsel you get. If you don't do "A" you don't get "B". If you don't do "C" you certainly won't get to "D". I don't know about you but if I'm going shopping for ingredients I certainly don't want my time (standing in the grocery store) spent plunging through time-consuming advertisements. Keep your recipes!!!!!

title: Awesome app!
body: I love that I can just type in an ingredient I have at home and need to use and Yummly will provide recipes! For example, I put in pork chops and apples, there were great recipes to make! I didn't really know you could cook with the two!

title: The best site ever
body: I use it for inspiration on all my meals. It is so easy to find and organize the recipes I like to save. I've told all my guests don't ask for the recipe get yum oh. It's all there. Terrific

title: Truly essential
body: This app truly inspired me to pick up cooking again, it gives you the ability to choose specific ingredients for the dish you are cooking. Love it!

title: Reviews
body: I think most of your recipes are awesome, except the pork & most of the seafood ones.  Still I am able to work around them!!  Keep up the good worküòÑüòÑüòÑ!!!

title: Love this APP
body: I am new to gluten intolerance and had my 5 or 6 "safe" foods that I knew I could eat.  This APP is stuffed full of so many recipes and different ways to cook simple meals.  I haven't came across a bad recipe yet.

title: Yummly!!!
body: I love this app. It is hard to come up with ideas sometimes and this app helps so much. Also, it's so good to have your grocery list made while you're picking a recipe. This is an AMAZING app!!!

title: Fantastic App!
body: I love this app!! Super helpful when I am prepping my grocery list and looking for new recipes.  The extensive recipe selection has everything from clean eating, to comfort food, and yummy desserts.

title: I love it!!!‚ù§Ô∏è
body: This app really helps me a lot! It is easier to find a specific food that i like to cook and it is easy to pick some specific recipes if i am lacking of ingredients.

title: Perfect for Adventurous Cooks
body: Great app, pulls from all the most relevant recipe sites. Constantly updated with new recipes and the shopping list feature is the best I have used to date.

title: Love this!!!!
body: I absolutely love this app!  It's modern, clean, and simple.  Their recipes range from super easy to more advanced.  You can see how many "Yums" or likes a recipe received.  This is the best cooking app I've used so far!

title: Yum!
body: I use this app all the time it's so easy to find recipes that match every diet type and to save them if you want to use them again!

title: Time Saver!
body: I love food and I love saving time, this app is definitely good for both. I love how it tailors things based on your on lifestyle. Beautiful interface and many delicious recipes at your fingertips!

title: Great app
body: My husband and I always find great recipes in this app. Helps change up how we eat certain foods instead of eating meats the same boring way every time.

title: Best food App!!
body: I absolutely love, love, love Yummly! I have been waiting for a great recipe app to come out and this is it!! I have used it everyday since I got it! Very easy to navigate and simple to use. Best part about it, it's free! ;)

title: Yummly is Yummy
body: I love this app. I love how you can put needed ingredients on your shopping list.  The only thing I wish they would add is a menu feature, so you can create your weekly menu and have it available at a glance.

title: Great app!
body: The food ideas it has are great! I get the most use out of its grocery list feature, it helps me organize meals for the rest of the week

title: LOVE, LOVE, LOOOOVE THIS APP
body: Not only is it easy to use.. Recipes are awesome and different. Many options for one dish with a built in grocery list!! Doesn't get easier than this! From experienced cook to new cook.. This app is the best!

title: Easy and convenient!
body: This app works great!  Easy to find quick recipes, drink recipes or whatever you may need.  Highly recommend.

title: Great!
body: Warning: this app may make you spend way too much time staring at food recipes. All I want to do is make everything! It's easy to use and a visually appealing app.

title: Freezes and doesn't update consistently
body: Beautiful and I love the nutrition info but it doesn't update my saved recipes consistently so it can be frustrating to have to search for the same recipe over and over.  Also why the pop-up ads on some of the recipes?!? Very annoying.

title: Great
body: I love this app only down side is the recipes are only viewable when in an area with wifi. So if you plan on purchasing ingredients be sure to screenshot it or write it down before going into a store with no wifi!!

title: Absolutely amazing!
body: This app is AWESOME! If you like to cook, I highly recommend downloading Yummly. The design is beautiful and it's so easy to use. Plus, the recipes are great. I haven't had a cooking fail with any of these recipes yet. DOWNLOAD NOW.

title: A Must-have!
body: I've only had this app for 10 minutes and I already know that I'm going to use it a lot. I wish I had known about it sooner.

title: Amazing App

title: This app gets worse and worse

title: Love the wealth of recipes!
body: This is my go to place to search for recipes.  You can search by more then one keyword and see ingredients right away.   There are many filters to help you find just the right recipe.  Then you will link to original blog or website for the recipe directions.   You can set up custom folders for storing favorites or potential recipe  There can be inaccurate measures occasionally when you compare actual recipe   to Yummly list , but overall it‚Äôs a great tool.   I had issues using it in an older Android tablet but none in a newer Iphone yet.

But it‚Äôs nice to use an app like Yummly where there are thousands of recipes for everything u can think of. Just wanted to make sure I point out it takes all the measurements into account. Wether ur feeding 6 people or 20. I have recommended this app to both family and friends.

I appreciate how the recipes are linked to the grocery list and can be added to my calendar. title: Love this app!!!!!

And there‚Äôs tons of recipe options to choose from!! I also like that it shows you a shopping list - you can send it to yourself and sit prices it out among some popular grocery stores. It‚Äôs so handy and functional. I don‚Äôt cook very often so as a beginner who needs inspiration and easy things to make, this is the perfect place to find what I need!!

title: Very helpful, but Suggestions.

There needs to be a code in which the app recognizes that there is already an item in the list and will not double up such. An alternative is maybe adding a way to say ‚ÄúHey, I have this, I don‚Äôt need it!‚Äù Much like the salt and pepper. title: If you can imagine!
body: I do not do reviews. I am 66, and have always loved to cook. My collection of cookbooks was massive. Then I found this app. The search function is incredible. Great app I would recommend to accomplished cooks as well as novices.

title: Deserves to win every app award!
body: This is a fantastic app. Once you pick a recipe, you can add the ingredients to a ‚Äúshopping list‚Äù for you to shop or ‚Äúbuy‚Äù and it will send to you Instacart or amazon fresh account to be delivered.  Then on that page you can see the prices each store is charging and the total grocery bill price!  In addition, you can swap out brand, organic, or type (green bell pepper for red or yellow) and you can change the quantity!  I also love how you can set it to your calendar so it‚Äôs easily found when you‚Äôre ready to cook!  Just all around well thought out!  It should win best app award!!!

title: What happened?
body: I‚Äôve been using Yummly for a couple years now, and have been very pleased. But with the new app and changes, I can no longer import a recipe from Safari on my iPad. Used to, I could hit share and Yummly would come up as an option. No more. I‚Äôve never been able to import one from Crome. That‚Äôs always been a pain. This is so frustrating! I find great recipes on the web and want to save ones we like in my virtual cookbook, but now I cannot. Why? I‚Äôve spent far too much time trying to figure this out. I guess it‚Äôs time to move on to an app that will let me do what Yummly USED to let me do. (BTW, this problem is just with my iPad, not my android phone.) ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

title: Nearly the only place I go-to
body: The app is fabulous for finding new and easy to follow recipes, which is very important for me as the wielder of the spatula in our home! I really appreciate how you can adjust the servings as needed and it will automatically adjust the recipe to match your needs. It helps save time and let‚Äôs face it... time! No one wants to have to deal with the nuisance of figuring out what the difference in spoon or cup or oz is gonna be if they need to make more or less to fit their families needs... it will just make them want to pass on a recipe altogether in favor of something simpler to avoid the hassle... but Yummly takes the guesswork out for you and let‚Äôs you just keep going with that tasty sounding new recipe you have been really interested in trying!
